cutscene.desc: The water ripples in the breeze as the seagulls fly overhead. The ubiqui- tous windmills of this bright white world turn, their heavy creaking sound sailing on the air. Beneath the water, schools of fish swim in slow currents. High above the water, cable cars traverse over wires in the sunlight, clanging as they move along. At the world's central point, a grand tower stands. Inside the tower, the sun shines warmly on a pair of young boys seated at a table. The wall-length curtains ripple as the breeze wafts through the open window. On the table sits a game board with twenty playing pieces, thirteen black and seven white

xml.sp: Boy in Black Have you heard of the ancient Keyblade War?
Boy in White Huh? Of course I have.
Boy in Black Long ago, Keyblade wielders waged a war over the ownership of light.

cutscene.desc: The Boy in Black moves one of his black pieces and takes one of the white pieces, as you would in a chess game

xml.sp: Boy in White Yeah, the Master's favorite story.

cutscene.desc: The Boy in White takes a black piece with one of his white pieces

xml.sp: Boy in Black I wonder what they planned on doing with Kingdom Hearts after... making it appear.
Boy in White Who knows? I don't get why anyone would initiate a war.

cutscene.desc: The boys keep playing

xml.sp: Boy in Black So...you know the Lost Masters?
Boy in White Who?
Boy in Black They're the ones who started the Keyblade War.
Boy in White Never heard of 'em. Where'd you hear about that?
Boy in Black Or...they're the ones for whom the war started.
Boy in White I'm not following you.
Boy in Black You can drop the facade.
Boy in White Facade?
Boy in Black On that land shall darkness prevail and light expire. A prospective Keyblade Master should know this.
Boy in White If you say so.
Boy in Black The Gazing Eye sees the fate of the World.

cutscene.desc: The Boy in Black looks up to a Keyblade on the wall with an eye set in its teeth

xml.sp: The Boy in Black The future--it's already been written.
Boy in White Really? I'm not so sure about that.

cutscene.desc: He picks up a white piece bearing a blank heart token

xml.sp: Boy in White Besides, who's to say I can't change it? And maybe light will prevail.

cutscene.desc: The Boy in Black gives a small laugh

xml.sp: Boy in Black Pretty confident.

cutscene.desc: He moves to claim another white piece

xml.sp: Boy in Black But things aren't in your favor.
Boy in White Perhaps. But unlike darkness, there is more to light than meets the eye. You might be surprised.

cutscene.desc: The Boy in Black smiles, peering at the other boy with his gray eyes

xml.sp: Boy in Black Oh, I hope so.

cutscene.desc: Far into the future, Sora, Donald and Goofy meet at Yen Sid's Mysterious Tower. The trio stand at attention as the former Keyblade Master sits in his tall chair

xml.sp: Yen Sid In order to defeat Xehanort, there are allies we must gather, acting now to rouse them from their slumber. We have discussed this before, Sora.

cutscene.desc: They nod

xml.sp: Yen Sid Your Mark of Mastery exam was conducted in the hopes you would acquire the power to wake them. However, the darkness nearly took control of you, and your grasp of your new abilities leaves much to be desired.

cutscene.desc: Sora looks sad and Donald and Goofy share concerned faces

xml.sp: Yen Sid Furthermore, Xehanort nearly made you his vessel, and in the process stripped you of most of the power you had gained by then. I suspect you have already noticed this, correct? But first, you must regain all the strength you have lost. Perhaps it is foolish to expect a complete recovery, but it is absolutely vital you perfect one power--the power of waking, which you failed to master during your exam. There's someone who lost his strength and found it again, a true hero to whom you ought to pay a visit.

cutscene.desc: Sora perks up and strikes various bodybuilding poses, to Donald's less- than-amusement

xml.sp: Yen Sid Perhaps he can point you in the right direction.
Sora saluting Got it.

cutscene.desc: The sorcerer nods

xml.sp: Donald Master Yen Sid...
Goofy You can count on us to take care of Sora!
Yen Sid I would have it no other way. I put Sora in your hands.
Donald to Sora And don't forget, we'll keep an eye on you.

cutscene.desc: Donald holds out his hand

xml.sp: Goofy Oh, this is gonna be lots of fun!

cutscene.desc: Goofy joins with his own hand

xml.sp: Sora It's not a vacation!

cutscene.desc: Sora completes the trio

xml.sp: Sora Let's go!

cutscene.desc: They stand at attention toward Yen Sid

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy Count on us!

cutscene.desc: Later, the three fly in the Gummi Ship, seemingly going nowhere. Donald and Sora cross their arms impatiently. Sora whines as Donald glares at him

xml.sp: Sora How're we supposed to get there now?
Donald What? I thought you knew!
Goofy Looks like all the old highways are closed. Didn't Master Yen Sid say that Sora should trust the guidance his heart gives?
Donald C'mon, Sora. Which way?
Sora Ummm...
Donald Hey, would you get serious?
Sora Gimme a break, I'm trying. These things take time!

cutscene.desc: Donald sighs

xml.sp: Goofy Well, since we've already been before, why don't you try picturing out friends like we're there?

cutscene.desc: Sora stands up and walks behind his chair

xml.sp: Sora Hmmm...

cutscene.desc: He strikes a bicep pose, mimicking Hercules

xml.sp: Donald Well?
Sora Sorry, I got nothin'. What did you expect?

cutscene.desc: Donald falls back into his chair, exasperated

sp.speaker: Goofy
sp.q: May your heart be your guiding key.

xml.sp: Sora Huh? What's that?
Goofy Master Yen Sid always said that, right before we went off on any of our real important adventures.
Sora Really? (to Donald) Ring a bell?
Donald Uh-uh...
Goofy Maybe I just imagined it.

cutscene.desc: He scratches his head

sp.speaker: Sora
sp.q: May my heart be my guiding key.

cutscene.desc: He gets an idea and runs back to his chair

xml.sp: Sora I've got it!

cutscene.desc: He summons the Keyblade and aims it forward. The tip glows brightly and a portal opens ahead of the ship

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy It's a gate!

cutscene.desc: Sora sits in his chair

xml.sp: Sora All right! Olympus Coliseum, here we come!

cutscene.desc: He grabs the controls and the ship speeds off into space through the portal
KINGDOM HEARTS II.9

xml.sp: Narrator At long last, the time had come. The planets were edging into perfect alignment...and the plan Hades devised eighteen years ago was about to reach fruition. The Fates had predicted this very future--the day he would sieze control of Olympus and rule over all the cosmos. Hades' previous attempts--using Terra, Cloud, and Auron to advance his plans for conquest-- had failed. The hour was not yet right. But now the planets were aligned and nothing could possibly go wrong. A wave of darkness lanced down from their celestial rank, and one by one, Hades freed the Titans from their prison--some of them the same monstrosities that Sora and his friends had already fought and bested before. With both the Titans and his longing for vengeance against Zeus reinvigorated, Hades began his attack on Olympus.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy land on Olympus in a small cave

xml.sp: Sora Huh? Uh...

cutscene.desc: He sees no one around

xml.sp: Sora No fanfare?

cutscene.desc: He mocks playing a trumpet. Donald listens for one, but shakes his head

xml.sp: Donald Un-uh...

cutscene.desc: Goofy looks around

xml.sp: Goofy Nope, looks like we missed the Coliseum.

cutscene.desc: Sora continues looking around

xml.sp: Donald Sora, YOU opened the gate!

cutscene.desc: Sora scratches his head bashfully

xml.sp: Sora I was a little off again. Sorry! We'll find him. But we need to go!

cutscene.desc: He starts walking in a direction

xml.sp: Donald Up the mountain?
Sora Yeah. Up is the usual direction.
Goofy Well, never hurts to have your head in the clouds.
Sora Exactly!

cutscene.desc: Smirking, he makes a tough fist. Goofy giggles and Donald gives a sigh. Sora continues walking with Goofy following behind

xml.sp: Sora Hey. We're leaving!

cutscene.desc: Donald opens his eyes and jumps with a shout, running up to catch them. Soon, they reach a clearing with a few trees

xml.sp: Goofy I think we might be goin' in circles.

cutscene.desc: Sora thinks

xml.sp: Donald judgmentally Sora...
Sora Did I make a turn at the wrong rock?

cutscene.desc: He walks closer to the edge and calls out

xml.sp: Sora Hey, Hercules! Where are youuu?

cutscene.desc: A wisp of smoke lands near them and out of the cloud appears...

xml.sp: Hades All right. I know I dotted my I's, crossed my T's, zeroed the hero. So what gives? Who could possibly be trying to give me a migraine by yodeling that yutz's name?
Sora Really? Hades?

cutscene.desc: Hades sighs

xml.sp: Hades Oh, it's just you. Oy vey.
Sora It's just us? Even for you that's cold.
Hades Don't forget...I can always (yelling) turn up the heat!
Goofy Wait. If Hades is here, then where's Herc?

cutscene.desc: Hades whirls toward Goofy, startling him

xml.sp: Hades What is everyone's infatuation with that dolt?!

cutscene.desc: The blue flame on his head bursts into a large red one, turning his skin red as well. He glares at Goofy for a moment before cooling himself down, becoming blue again

xml.sp: Hades You know what? Never mind. Never mind. I'm cool. I'm good. Because...Wonderboy'll be outta my hair soon enough.

cutscene.desc: The trio summon their weapons

xml.sp: Sora So you're up to no good again!
Goofy Of course he is.
Donald You bet!
Hades Whoa, easy--what is this, Sparta? Kind of on a schedule. Don't have time to toss around the old fire and brimstone. The whole cosmos is basically waiting for me to, you know, conquer it!

cutscene.desc: Hades walks away and they dispel their weapons

xml.sp: Sora Poor Hades. He thinks he can actually pull it off this time.
Hades calling Where are my Titans? Show me your power!

cutscene.desc: The sky turns dark and the ground shakes. An enormous shadow looms over them and Donald hides behind Sora before a blast of icy wind comes over the mountain. Above, lava flows from a nearby precipice

xml.sp: Hades Ahh! Love the breeze.

cutscene.desc: The wind gains speed and sheds its icy qualities. The three struggle to hold on but are swept up and off the mountain. Hades looks over his handiwork

xml.sp: Hades Ahh. That sent 'em sailing.

cutscene.desc: He pauses

xml.sp: Hades Sailing right to where I left...

cutscene.desc: He turns away casually

xml.sp: Hades Eh, no biggie.

cutscene.desc: He gazes upward at the Titans

xml.sp: Hades Nice work, boys! So, back to the whole cosmic coup thing?

cutscene.desc: They retreat into the mountain again. Hades waves as a corridor of darkness appears behind him

xml.sp: Hades Ugh. Really? Are you kidding? Geez Louise. Seriously, when it rains, it pours. Okay, who's the new pest?

cutscene.desc: He turns to see...

xml.sp: Pete Hey, now, that ain't no way to say hello, 'specially to your old friends.

cutscene.desc: Pete and Maleficent emerge from the portal

xml.sp: Hades Oh, perfect. Now I gotta put up with you two. Funny, I don't remember you doing me any memorable favors. So, you can keep your Heartless this time. I'm going back to my original plan. All right? So...toodle-oo! Exit's thataway.

cutscene.desc: He points to his left

xml.sp: Hades Hey, it was great seein' ya! (singing) Happy traaails!
Maleficent We are not here for you. I have my own business to attend to. All I need to know is if there is a distinctive...black box somewhere in this world?
Hades Black box, huh?

cutscene.desc: He thinks

xml.sp: Hades Hmm... Black box, black box, black box... Wait. Don't tell me... You're after the one Zeus hid on earth?
Maleficent Possibly. If I were, where might it be?

cutscene.desc: Elsewhere, in the city of Thebes, Hercules wipes his hands together, having done some heavy lifting, when upon hearing the sound of screams, he turns, seeing Sora, Donald and Goofy flying towards him. His eyes widen and he jumps into the air, catching Sora and Goofy in both arms. He lands on one knee and stands

xml.sp: Sora See? Found him.
Goofy Yeah, guess this counts!

cutscene.desc: Hercules chuckles

xml.sp: Donald Get me down!

cutscene.desc: Herc turns to see Donald caught on the fangs of a lion statue

xml.sp: Hercules Just a second!

cutscene.desc: Donald yells and crosses his arms with a glare. After Hercules saves him...

xml.sp: Hercules You guys are here! Sora, Donald, Goofy! You literally dropped in. Gotta say, I'm impressed.
Donald Thanks!
Goofy Liked the catch.
Sora Yeah, thanks Herc. But...what's going on?

cutscene.desc: Sora looks around at the burning city, smoke plumes billowing into the sky. Several cracked stone building surround them. Hercules sighs

xml.sp: Hercules Take a guess. Starts with an H.
Sora Ah, I get the picture. Actually, we bumped into the H-ster on the way here.
Donald nodding Uh-huh.
Goofy He said somethin' about conquerin' the whole cosmos.
Hercules All of it, huh? Nice of him to show a little self-restraint. Well, whatever he's planning, I'll send him running back across the Styx.

cutscene.desc: He strikes a hero pose and Sora mimics him

xml.sp: Sora That's our Herc!

cutscene.desc: The four of them walk through the city toward a gigantic statue of our famous hero himself

xml.sp: Hercules So Sora, is there a reason you guys are visiting? I'm guessing it's not just for the cheese and olives.
Sora Oh yeah!
Goofy It sounds like somebody forgot.
Donald That's Sora.

cutscene.desc: Sora crosses his arms

xml.sp: Sora I just...took my time remembering. Herc, I came here so I could ask you something.
Hercules Ask ME?
Sora Yeah. Do you remember the last time we were together? You were feeling down and out. How'd you get your strength back--when you jumped in and saved Meg?
Hercules Hmm...that's tough. All I know is that she was in trouble. Suddenly, I wanted to save her with all my heart, but...it's not like I could tell you how.
Sora looking down Oh, man.
Hercules What's wrong?
Sora All my strength is gone from me too. That's why I need you--because I was hoping you might have a solution, or something.
Hercules I'm sorry, Sora.

cutscene.desc: Donald sees a shower of meteors over Herc's shoulder, but on closer look, they're actually...

xml.sp: Donald Heartless!

cutscene.desc: Most of the Heartless land, while one strikes the statue of Hercules on the foot, causing the enormous statue to topple over. The trio take out their weapons

xml.sp: Hercules Let's talk later!
Sora Right...once we've dealt with these guys.

cutscene.desc: They fight the group of Flame Cores

xml.sp: ??? Hercules!

cutscene.desc: Herc turns to see a flying white horse, Pegasus, land with a whinny near them, carrying Megara and Philoctetes. Meg, as her friends call her, jumps down from Pegasus with Phil in tow

xml.sp: Meg You're okay!
Hercules Meg!
Meg Boy, that didn't look so fun.
Hercules No, not with the Heartless involved. We're just lucky our friends showed up.
Meg smiling Well, whaddaya know? Sora, Donald, Goofy, guess I owe you a big thank you.
Hercules Meg, you need to stay someplace safe. We'll search the city and make sure everyone manages to get clear of the fire.
Meg Be careful, Wonderboy.
Hercules I will.

cutscene.desc: He turns to the trio

xml.sp: Hercules So, you guys in?
Sora Of course we're in!
Donald We're heroes!
Goofy Mm-hmm!
Meg Break a leg then...heroes.

cutscene.desc: They strike a pose. Meg walks back to Pegasus

xml.sp: Hercules Phil, you should go with Meg.

cutscene.desc: Phil nods and follows her, leaping aboard the horse. Hercules approaches and strokes his mane. Pegasus lets off a loud whinny

xml.sp: Hercules You gotta keep her safe.

cutscene.desc: Pegasus responds with a serious stare before taking off into the sky. The four watch until they're out of sight

xml.sp: ????Heeelp!

cutscene.desc: Goofy lifts an ear and listens

xml.sp: ???? Is anyone theeere?
Goofy Hey! I hear a voice!
Hercules From which way?

cutscene.desc: Goofy points to their left

xml.sp: Goofy Over that way.

cutscene.desc: Hercules looks up to see a young girl trapped on a large rock against a stone wall

xml.sp: Girl Help meee!

cutscene.desc: She almost slips

xml.sp: Hercules Oh no! There's a little girl caught in the fire!
Sora running ahead Let's go!
Hercules Wait. Running's too slow!

cutscene.desc: Sora slides to a stop

xml.sp: Sora Then what's the other choice?

cutscene.desc: Herc thinks and turns to the fallen statue

xml.sp: Hercules pointing Get on that.

cutscene.desc: Donald, Goofy and then Sora climb aboard the cape of the statue

xml.sp: Donald Is it safe?
Goofy shrugs Hope so.
Sora Like this?
Hercules That's good. Now hold on tight!

cutscene.desc: They hang on as Hercules lifts the gigantic statue above his head with a grunt

xml.sp: Sora Wh-- Wha-- Whoooa! Herc, m-maybe we should... I don't think this is a good idea!

cutscene.desc: Hercules aims the statue toward the fire and sends it sailing

xml.sp: Sora Oh no! Not agaaaaaain!

cutscene.desc: They successfully rescue the girl in time

xml.sp: Girl Thank you for saving me.

cutscene.desc: She bows

xml.sp: Sora Yeah, no prob.

cutscene.desc: She giggles and runs off

xml.sp: Sora We better check and see if anyone else needs us.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Donald Yep.

cutscene.desc: Maleficent portals in behind them

xml.sp: Maleficent Well, if it isn't Sora and the King's pawns.

cutscene.desc: They turn in surprise as Pete follows her

xml.sp: Sora Maleficent! Pete!

cutscene.desc: The trio brandishes their weapons

xml.sp: Sora Are you the reason the Heartless are here?
Maleficent Certainly not.

cutscene.desc: Pete eyes Sora carefully

xml.sp: Pete Say, Maleficent, I dunno about his sidekicks, but Kid Keyblader here looks way punier than the last time we saw him.

cutscene.desc: Sora frowns

xml.sp: Pete I say we finish him off while we still can.
Maleficent Waste no time with the boy. He's inconsequential. We have a far more pressing matter to attend to.

cutscene.desc: Pete crosses his arms and raises an eyebrow in thought

xml.sp: Pete Oh! We gots to find that black box.
Maleficent Be silent, you fool!

cutscene.desc: Pete grimaces at her outburst

xml.sp: Maleficent As for you three: we shall meet again...when I have time for such trifles.

cutscene.desc: She turns and enters a portal of darkness

xml.sp: Pete Yeah, and youse better get your act together before then. Later, twerps!

cutscene.desc: He waves them off and follows the witch

xml.sp: Sora Wait!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs after them but the portal closes in time. Sora stops, his shoulders slumping

xml.sp: Donald Sora?

cutscene.desc: Sora sighs, looking crestfallen

xml.sp: Sora It's fine. I can take it.
Goofy Gawrsh, it sure don't sound like it. Did Pete sayin' mean things bother ya?

cutscene.desc: Sora crosses his arms

xml.sp: Sora petulantly It's fine! I can take it.
Donald You're gonna get stronger!
Goofy We know ya! You CAN take it!
Sora Don't say that!
Goofy to Donald I just said what he said.
Donald He can take it!

cutscene.desc: They proceed through the city, when another barrage of Flame Cores bursts through the buildings ahead, causing Goofy to yell. They defeat the Heartless and continue onward, however the path forward remains engulfed in flames. Sora approaches, but is burned

xml.sp: Sora Ouch!
Donald Now what are we gonna do?

cutscene.desc: Goofy holds his shield out in front of him and pushes it against the fire. Seeing that he's okay, he turns to them

xml.sp: Goofy Fellas! I just got a crazy idea!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald catch on

xml.sp: Sora The shield!
Goofy Ready?

cutscene.desc: Goofy tosses the shield to the ground and Sora and Donald leap aboard. Goofy gets ready to push

xml.sp: Goofy Here goes!

cutscene.desc: The shield slides forward over the fiery bricks as Goofy jumps on. They ride the shield sled-style through the flames as debris falls around them. At the end of the path, the flames die down and they hop off just as a huge fiery rock shoots from the sky

xml.sp: Donald The building!

cutscene.desc: An immense structure held up by numerous stone pillars crumbles to the ground

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, I hope they've got insurance.
Sora If there's anybody else stuck out here, we'd better find 'em fast.

cutscene.desc: They enter the Gardens section of the city where a young woman is trapped on top of a pillar, surrounded by Flame Core Heartless

xml.sp: Woman Someone, heeelp!

cutscene.desc: She peers over the edge of the pillar

xml.sp: Woman Where did all these monsters come from? Hercules, where are youuu?!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy run up

xml.sp: Donald Look!
Sora Oh no!
Goofy Help is on the way!

cutscene.desc: They run down the stairs towards the fray and the woman sees them

xml.sp: Sora We'll put these hotheads out!
Goofy Hang on up there!
Woman Huh? Who are you three? Where is Hercules?
Donald Hey, we're heroes too!

cutscene.desc: The defeat the Heartless and the young woman descends from the pillar, running over to them

xml.sp: Woman Thank you. You're so kind. Keep training and one day you'll be great heroes just like Hercules.

cutscene.desc: She giggles and waves, leaving Sora's smile to falter

xml.sp: Sora Keep training? Is it that obvious?
Donald Just for you.
Sora Hey!
Goofy I think we all have a ways to go. But we'll get there together!
Sora Yeah, we will.

cutscene.desc: Donald gives a sheepish look. On their way out of the Gardens, another meteor destroys a tower in the city. Pasing through an Alleyway, they enter the destroyed building and find Hercules stopping it from crashing onto a family inside

xml.sp: Sora Herc!
Hercules Sora!

cutscene.desc: The trio runs in as the building continues to erode. Hercules struggles to hold it as debris rains down on all sides, sending up swirls of dust. The exit collapses

xml.sp: Donald Nooo!

cutscene.desc: Heartless surround the terrified family

xml.sp: Sora More Heartless!
Hercules You take them. We need to save these people!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs up and summons his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora Herc, can you hold the building?
Hercules grunting No problem!
Sora Donald. Goofy. We gotta do this quick!

cutscene.desc: The trio make quick work of the Heartless while Herc shouts words of encouragement until his strength starts to waver

xml.sp: Hercules urgently Get the people out!
Sora Okay!

cutscene.desc: They run over to the three Olympians

xml.sp: Sora Are you guys all right? You need to get to safety.
Goofy Hurry, hurry!
Sora Go! Quickly!

cutscene.desc: As they run out a hole in the wall, Sora pauses, worried as Hercules begins to falter. Rounding the corner the ground starts to shake as the building collapses. Huddling together, Goofy summons his shield as a dust cloud blasts toward them. They look up as the last of the fallen rocks trickle to the ground. Goofy dispels his shield as Sora walks toward the rubble

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy Hercules!

cutscene.desc: Facing no response, the trio frowns before hearing footsteps. A large figure walks out of the cloud of dust, the hero himself coming into view. Hercules dusts off his armor and they exclaim joyfully. Herc brushes his chin with a sigh of relief

xml.sp: Sora You scared us!
Hercules It's nothing. That's what these are for.

cutscene.desc: Herc flexes his biceps. Goofy chuckles and he and Donald mimic Herc. They hear a portal open and a familiar, though unwanted, face steps through, peering at them through his yellow eye

xml.sp: ?????? clapping Oh, wow! Very nice, full marks.
Donald Go away!
Goofy No Organization!
Sora You're Xigbar!
Xigbar All this altruism is giving me the warm and fuzzies. So then, does having a heart of light come with an extremely good insurance policy?
Sora Just say what you mean.
Xigbar Oh, but I did though. No good will ever come from putting other people first.
Hercules I was able to save Meg's life because I was ready to risk my own.
Xigbar Because you've got friends in high places, you mean. Tricks like that don't fly for your average joe.

cutscene.desc: Hercules is speechless

xml.sp: Sora What do you know? You weren't even there! If you were, you'd admire Herc's courage.

Xigbar I don't admire one guy leaping into danger if it means someone else might have to jump in to save him. You're all just lining up to lose out. Dooming others to take the fall with ya. Oh, and you can spare me the usual party line. Yes, hearts are powerful when they're connected. But if you put too much of that power in one place, some of those hearts might end up breaking.

cutscene.desc: He points toward Sora

xml.sp: Xigbar Still, Sora, that doesn't mean you should change. Accept the power you're given. Find the hearts joined to yours.
Sora Why would I ever take advice from YOU?

Xigbar As if! You don't have any choice but to follow this sweet little trail of bread crumbs. And at the end, you'll finally realize what destiny has in store for you. In fact, your reward might be right around the corner. You're so close!

cutscene.desc: Xigbar walks away from them, laughing to himself, and vanishes

xml.sp: Sora Hearts breaking? Whose hearts?
Hercules Sora, don't let him bother you. He's just trying to get under your skin 'cause he thinks he can. But we'll prove him wrong. We'll show him that our sacrifices haven't been for nothing.

cutscene.desc: Sora's face brightens

xml.sp: Sora You're right.
Goofy Mm-hmm! Besides, we're already proof enough!
Donald We're a team! When we're together, we can do anything!
Sora Yeah!

cutscene.desc: They continue walking along, before Sora stops, gazing at the spot where Xigbar disappeared

xml.sp: Sora ...What reward?

cutscene.desc: Heading further into the city, they blast through a small aqueduct, finding a large group of Heartless near the plaza fountain being led by a Rock Troll Heartless. They defeat the monstrous being and its tiny underlings when Pegasus returns carrying Meg and Phil. He lands with a winny, tucking his wings to the side

xml.sp: Meg Nice job, Wonderboy.

cutscene.desc: Herc puts a fist on his hip

xml.sp: Meg We checked the whole area. It looks like everyone's safe.

cutscene.desc: Pegasus nods

xml.sp: Hercules That's great. We did what we could.
Meg You heroes have been busy little bees.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy smile excitedly, eliciting a small laugh from Megara. Pegasus alerts them to something up ahead. Phil peers over Meg's shoulder

xml.sp: Meg Oh... Look. More trouble!

cutscene.desc: Ominous dark clouds swirl over Mount Olympus

xml.sp: Hercules It's Hades.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods to both Donald and Goofy in turn

xml.sp: Sora Herc! Let's go!
Hercules Right!

cutscene.desc: Pegasus takes flight as the party makes their way toward the mountain. They travel across a ravine and ascend its steep cliffs. As they get closer to the summit, huge tremors shake the ground beneath them

xml.sp: Goofy This sure does feel awfully familiar...
Sora Yeah, just like before.
Hercules Guys, this is getting worse by the minute. I hope I'm wrong, but my family may need me.

cutscene.desc: He whistles into the sky and Pegasus swoops in, landing next to Herc

xml.sp: Hercules Sora, I'm gonna fly ahead.

cutscene.desc: Pegasus nods

xml.sp: Hercules You've been a big help, but...leave the rest to me.
Sora Family?

cutscene.desc: Hercules mounts his friendly steed

xml.sp: Hercules Yeah. Dad's king of the gods.

cutscene.desc: He takes off before they can respond

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy Whaaat?!
Sora His father is a god? But doesn't that mean Herc is a god too?
Goofy I think it does.
Donald No wonder he's so strong!
Goofy Then he'll be okay.
Donald Won't he?
Sora No. Organization XIII's here. He'll need our help.
Goofy Good point. We gotta go!
Donald looking ahead 'Cause heroes never quit.

cutscene.desc: Sora thinks back to what Hercules told him earlier

xml.sp: Hercules Hmm...that's tough. All I know is that she was in trouble. Suddenly, I wanted to save her with all my heart...
Sora We fight with all our heart.

cutscene.desc: He looks determined

xml.sp: Sora C'mon!

cutscene.desc: The three of them continue forward, when a loud boom shakes the ground. They look over to see part of the mountain moving

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Titan!

cutscene.desc: The colossal Rock Titan tosses a gigantic boulder over the mountainside. The trio run away as it crashes, splitting into pieces. One rock blocks the exit back down the mountain. The tension is palpable as Sora races up the sharp walls dodging barrages of rocks thrown by the Rock Titan. One huge boulder strikes the cliff next to him, sending a rock slide over the edge, just a foot away. As they get closer, they enter the dark clouds and their view of the sun is obstructed. The Titan sees them getting nearer and stomps a foot against the precipice, causing a torrent of boulders in Sora's direction. With some quick footwork, he leaps from rock to rock, quickening his pace to the summit. A lit flame guides their way forward through a cave further ahead where they see flashes of light, proof that they have reached the thick of the storm clouds. Fighting Heartless in their path, the rain beats down in currents and lightning strikes the area around them. The Rock Titan, illuminated by the bolts in the air, hones in on the Keyblade wielder, sending a personal gift in his direction. It strikes just past his face, breaking the mountainside and blocking off the cave. For all the Titan's attempts, they succeed in reaching the Rock Titan. They strike at its feet, dodging when it tries to stomp them until cracks begin to show, causing the monster to fall against the mountain with a growl. With the Titan nearly motionless, they ascend their gigantic foe, striking at the two heads on its bulky body. Rain continues to pour as a power emerges from Sora in the shape of an illuminated train on magical roller coaster tracks. The trio ride in the train cars as sparks fly from the chimney of the Mountain Coaster. The Rock Titan attempts to punch the incoming train, but Sora sends a barrage of fireworks at the monster. The Titan howls and careens off the side of the mountain, tumbling all the way down. The three watch it fall

xml.sp: Sora Yes! That's one down!
Goofy They're not so tough by themselves.
Donald That one was dumb as a rock.
Sora Okay! What's next?

cutscene.desc: They follow the pathway ahead, following a cave to escape the storm. Bursting through a pile of rocks, they enter a bright light, finding a grand stairway into the clouds. Their spirits lightened, they rush up the stairs to a golden door and enter the Realm of the Gods

xml.sp: Sora Whoa! Is this...Olympus?
Goofy Gawrsh, it's amazing!

cutscene.desc: Trumpets sound suddenly, startling them

xml.sp: Donald The fanfare?
Sora Nope!

cutscene.desc: They summon their weapons as Heartless appear. Above the Cloud Ridge, Hercules demolishes Heartless aboard his trusty steed, flying toward the Apex. Hades has trapped Zeus, the king of the gods, in a cone of rock with the powers of the Ice and Lava Titans

xml.sp: Zeus I swear to you, Hades, when I get out of th--

cutscene.desc: The lava reaches above Zeus's head and Hades summons a dark throne to sit and watch his handiwork

xml.sp: Hades No, I'm the one giving orders now, bolt boy.

cutscene.desc: He sits back with a smirk

xml.sp: Hercules calling Don't get too comfortable, Hades!

cutscene.desc: Hades sits at alert and looks around

xml.sp: Hades Huh?

cutscene.desc: Hercules flies in with his sword

xml.sp: Sora We're gonna stop you!
Hades What?!

cutscene.desc: He turns to the gates of the Apex, where Sora, Donald and Goofy brandish their weapons. Hercules looks down to see the other gods of Olympus in chains and swoops down, releasing them with his sword. Hades growls, bursting into red flames

xml.sp: Hades pointing Get them!

cutscene.desc: The Lava, Ice and Tornado Titans approach the trio

xml.sp: Hercules Sora, Donald, Goofy!

cutscene.desc: Herc jumps down off of Pegasus and joins them

xml.sp: Hercules It's on!
Sora, Donald & Goofy Yeah!

cutscene.desc: They ascend the hardened lava cone to get a better vantage point of the Lava and Ice Titans while the Tornado Titan swirls in the wind around them. The Lava Titan sends out a barrage of molten liquid towards Sora, who dodges on the Ice Titan's side of the cone. After dealing the Ice Titan a blow to the face, it strikes back with a blizzard of icy breath in their direction. The Tornado Titan explodes in a gust of heavy wind, knocking the group back to the ground, making it hard to get back up. Combining their efforts, the Lava Titan glows red, spewing a rush of lava toward them as the Ice Titan focuses its energy into a beam of ice. Dodging upwards, they reascend the cone to continue their assault. Hercules grabs onto Sora's legs and spins him around like a top, using the Keyblade to strike at the two Titans until the Ice and Lava Titans collapse with exhaustion. The Tornado Titan moves in

xml.sp: Sora Just one Titan left!

cutscene.desc: The Tornado Titan wiggles through the air, facing its vortex toward the group. Large pieces of debris from Thebes sail out in their direction. Sora dodges the flying rubble, sending spells at the whirlwind, until the Titan tries another approach. Branching out from its main funnel cloud, it aims two smaller vortices at the group, sending them high into the seemingly endless sky. As they fall from such a height, the Titan spits out more ruins toward them along with burning lava sludge and sharp ice crystals. Successfully dodging the barrage, Sora strikes right between the glowing red eyes of the Titan. Suddenly, the Rock Titan bursts through the clouds below with an enormous bellow. The group is surrounded, causing worry to grow on Donald and Goofy's faces

xml.sp: Goofy Uh-oh! Now it's all four of them.
Sora So what? There are four of us too.
Hercules Actually, I think I can make it five.

cutscene.desc: Hercules leaps to the top of the cone, attempting to pry open the hardened rock with his hands. With a great struggle and a burst of light, Zeus emerges from the open stone

xml.sp: Hades Nooo!
Zeus smiling Thank you, my boy.
Sora Yeah!

cutscene.desc: The trio rejoice and Zeus conjures a trove of lightning bolts

xml.sp: Zeus excitedly Hah! Now, watch your old man work!

cutscene.desc: He readies his arm and tosses a bolt at the Rock Titan, splintering rock from both of its heads. The Lava and Ice Titan start to head-tail with the other Titans following, one of the Rock Titan's heads covering its face. The Tornado Titan passes Hercules and he gets an idea. Running alongside the Titan, Herc manages to grab the tail end of the funnel. Spinning it, he swings the head of the vortex toward the other three Titans, who get sucked up into the cyclone. With a final hurl, Hercules sends the tornado flying into space causing a brilliant explosion. Zeus and Herc laugh and exchange a high-five.

xml.sp: Goofy We did it!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy share their own high-fives as Hades glares at them

xml.sp: Hades I can't believe it! I put eighteen years into that plan and you've blippin' ruined it! I REALLY don't like you.

cutscene.desc: He points at them

xml.sp: Sora Just give it up already! You'll never beat Herc, no matter how many times you try.
Goofy Yeah, stay in the Underworld where ya belong.
Donald Go have the time of your afterlife.

cutscene.desc: Hades trembles with anger

xml.sp: Hades Enough already! I did not come this far to be ridiculed by Zeusy high and mighty, his little sunspot, and a trio of clowns!

cutscene.desc: He bursts into red flames

xml.sp: Hades You know what? I'll just go ahead and destroy you!
Hercules Hades.

cutscene.desc: Hades stops, turning his head slowly toward Herc

xml.sp: Hercules motioning The exit is that way.

cutscene.desc: He looks back in the trio's direction and turns blue again with a sigh

xml.sp: Hades Oy vey... Geez Louise...

cutscene.desc: He slowly starts walking toward the gate

xml.sp: Hercules Hold on. I almost forgot.

cutscene.desc: Hades stops and turns back, before getting a knuckle sandwich in the face

xml.sp: Hercules That one's for trying to wreck Thebes.

cutscene.desc: Hades clutching a hand to his face from his spot on the floor

xml.sp: Hades You'll pay for this! I have a very, VERY long memory!

cutscene.desc: He summons a portal in the form of clouds of smoke

xml.sp: Hades I can still dunk your little Nut-Meg in a river of de--

cutscene.desc: Zeus chucks a lightning bolt into the portal just as it closes. Later, the gates to the Realm of the Gods open and the trio and Hercules run out. Herc stops and takes a glance back

xml.sp: Sora Are you sure you want to leave all this behind?
Goofy Isn't Olympus your home?
Donald And your family.
Hercules I can see my family anytime I want. If I stayed, I'd have to be apart from the person I love most... And that life would be empty.

cutscene.desc: He looks at the base of the stairs where Meg is waiting

xml.sp: Hercules I finally know where I belong.

cutscene.desc: He runs down the stairs

xml.sp: Meg Hercules...

cutscene.desc: They share an embrace before the trio catches up

xml.sp: Hercules Sora, we never got back to your question. Can I help?

cutscene.desc: Sora shakes his head

xml.sp: Sora Mmm, it's okay. I think I'm meant to figure it out for myself. I'll find my strength the way you found yours. Something to fight for...with all my heart. I guess you DID have the answer.
Hercules Well, you've got heart, Sora. Just keep at it and I know you'll be stronger than ever.
Sora Yeah, I might even end up stronger than YOU are.

cutscene.desc: Sora strikes a hero pose. Goofy smiles and Donald's face drips with sarcasm

xml.sp: Donald There he goes again.

cutscene.desc: They break into laughter. Meanwhile in the Gardens of Thebes, Pete has been busy digging through the ground while Maleficent oversees the job

xml.sp: Pete Are you sure this box with the Book of Prophecies is for reals? I think that dingbat in black was pulling your leg.
Maleficent Be quiet and dig, you imbecile. I must find that Book of Prophecies and make it my own. His was the only clue we have. We cannot afford to dismiss it without a thorough investigation.

cutscene.desc: Pete continues to dig

xml.sp: Pete I'm just sayin', a shot in the dark ain't gonna get us any closer to--

cutscene.desc: He strikes something solid and looks down

xml.sp: Pete Whoa!
Maleficent What is it? Have you found something? Show it to me at once, fool.

cutscene.desc: Pete lifts a box from the ground

xml.sp: Pete Yes sir-eesy, this has gotta be that Pandora's Box Hades mentioned.

cutscene.desc: Maleficent peers at it scornfully

xml.sp: Maleficent Leave it.
Pete What? After all that diggin'?
Maleficent That is not the box which I desire. We are finished with this world. Come.

cutscene.desc: She walks away

xml.sp: Pete Awwwwww...

cutscene.desc: He looks at the box sadly, before tossing it over his shoulder and running to catch up with Maleficent. Gazing down at them from above is Xigbar

xml.sp: Xigbar May your hear--

cutscene.desc: Darkness. A world without light. King Mickey and Riku travel through the Realm of Darkness in search of Aqua. Riku stops and Mickey turns back

xml.sp: Mickey What's wrong, Riku? Are you tired? Do you need a break? We can stop.
Riku No, just... I've been here. I should know this place. But that all seems like another life.
Mickey Well, gee. Think of all you've seen! All the feelings you've felt. Why, you've done years of growin' in almost no time at all.

Riku I remember my first time here. I was so scared. But now, my doubts and fears are gone. If anything, I feel exhilarated. And it's not because there's darkness in me--I know too well what that rush is like. This is different. And it's not adrenaline either. I know Aqua needs us...but I'm ready. I'm in control now. Maybe it's because you're with me this time.

cutscene.desc: Mickey shakes his head

xml.sp: Mickey It's not me. I think it's because you've finally found inside you that special strength to protect what matters.
Riku What?
Mickey Sometimes you care so much for somebody that other feelings disappear. And then, there's no room for fear or doubt.

cutscene.desc: Riku smiles, looking down at his hand

xml.sp: Riku Is that it?

cutscene.desc: His thoughts drift to when he first held a Keyblade, when he met Terra at dusk on the Destiny Islands

xml.sp: Riku Strength to protect what matters... It reminds me of a promise I made.
Mickey To who?
Riku Just someone I once met. Can't tell.
Mickey Sounds like a good memory.
Riku Yeah... While we're reminicing--Mickey, does any of this look familiar?
Mickey looking around Sort of, but the realm of darkness has changed since I was here with Aqua.
Riku Yeah, it's different from what I remember.
Mickey Usually, I'd just follow my heart, and Aqua would show me the way. But the closer I get, the hazier our connection feels.
Riku You mean...
Mickey Maybe, but we can't give up hope.
Riku nodding Yeah.

cutscene.desc: They continue on to the End of Sea, the Dark Margin, a beach in shadow. A light shines from far across the water

xml.sp: Riku This beach...
Mickey It's gone...
Riku Huh?
Mickey I'm positive Aqua was here. But now...her trail's gone dim.
Riku I've been here, too. With Sora.
Mickey Really?
Riku This is where we found our way back to the realm of light. Hey, maybe Aqua did, too!

cutscene.desc: Mickey solemnly shakes his head

xml.sp: Mickey Aqua...has fallen into an even darker abyss--somewhere I can't see her. And I don't think we're equipped to dive any deeper than we already are.
Riku So then...

cutscene.desc: A horde of Shadow Heartless emerge from the dark sand

xml.sp: Mickey Oh no!
Riku What?!

cutscene.desc: They summon their Keyblades as the Shadows twitch hungrily

xml.sp: Mickey Riku...be careful. Even the least threatening Heartless are stronger in this realm.
Riku I got it.

cutscene.desc: The Heartless run past them, gathering into a huge solitary mass, the Demon Tower. The pillar of Shadows wriggles in the air and dives into the sand near them, scattering the cluster of Heartless across the sand. Riku and Mickey strike down several of them before they reform into the tower from beneath them, tossing them into the air. After a struggle, the tower disperses and the remaining Shadows encircle them

xml.sp: Mickey It's not over. Be careful!

cutscene.desc: Surging from the ground, the spinning maw of the tower hones in on Riku

xml.sp: Riku Oh no!

cutscene.desc: Riku holds an arm up to shield himself but is hit head on by the Demon Tower

xml.sp: Mickey Riku!

cutscene.desc: The tower regains its vertical shape, spinning fiercely with no trace of Riku. He floats in darkness with a sensation like drowning, muffling his sight and his hearing

xml.sp: ???? Didn't expect to see you again.
Riku What...?
???? Why did you even come here?
Riku Because somebody needs me.
???? Do you want some help?
Riku Who are you?

cutscene.desc: Riku loses consciousness in the abyss. The next moment, he hears the sound of the waves

xml.sp: Mickey Riku... Wake up... Riku.

cutscene.desc: Riku opens his eyes, seeing Mickey's sad face leaning over him. The King's eyes brighten into a smile

xml.sp: Mickey Are you okay?

cutscene.desc: Riku sits up

xml.sp: Riku Where'd the Heartless go?
Mickey I got more than half of 'em, and the rest vanished. But, they spit you out first.

cutscene.desc: Riku stands, holding his head

xml.sp: Riku Thanks. I owe ya.
Mickey I know ya feel invincible, but we're not.
Riku Are YOU all right, Mickey?
Mickey Yeah, thanks to the new gear. But...your Keyblade...
Riku Oh.

cutscene.desc: He look down at the Keyblade in his hand, which has been severed just below the winged teeth

xml.sp: Mickey The Heartless here are stronger than what we expected. I guess we probably should've powered up our Keyblades before we came in here, huh? I think we need to go back to Master Yen Sid's tower so we can regroup.
Riku pausing But Aqua's...still down here, alone. Facing enemies like that.
Mickey I know...

cutscene.desc: Riku walks to the edge of the water

xml.sp: Riku What if she's feeling as scared and alone...as I felt the first time I came here? How long are we supposed to keep her waiting in this awful place?

cutscene.desc: Mickey walks up to him

xml.sp: Mickey But Aqua... She's like Sora.
Riku stunned Whaaat!?
Mickey No no no... STRONG like Sora!

cutscene.desc: Riku breathes a sigh of relief

xml.sp: Riku Okay... Good. Then I guess she's gonna be all right. Sora could fall into any darkness and swim his way out.
Mickey Besides, we won't be long.
Riku Right.

cutscene.desc: Riku walks forward and plants his Keyblade into the sand

xml.sp: Mickey Huh?
Riku Can't use THIS Keyblade anymore. Might as well leave it here... for the other me.
Mickey Wha...?

cutscene.desc: Meanwhile, Sora, Donald, and Goofy revisit Master Yen Sid in his tower

xml.sp: Yen Sid I see... You could not regain your strength.
Sora Aw, no biggie. I still learned a lot.
Yen Sid Regardless, Sora, you will need the power of waking.

cutscene.desc: Sora crosses his arms with a loud sigh

xml.sp: Goofy It can't be gone forever. Maybe something'll trigger it real soon.
Sora Like, what exactly?
Donald I know! How about a bonk on the head?
Sora Hey!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald have a staredown

xml.sp: Yen Sid Perhaps it could be something that is as simple as that.
Sora Wait, YOU think so too?
Yen Sid Whenever you are in need, magic happens. That is your greatest strength, Sora.
Sora You make it sound like an accident.

cutscene.desc: Sora slumps over and Donald and Goofy laugh, before they hear a knock at the door

xml.sp: Sora Huh?
Mickey We're back, Master!

cutscene.desc: The door opens and Mickey and Riku enter

xml.sp: Sora pointing Whoa!
Mickey Oh, wow. You guys are all here!
Sora We were here before, but you didn't wait.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy each knock Sora aside to get to Mickey, causing him to fall over

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Your Majesty!
Mickey Hey there, fellas. So, what've you three been up to?

cutscene.desc: Sora stands up, shaking off the fall and runs up

xml.sp: Sora We were visi--

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy push him back to the floor

xml.sp: Donald We went to Olympus to visit Hercules!
Goofy And to figure out how to get all of Sora's lost powers back.
Donald whispering to Mickey But...it was a big disappointment.
Mickey Oh. What a shame. But, honestly...
Riku We didn't fare any better.
Goofy Did ya manage to figure out where Aqua is? 'Cause Master Yen Sid said that's why you fellas left.
Donald Even a hint?

cutscene.desc: Riku and Mickey enchange glances, before the King's face turns sad. Sora sits up on the floor

xml.sp: Sora Come on. Can I finally say something?
Riku We know Master Aqua made it as far as the beach that Sora and I once visited, but that's where her trail ends.

cutscene.desc: Sora stands back up and joins them

xml.sp: Sora Meaning...?
Mickey All traces of her vanish into the great abyss...beneath the realm of darkness.
Donald She's gone?

Riku No. Sora was dragged into the abyss during his exam. And I went in after him. So, I think if we find someone who was really close to Aqua, and they make the dive, they could reach her down there.

cutscene.desc: Mickey shakes his head sorrowfully

xml.sp: Mickey I'm not sure who's even left to ask. Ventus is hidden...and Aqua's the only one who knows where. Plus, nobody's seen Terra in ages. Aqua was the last.
Riku So Aqua--she's gonna be the key to finding all three.
Yen Sid Yes. Their teacher, Master Eraqus, would have been another possibility, had Xehanort not mercilessly struck him down.

cutscene.desc: Yen Sid closes his eyes pensively and Sora places a hand over his heart

xml.sp: Sora I'll save her.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy jump in surprise

xml.sp: Riku & Mickey Huh?
Donald You can't!
Goofy But Sora, that's gonna be super hard since you don't have the power of waking.
Sora Huh? Sorry... I have no idea why that just popped out.
Mickey Well, it was pretty convincing.
Riku Yeah, better not let us down.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods

xml.sp: Yen Sid Sora, you must focus on regaining your lost power of waking. Mickey and Riku, I recall that Master Aqua journeyed to many worlds, and connected with others who could be the link we need.
Mickey Good plan, sir. Riku and I will retrace her steps and see if we can find any sort of clues, but first...

cutscene.desc: Mickey walks up to Yen Sid's desk

xml.sp: Yen Sid Hmm?
Mickey We got hit pretty hard in the realm of darkness. My Keyblade was damaged, and the Heartless broke Riku's clean in half. So, we're gonna need to get replacements before we can continue.
Yen Sid In that case, rendezvous with Kairi and Lea. They are continuing their training under the tutelage of the wizard Merlin.

cutscene.desc: Mickey & Riku bow

xml.sp: Mickey Yes, sir.
Yen Sid Also, I would like you to deliver these for me.

cutscene.desc: He waves a hand over the table and two briefcases appear, one black & pink and one red

xml.sp: Mickey Are they...
Yen Sid Yes, they are the same as the ones I gave you. Special vestments to shield Kairi and Lea from the darkness.
Mickey We got 'em.

cutscene.desc: Riku and Mickey take them in hand

xml.sp: Sora whining What? No fair! What about my outfit, Master?
Donald Sora, don't bug him like that. It's inconsiderate.
Yen Sid Settle down. I have new clothes for you, too, Sora.
Sora excitedly Yeah?
Yen Sid A gift from the good fairies.

cutscene.desc: Sora laughs and Yen Sid appearifies a third briefcase

xml.sp: Sora I knew you'd come through for me. Thanks!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs up to the table

xml.sp: Yen Sid Those are no ordinary garments, Sora.

cutscene.desc: Sora picks it up, upside down

xml.sp: Yen Sid Like before, they have very special powers, so it took extra time to prepare them. In addition, there is a gift from Chip and Dale inside.

cutscene.desc: Sora turns the case the right way and grabs the handle with glee

xml.sp: Sora Cool. Okay!

cutscene.desc: He slings it over his shoulder

xml.sp: Riku Happy now?
Sora Yup!
Yen Sid Now, you are all ready to proceed.

cutscene.desc: A small cricket in a top hat jumps onto the table, carrying the smallest of umbrellas

xml.sp: Jiminy Cricket Hey, wait! Don't forget about me!
Sora, Donald & Goofy Jiminy!
Jiminy Every journey worth goin' on needs a cricket to keep track of it. And I can't let ya start this one without ol' Jiminy Cricket by your side.
Goofy The whole team's back!
Sora Yeah.
Donald Yeah!
Yen Sid Good. Now, to mark the beginning of a new journey, I wish for you to have this, Sora.

cutscene.desc: The sorcerer waves his hand and a purple crest appears in Sora's hand

xml.sp: Sora Okay?
Yen Sid That is a Heartbinder. Think of it as a good luck charm made just for you. You have a gift, Sora, for connecting with others, and this makes that gift stronger.

cutscene.desc: Sora holds the crest tight

xml.sp: Mickey It's time to go!

cutscene.desc: The group of them stand at attention and bow

xml.sp: Yen Sid whispering May your heart be your guiding key.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy huddle to themselves

xml.sp: Goofy See?

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald agree. Sora, Donald, Goofy & Jiminy leave the Mysterious Tower in their trusty Gummi Ship. Sora sits back in his chair as the ship chugs along

xml.sp: Donald Okay, where to?
Sora Ummmmmm...
Donald Oh, come on. Would you get serious?
Sora Gimme a break, okay? I told you. These things take time.
Goofy Gawrsh, is it just me, or is this turning into a routine?

cutscene.desc: A quiet musical tune erupts inside the cockpit, surprising them

xml.sp: Donald Huh? What?

cutscene.desc: They look around for the source of the noise. Jiminy holds a hand to his ear

xml.sp: Jiminy It's comin' from you, Sora!
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: He searches his pockets and pulls out a device with the King's symbol on it. The icon of a telephone ringing is displayed on the screen

xml.sp: Sora What's this?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy walk to Sora's chair to get a closer look

xml.sp: Donald Got me! Make it stop.

cutscene.desc: Sora puts it to his ear and shakes it

xml.sp: Sora But, I don't know how. Maybe...this.

cutscene.desc: He presses the green button on the screen and an video of Dale appears

xml.sp: Dale Hurray! He picked up.
Sora Huh? Dale?
Dale calling off-screen Hey, Chipper, I finally got him! Hurry up, Chip!

cutscene.desc: Chip runs into view

xml.sp: Chip Well, it's about time.
Sora Chip?
Dale Ya gotta answer the phone, Sora, or we can't give ya updates. We got lots and LOTS of important stuff we want to tell ya!

cutscene.desc: Chip and Dale speak into their own phone situated on the desk in the Library of Disney Castle

xml.sp: Chip That's why we asked Master Yen Sid to make sure you got this Gummiphone we made ya. So we'd be able to stay in touch with you at all times.

cutscene.desc: Dale nods, making a rectangle with his tiny fingers

xml.sp: Dale AND it takes pictures.

cutscene.desc: Jiminy jumps onto Sora's shoulder

xml.sp: Jiminy Oh! You finally finished it. Say, with this Gummiphone, we can talk to each other across worlds. In fact, I might even try writing my journal on it.
Sora Wow! Sounds like it's pretty handy, guys. So, what's so important?
Chip This! Back when you and Riku quested through the Sleeping Worlds, Riku recovered some secret research data that Ansem the Wise hid inside you.
Dale Ansem's Code!
Chip Mm-hmm. We've been workin' our tails off tryin' to crack it and see what it says.

cutscene.desc: The video switches to a young man in a lab coat with long gray hair obscuring half of his face

xml.sp: ????? The data has been encrypted, so we've only deciphered some of it.
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: The man stands at the computer terminal inside Ansem's Study in Radiant Garden

xml.sp: ????? Oh... I guess we haven't spoken since the castle. I'm Ienzo. Aeleus is here too.

cutscene.desc: Aeleus walks behind Ienzo silently. He narrows his eyes and stops

xml.sp: Ienzo Aeleus, whatever's between you and Roxas, it's in the past.

cutscene.desc: Aeleus continues walking and Ienzo sighs, turning back to the phone

xml.sp: Ienzo Sora, the reason we're here is because you and your friends defeated our Nobodies, thereby recompleting us. We cast off our hearts by choice, make no mistake, but we didn't know that Xemnas--or rather, Xehanort--was deceiving us.
Sora Huh? Xemnas?
Goofy hotly Aw, he's with them!
Ienzo Not anymore. Xemnas and Xehanort have no hold over us now. We're just students of the heart, exactly the same as we were before all of this began.
Donald Yeah, right.
Goofy Hmm... But ya know, now that I think about it, Axel's on our side now.

cutscene.desc: Donald crosses his arms, his eyes narrowing

xml.sp: Ienzo We have friends we want to bring back to this world, just the same as you. To do that, we have to work together. In that spirit, Sora...

cutscene.desc: He presses a key on the computer terminal

xml.sp: Ienzo ...we found some intriguing data in the bit of code we deciphered.

cutscene.desc: A digital readout of Sora and his Keyblade appear on the D.T.D. screen

xml.sp: Sora Is it about me?
Ienzo Yes. In order to piece your memories back together, our teacher, Ansem the Wise, look a close look at your heart. And what he found...

cutscene.desc: Half of Sora's model on the screen flashes, bringing up red data windows

xml.sp: Ienzo ...is that your heart doesn't belong just to you.
Donald, Goofy & Jiminy It doesn't?
Goofy Gawrsh, you don't seem surprised.
Sora Yeah. Honestly, I suspected as much. There's another heart inside mine. I think it's Roxas's. Just like Namin is still inside Kairi's.
Ienzo Interesting... Well, no one knows your heart better than you.

cutscene.desc: Ienzo taps his finger against the terminal

xml.sp: Ienzo To be honest, we still have a plethora of questions on our side, but...the idea has merit. It's incredible enough that you and your Nobody are able to coexist. If you share a heart...no wonder someone as remarkable as you caught Ansem the Wise's eye. We'll keep investigating based on your hypothesis. I'll be in touch.

cutscene.desc: Ienzo ends his side of the call, and it switches back to Chip and Dale

xml.sp: Dale Okeydokey, we'll give you fellas a ring if there's anything else. Remember, me and Chip, the guys at Radiant Garden, and King Mickey and everybody are never far away.
Chip And Jiminy, would ya do us a favor? Teach Sora how to use the Gummiphone.
Jiminy Leave it to me.

cutscene.desc: The call ends and Jiminy hops down

xml.sp: Sora I have to find Roxas and save him. The others are following Aqua's heart, so I'll follow Roxas's heart!

cutscene.desc: Donald, Goofy & Jiminy nod

xml.sp: Goofy Trust the guidance that your heart gives ya, Sora. That's what Master Yen Sid said.
Donald Where to?
Sora smiling Oh, that's easy.

cutscene.desc: He holds out his hand and summons the Keyblade, aiming it out before him with a flash

The group voyages across the Ocean Between and find their destination, a sleepy village of eternal sunset, Twilight Town. They walk casually down Market Street toward the Tram Common, passing clothing and accessory shops

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, we forgot to fill Master Yen Sid in on what happened. Should we go back?
Donald Typical Sora.

Sora Hmm... You mean about Maleficent and Xigbar? No, the others have already got enough on their plates as it is. Why go stressing them out? The three of us know how to handle a couple of old adversaries, right?
Donald Yeah, I guess...
Goofy But doesn't that thing Pete said bother ya?
Donald The black box?
Sora Come on, we're talking about Pete. That means it's probably no big deal.
Goofy I don't know...

cutscene.desc: The tram passes in front of them, its trolley bell ringing

xml.sp: Sora Oh, cool. The trams are still here!
Donald Sora, it hasn't been THAT long.
Sora Feels like it.
Goofy Maybe you're feeling what Roxas feels 'cause he misses home.
Sora Mm-hmm. Actually, I ran into Roxas in the Sleeping Worlds. It was like...seeing into his heart for the first time.
Donald And he was in the datascape, too.
Goofy Uh-huh. It was a test to see if your data version was ready to face the hurt that ya carry inside.

Sora Was I ready? I do know hurt. When I lost Riku and Kairi, and later when I lost the Keyblade, and you guys had to go on without me like that... Having no one to turn to was the worst kind of hurt. But that just shows how much you mean to me. Carrying around a little hurt can't be all that bad. Hurting is part of caring.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy share a glance

xml.sp: Donald He sounds like Data-Sora did.
Goofy Of course. Any Sora's still Sora.
Sora So wait... If Roxas feels something, then we're in the right place. Roxas, I'm gonna find you!

cutscene.desc: Sora hears a voice, or rather, the words appear in his head

xml.sp: ???? Do you seek our liege?
Sora stunned Huh?
Donald What is it?

cutscene.desc: Three Dusk Nobodies appear behind Sora

xml.sp: Goofy Nobodies!

cutscene.desc: Sora whirls around and summons the Keyblade as more appear. The fight the Dusks in the street until not a single one stands

xml.sp: Sora Hmm... What was that voice? I know I heard it.
Donald I didn't hear it.
Goofy You sure it wasn't the wind? Or somethin' else?
Sora I'm pretty sure...
?????? Where'd they come from?!
?????? Get the ice cream later!
????? What? Hold up!
Sora See? Voices.

cutscene.desc: Goofy scratches his head

xml.sp: Sora ...New ones?

cutscene.desc: Sora spins around to see a familiar trio running in from around a corner

xml.sp: Sora What? Hayner? Pence! Olette!

cutscene.desc: The three continue running as a monstrous wave of Shadow Heartless rushes in from behind them

xml.sp: Goofy What is THAT?!

cutscene.desc: The wave gains ground on them as Hayner notices the group

xml.sp: Hayner Heeey! Sora!

cutscene.desc: They run right past them as Sora watches

xml.sp: Hayner Hello, good-bye.
Sora Go! We got this.

cutscene.desc: The trio takes out their weapons as the wave spirals into the air as if facing them down. Sora provides several good hits on the flying swarm as Donald uses his magic spells, Goofy providing defense, until the Demon Tide flies off into the sky and away from them. Hayner, Pence, and Olette walk back over once the coast is clear

xml.sp: Hayner Nice fightin'! Thanks, Sora.
Sora Hayner, Pence, Olette. It's been ages!
Hayner What? It hasn't been THAT long.
Donald Ya see?
Olette Donald! Goofy! How are ya?
Donald We're good.
Goofy waving Howdy there, Olette.
Pence So does this mean that weird stuff's going down again?
Hayner leaning in You kidding, Pence? When have we ever seen a tornado of shadowy blobs before? It's not weird. This is underprecedented.
Pence Hmm, I guess it is. The creatures from the last time were bright white. These things must be new. Man, I can't wait to get to sleuthin'.
Olette We're already done with the school project, silly. (to Sora) Whatever's going on, you wouldn't be here unless you had a good reason.
Hayner Which is?
Sora Well, actually, we're looking for Roxas.
Olette Roxas?

cutscene.desc: Hayner thinks

xml.sp: Hayner That's funny... I don't know any Roxas, but the name sounds familiar.
Pence Maybe we bumped into him somewhere.
Donald Uh, that's one way to put it.
Goofy Actually, he mighta been friends with another version of ya.

cutscene.desc: Goofy pulls out a photo of Hayner, Pence, Olette and Roxas standing in front of the Old Mansion, and hands it to Hayner

xml.sp: Olette This photograph...
Pence Yeah. We've got the same one.

cutscene.desc: Pence pulls out his photo, where Roxas is missing, and Hayner remembers

xml.sp: Hayner Oh yeah! The other Twilight Town!

cutscene.desc: They compare the two

xml.sp: Pence It's like one of those spot the differences puzzles...except really easy. I guess in that town, we're friends with this Roxas person.
Hayner Sora, let us help you track Roxas down.
Sora Really?
Hayner Sure, he seems like a pretty cool guy.
Sora chuckling Yeah. He is.
Pence Great. Then let's all go ask around town. If alternate-us knew Roxas, then maybe alternate-other folks did too.
Olette Mm-hmm. Sora, you three should go to the place in the photo. It's the old mansion. The three of us'll cover places in town.
Sora Thanks. Oh yeah! I got this phone thingy that takes pictures.

cutscene.desc: Sora pulls out the Gummiphone

xml.sp: Sora Want to snap a photo while we're all here?
Hayner Sure!
Pence That's a great idea!

cutscene.desc: Everybody stands together in a pose

xml.sp: Pence Wait, who's taking it?

cutscene.desc: Hayner, Sora & Donald share a bemused look. Hayner and Sora look at Donald. A moment later, Sora poses with Hayner, Pence and Olette while Donald holds the camera

xml.sp: Donald Aww! Why do I have to do it?
Sora Hey, tough luck. You drew the short straw.
Goofy It's okay. I'm sittin' outta the photo with ya, Donald.
Donald Then YOU take the photograph!

cutscene.desc: Donald shoves the phone into Goofy's hands and rejoins the group with a huff

xml.sp: Goofy Everybody smile. A-hyuck!

cutscene.desc: Goofy snaps the photo and they see the result on the screen

xml.sp: Pence Wow, that came out great!
Olette Oh! A lucky emblem.

cutscene.desc: She points at a symbol made of the circles on the wall behind her in the photo

xml.sp: Sora Lucky emblem?
Olette Oh yeah, they are HUGE right now. Supposedly, these things are hidden all over town. And if you get a picture of them, they'll bring you good luck.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald & Goofy are impressed

xml.sp: Sora Cool! Wait. Look, guys! Is that...

cutscene.desc: Sora points to the emblem, showing Donald and Goofy, whose eyes widen

xml.sp: Goofy You're right! I see it too.
Donald Is it the King?

cutscene.desc: Sora gives a small laugh

xml.sp: Sora I knew it.
Olette Good luck, because they're not all this easy to find.
Hayner Okay, we better start asking around. You start by checking the old mansion. We'll catch up.
Sora Got it.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy make their way out of town through the woods. Walking down the beaten path, they come upon a trail of fruit

xml.sp: Donald What's that?

cutscene.desc: Goofy looks up, seeing a small group of Powerwild Heartless in the trees

xml.sp: Goofy Heartless!
Sora What do ya think they're up to?

cutscene.desc: Goofy looks closer and sees a tiny rat trapped up in the tree

xml.sp: Goofy pointing Look! On that branch. The Heartless have him surrounded!
Sora Oh no!
Donald Let's help!
Sora Yeah!

cutscene.desc: They summons their weapons and the Heartless jump down to fight. Once the Powerwilds are taken care of, the rat scurries down the tree toward them

xml.sp: Sora Well, take care.

cutscene.desc: They start to walk away, leaving the rat alone with the multitude of fruit, some even bigger than himself. The rat sighs and runs in their direction. He latches onto Sora by his shoe and crawls up to his head. He grabs two tufts of Sora's hair and jerks them back towards the fruit. Sora spins uncontrollably and starts walking back the way they came, making very exaggerated movements

xml.sp: Sora Wh-what is--

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy stop and watch

xml.sp: Donald Are you okay?

cutscene.desc: Sora stops at an apple and the rat moves his hair downward, causing Sora to pick up the fruit

xml.sp: Goofy Lookie! That little feller's parked on your head.

cutscene.desc: The rat turns Sora around

xml.sp: Sora Huuuh?

cutscene.desc: He pulls Sora's hair upward...

xml.sp: Sora Would you cut that--

cutscene.desc: ...and then downward, picking up another apple

xml.sp: Donald Sora, you've been hijacked.
Goofy Ya know, maybe he wants you to pick up the fruit for him.

cutscene.desc: The rat nods, smiling

xml.sp: Sora Okay, that's fine. But I can do it by myself.

cutscene.desc: The rat hops off Sora's head down to his hand, standing on the apple

xml.sp: Sora I just need to collect the fruit?

cutscene.desc: The rat nods again

xml.sp: Sora Right, then.

cutscene.desc: Moments later, the fruit is gathered into a nice big pile. Sora, Donald and Goofy kneel down to the rat's level

xml.sp: Sora So, what're you gonna do with all this, anyway?

cutscene.desc: The rat makes a slicing, then swiping motion with his tiny, little arms

xml.sp: Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: The three exchange glances of confusion and the rat sighs

xml.sp: Sora standing Well, okay. You be careful going home.

cutscene.desc: They walk away

xml.sp: Donald Bye-bye!
Goofy See ya 'round!

cutscene.desc: The rat watches them leave, then turns back to his pile of fruit. After exiting the woods, the trio reach the Old Mansion. Sora looks up at the white curtains blowing in the window and gets a major surge of nostalgia. For a moment, it is not Sora looking up at the curtains, but Roxas. In the blink of an eye, Sora snaps out of it, feeling a sense of loss

xml.sp: Sora Whaddaya think, guys? This place is even creepier than I remember.
Goofy Well, they do say that this mansion is haunted.

cutscene.desc: If Donald's face wasn't already white, it would have turned it, and he gives off a shiver. They stare at the door, hesitant to enter when a hand reaches for Sora's shoulder

xml.sp: ?????? Hey, there.

cutscene.desc: Sora knocks the hand away and screams, causing Donald and Goofy to jump in terror. Sora sees Hayner, Pence and Olette have joined them

xml.sp: Sora Thanks for the heart attack!
Hayner smirking Oh, what? Did I scare you?
Donald trying to save face Not a chance!
Olette Our bad.
Sora So how did it go? Did ya get any leads?

cutscene.desc: Hayner looks toward Pence, who nods

xml.sp: Pence Nope, 'fraid not. The asking around thing was a total bust.
Hayner Yup. This old mansion is our last hope.

cutscene.desc: They look up at the mansion

xml.sp: Olette You guys ready?
Pence Another Twilight Town awaits!
Sora Yeah.

cutscene.desc: They enter the mansion, making their way to the basement, where Pence spots a computer with numerous screens

xml.sp: Pence Here we go!

cutscene.desc: He runs to the console and sits down

xml.sp: Pence The password was...uh...sea-salt ice cream, right?

cutscene.desc: He types the password into the computer and the D.T.D. screen appears

xml.sp: Pence Okay, I'm in. Let's get that transporter working...

cutscene.desc: He types another command into the computer, or attempts to, when the screen flashes red

xml.sp: Pence Uhhh...

cutscene.desc: He tries more keys, but only gets access errors and locked data

xml.sp: Pence Oh, man. The transporter's been protected.
Sora Protected from what?
Pence I guess from us? We can't use it to get to the other Twilight Town.
Hayner loudly Why not? It worked before! We sent Sora there!
Pence Well that was then, and this is now.
Olette And there's no other way?
Pence None that I know.
Sora Great.

cutscene.desc: Sora's ringtone goes off in his pocket and he pulls out the Gummiphone. He answers the call and Ienzo appears on the screen

xml.sp: Ienzo Hello, Sora. You wouldn't happen to be in front of a computer?
Sora Huh? Well...yeah. But how'd you know that?
Ienzo I was tinkering with Ansem's computer--you know, to decrypt the Code that was left in it? And I noticed that someone had logged in from another terminal. I figured it might be you.
Sora totally getting it Oh! Yeah, the log terminal.
Donald You don't know what he said.
Sora to Donald Oh, and what, you do?

cutscene.desc: Ienzo laughs to himself

xml.sp: Goofy I know I haven't got a clue. A-hyuck!
Ienzo Then, uhh...who was it that logged in?
Pence Oh, hi there. This is Pence.

cutscene.desc: Sora holds the phone up to him

xml.sp: Pence I'm the one who logged into the computer.
Ienzo Good. As long as it's a user that we know we can trust.
Pence Yup. But, I'm kind of stuck here.

cutscene.desc: Hayner crosses his arms impatiently

xml.sp: Pence One of the programs is protected, so...I can't run it.

cutscene.desc: Hayner sighs impatiently

xml.sp: Ienzo Which program?
Hayner explodes The transporter to the other Twilight Town!

cutscene.desc: His outburst surprises Ienzo

xml.sp: Hayner It's the only way to find Roxas. You gotta help us.
Ienzo processing this Another Twilight Town? And a transporter? Okay... A virtual town inside the computer, made of data.

cutscene.desc: Jiminy pops out of Sora's hood

xml.sp: Jiminy A datascape! Fellas...
Goofy Mm-hmm, we've seen one. That's what we used once to investigate Jiminy's journal.
Ienzo Maybe I can do something. Pence, let's get a network set up. My address here is...

cutscene.desc: The time it takes to set up this network mixed with the inherent technobabble between Ienzo and Pence, Sora has fallen asleep holding the phone. The computer makes a sound through his snoring

xml.sp: Ienzo Okay, sharing is enabled.

cutscene.desc: Sora awakes with a start

xml.sp: Sora Huh? Were you able to fix it?
Ienzo Now that our two computers have been successfully networked together, I can take control of the terminal there and change the privileges...
Sora And Roxas?

Ienzo Yes. For the virtual world to be completely realized, Ansem the Wise would've included Roxas's full data in the construction. Meaning, somewhere on your machine there's a log of that data that--

cutscene.desc: He pauses, thinking how to translate this into Sora-speak

xml.sp: Ienzo Uhh...basically, we can decipher Ansem's Code more quickly, AND we can analyze the virtual Twilight Town while we're at it.
Sora Okay. Great! I can't computer so...do that.
Ienzo Glad you're following along. Don't worry, we'll handle it. Chip and Dale will be helping me out here on this end. I'll call you back as soon as we know anything more.
Sora Thanks.

Ienzo Oh, before I forget--a bit of troubling news. It's about one of the Organization's former members. You knew him as Vexen--but to us he was Ansem's apprentice Even. He was recompleted like the rest of us, but hadn't regained consciousness yet. Then, sometime after Lea left, Even vanished. Aeleus and Dilan--the two you know as Lexaeus and Xaldin--they went out looking for him, but...he's just gone. And I'm starting to worry.
Sora You think he's on THEIR side?
Ienzo I think it's a real possibility. He's a devious researcher. You should be careful.
Sora All right. Thanks.

cutscene.desc: Sora hangs up and pockets the phone

xml.sp: Hayner Oh no! We got work! I totally forgot.

cutscene.desc: Hayner starts to rush off

xml.sp: Pence Really? But what about all this?
Hayner Hey, both are important. We're gonna need some cash to go to the beach. Also, don't forget the pretzels. Gotta buy four now.

cutscene.desc: Pence thinks and counts on his fingers

xml.sp: Pence Ohh. I get it.
Olette smiling He's thinking ahead.

cutscene.desc: Pence laughs

xml.sp: Hayner Later, Sora!
Sora Yeah. See ya, Hayner!

cutscene.desc: Hayner walks to the entrance and Olette follows

xml.sp: Olette Bye, Donald! Goofy!
Donald & Goofy waving Good-bye!
Pence Oh, and since I'm manning the computer here, you guys're in charge of earning my share.
Hayner No pretzel for Pence.

cutscene.desc: Olette giggles and the two of them leave

xml.sp: Pence Hey!

cutscene.desc: Pence sighs, making the trio chuckle. Sora, Donald and Goofy leave the mansion

xml.sp: ????? So, you think you can bring Roxas back?

cutscene.desc: Sora turns to see Ansem standing against the wall with his arms crossed, looking at them snidely

xml.sp: Sora Ansem!

cutscene.desc: A corridor of darkness appears next to him and his Nobody persona emerges from its depths

xml.sp: Sora Xemnas!
Xemnas Roxas should never have existed in the first place. What you seek is impossible.
Sora Roxas does exist. His heart's inside my heart.
Xemnas And in the unlikely event you did manage to separate the two, where is it you think you can put his heart?
Sora Well...Roxas used to live in the other Twilight Town, right? So, I'm just gonna put him back there.
Ansem Do you even realize what you are saying? The other Twilight Town is just data.
Sora A heart can live anywhere. Even inside data. There are hearts all around us.

Goofy pensively Ansem and Xemnas used to be part of the same person, right? But look. Now, they exist separately just fine. If they can do it, then I don't see any reason why you and Roxas can't find a way.
Sora Oh...yeah!
Donald Yeah! You tell 'em, Captain Goofy!

cutscene.desc: With newfound exhuberance, they face the two enemies

xml.sp: Ansem In that case, by all means.
Xemnas Nothing would please us more than Roxas's return, of course.
Sora You wish. He'll never answer to you again.

Xemnas Still so blind. A Nobody is what's left behind when one gives his heart to darkness. There is only one way to bring Roxas back, which is for you to give your heart up as well. Sora, have you finally decided to call upon the darkness?

cutscene.desc: He points directly at Sora

xml.sp: Sora What?
Ansem Go on then. The shadows are never out of reach.

cutscene.desc: Ansem smirks as a herd of Neoshadow Heartless appear behind them. Xemnas waves his hand and Dusk Nobodies join them. Sora glares at them

xml.sp: Ansem & Xemnas Now, set your heart free.

cutscene.desc: The two disappear

xml.sp: Sora Wait!
Donald & Goofy Sora!

cutscene.desc: The knight and the wizard face the creatures and Sora summons his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora It's not darkness. Not if it helps him!

cutscene.desc: Together, the three defeat the Heartless and Nobodies. Donald and Goofy regroup once the fighting is done, while Sora stands by himself, silently. The two give a sad sigh

xml.sp: Sora Herc said... He said, With all my heart. Okay. Then all my heart it is. I'm getting Roxas out.

cutscene.desc: He turns to the two of them

xml.sp: Sora Are you with me, Donald? Goofy?
Donald & Goofy brightly You betcha!
Sora I don't know what Ansem and Xemnas want, but I think we'd better tell the others to watch out.
Donald nodding Yeah.
Goofy Okay then. Let's head back to town.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods and they run back through the woods to town, interrupted by a familiar voice

xml.sp: ??????? Well, bless my bagpipes! It was YOU laddies who rescued my chef.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy stop at the sound of the voice near a plaza where they see an elderly duck with a cane, top hat, and glasses. Tucked under one arm is a box

xml.sp: Donald It's Uncle Scrooge!

cutscene.desc: Sora walks back

xml.sp: Sora Huh? Wait... Didn't he sell ice cream in Hollow Bastion?
Goofy That's right. But Uncle Scrooge here's what you might call a world traveler.
Sora Cool.

cutscene.desc: Donald runs up to Scrooge McDuck with Sora and Goofy in tow

xml.sp: Sora How are ya, Uncle Scrooge?
Scrooge Oh! Hello, Sora! You're lookin' hale and hearty. I heard ye were on another grand adventure with these two. I hope Donald isn't making a menace of himself.

cutscene.desc: Donald shakes his head in embarassment

xml.sp: Donald Aw. Why did you have to say that?
Goofy So, Uncle Scrooge, what's that you were sayin' about a chef?
Scrooge Och! Right, right. The chef of me bistro here wanted to show ye his appreciation, so he baked this for ye.

cutscene.desc: He holds out the box and Sora takes it

xml.sp: Sora What is it?

cutscene.desc: He opens the box seeing a decadent dessert topped with fruit

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy Wow, cake!

cutscene.desc: Scrooge's top hat twitches, getting his attention

xml.sp: Sora The whole cake? It's for us?

cutscene.desc: The hat twitches some more, puzzling Sora

xml.sp: Scrooge Aye, settle down... The chef wants ye to know it's not a cake, but a 'tarte aux fruits'.
Goofy He does?
Scrooge Why keep it under my hat? May I introduce...

cutscene.desc: Scrooge takes off his top hat, revealing the gray rat from earlier, who hops down onto the crown of the hat

xml.sp: Scrooge Little Chef.
Sora Oh! It's you!
Donald Uncle Scrooge, you opened a bistro in Twilight Town?
Scrooge Aye. It all started a little while ago, when I was enjoying one of the best meals of my life.

cutscene.desc: Little Chef smiles and nods

xml.sp: Scrooge And when I asked to speak to the chef, I met this wee genius.

cutscene.desc: Little Chef strikes a confident pose

xml.sp: Scrooge As it turns out, he wanted to expand his culinary horizons. So, I thought: that's an opportunity. And I financed the whole operation.

cutscene.desc: Little Chef mimes cutting, preparing, and serving a dish

xml.sp: Scrooge Ooh, I think he wants to cook some more for ye.

cutscene.desc: The happy rat smiles eagerly

xml.sp: Scrooge Fetch some ingredients. Especially anything unusual.
Goofy That'll be fun! Kinda like a scavenger hunt.
Scrooge An' the more the better. The mark of a truly great chef is creating masterpieces out of anything. Ye can start right here in town.
Sora We'll do anything to try more of Little Chef's food.
Donald Yeah!

cutscene.desc: Little Chef scratches his head meekly

xml.sp: Goofy That tarte sure did look scrumptiously delicious.
Sora Okay! The ingredient hunt is on.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod. After searching town for ingredients, the trio return to Le Grand Bistrot

xml.sp: Hayner Hey! Guys!

cutscene.desc: They turn to see Hayner and Olette running towards them

xml.sp: Sora Hayner! Olette!

cutscene.desc: Scrooge walks out from behind the three of them

xml.sp: Hayner Hey, boss. Done with the posters.
Scrooge Aye, good work, kids.
Goofy You guys work for Uncle Scrooge here at the bistro?
Hayner Umm... Do we?

cutscene.desc: He looks over at Olette, who pulls out a poster

xml.sp: Olette He gave us a short job putting up these special posters.
