cutscene.desc: She unravels the black-and-white poster which is titled Mickey & Sora in 'GIANTLAND' depicting a club-carrying bearded giant, holding up a rogue-dressed Mickey Mouse who looks ready to fight

xml.sp: Olette Mr. McDuck's hosting an open-air film festival in the courtyard. Cool, huh?

cutscene.desc: The three gaze at the poster curiously

xml.sp: Olette Oh. Sora... Hold your phone up to the poster.

cutscene.desc: Sora takes out the Gummiphone

xml.sp: Sora 'Kaaay...

cutscene.desc: Olette gestures to the scrambled icon in the corner of the poster. Sora points the phone's camera at it and it scans the code with a bright sound. Olette rolls the poster back up

xml.sp: Olette There, you've just downloaded a promo game for the film. You can try it later.

cutscene.desc: Donald turns to his rich uncle

xml.sp: Donald You did all this, Uncle Scrooge?
Scrooge Of course, laddie. Provide a bit of entertainment, and then give folks a nice, cozy place to relax.

cutscene.desc: He gestures to the restaurant, pointing at the logo with his cane

xml.sp: Scrooge Like me bistro here. They'll all be happy, an' hungry, an' eager to spend their money.

cutscene.desc: He cackles to himself

xml.sp: Donald Uncle Scrooge...
Goofy Gawrsh, he sure is canny. I always wondered how he keeps customers comin' into his businesses over and over.
Sora Oh, yeah, I'm no business guy, but I sure wouldn't wanna be one of Uncle Scrooge's competitors.
Hayner Seriously.

cutscene.desc: Donald, Goofy and Olette laugh

xml.sp: Sora Oh! Right. I need to warn you guys.
Hayner Why?
Sora Well, those creepy-crawly things might come back for more, so stay on your toes.
Hayner Sure. But don't we have you guys to take care of 'em for us?

cutscene.desc: Olette catches on

xml.sp: Olette You have to leave AGAIN?
Sora nodding Mm-hmm.
Donald It's our job.
Goofy But we'll definitely be back.
Hayner When ya gonna slow down?
Sora Sorry. Just do me a favor...
Hayner Well, what is it? Don't make it too tough.
Sora I know how Roxas feels. To be lost. But Donald and Goofy...Kairi... brought me back by wishing with all their hearts.

cutscene.desc: Donald & Goofy nod

xml.sp: Sora So...I was hoping the three of you would do the same, and wish for Roxas.
Hayner What? That's it? (chuckles) That's no favor. We'll all wish. I'm wishin'.
Olette Yeah! Me and Pence too.
Sora gladly Thanks.

cutscene.desc: On the roof of a nearby building, Ansem and Xemnas watch from above. From behind them, a dark portal opens and Xigbar struts out

xml.sp: Xigbar Aren't you making it a little too obvious?
Xemnas We were instructed to guide him.
Ansem Yes...just look at them. They wouldn't get far if we did not spell it out.
Xigbar Fair enough. But let's not forget how many times Sora still managed to rain on our parade.
Ansem If he wavers from the path we lay, we destroy him.
Xigbar But in that case...we'll have to find ourselves another vessel.
Xemnas That is why we never have just one iron in the fire.

cutscene.desc: Later, Sora busts through the swinging doors into the kitchen of Le Grand Bistrot

xml.sp: Sora Is the food ready yet?

cutscene.desc: He sees the kitchen empty

xml.sp: Sora Huh? He hasn't started?

cutscene.desc: Little Chef runs in and crawls up Sora's leg

xml.sp: Sora Whoa! Hold on! Hey!

cutscene.desc: He reaches Sora's head and grabs onto his hair, same as before. He pulls on one tuft of hair and Sora lurches in that direction

xml.sp: Sora Oh no!

cutscene.desc: He grabs a frying pan in his left hand and a spatula in his right

xml.sp: Sora Would you--

cutscene.desc: He spins around to face the stove

xml.sp: Sora You're gonna make ME cook?

cutscene.desc: After a successful cooking experience with Little Chef at the helm, they leave Twilight Town hungry for more ingredients and also more worlds. In a Secret Forest, Kairi is writing a letter to Sora as the evening sun washes over her

xml.sp: Kairi I'm sorry I left without saying good-bye. Did Master Yen Sid tell you? I'm training to become a Keyblade wielder like you. That's right. No more waiting for you to come back from your adventures. I want to get out there and do my part to help. Merlin has used his magic to bring us to a place where time doesn't matter. We can take as long as we need to complete our training. He's an amazing wizard. Oh, and by us, I mean me and Lea. He's really sorry for all the trouble he caused. I told him it's fine, but he won't stop apologizing. I'll admit I was a little scared of him at first, but I've gotten to know him better. All he ever wanted was to help his friend. Honestly, it's hard not to like him. Every now and then, I catch him staring at me. When I ask what's wrong, he says, I'm not sure. I think I'm forgetting something. Don't know what. Sora, I think it may have something to do with you. Your journey is all about helping people: some that you've never met before, and some like Lea that you have. They're all counting on you. It won't be easy, but I hope you'll remain the happy and cheerful Sora I know. There's no heart your smile can't reach.

cutscene.desc: She hears footsteps and look over to see Lea

xml.sp: Kairi What's wrong?

cutscene.desc: He breaks his stare after a moment and tries to shrug it off, turning away

xml.sp: Lea Huh? Nothin', sorry.
Kairi admonishingly Lea.
Lea What? I am.

cutscene.desc: He scratches the back of his neck. She giggles, and he sits on a rock opposite her as she continues writing

xml.sp: Lea A letter?
Kairi Yup.
Lea To Sora?
Kairi Mmm, technically yes. But I won't send it. It's more for me.
Lea Ask Merlin. He'll deliver it for you.
Kairi Yeah, but it's okay. I just like talking to Sora, even if it's on paper.

cutscene.desc: She holds the notepad close

xml.sp: Lea Ohh... Okay.

cutscene.desc: He remembers something

xml.sp: Lea Oh!

cutscene.desc: Kairi tilts her head, puzzled. Lea pulls out two sea-salt ice cream bars

xml.sp: Lea Here.
Kairi Ice cream? Really?
Lea Yeah, I asked Merlin to pick these up.

cutscene.desc: Kairi smiles

xml.sp: Lea Ya know, we did both summon Keyblades. Gotta celebrate.

cutscene.desc: He hands a bar out to Kairi, who take it

xml.sp: Kairi You're sweet, Lea.

cutscene.desc: Lea chuckles sheepishly

xml.sp: Lea Naw...

cutscene.desc: Lea watches her take a bite, zoning out again

xml.sp: Kairi What?

cutscene.desc: He averts his gaze

xml.sp: Lea N-nothing, I just...
Kairi You're trying to remember what you forgot?
Lea Well, I, uh... Yeah... Yeah.

cutscene.desc: He looks out at the sunset as his words trail

xml.sp: Kairi So tomorrow--you and me in the ring. You ready?

cutscene.desc: The sun starts to get into his eyes

xml.sp: Lea 'Course.
Kairi Don't hold back, Lea. Promise?

cutscene.desc: In the glare of the sun, Lea thinks he sees a different girl in Kairi's shadow. Her black hair sways softly in the breeze as she holds her ice cream with a smile. Lea's emerald eyes well up with tears and he drops his ice cream bar in shock. Unable to contain his feelings, the tears stream down his face

xml.sp: Kairi Huh? Are you okay? Lea!

cutscene.desc: He quickly tries to wipe them away as Kairi gets closer to him

xml.sp: Lea Yeah... Sorry...
Kairi You're crying. What's wrong?

cutscene.desc: Lea sniffles

xml.sp: Lea Something in my eyes.
Kairi Lea...

cutscene.desc: He stands

xml.sp: Lea I'm...gonna go. Sorry.
Kairi 'Kay, but stop apologizing.
Lea Fine...on one condition.
Kairi What?
Lea Call me Axel from now on. Got it memorized?

cutscene.desc: He points to his head

xml.sp: Kairi Yeah. Okay, Axel.

cutscene.desc: He walks away, leaving his ice cream bar in the grass. Meanwhile in Radiant Garden, Dilan leads Riku and Mickey to the Fountain Court, walking softly over the cobblestone terrain. Dilan stops, gesturing at their destination

xml.sp: Mickey So, this is the place.
Riku Where Aqua fell into the realm of darkness after she dove in to save Terra.
Mickey Yeah, she said he was acting strange.
Riku Strange how, exactly?
Mickey She sensed darkness in him, and they ended up getting into a big fight.
Riku Right. And in the aftermath, the two of them disappeared. Around the same time, the guards found a stranger with white hair lying unconscious here in the square--a man calling himself Xehanort.

Mickey Ansem the Wise took the stranger in, but that was a mistake. Xehanort betrayed his master, stole his research, and along with his fellow apprentices, separated his heart from his body. Xehanort's heart took his master's name, Ansem, and traveled to the past to give his younger self instructions. He even briefly had control of you. His empty body stayed in the present, took the name Xemnas, and founded Organization XIII. Their goal was to prepare thirteen vessels for Xehanort's heart.

Riku Until we put an end to the Organization. But all the while Young Xehanort had been visiting the future to choose thirteen vessels of his own-- hearts with strong enough ties to him to begin a new Organization, the REAL Organization XIII. And now they're looking for a fight with us. But what happened to Terra? I thought you said that Aqua saved him.

cutscene.desc: Mickey's face takes on a serious look

xml.sp: Mickey Yep, she did. The problem is we didn't notice. You remember the end of the Mark of Mastery exam, when Master Xehanort made his grand return? That's the Xehanort I remember. He was already a pretty old man then. But how do you explain Ansem and Xemnas, his Heartless and his Nobody? Isn't it strange how young they look? Why aren't THEY old men? It's because Xehanort was using a different body when the split happened. That face from the portrait I mentioned--it wasn't just some stranger that Ansem the Wise took under his wing. It was the young man whose body Master Xehanort possessed.
Riku No way! That was Terra? Master Xehanort was using Terra?
Mickey Yep. Master Xehanort told us another on our list belonged to him. He was talking about Terra. Turns out, Aqua saved more than just her friend that day.
Riku Okay, but Master Xehanort is an old man again now. Where did Terra's body go?
Mickey Hmm... (gasp) It's cause Master Xehanort's collecting vessels! He claimed to have two of our seven lights. We got Sora back, but Terra must still be on Xehanort's side.
Riku He's with Organization XIII? We should warn Sora.
Mickey Yep! And Merlin, too.
Riku Yeah.

cutscene.desc:
And now for a commercial break...
In the heart of Shibuya, a battle rages on between a group of fighters and the mechanical troopers known as Gigas. Atop a tall building a pink beam of light shoots into the sky. Racing through the rubble on the ground, a strong man with glasses tears through a Gigas with his large green sword, scattering the mechanical beast into disintegrating cubes. Running to catch up to him is another young man with silver hair who engages his red sword as more Gigas encroach on them. Swooping in on the silver-haired youth's left is a third young man wielding two thin blue swords, the wind whipping through his red hair. He aims a Blizzard spell at a (relatively small Gigas in front of them. Several more Gigas close in on the source of the beam of light on the roof. The source is a young woman with long hair clutching at her necklace as the pink energy swirls around her. The beam is directed at a point in the sky which takes on a circular blue shape forming a kind of gate. The clouds whirl around it as the surrounding skyscrapers are torn asunder, pieces falling upwards toward the gate. The red-haired youth holds off a Gigas with one sword-hand, while sending a Thunder spell toward a second with his other hand, destroying the foe. The man with glasses summons a green Barrier to stop an incoming Gigas as the silver-haired youth takes one out behind him. Dodging several blaster shots, the silver-haired youth sends a red spell at a Gigas while eliminating another with a slice from his sword. He lands on the ground just as a red Gigas flies towards him. As it rushes him, the boy summons a spinning orb, sending shards of the tiled floor into the air. The boy leaps above the orb and strikes downward through it, tearing apart the bubble and the Gigas inside it. The energy surrounding the girl grows in volume as the boy freezes a Gigas in place with a Stop spell. The frozen Gigas soon caves in on itself by way of a Gravity spell, which the boy sends through two other Gigas, trapping them. He slices through the amalgamation and gives a defiant look through his red and blue eyes. The three young men reach the edge of an adjacent building in time to watch the skyscraper being torn apart by the pink energy, blue lightning bolts shooting out from the gate. The three fighters leap into the swirling vortex as numerous Gigas fly toward them. The silver-haired boy destroys one Gigas with his crossbow and slashes at another with his red sword. Catching him off-guard, he is soon piled on by several blue Gigas before a large Reflect spell surrounds him and his friends. The redhead summons another Blizzard spell and shoots it through the green barrier, providing a tunnel of ice for the silver-haired youth to fly through. He reaches out his hand to the girl drifting in the pink abyss, her star necklace floating freely around her neck. She opens her eyes as he reaches her and their hands nearly touch. Suddenly the maelstrom around them breaks and the girl is ensnared by the claw of a Gigas. The trio land on the building as the girl cries out from its clutches. An enormous Gigas, bigger than the rest rises to meet them on the edge of the skyscraper. It opens a giant claw, summoning a cerulean blast. The boy stands in its crosshairs and his weapon folds down, igniting the red sword once again. He swings it back as his other weapon raises the arms of his crossbow. He slices the air and sends a shot from the crossbow, with the energy claw reflecting firmly in his blue eye.
VERUM REX - Video game available now from Square Enix for the Play Plus console. Rated 12+ GIGAS Action Figures out now. Rated 6+
The television suddenly shuts off with a buzz as a cowboy doll carrying a wooden toy block steps over the TV remote)

xml.sp: Rex I was watching that.
Woody Ah, sorry. But this is no time for television, Rex.

cutscene.desc: Woody the cowboy walks off, leaving Rex the dinosaur and Hamm the piggy bank

xml.sp: Hamm Gotta say, that Gigas is pretty impressive.
Rex Really?

cutscene.desc: Woody spots Heartless spawning on the floor from his view on the bed

xml.sp: Rex I like Yozora most.

cutscene.desc: Woody tackles Rex and Hamm and they go spiraling further onto the bed with a yell. Woody fixes his cowboy hat

xml.sp: Hamm Woody? What gives?
Woody Shh!

cutscene.desc: Buzz Lightyear the space ranger jumps down to the bed joining the others

xml.sp: Buzz Are they back?
Woody Shhhhhh!

cutscene.desc: They peer over the side of the bed to see a group of Toy Trooper Heartless scouting the floor

xml.sp: Woody All right, guys. Today we teach those masked intruders who's boss. Is everybody in position?
Rex Wait. Hold on! I don't think I'm emotionally prepared!
Hamm Would you calm down? Don't worry. I got ya covered.

cutscene.desc: Woody gazes over to a shelf across the room where a pair of Green Army Men stand on the edge of a bucket. They give a salute to a trio of Little Green Men who wave in Woody's direction. Woody returns a salute

xml.sp: Buzz It's go time.

cutscene.desc: Woody nods as Sora arrives in the room next to a giant toy ball under the bed

xml.sp: Sora What in the world?

cutscene.desc: He passes an equally oversized xylophone and soccer ball

xml.sp: Sora Where are we?

cutscene.desc: He looks up to the larger-than-life bedside table and realizes

xml.sp: Sora Oh my gosh! Have we been shrunk?! And...and look at us!

cutscene.desc: He looks at himself, a similar figure though with considerably more plastic

xml.sp: Donald You know what the magic is for. We have to protect the world order!
Sora Border?
Donald I said, Order!

cutscene.desc: Something to their left catches Goofy's eye

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh...

cutscene.desc: Donald and Sora look over

xml.sp: Goofy Who's gonna protect the order from them?
Sora & Donald Heartless!

cutscene.desc: They summons their weapons and run at the Heartless

xml.sp: Woody Okay. We go on three. One, two...

cutscene.desc: Buzz's wings open suddenly when he sees the trio arrive

xml.sp: Buzz Wait!

cutscene.desc: Rex, already at a running start, almost falls off the bed

xml.sp: Woody What are you doing?!

cutscene.desc: Buzz directs Woody's gaze back to the floor

xml.sp: Woody Who are those guys?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy take out all the Heartless as the toy gang make their way to the wooden floor

xml.sp: Hamm Are they new?
Rex Wait! Ah-- Ah-- You look familiar!

cutscene.desc: Rex shoves past the rest of them toward a confused Sora

xml.sp: Rex I know this. You're, uh, you're, uhhh...

cutscene.desc: Hamm catches up

xml.sp: Hamm Yozora!
Sora Huh? My name's Sora.

cutscene.desc: A red dot appears on Sora's chest as Buzz stands on alert

xml.sp: Buzz Stay back! For all we know, the intruders sent them.

cutscene.desc: Rex excitedly tackles Sora

xml.sp: Rex Yozora!
Woody Slow down there, Rex. We don't know them.
Rex But we can trust them. They're the number-one-selling heroes in the country!
Hamm Yeah, Andy's mom must've bought 'em for him.

cutscene.desc: Rex shakes Sora's hand as Buzz continues staying his distance, walking around them in a circle

xml.sp: Rex Hamm's right. Did you see how easily they took care of the intruders? I bet they're here to figure out why all our friends have gone missing, and why Buzz's laser started actually laser-ing...and all the weird stuff that's been going on.

cutscene.desc: Buzz stares at the laser gun on his arm

xml.sp: Rex I mean, that's what heroes do, right?
Buzz Let's not jump to conclusions.
Woody Hmm...
Buzz to Woody Gotta be smart, Woody.

cutscene.desc: Woody casually walks up to Sora, surprising Buzz

xml.sp: Woody So, you're...Andy's new toys?
Sora, Donald & Goofy Toys?
Woody You sure did a number on those intruders.
Goofy Those are the Heartless.
Donald The bad guys!
Sora We've been fighting against those intruders for a while.
Rex I knew it!

cutscene.desc: Hamm chuckles

xml.sp: Woody Hmm... Okay.
Buzz Huh?
Woody In that case, you're all right by me. My name's Woody. Put 'er there.

cutscene.desc: He offers a hand and Sora shakes it

xml.sp: Sora Hey.
Buzz Now hold on.
Sora I'm Sora--
Rex overexcitedly Yozora!

cutscene.desc: Rex gets forlorn looks from everyone and joins the rest of Andy's toys

xml.sp: Sora Actually, my name's Sora...
Donald And I'm Donald.
Goofy I'm Goofy.
Buzz And I'm...Buzz Lightyear.
Hamm Call me Hamm. It's a real honor.

Rex And I'm Rex! I'm your biggest fan. In fact, I've been playing your game for months now. And I've already gotten you all the way up to LV 47. But that Bahamut boss is really tough. Slinky and I can't figure out how to beat him.

cutscene.desc: The Green Army Men walk up to the group

xml.sp: Rex Oh, I wish Slinky and the others were here. They'd be so happy to meet you!
Sarge All troops at attention, sir!

cutscene.desc: The Army Men salute and Sora, Donald and Goofy return it. A rolling sound catches their attention and they hear a squeak as the three Little Green Men coast toward them on Andy's skateboard

xml.sp: Little Green Men Weeee!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy leap out of the way. After leaving the skateboard, the toy aliens waddle over to Donald, their eyes blinking individually

xml.sp: Little Green Man 1 Strangers.
Little Green Man 2 From the outside.
Little Green Man 3 Welcome.
Sora They're all toys? So that's why we look the way we do.

cutscene.desc: He sees Buzz walking towards him as the aliens go on their way

xml.sp: Buzz Excuse me. You said that you've battled those intruders before. Tell us where and why.
Sora Oh... Well, uh...we are--
Donald to Sora Order!

cutscene.desc: Sora covers his mouth

xml.sp: Buzz Well? You must have come from somewhere.

cutscene.desc: Hamm agrees while Woody walks over

xml.sp: Woody Take it easy, Buzz. What matters is that they got those intruders out of our way--for at least a little while.
Woody No need to interrogate 'em.
Rex Yeah, Buzz!
Hamm Woody's right.
Buzz Noted. But still...
Sora Hey. Have those intruders--the Heartless--been a problem around here?
Woody No, they just showed up a little while ago.
Buzz In fact, those Heartless materialized...right after our friends up and vanished.
Donald to Goofy You don't think...
Goofy Well, gee. It can't just be a coincidence.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods and Woody gazes up at the window over Andy's desk

xml.sp: Woody It wasn't always this lonely. One day we woke up, and we were the only toys left here. Nobody's heard from Mom, Molly, or Andy...

cutscene.desc: He sits on a wooden block and stares at the underside of his shoe where the name ANDY is written in faded ink

xml.sp: Woody sadly We keep waiting for Andy to come home.
Sora You really care about him.

cutscene.desc: Woody nods and stands back up, rejoining the group

xml.sp: Woody Yeah... He's the best friend that toys like us could ever hope to have.

cutscene.desc: He places a hand on Buzz's shoulder and the toys smile

xml.sp: Sora All right. We'd better start looking!
Woody Huh?
Sora Have you gotten any clues we can go on--any other strange things that happened?
Woody Well... Hmm. There's one thing.
Hamm One big thing.
Sarge Huge, sir.
Rex What thing?

Buzz After everyone went MIA, the intruders didn't come alone. They arrived with a guy wearing a hood, dressed in black, just like you. As a matter of fact, he's the only other toy we've seen, outside of you three.
Sora A black hood? (gasp) But that would mean...
Donald & Goofy The Organization!
Woody You know who it is?
Sora Yeah. They're bad news.
Buzz Seems like you have a lot of enemies.
Sora We may have a hunch what's causing all the weirdness. Would you mind if we handle this?
Woody I'm sorry. But we're not gonna leave this to you.
Sora Huh?
Woody If that guy had something to do with our friends vanishing, then he's our problem too. We've got to work together.

cutscene.desc: He extends a hand once more to Sora, who reciprocates

xml.sp: Sora Right!

cutscene.desc: Goofy, Rex, Hamm and the aliens share a delighted response

xml.sp: Sora So then, were can we find that guy?

cutscene.desc: Woody kneels toward the Army Men

xml.sp: Woody Sarge, any word from the recon team?
Sarge The latest reports place him in town, sir. At Galaxy Toys!

cutscene.desc: He points to the Galaxy Toys flyer on Andy's bulletin board

xml.sp: Woody Then Galaxy Toys is where we're going. Sora. Follow me.

cutscene.desc: He looks up to the window and the others follow his gaze

xml.sp: Woody It's out the window and down the roof.
Buzz Not so fast, cowboy.
Woody Hm?
Buzz You seem pretty gung ho about going, but shouldn't we stay here and wait for Andy?
Woody Well... You've got a point, but...we've tried waiting. Look, if we go with Sora, we might find a clue. Are you with me, Buzz?

cutscene.desc: Buzz smiles

xml.sp: Buzz Of course. Okay, let's move out!

cutscene.desc: They exit through the window and down the roof of the garage to the driveway, engaging in spars with the Heartless that block their way. They reach Galaxy Toys, home of Vic the Visitor, their alien mascot, displayed by the gigantic flying saucer that stands atop the building. They cross the threshold and enter the enormous toy store, Rex running in ahead

xml.sp: Rex We're here!

cutscene.desc: Everyone follows in awe of the spacious place. Large displays of Gigas are scattered on different shelves along with game boxes of all kinds. In the center of the first floor is an oversized gumball machine labeled Space Capsule with metal tracks leading in spirals to the upper floors. Sora notices the giant red Gigas

xml.sp: Sora Hey, why doesn't THAT toy move?
Woody I guess it hasn't figured it out.
Sora Figured what out?
???????? I can make it move for you.

cutscene.desc: Sora and Woody look above the Space Capsule, where a black hooded figure enters through a dark portal, uncovering his hood and revealing himself to be Young Xehanort

xml.sp: Sora You're from the dream--the first of the Xehanorts!
Young Xehanort I'm so honored you remember me.

cutscene.desc: He snaps his fingers and three Heartless appear. One jumps into the helmet of the red Gigas and assumes control of it. Its claw arm starts to move with clicking sounds and it leaps toward Sora. Woody raises his hat to see better

xml.sp: Woody Oh no! He CAN move!
Hamm Way cool!

cutscene.desc: The arm spins backwards into a fist with Hamm giving off a startled shriek

xml.sp: Sora Look out!

cutscene.desc: As the Gigas attempts a punch, Sora, Donald and Goofy hold him off while Woody knocks Hamm out of the way

xml.sp: Young Xehanort One heart's shadows fill the emptiness of another. See how they bring him to life? Like Heartless and Nobodies, they fit together.
Sora Enough. Why are you doing this?!

Young Xehanort There's a darkness we are missing and must reclaim. The way hearts connect in this world can provide us with a clue. So we made a copy of the world, and then pulled those hearts apart. I wonder how you'll handle the strain.

cutscene.desc: Hamm runs off to hide behind a potted plant with Rex. Young Xehanort summons the portal again and begins to enter

xml.sp: Sora Wait! What does that mean?
Young Xehanort Don't let me down.

cutscene.desc: Young Xehanort leaves and the Gigas knocks the trio away. Woody catches Sora, while Buzz saves Donald and Goofy

xml.sp: Rex Oh no!
Buzz Woody! What is going on? Is this toy a friend...or foe?

cutscene.desc: The Gigas stands, aiming its arm cannon at them

xml.sp: Woody I think we've got our answer.

cutscene.desc: The cannon fires bursts, causing them to flee in opposite directions, hiding behind shelving units

xml.sp: Donald Sora! You're up!
Goofy Yeah! If the Heartless know how to do it, there's no reason you can't.
Sora Do what?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy point to a large blue Gigas on the wall with an already open helmet

xml.sp: Sora Brilliant! I'm on it!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs toward the Gigas, taking a spinning leap and landing inside. He grabs onto the two control sticks inside and closes the helmet, leaping down to the floor to face off against the Heartless-controlled Gigas. Using the toy mech's various blasters, punches, and explosions, he defeats the main Gigas troops while the others take down the small Heartless legions on the floor. The red Gigas slows to a stop and the helmet opens as a Heartless disappears, the Heart being released from inside it. Sora leaps out of the blue Gigas

xml.sp: Buzz He was being controlled? He wasn't just switched into battle mode by accident?
Sora Buzz?

cutscene.desc: Buzz turns away

xml.sp: Buzz sighs It's nothing.
Woody I'm confused. That guy in the black coat--did he say he made a copy of the real world? What's that mean?
Sora It...prob'ly means they split this world in two--your friends in one world, us in the other. Only one of the worlds is real, and the other is just really convincing.
Buzz You can't be serious. Oh! That's right, you're from a video game. Well, maybe in your game, that's how things work...but here in reality, you can't split worlds.

cutscene.desc: Sora is lost for words

xml.sp: Buzz This is ridiculous.

cutscene.desc: He waves Sora off and walks away towards Woody

xml.sp: Buzz Woody, let's go.
Woody I admit, it does sound just a little far-fetched.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy rejoin the group

xml.sp: Woody But...say we HAVE been taken to some kind of alternate world. That would explain why your laser's real. And is it really that crazy? Worse than evil emperors and protecting the galaxy? Any of that ring a bell?

cutscene.desc: He puts a hand on Buzz's shoulder. Buzz clears his throat

xml.sp: Buzz Point taken. But that just means these strangers are part of the delusion. And I say it's time we parted ways and went home.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy look crestfallen

xml.sp: Goofy Thought we were friends, not strangers.
Sora Look, I get that it seems weird, but we know something's wrong with this place. We should stick together.
Woody Sora's right. They helped with the intruders, so they might help find our friends.

cutscene.desc: Buzz starts walking toward the red Gigas

xml.sp: Woody They have been there for us so far. You can't deny that. Come on. Every toy deserves a fair shake. Am I right?
Buzz Tell it to that toy over there.

cutscene.desc: He points to the Gigas. Woody falls silent

xml.sp: Sarge Sheriff, sir!

cutscene.desc: Woody looks atop the shelf to see Sarge and another Green Army Man

xml.sp: Sarge Rex has just been dino-napped!
Woody What's that?!

cutscene.desc: Sarge turns to his fellow soldier, who salutes

xml.sp: Sarge My men saw him get hauled up to the second floor, sir! And Hamm and the Aliens are MIA.
Woody Come on. We have got to find them!

cutscene.desc: Woody begins running and Sora follows

xml.sp: Sora Please, let us help!
Donald & Goofy Yeah!

cutscene.desc: Woody looks over his shoulder at Buzz who hasn't budged and runs back over to him

xml.sp: Woody Well, Buzz? Do you really think we can save our friends on our own? We didn't get very far before. We gotta take all the help we can get.

cutscene.desc: Buzz gives an abject sigh

xml.sp: Goofy Don't worry. Sora can be reckless...
Sora Wha?
Goofy ...and Donald grumbles a lot.
Donald Huh?
Sora It's true.
Goofy But you can trust 'em!
Donald Hey! He suspects you, too!
Sora It's true.
Goofy Huh? He does?

cutscene.desc: Donald throws his hands up and Sora chuckles

xml.sp: Woody See, they don't seem bad. Am I right, Buzz?
Buzz Okay, fine. We do need the extra help. But just so we're clear: I remain skeptical about this. I'll work with you till we find our friends.
Sora Ohhh...kay.
Woody Thanks for the help, Sora, Donald, Goofy.
Sarge My troops will return to the field, sir!

cutscene.desc: The Army Men salute and walk off. The group walks over to the Space Capsule and Buzz ejects his wings right as Woody walks into them. He scowls at Buzz for a moment, but the feeling passes

xml.sp: Buzz This ascent is gonna be rather tricky.
Woody smiling Too bad we're not strapped to a rocket, huh?

cutscene.desc: Woody leans on Buzz's wings, but Buzz retracts them back into his suit

xml.sp: Sora Hey! Think we could use that?

cutscene.desc: Sora points upwards and they see the spiral tracks leading to the other floors

xml.sp: Woody It's perfect. C'mon, guys!

cutscene.desc: They ride the rails up to the 2nd Floor and enter a store named Action+, where they gaze in awe of the seemingly endless shelves of action figures. Woody sees something tail-shaped out of the corner of his eye and he turns in surprise

xml.sp: Woody Rex!

cutscene.desc: He dashes around the corner of a display, but sees no one there

xml.sp: Woody Where'd he go?
Buzz You sure you saw him?
Woody Yes, he just--
Sora Shh. Do you guys hear something?
Goofy What's that?

cutscene.desc: Sora sees waves of darkness though a break in the boxes on display where something is moving

xml.sp: Buzz Something feels wrong...

cutscene.desc: With a huge swipe of its claw, an immense dragon model toy called the Supreme Smasher knocks over the display of Smasher toys in front of them. Donald starts running back to the exit, when the store's sliding door slams shut. The Supreme Smasher lets out a giant bellow and they clearly see the Heartless symbol emblazoned on its neck. They summon their weapons

xml.sp: Sora Another toy's being controlled!

cutscene.desc: Buzz shakes off a worrisome look and readies his laser

xml.sp: Sora Buzz, you sure?
Buzz If it wanted to play nice, then it should've stayed away from my friends.

cutscene.desc: They manage to free the controlled toys and Sora dispels his Keyblade with a sigh of relief. Suddenly, another Supreme Smasher lands behind them and roars. Sora hears a scream and looks over to see a dragon-shaped glider hooked to the ceiling flying in circles piloted by a shouting Rex. It spins at full speed, knocking the hook out of the tile, sending the glider and Rex flying into the Supreme Smasher just as it reaches back for a claw slash at Sora. The dragon toy falls over as Rex flies into an Air Droid display along with an orange puppet hanging from a cloud-like gear. After landing on the floor, the gear tries to float away but Rex lands on it

xml.sp: Rex What's this?!

cutscene.desc: The puppet turns its head to face Rex menacingly, revealing a Heartless symbol on its hat

xml.sp: Rex Oh no! What did I do?!

cutscene.desc: He runs away from it while Sora strikes down the Marionette Heartless with one swipe of his Keyblade. Woody sighs with relief, wiping his brow

xml.sp: Woody Nice moves, Rex.
Goofy That was great!
Rex Great? Really? Would you say I was impressive?
Buzz Very impressive, Rex. We couldn't look away.
Rex excitedly Hurray! Oh, that makes me so happy!

cutscene.desc: He turns to Donald

xml.sp: Rex Were you watching too? Did you see what I did?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Woody try to calm Rex down

xml.sp: Donald Yeah, good for you.
Woody Listen, Rex.
Rex I was going for fearsome...
Woody Would ya--
Rex ...but I think I might've actually achieved something close to terrifying!
Woody Earth to Rex.

cutscene.desc: Rex stops

xml.sp: Sora Do you know where the others were taken?
Rex What do you mean? Did something bad happen?
Buzz Back to square one.
Woody Oh, great.

cutscene.desc: Woody hears a clicking sound of plastic on metal and looks up to see the sergeant climbing down the vent near the ceiling

xml.sp: Woody Sarge! Have you got a status report?
Sarge saluting Sir! One of my men just located Hamm forward of our position, in Babies in Toddlers.

cutscene.desc: The group smile with the good news

xml.sp: Sarge The corporal was debriefing him, but something must have gone wrong. All radio contact has been lost.

cutscene.desc: The group sighs

xml.sp: Buzz Anything more specific we can go on?
Sarge Right before I lost contact, I heard music with some sort of sonic interference.
Buzz Music?
Goofy Ya think it could be the Heartless?
Donald What if it's another big monster?
Sora Let's find out.
Woody I agree.

cutscene.desc: Woody and the group start walking ahead, while Rex stays put

xml.sp: Rex Actually...I think I'll head back and wait by the entrance. I'm sure those vents are gonna be much too narrow for my big dinosaur tail.

cutscene.desc: Sora looks up at the vent

xml.sp: Sora Really? I'm sure you'd fit.
Buzz interjecting Rex is right. Besides, we need a lookout at th e entrance. It's an important mission. Can you do it?
Rex Yes, sir!

cutscene.desc: Rex makes a determined fist with his little arm and Buzz salutes him. Sora and the rest chuckle and make their way up into the ventilation shaft. Using the vents to reach the third floor of Galaxy Toys they exit into the Dolls section of Babies & Toddlers

xml.sp: Woody This is Babies and Toddlers. Where do you guys think we should start?

cutscene.desc: Goofy bends down to speak to the sergeant

xml.sp: Goofy Sarge, didn't you mention music?

cutscene.desc: Sarge hops to face him

xml.sp: Sarge Affirmative, Goofy.

cutscene.desc: Sora peers out through the vast toy section

xml.sp: Sora Hmm... All right. Why don't we look for things that make noise?
Goofy Sure!
Donald That's good thinking for you.

cutscene.desc: Donald walks off, cackling

xml.sp: Sora Wha... What do you mean, for me?

cutscene.desc: Donald breaks into a run

xml.sp: Sora Hey, where ya--

cutscene.desc: Donald runs around Goofy

xml.sp: Sora laughing Donald!

cutscene.desc: They end up in a standoff around Goofy

xml.sp: Woody I think they really are good guys.

cutscene.desc: Sora tries to grab Donald but he runs past him and shakes his tailfeather

xml.sp: Sora Hold still!

cutscene.desc: Goofy chuckles and Sora runs after him

xml.sp: Buzz Well, you wouldn't have trusted them otherwise.

cutscene.desc: Donald tries to run around Goofy again but Sora blocks him, prompting Donald to dive through Sora's legs. Goofy laughs harder

xml.sp: Sora What?
Donald Missed me!

cutscene.desc: He laughs, leaping back to his feet

xml.sp: Sora Don't!
Buzz And I know that your trust is a hard-earned treasure.

cutscene.desc: They continue playing cat and mouse

xml.sp: Sora No! Stop that!
Donald laughing Victor!

cutscene.desc: Woody smiles softly at Buzz

xml.sp: Buzz Well...for all our sakes, let's hope you're right, cowboy. I'm willing to give 'em a chance at least for a little while longer. Especially if it means getting Andy and our friends back.
Woody Agreed.

cutscene.desc: They search through the store, taking out more Heartless-possessed toys, until they reach a large gramophone in the corner at a display labeled Musical Toads. Sora hops onto the turntable

xml.sp: Sora Is this it?

cutscene.desc: He begins to run on the record and the symphony of toads on the display light up and begin playing

xml.sp: Woody Come on, Sora... You've never used a record player?
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: Sora slows down and the music stops as Woody leaps up onto the record as well

xml.sp: Woody Like this!

cutscene.desc: He starts running along the record, throwing Sora off-balance. Sora returns to a run and laughs as the orchestra continues playing

xml.sp: Goofy It's workin'!

cutscene.desc: One of the instruments plays a false note

xml.sp: Buzz Wait, did that sound off to you?
Donald It did.
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: Distracted, Sora slows down and almost crashes into Woody

xml.sp: Woody Heeey!

cutscene.desc: Sora speeds back up and Goofy calls up to him

xml.sp: Goofy Sora! There's some kinda strange noise comin' from the orchestra!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Woody exchange glances

xml.sp: Sora waving Got it! Woody, you keep the record going.

cutscene.desc: Sora jumps down from the turntable

xml.sp: Woody Whoa-whoa-whoa!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy search the orchestra for the instrument that's playing off-rhythm and find that it's the tuba-playing toad. Woody struggles to catch his breath as he keeps the music playing while Goofy peers into the tuba

xml.sp: Goofy Hmm... Somethin' seems to be stuck in this tuba.
Sora I'll get it out.

cutscene.desc: Sora reaches into the tuba, feeling around for the obstruction. He finds it and struggles to get it unstuck

xml.sp: Sora Almost got it...

cutscene.desc: With a loud pop, he pulls out...

xml.sp: Sora There!

cutscene.desc: ...the corporal. Sora places him gently on the table

xml.sp: Sarge Corporal!

cutscene.desc: The sergeant hops down from a higher ledge and walks over to the corporal, placing a hand on his back

xml.sp: Sarge You all right, son?
Corporal Yes, sir.
Buzz That's the soldier Sarge lost contact with.

cutscene.desc: Sarge gets the soldier to his feet and puts his arm around his shoulders, hoisting him up

xml.sp: Sora So you found Hamm?
Corporal Yes. But...while I was radioing in, a giant hand grabbed me, and it stuffed me in there. They must have taken Hamm to another location. We have to hurry!

cutscene.desc: The corporal tries to walk his injured self, but falls over

xml.sp: Sarge Wait, Corporal. You're not fit for action.

cutscene.desc: Sarge helps him stand again

xml.sp: Corporal But Sarge...
Sarge Your tour is over, son. And it's all right. Our trusted allies will take over.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy salute them and the corporal starts tearing up

xml.sp: Sarge I will move the corporal to a safer location.
Corporal saluting Good luck, gentlemen.

cutscene.desc: The Green Army Men walk off as the music continues to play and Woody continues to run. They reach the edge of the orchestra ledge and give Woody a salute

xml.sp: Woody Huh...?

cutscene.desc: They hop down the ledge

xml.sp: Woody running out of breath Hey, hey, hey, hey! What is...going on?!
Sora Oh, right!
Buzz Woody! Mission complete!

cutscene.desc: Woody leaps off the record player and the music slows to a stop

xml.sp: Woody winded Why didn't...you tell me...a little sooner?

cutscene.desc: Woody falls to his hands and knees, trying to catch his breath

xml.sp: Buzz Sorry, there's no time to rest. Hamm needs us.

cutscene.desc: Buzz hops off the table and Woody gives an exhausted salute. They soon find a dollhouse that's rattling around in a window display. They struggle to get the side of the house open, but with everyone's help, it unlatches, and the five of them land in a pileup

xml.sp: Hamm Talk about cabin fever. Thanks for the save.

cutscene.desc: Hamm walks out of the dollhouse much to their surprise

xml.sp: Woody You okay, Hamm?
Hamm Yeah, aside from being locked in, the accomodations were fine.

cutscene.desc: He nods over to the fully-furnished inside of the house, where Donald steps inside

xml.sp: Donald Aww. What a tiny little house.

cutscene.desc: He walks by the window where a giant doll peers inside

xml.sp: Donald Huh?

cutscene.desc: The doll brims with darkness and its sudden appearance causes Donald to thrash about the house

xml.sp: Woody Who was--

cutscene.desc: Hamm shrieks in terror and backs away

xml.sp: Buzz What's wrong?
Hamm She's back! That's the doll that pig-penned me!

cutscene.desc: The doll's eyes glow orange, matching the glowing Heartless symbol on her left bunny ear

xml.sp: Woody Hamm, take cover.
Hamm Uh, copy that. One stay in the dread-and-breakfast was enough for me!

cutscene.desc: Hamm runs away

xml.sp: Buzz Not another possessed toy...
Sora Guys, look alive!

cutscene.desc: They fight the possessed Angelic Amber doll along with a horde of Bouncy Pets and Patchwork Animals also under the Marionette Heartless's control. The doll stops floating and its eyes return to their normal shade of blue. It slumps against the floor, lifeless

xml.sp: Buzz Wait... What if we end up just like her? Forgetting ourselves and... attacking each other?
Sora No way, Buzz. That won't happen.
Donald No way!
Goofy You guys are too strong.
Buzz hotly You can't be sure! What if I get taken over, then attack you?

cutscene.desc: Woody places a hand on his shoulder

xml.sp: Woody Buzz, you're overthinking it.
Sora Yeah. The Heartless--the darkness--can only creep in when our hearts falter. Trust me. You'll be fine if you don't lose heart.
Woody Well, that's good. Because I know you, Buzz. You'll never lose heart when it comes to your friends.

cutscene.desc: He flicks his hat upwards

xml.sp: Buzz True enough, cowboy.

cutscene.desc: Buzz gives a small smile

xml.sp: Buzz Sorry to have worried you all.
Woody No problem. Now, let's go find the others.

cutscene.desc: They return to the window, Buzz helping Woody up to the windowsill, and meet back up with Hamm. Donald and Goofy spot something through the glass

xml.sp: Donald Look!

cutscene.desc: A UFO with a crane claw sails past the window, a trail of darkness behind it

xml.sp: Goofy A flying saucer!

cutscene.desc: Woody adjusts his hat

xml.sp: Woody I think I know who that might lead us to. C'mon, guys!

cutscene.desc: They open the window right as the UFO passes by and Woody waves them through when the coast is clear

xml.sp: Hamm Hey, Woody. I'd just slow you down, with all the loose change I'm carrying. I'll hang by the entrance.
Woody No problem. Be safe, Hamm.

cutscene.desc: Woody leaps out the window

xml.sp: Hamm Hey, thanks, buddy. You just take care of your old self.

cutscene.desc: Hamm leaves and Woody rejoins the group

xml.sp: Woody Now, let's follow that UFO!
Sora, Donald & Goofy Right!

cutscene.desc: They enter the Outdoor playplace of Babies & Toddlers where the UFO is flying through. The Aliens spot it with glee

xml.sp: Little Green Man 1 They have come for us.
Little Green Man 2 The mystic portal awaits.

cutscene.desc: The UFO stops over the three Aliens and the claw descends, sending the group running after them

xml.sp: Buzz Oh no!
Sora Wait!
Woody Stop!

cutscene.desc: The Aliens are snatched up into the mothership

xml.sp: Little Green Men Farewell!
Buzz It's getting away!
Sora Don't go!

cutscene.desc: Surrounded by Toy Trooper Heartless, Sora, Donald, Goofy, Woody & Buzz take down the possessed UFO. It drops the Aliens and falters in the air, eventually losing power and sinking to the floor

xml.sp: Little Green Men We are back!

cutscene.desc: They start to run in different directions

xml.sp: Little Green Man 1 Our ship is no more.
Little Green Man 2 Nirvana will not be reached.

cutscene.desc: Sora picks one up with a squeak

xml.sp: Sora Sorry I trashed your ride.
Little Green Man 3 Fear not.
Little Green Man 1 We still have our new home.
Little Green Men The Chamber of Andy.
Buzz They're right.

cutscene.desc: Sora sets the Alien down

xml.sp: Buzz This isn't where we belong. We've been in this toy store long enough. It's time for us to go home to Andy's room.
Sora But...Xehanort told us that room isn't even his real room.
Buzz Can you prove that any of that nonsense is true?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy sigh

xml.sp: Buzz And even if that Andy's room IS fake, it doesn't mean he's not somewhere in this world with us. I'm going home to wait for him. No more debate.

cutscene.desc: He turns

xml.sp: Buzz You with me, Woody?

cutscene.desc: The Aliens waddle to follow Buzz

xml.sp: Woody Hmm... Youre right, Buzz. Now that we're all accounted for, we should meet up at the entrance and go home.
Sora Okay. We could have used friends like you for the final showdown...
Goofy But Organization XIII's our problem to solve.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods and Donald hops in place

xml.sp: Donald Yeah, I can take 'em!
Sora I'm not so sure about that...

cutscene.desc: Goofy chuckles

xml.sp: Donald I'll show ya!

cutscene.desc: Sora laughs and runs up to Woody and Buzz, Donald and Goofy following suit

xml.sp: Sora Guys, can we see you off?
Woody That would be great.

cutscene.desc: They return to the first floor

xml.sp: Woody Sarge, roll call.

cutscene.desc: He points to the Green Army Man as he walks past him

xml.sp: Sarge saluting Sir, yes sir! Roll call! All toys, fall in!

cutscene.desc: The Army Men, Hamm, and the Aliens form a line as Buzz walks by them

xml.sp: Buzz Sarge... Army Men times four... Hamm... Aliens 1, 2, 3...

cutscene.desc: The Army Men salute and each Alien squeaks as they raise their hands

xml.sp: Buzz Wait. Where's Rex?
Hamm Aw, he took off. Said he wanted to prove to you you could trust Sora. He's up there by the video games.

cutscene.desc: The pig points up to the third floor and Buzz sighs

xml.sp: Buzz Well, here we go again.
Sora Huh? This is about us?

cutscene.desc: He gives a worried look

xml.sp: Sora He's not safe. The Heartless are out there.
Woody You're right. Sora, Donald, Goofy... Any chance you could help us one last time?
Sora Sure!
Goofy Of course!
Donald You bet!
Woody smiling Thanks, guys.

cutscene.desc: They return to the third floor and enter the video game store where they find Rex among the Verum Rex merchandise

xml.sp: Rex Hurray!

cutscene.desc: He hops down and rushes over to Sora with the game in his hands

xml.sp: Rex Look! Look! I found it!

cutscene.desc: He holds it almost too close to Sora's face, trying to show him the cover

xml.sp: Rex See, Sora?

cutscene.desc: The cover shows an image of the silver-haired Yozora lazing on stone steps with his sword and crossbow

xml.sp: Sora Well, I never look THIS good. The clothes kinda match.

cutscene.desc: Buzz and Woody walk further into the game store around a giant poster for Verum Rex, where they can see a much larger version of the game cover

xml.sp: Woody Whaddaya know! They ARE video game figures. See? I told ya, Buzz. They're toys, just like the rest of us.

cutscene.desc: Buzz looks over to them as something catches Rex's eye

xml.sp: Buzz Well, I suppose.

cutscene.desc: Sora leans over to speak privately with Donald

xml.sp: Sora Donald, I thought your magic decided how I look. Explain.
Donald Simple. That's not you.
Goofy Say, Riku would make a great action figure!
Donald Must be him!
Sora No! It's me. I've got the black clothes and, uh...

cutscene.desc: He trails off slowly

xml.sp: Donald So what?
Buzz All right, everyone. Now that we're back together, it's time to return to Andy's room.

cutscene.desc: Rex is reading the back cover of a Play Plus strategy guide

xml.sp: Rex Now?

cutscene.desc: He drops the book and searches through the shelf, tossing books aside

xml.sp: Rex But can't I at least check the strategy guides? I want to know how to beat Bahamut!

cutscene.desc: He manages to find the Verum Rex guide

xml.sp: Buzz Next time. Right now, we need to go home.

cutscene.desc: Buzz takes the book and tosses it away. Rex's face turns sad and Buzz consoles him with a tap him on the snout. Rex walks away hesitantly from the book, following Buzz back to the group. A figure with a pair of boots lands on the floor nearby

xml.sp: Young Xehanort Oh, but you needn't rush off.

cutscene.desc: The voice catches their attention and they summon their weapons

xml.sp: Sora Xehanort!
Young Xehanort I have more to observe. I can't let you leave yet.
Sora It's us that you really want. Leave the others out of this.

cutscene.desc: Xehanort smirks

xml.sp: Young Xehanort You WOULD say that, champion of light.

cutscene.desc: A Marionette Heartless dangles behind them unknowingly

xml.sp: Young Xehanort Very well, let's skip to the final stage.

cutscene.desc: It strolls up to Buzz and he gives a face of surprise before the Heartless disappears and his body goes quiet

xml.sp: Rex Buzz? What's the matter?

cutscene.desc: Darkness emanates from Buzz Lightyear and he activates his laser, aiming it at Woody's head. Woody gasps before raising an eyebrow

xml.sp: Woody C'mon, Buzz. Quit fooling around.
Goofy Look out!

cutscene.desc: Buzz fires the laser just as Goofy leaps in front of Woody with his shield

xml.sp: Woody I can't believe it! Buzz has been taken over?

cutscene.desc: Buzz fires a few more shots

xml.sp: Sora What did you do to him?!

cutscene.desc: Sora attacks Xehanort, who phases away in the blink of an eye

xml.sp: Young Xehanort I thought I made it clear. I am testing the strength of their bonds.

cutscene.desc: Young Xehanort walks around the room, phasing in and out as Sora tries to strike him down, but only slicing air

xml.sp: Young Xehanort In this world, toys have hearts. And those hearts come from a powerful bond.

cutscene.desc: Sora looks around, seeing Xehanort on a high display case above a video screen

xml.sp: Young Xehanort So what happens when those bonds are stretched to their limit? When they are worlds apart, can cloth and plastic hold on to their hearts?

cutscene.desc: Sora leaps to the top of the display with another failed attack

xml.sp: Young Xehanort All I needed was a wedge to widen the divide--someone like you to fill them with distrust and doubt.

cutscene.desc: Sora finds him walking along the display and Xehanort dodges each of Sora's blows effortlessly

xml.sp: Young Xehanort And that chasm you created can be filled with a vast darkness.

cutscene.desc: He appears on the floor and Sora leaps down at him, striking nothing

xml.sp: Young Xehanort Witness it for yourself.
Donald Sora!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Rex are trying to hold Buzz at bay, but he continues his laser blasts unflinching as Goofy stops them from hitting Woody

xml.sp: Rex Do somethiiing!
Sora On my way!

cutscene.desc: Sora tries to run to their aid, but Xehanort snatches him up

xml.sp: Young Xehanort Not this time!

cutscene.desc: Xehanort summons a concentrated energy blast near Sora's waist, which then explodes, blasting him into the nearby video screen. He phases into it, sending a ripple through the screen. He lands on a metal surface of an enormous boat several miles from a nighttime city skyline

xml.sp: Sora Where am I?
Young Xehanort Haven't you heard? In this world, you come from a video game. So now, you can watch my experiment from inside that screen. That is...if you manage to find a moment's rest.

cutscene.desc: Young Xehanort teleports out of the store as Sora comes face to face with the Gigas inside Verum Rex

xml.sp: Sora There's got to be a way out. Buzz, Woody, hang on!

cutscene.desc: After a few minutes, Sora leaps out of the television screen to the delighted faces of his friends

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Sora!
Woody Y'all right, Sora?
Sora Yeah, I'm just fine. And you?

cutscene.desc: They don't know how to respond aside from worry

xml.sp: Sora Wait... Where's Buzz?

cutscene.desc: Woody sighs

xml.sp: Goofy He disappeared into a dark corridor.
Sora Oh...
Woody Sora, how do we get him back?
Sora I don't know. My power won't open those.

cutscene.desc: Woody breathes a large sigh as the Green Army Men walk nearer

xml.sp: Sarge Sir, did I hear you say dark corridor?
Woody That's right, Sarge. Any ideas?
Sarge Well, it might be a long shot, but we've sighted a shadowy portal in the Kid Korral. We can infiltrate from a window inside Babies and Toddlers.

cutscene.desc: Woody's disposition lightens

xml.sp: Sarge I'll head there and get it open.

cutscene.desc: He kneels down close to the sergeant with a wide smile

xml.sp: Woody Sarge, you're a lifesaver!

cutscene.desc: He turns back to Sora and the others

xml.sp: Woody You guys in?
Sora, Donald & Goofy Yeah!
Rex Please promise you'll bring Buzz home.
Hamm With batteries included?
Little Green Man 1 Journey safely.
Little Green Man 2 Farewell!
Woody Don't worry. WE'RE gonna get our friend back.

cutscene.desc: They return to the Outdoor section of Babies & Toddlers

xml.sp: Woody Sora, look!

cutscene.desc: High above on a windowed wall with the design of a house is a much smaller window

xml.sp: Woody That must be the window Sarge mentioned.

cutscene.desc: They make their way up through the window and enter the Kid Korral, where Sora sees odd green cubes piled against the main door

xml.sp: Sora The entrance was blocked by BLOCKS?
Woody Can you use the Gigas to move 'em?
Sora Yeah, maybe. I'll try.

cutscene.desc: Sora pilots a nearby blue Gigas, stretching its arm out. He activates the claw which sends magnetic bolts to the green blocks, causing them to glow and disperse, unbarring the door. They move further into the room where Donald spots something

xml.sp: Donald Up there!

cutscene.desc: A stream of darkness emanates from the uppermost vent in the room, much too high to reach by normal means, especially at toy height

xml.sp: Sora How we gonna reach that?
Woody Well, there ARE some more blocks here...

cutscene.desc: Heartless appear as they reach another pile of green blocks, but they are quickly taken out. Sora uses a Gigas again to pile them closer to the vent

xml.sp: Goofy We'll need more than that.

cutscene.desc: They find another pile in a room with multicolored blocks

xml.sp: Donald Getting closer.

cutscene.desc: Once all the blocks have been gathered and piled up, three cones land on top of the green figure assembled and a fanfare plays. The figure, with a permanent surprised look on its face, leans over toward the wall, providing a path up to the vent

xml.sp: Donald Hey, is that...
Sora A cactus?

cutscene.desc: The vent cover falls open

xml.sp: Goofy Yep, and it's our way up to the dark corridor.

cutscene.desc: The party makes their way to the vent and enters it, finding a corridor of darkness

xml.sp: Sora It looked like this?
Goofy Yup.
Sora Here goes.

cutscene.desc: Sora and the group pass through the ominous portal, finding themselves in a hazy abyss. Buzz is hovering in the center, darkness coming off of him and spreading through the air. Young Xehanort waits for them, waves of dark energy covering the floor as pieces of toys are scattered about the abyss, floating on invisible strings

xml.sp: Sora & Woody Buzz!
Sora Xehanort!
Woody What do you want with my friend?
Young Xehanort Look... Such tremendous darkness. All because he was ripped away from the boy who cares about him most.

cutscene.desc: The waves punch upward

xml.sp: Woody Does that mean...we'll all be like Buzz...

cutscene.desc: The waves coalesce around Woody

xml.sp: Woody ...if we don't...find Andy?
Sora Wrong! Distance doesn't matter. Andy's part of their hearts, just like my friends are part of mine.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod in agreement, glaring at Xehanort

xml.sp: Sora You can't rip that apart!

cutscene.desc: Woody looks at the bottom of his shoe where Andy had written his name years ago, and then at Buzz's, just the same. Buzz is carried higher by the waves as Xehanort raises an arm

xml.sp: Young Xehanort What? Your friends are your power? Ah... How very true. But if the light of friendship is a form of power...the darkness of being alone is a power...even greater. Darkness is the heart's true nature.

cutscene.desc: Sora is stunned to silence, but Woody places a hand on his shoulder and walks past him

xml.sp: Woody Whatever you're talking about, I don't care. Put Buzz back the way he was, then get lost!
Young Xehanort Or else what, toy?
Woody Yeah, I am a toy. And a friend.

cutscene.desc: Woody stamps down with his foot, breaking the waves of darkness slightly, revealing the floor underneath

xml.sp: Woody My guess is no one's ever loved you before. Because you know NOTHING about hearts and love.

cutscene.desc: Sora joins him in their circle of light, both making steps forward

xml.sp: Sora There are hearts all around us, trying to connect. Your loneliness only made Woody and Buzz's connection stronger. THAT's the heart's true nature--to never, ever let go. Wherever they are, Andy and the other toys haven't let go either.
Woody Yeah! You can't keep us from Andy. We're going home no matter what. And taking Buzz!
Sora Xehanort, you're so caught up in finding the shadows, you forgot about the light that cast them.

cutscene.desc: The force of light breaks through the dark waves, tearing apart the darkness holding Buzz in the air. As it reaches Buzz, it shines out with a brilliant light

xml.sp: Young Xehanort No!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy charge forward, forcing Xehanort to summon his Keyblade, blocking the three of them

xml.sp: Sora Woody, now!

cutscene.desc: Woody leaps forward over them, tossing out the pullstring from his back. It latches onto a Lego floating in the air and Woody swings around, using the momentum to snatch Buzz from his tangled perch. Sora smiles as Xehanort scowls as the pullstring retracts back inside Woody with a message of Giddy-up, partner! We gotta get this wagon train a-movin'! Suddenly, Buzz opens his eyes, seeing Woody on top of him. Woody lifts his head and gazes back at his friend. He turns over and sits with Buzz, who holds his head

xml.sp: Buzz Woody... Wait, how did I get here?
Woody Hmm. Oh, I don't know! (elbows him) Maybe somebody switched you into dark and stormy mode.
Buzz But I don't have a--

cutscene.desc: He realizes what Woody is saying. The cowboy extends a hand to him and Buzz smiles, taking it, getting to his feet

xml.sp: Buzz Thank you, Woody.
Woody Good to have ya back, Buzz.
Donald Hey, hurry up!

cutscene.desc: The two of them look over to see the trio locked in combat with Xehanort

xml.sp: Goofy We can't hold him much longer!
Sora Don't give up, guys!

cutscene.desc: Young Xehanort knocks the three of them back

xml.sp: Young Xehanort So, even empty puppets can be given strong hearts. I am going to have to remember that.

cutscene.desc: Buzz aims his laser beam at Young Xehanort

xml.sp: Buzz Remember this--our hearts will always be connected to Andy's. No matter what you do!
Woody And that's something you'll never understand, because you're hollower than any toy.
Young Xehanort But now I know a heart can be placed in the vessel of our choosing. For that, let me give you a parting gift to play with.
Sora Wait!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs at Xehanort and slashes right through him

xml.sp: Young Xehanort whispering Find the hearts joined to yours.
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: Xehanort vanishes and Donald leaps up, pointing at the sky where the darkness has begun to break

xml.sp: Buzz There!

cutscene.desc: The group rejoins as the darkness is swept up, forming a giant flying saucer Heartless, revealing the room as a toy-sized cityscape with a puzzle-piece road

xml.sp: Woody Careful!
Sora Here goes.

cutscene.desc: After a long battle with the King of Toys involving an electromagnetic tornado, they succeed in finishing off the Heartless and return to the first floor of Galaxy Toys. They regroup with their friends and begin walking toward the exit

xml.sp: Goofy So, Xehanort got away again.
Donald Yeah, he's a big chicken.

cutscene.desc: Sora hangs his head and stops walking

xml.sp: Sora I'm sorry!

cutscene.desc: Woody, Buzz and the others turn back to him, confused

xml.sp: Sora I wanted to get you back to the real world.

cutscene.desc: Woody and Buzz look at each other and smirk

xml.sp: Buzz It does seem that we're trapped here.
Rex We'll never get home.
Hamm Yeah, stuck like pigs.
Sarge Our position appears fixed.
Little Green Men Oh nooo.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy give a sad sigh

xml.sp: Buzz A shame we'll have to stay a little longer...with our new best friends.
Sora, Donald & Goofy Huh?

cutscene.desc: Woody walks up and leans on Sora's shoulder

xml.sp: Woody After all the adventures we've had, we're not quite ready to say, So long.

cutscene.desc: Sora laughs

xml.sp: Sora You guys...

cutscene.desc: The space ranger extends a hand

xml.sp: Buzz I'm sorry that I was being so stubborn. Please forgive me.

cutscene.desc: Sora shakes his head, smiling, and shakes Buzz's hand

xml.sp: Sora Hey, you were just looking out for your friends. No biggie.
Hamm Yeah, somebody's gotta be the sensible one, especially since Woody's always gettin' in trouble.
Goofy Gawrsh, that sounds a little like Sora, don't it?

cutscene.desc: Sora and Woody exchange a look, pointing at themselves

xml.sp: Donald Yeah, and I'm the dependable one!
Rex Like Buzz! ...Kinda.

cutscene.desc: They all laugh

xml.sp: Woody Besides, if we do go back to the real world, we'll never see you again, right?

cutscene.desc: Sora scratches his cheek

xml.sp: Sora But...what about Andy? You care about him so much.

cutscene.desc: Buzz puts a hand on his shoulder

xml.sp: Buzz And he's still right here with us.

cutscene.desc: He touches his heart, smiling. Woody puts an arm around Sora

xml.sp: Woody If we follow our hearts, we'll find him again.
Sora grinning Yeah!

cutscene.desc: They continue walking to the exit

xml.sp: Woody So, Sora, are you goin' after the guy in the black coat?
Buzz Something tells me we can't join you on that mission.
Woody That's okay...because you've become part of our hearts.

cutscene.desc: He points to Sora's heart

xml.sp: Woody So let us become a part of yours.

cutscene.desc: The group extends joyous laughter and infectious smiles as Sora side-hugs Woody

xml.sp: Sora Thank you!
Buzz Now, off you go. To infinity and beyond!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy leave the Toy Box and sail on again in the Gummi Ship. Sora sits in his chair with his hands behind his head and nowhere to go. Donald and Goofy walk to his chair

xml.sp: Donald Sora, what about the power of waking?
Sora You HAD to remind me?
Goofy Well, gawrsh, we just wanna help keep ya motivated.
Sora I was thinking about Roxas. He's trapped here in my heart. But... he needs a body to be himself again.
Goofy Aw, don't worry. Ienzo's workin' on a way to get him free. I'll betcha he's got the perfect body all lined up.

cutscene.desc: Jiminy Cricket hops out of Sora's hood

xml.sp: Jiminy You've got the Gummiphone, Sora. Why don't ya try givin' him a call?
Sora Uhh, I guess so?

cutscene.desc: He takes out the phone

xml.sp: Sora Yeah, why not.

cutscene.desc: He dials and Mickey pops up on the screen

xml.sp: Mickey Oh! Hiya, Sora!
Donald & Goofy Your Majesty!

cutscene.desc: They shove themselves into the view of the camera

xml.sp: Sora Hey! Wha...? Wrong number?
Mickey No, Riku and I are visiting Radiant Garden. Actually, we were just about to call you guys, but it looks like you beat us to the punch.

cutscene.desc: Riku kneels down to Mickeys level as the King holds out the camera

xml.sp: Riku Sora, is something wrong?
Sora I wanted to pick your brain. In order for us to recomplete Roxas, he needs a body, right?
Mickey Yeah, to put his heart in.

cutscene.desc: There is a moment of near silence among them while they think, the only sound from the water fountain at Radiant Garden. Riku gets an idea

xml.sp: Riku Replicas...
Sora Huh?
Riku Well, replicas are basically human.
Sora Uh, what?

Riku Oh, yeah... You wouldn't remember. The previous Organization XIII developed replicas: realistic vessels to place hearts in. They're so real, in fact, that you'd actually mistake them for people. And with hearts, the replicas will BECOME people.
Sora Cool, but if we get our hands on a replica, will Roxas look like himself when he's recompleted?
Riku Yup. The replica takes the form of the heart inside it.

cutscene.desc: He remembers his doppelganger from the events at Castle Oblivion

xml.sp: Sora That's perfect!
Mickey I'll talk to Ienzo. He was in the Organization back then, so he might know more.
Sora Great. Thanks. Wait... (to Donald & Goofy) Do you guys think THEY'RE after replicas too?
Goofy No, they definitely said a black box.
Riku Who's that?
Sora The Organization and Maleficent.

cutscene.desc: They look slightly ashamed

xml.sp: Donald I guess we forgot to mention it.
Mickey Aw, it's okay. But there's something you guys should know about one of their members.
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: They explain what they discovered about Terra

xml.sp: Mickey So, let the rest of us worry about Roxas and Namin for now. You journey on, and keep an eye out for Terra.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy block Sora again

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Yes, Your Majesty!
Sora Stop that!

cutscene.desc: They hang on as Mickey and Riku chuckle

xml.sp: Mickey They don't change, do they?

cutscene.desc: Riku stands

xml.sp: Riku Nope, that's their best quality.
Mickey Welp, we gave Merlin the vestments for Kairi and Axel. Let's go stop by Ansem the Wise's study.
Riku Right.

cutscene.desc: Sora pilots the Gummi Ship to a new world with a tall tower in the middle of a deep forest, the Kingdom of Corona

xml.sp: ???????? Why can't I go outside?
?????? The outside world is a dangerous place. You must stay here, where you're safe. Do you understand, flower?

cutscene.desc: A girl sits at the window of a tower gazing at night sky, her unusually long hair trailing to the floor behind her. Her lonely look changes upon seeing the floating lights in the sky

xml.sp: Rapunzel Those lights appear every year on my birthday--only on my birthday. And I can't help but feel like they're...they're meant for me. I need to see them. And not just from my window... In person. I have to know what they are.

cutscene.desc: Some time later, Sora, Donald and Goofy walk through a picturesque forest. Goofy puts his hand up to block the sun

xml.sp: Goofy It sure is a pretty day.

cutscene.desc: Sora stretches

xml.sp: Sora Yeah, the weather is great. It'd be perfect for a picnic.
Donald Why do you think we came HERE?
Sora Got me, Donald.
Goofy We'll figure it out as we go.
Donald sighing Okay.
Sora I'm sure we were brought to this world for SOME good reason, but can't we sweat it later?
Donald Fine with me, as long as there's no Heartless.

cutscene.desc: They hear a scream and stop in their tracks, looking around for the source of it. Then with grunting and a final slide, a man falls down the hill behind them. He groans, massaging his back, then looks back where he came from, where a troop of Heartless fly down after him. The man gets up and scampers away, the satchel on his hip flapping with every step. He runs toward the trio with the Heartless on his tail, flailing his arms wildly

xml.sp: ????? Make way! Make way! Make way!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy part so he can pass them, then summon their weapons

xml.sp: Sora Heartless!

cutscene.desc: The man finds a rock to hide behind, catching his breath and peering out at the group

xml.sp: Sora You see? Soon as you mention 'em, they show up!
Goofy There goes our picnic.
Donald I didn't do it!
Sora S'okay. Let's send these guys packing.
????? Say, since you three seem to know what you're doing, mind if I leave this one to you?
Sora Yup. We'll take care of them. Go on, skedaddle!
????? You have my thanks.

cutscene.desc: The dashing man gives off a sigh

xml.sp: ????? The horse was enough. Don't need any monsters on my trail.
Donald The WHAT was enough?
????? Oh, nothing, nothing. Name's Flynn. Flynn Rider. (pointing) Ohh! Watch out, they look mad!

cutscene.desc: Donald turns around again and Flynn starts creeping away

xml.sp: Flynn Slowly... Slowly... Outta here!

cutscene.desc: He dashes away as fast as he can while Sora, Donald and Goofy take out the multitude of Heartless. After the fight, they see no sign of Flynn Rider

xml.sp: Sora Huh? Where'd Flynn go?
Donald He skedaddled.
Goofy I think I saw him go thataway.

cutscene.desc: He points toward a spot between the trees that veers into a small clearing with rocky hills on each side

xml.sp: Sora Huh? But thataway is...just a dead end.
Goofy Yeah. That's puzzling.
Donald Well, did he?

cutscene.desc: Goofy crosses his arms, thinking

xml.sp: Sora I say we investigate.

cutscene.desc: They search the area for Flynn and approach the rocky hillside ahead

xml.sp: Donald He couldn't have come this way.

cutscene.desc: Sora sees no exit nearby and turns to face Donald & Goofy, his back to a patch of leafy vines

xml.sp: Sora Well, at least he got away safe. Right?

cutscene.desc: He tries to lean against the vines, but stumbles right through them. Goofy turns at the rustling sound, but Sora has disappeared

xml.sp: Goofy Hey! Now Sora's gone, too!

cutscene.desc: Goofy walks over to the vines and hears Sora's voice through them

xml.sp: Sora This way, guys! It's a secret passage!

cutscene.desc: Sora stands up as Goofy and Donald pull the vines apart to find a small hollow in the mountain. They run through the cave until emerging into a small valley with a lone tower standing in its center. Made mostly of brick, the tower has vines running along its side indicating it must have been there for years. Behind the tower, a waterfall runs over the mountainside into a small pond that glistens in the sunlight. Inside the tower, Flynn wakes up tied to a green chair by yards and yards of golden hair. He struggles to get free and raises an eyebrow as Rapunzel steps from the shadows wielding a frying pan. Flynn takes the opportunity and gives her the smolder

xml.sp: Flynn suave How you doing? The name's Flynn Rider. How's your day going? Huh?

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel is unfazed and decides to brandish the frying pan, making Flynn wince

xml.sp: Rapunzel Who else knows my location, Flynn Rider?
Flynn All right, hang on, Blondie.
Rapunzel Rapunzel.
Flynn Gesundheit. Here's the deal. I was in a situation, gallivanting through the forest when I stumbled upon a--

cutscene.desc: His eyes go wide

xml.sp: Flynn Oh! Oh no no! No no no! Where is my satchel?

cutscene.desc: He looks frantically around the room from his position in the chair

xml.sp: Rapunzel I've hidden it. Somewhere you'll never find it.

cutscene.desc: She continues to threaten him with the culinary club

xml.sp: Rapunzel So, what do you want with my hair? To cut it? Sell it?

cutscene.desc: She walks around the chair, her hair twisting over Flynn's legs

xml.sp: Rapunzel Sell it?
Flynn No!
Rapunzel Wait. You DON'T want my hair?
Flynn Why on earth would I want your hair? Look, I was being chased, I saw a tower, I climbed it, okay? End of story.

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel looks him over hesitantly before a tiny green chameleon emerges onto her shoulder, narrowing his eyes at the sight of Flynn. The chameleon looks back at Rapunzel, uncurling his tail and motioning with it, points toward the door to her right. She walks over, and Flynn again struggles to escape. After convening with her chameleon, Rapunzel places him back onto her shoulder

xml.sp: Rapunzel Okay, Flynn Rider. I'm prepared to offer you a deal.
Flynn stops A deal?
Rapunzel Look this way.

cutscene.desc: She pulls on the chair, twirling him around, and steps onto the fireplace, toppling him and the chair over

xml.sp: Rapunzel Do you know what these are?

cutscene.desc: She pulls apart a red curtain where a mural of the floating lights has been painted on the wall. Flynn looks up from his squished position on the floor

xml.sp: Flynn You mean the lantern thing they do for the princess?
Rapunzel Lanterns? I knew they weren't stars. Well, tomorrow evening they will light the night sky with these lanterns.

cutscene.desc: She points at him with the frying pan

xml.sp: Rapunzel YOU will act as my guide, take me to these lanterns, and return me home safely. Then, and only then, will I return your satchel to you. That is my deal.
Flynn Yeah... No can do. Unfortunately...

cutscene.desc: He lifts himself up with his hands and flips the chair onto its side

xml.sp: Flynn ...the Kingdom and I aren't exactly simpatico at the moment,

cutscene.desc: He includes the air quotes

xml.sp: Flynn ...so I won't be taking you anywhere.

cutscene.desc: The chameleon appears again and locks eyes with Rapunzel, making a punching motion with his front legs. She puts down the frying pan and jumps from the fireplace, gathering the strand of hair attached to the chair into her arms

xml.sp: Rapunzel Something brought you here, Flynn Rider.

cutscene.desc: She tugs on the chair, getting it to stand up

xml.sp: Rapunzel Call it what you will:fate, destiny...

cutscene.desc: She walks forward, gripping at her hair with each step closer

xml.sp: Rapunzel So I have made the decision to trust you.
Flynn sarcastically A horrible decision, really.
Rapunzel I am serious.

cutscene.desc: She pulls again, the chair leaning forward, and catches it, her face inches from his. He pauses, clearing his throat

xml.sp: Flynn Let me get this straight. I take you to see the lanterns, bring you back home...then you'll give me back my satchel?
Rapunzel I promise.

cutscene.desc: His eyes narrow slightly

xml.sp: Rapunzel And when I promise something, I never, ever break that promise.

cutscene.desc: He raises an eyebrow

xml.sp: Rapunzel Ever.

cutscene.desc: She stares at him intensely

xml.sp: Flynn thinking Oh, what to do? I cannot let her find that tiara. Okay, just think... I need the satchel and Blondie has it. There might be more monsters out there... I've got it! The three guys in the funny outfits. They looked tough enough to come in handy.

cutscene.desc: He smirks

xml.sp: Flynn All right fine, I'll take you.

cutscene.desc: She smiles brightly

xml.sp: Flynn But on one condition: my three sidekicks come along.

cutscene.desc: He turns his head with a smile. Meanwhile, Sora, Donald and Goofy admire the tower in the glade

xml.sp: Sora Look at that. A tower! Let's check it out!

cutscene.desc: As they near the base of the tower, they see Flynn climbing down the stones on the outside with a pair of arrows. He pauses, resting for a moment, when Rapunzel flings her hair down out the window, rappelling herself down the tower. She stops before she hits the ground and slowly extends a bare foot to the warm grass beneath. She takes in the feeling of her first taste of earth and kneels down, feeling the ground under her hands

xml.sp: Rapunzel It's so soft!

cutscene.desc: Several dandelion seeds fly into the wind before her and she stands

xml.sp: Rapunzel I'm free... I'm really free!

cutscene.desc: She starts running, not even noticing the trio as she passes them. Sora, Donald and Goofy run over to Flynn as he reaches the bottom of the tower

xml.sp: Sora Flynn, good to see you in one piece!
Flynn Guys! You're here, and just in time.

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel steps into the pond, laughing as she steps over the small stones lining the bottom

xml.sp: Sora Oh... Who's she?
Flynn Uh, that would be Rapunzel.

cutscene.desc: She takes a handful of water and splashes it upwards with a shout of glee and loud laughter

xml.sp: Flynn Something tells me this could be her first time outdoors. Give her a few minutes to get used to it.
Sora wide-eyed First time EVER?

cutscene.desc: The sun beats down on her golden hair as she takes in her decision. She grabs her face

xml.sp: Rapunzel happily I can't believe I did this!

cutscene.desc: She grabs her head

xml.sp: Rapunzel shocked I can't believe I did this.

cutscene.desc: She spins around

xml.sp: Rapunzel excited I can't believe I DID this!

cutscene.desc: She gasps

xml.sp: Rapunzel worried Mother would be so furious if she knew I disobeyed her and left the tower...

cutscene.desc: She sits on a rock holding a flower

xml.sp: Rapunzel carefree But that's okay--I mean, what she doesn't know won't kill her... Right?

cutscene.desc: She cries in the hollow cave

xml.sp: Rapunzel sadly Oh my gosh. This would kill her.

cutscene.desc: She runs through the grass, kicking up leaves. Donald laughs while Flynn rolls his eyes

xml.sp: Rapunzel shouting This is so fuuuuuun!

cutscene.desc: She leans her head against a tree

xml.sp: Rapunzel devastated I am a horrible daughter. I'm going back.

cutscene.desc: She does cartwheels through the flowers, wrapping herself in her hair

xml.sp: Rapunzel exhuberantly I am never going back!

cutscene.desc: She lies facedown on the ground

xml.sp: Rapunzel grief I am a despicable human being.

cutscene.desc: She swings around a large tree by her hair where Flynn and Sora wait for her to even out

xml.sp: Rapunzel exhilarated Best. Day. Ever!

cutscene.desc: She sobs into her hands at the base of the tree. Flynn walks over to her, with the trio following

xml.sp: Flynn I notice you seem a little at war with yourself here.
Goofy A little MORE than a little.
Donald More like a lot.
Sora Yeah...

cutscene.desc: She stops crying and turns to see them. She gasps and holds out the frying pan toward Sora, Donald and Goofy

xml.sp: Rapunzel Stop right there! Who are you?

cutscene.desc: Flynn steps in-between them

xml.sp: Flynn I told you before: my sidekicks.
Sora Sidekicks?
Flynn May I introduce, ehh...
Sora Oh, uh... My name's Sora.
Donald Donald!
Goofy And I'm Goofy. Pleasure, ma'am.

cutscene.desc: The chameleon appears from under her hair, skeptical of them

xml.sp: Rapunzel Sora, Donald, and...Goofy.

cutscene.desc: She lowers the frying pan

xml.sp: Rapunzel It's...nice to meet you, too. I'm Rapunzel.
Flynn Yep. My sidekicks.

cutscene.desc: Sora grabs Flynn's arm and spins him around

xml.sp: Sora whispering Since when is THAT?

Flynn whispering back Look, she really wants to see the lantern show tomorrow night. Now, I'm a nice guy, so I've decided to help her. Only problem is those monsters might show up again. I can get her to the Kingdom--but you guys are clearly more cut out for combat.
Donald That's cause we're heroes!
Flynn Uh-huh!
Goofy And we're Heartless experts.
Flynn Yeah, yeah!

cutscene.desc: They pose together and Sora gives a small laugh

xml.sp: Sora Just leave it to us!
Flynn Done.

cutscene.desc: Flynn motions to Rapunzel and leads her forward

xml.sp: Donald Rapunzel is interesting...

cutscene.desc: The trio walks behind them as Rapunzel admires her surroundings

xml.sp: Goofy Yeah, her heart's pulling her all kinda ways.
