Sora The outside world must seem so big and scary. I know how she feels. Lucky for me you two came along at just the right time--and the rest has been unforgettable.
Donald Awww...

cutscene.desc: Sora realizes he's getting sentimental

xml.sp: Sora Yep, unforgettable...just like your face!

cutscene.desc: He points at Donald, smiling

xml.sp: Donald Oh yeah?!

cutscene.desc: Sora laughs as Donald bursts out in anger. Sora runs to catch up to Rapunzel and Flynn, putting his hands behind his head. Goofy chuckles as Donald seethes

xml.sp: Goofy C'mon, now.

cutscene.desc: Goofy runs after Sora, and Donald follows

xml.sp: Sora All for one, and one for all.

cutscene.desc: Soon, they reach a patch of wildflowers and something catches Rapunzel's attention

xml.sp: Rapunzel Oh, look. What is that? It's so fluffy!

cutscene.desc: She runs up to the ball of fluff and inspects it, her fingers grazing the surface. Into the air sprout multiple tufts of fluff that, when the reach the ground, burst into Puffball Heartless. The Chief Puff itself pulls out of the ground and stares at her with its glowing yellow eyes, scaring her

xml.sp: Sora Heartless!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy run ahead of her and summon their weapons

xml.sp: Sora Rapunzel, take cover!

cutscene.desc: She runs back to Flynn, throwing her arms around him and using him as a shield. At first he is surprised, but smirks soon after, seeing an out

xml.sp: Flynn All right, I hate to say it, but I'm lettin' you outta this deal.

cutscene.desc: She loosens her grip on him

xml.sp: Rapunzel What?
Flynn It's way too scary out here. Let's just turn around and take you home.

cutscene.desc: He tries to get her to walk back, but she whirls around and punches him in the chest

xml.sp: Rapunzel No. I am seeing those lanterns.

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel bravely gathers her hair in her arms and runs back to Sora and company

xml.sp: Flynn Oh, come on!
Sora Rapunzel?
Rapunzel It's okay. I'm not afraid to face them.

cutscene.desc: They engage the plant-like Heartless and take them down. Meanwhile back at the tower, Mother Gothel has returned to find Rapunzel missing. She scrambles through the house in desperation

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Rapunzel?

cutscene.desc: She runs into her room

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Rapunzel!

cutscene.desc: She frantically tears down the curtain covering the window, but finds no one there. She clutches her face in terror before a glint of light catches her eye from beneath the stairs. She opens the bottom step and pulls out a satchel. Reaching into the satchel, she removes a sparkling tiara and at the sight of it, drops it in fear. Terrified, she looks further in the bag, taking out a Wanted poster for one Flynn Rider

xml.sp: ???????? Missing someone?

cutscene.desc: She whirls around

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Who's there?

cutscene.desc: Stepping out from a portal is a man in a black coat with long rose-colored hair. The abrupt entrance causes the frightened woman to drop the poster as Marluxia steps closer

xml.sp: Marluxia She's such a precious gift. Allow me to assist you in getting her back.

cutscene.desc: Mother Gothel's eyes slowly turn pink. As Sora, Donald, Goofy, Rapunzel and Flynn continue their trek to the Kingdom, they find a large field of...

xml.sp: Rapunzel Dandelions!

cutscene.desc: She runs ahead into the patch of flowers

xml.sp: Rapunzel Look! Watch.

cutscene.desc: She kneels down and blows on a few of them, sending their seeds into the air

xml.sp: Rapunzel Oh yeah, I thought that might work. But I wish there was a way to make more fly at once.

cutscene.desc: Sora summons an Aero spell, wafting the large patch of them into the air. The float past Rapunzel's wide-eyed stare

xml.sp: Rapunzel They're just like the floating lights.

cutscene.desc: They continue along the path

xml.sp: Rapunzel Rabbits!

cutscene.desc: They find a trio of rabbits

xml.sp: Sora Heartless!

cutscene.desc: The rabbits run into the brush at the Heartless's appearance

xml.sp: Rapunzel Oh, no, you're not picking on these rabbits.

cutscene.desc: After a brief brawl with the Heartless, the rabbits hop back out

xml.sp: Rapunzel Don't worry. It's safe now.

cutscene.desc: They dash away

xml.sp: Rapunzel Oh, maybe they want to show us something. Let's follow them!

cutscene.desc: They follow the rabbits to a chest hidden through a path in the trees

xml.sp: Rapunzel I think they want us to have this.

cutscene.desc: The rabbits hop away

xml.sp: Rapunzel Thank you.

cutscene.desc: Further through the forest, the group finds a small lake

xml.sp: Rapunzel Look at all this water!

cutscene.desc: She dashes into the lake

xml.sp: Rapunzel It's so refreshing! You have to come in.

cutscene.desc: Sora follows her into the lake, where she gives him a little splash

xml.sp: Rapunzel See? It feels nice.
Sora My turn.

cutscene.desc: He splashes her back

xml.sp: Rapunzel Sora!

cutscene.desc: She splashes him again and he covers his face

xml.sp: Sora Okay. You're in for it!

cutscene.desc: He summons the Keyblade and splashes the water into the air. The water droplets sparkle in the clear sun creating a band of colors

xml.sp: Sora & Rapunzel Whoa!
Rapunzel A rainbow!

cutscene.desc: They leave the lake and continue through the forest, Rapunzel's long hair trailing behind her as they come upon a strange plant stuck in the ground in a clearing alone

xml.sp: Flynn Okay. That's suspicious.
Sora Rapunzel...
Rapunzel Don't worry. I know to be careful around flowers now.

cutscene.desc: She winks at him

xml.sp: Sora Whatever it is, it's not normal. I'll take a look.

cutscene.desc: Sora walks closer

xml.sp: Donald Watch it.

cutscene.desc: Sora approaches the odd vegetation and examines it while everyone waits with bated breath. After seeing no imminent threat from the flower, he turns to the group

xml.sp: Sora We're all clear.

cutscene.desc: They sigh with relief, but too late, as the flower's petals open, folding downward as its form changes to that of a creature holding a scythe with a familiar symbol on its face

xml.sp: Donald alarmed Sora!

cutscene.desc: He points behind Sora, who turns just in time as the pink and white creature swings its immense scythe at him. Sora dodges away and summons his Keyblade with gritted teeth, joined by Donald and Goofy

xml.sp: Sora These guys?

cutscene.desc: More of them appear

xml.sp: Goofy They're Nobodies!
Rapunzel Mother said the outside world would be full of ruffians and thugs.
Donald Those aren't ruffians. Those are...uhh, I dunno...
Sora Rapunzel, Flynn, stay back!
Rapunzel No. I want to help you fight.
Sora I know. But I'm afraid you can't hurt these guys with a frying pan. Trust me on this. Flynn, could you explain?
Flynn No problem. Knowing when to flee is one of my specialties.

cutscene.desc: He rushes to Rapunzel

xml.sp: Flynn C'mon, Rapunzel. Gotta go.
Rapunzel But--
Flynn Look, I wanna stay and slug it out too, but my sidekicks have it covered.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods with a smile

xml.sp: Rapunzel All right. Please be careful, Sora.

cutscene.desc: They nod and leave them to it. Sora, Donald and Goofy take out all the Reaper Nobodies and regroup

xml.sp: Goofy You know who uses Nobodies...
Donald The Organization!
Sora Yeah. I'm surprised we haven't seen 'em. (calling out) I know you're there! Come out, you has-beens!

cutscene.desc: They look around and a corridor of darkness appears behind them

xml.sp: ???????? Has-beens? Now why would you say that?

cutscene.desc: A tall man with long pink hair emerges from the portal, peering at them through yellow eyes

xml.sp: Sora Because, bossing around Nobodies? That's the old Organization. chuckling Why? Are you in the real one too? Good for you.
???????? My name is Marluxia, and yes, that is correct. How interesting it is to see you again, Sora.
Sora Again?

cutscene.desc: He turns to Donald & Goofy

xml.sp: Sora YOU know 'im?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy shake their heads

xml.sp: Marluxia A shame you've no memory of me, because I remember you exceedingly well. Although...it's THOSE memories I'd soon erase.
Sora I don't know what you're saying.
Marluxia Nor should you. Nor will you ever, for that matter.

cutscene.desc: They glance at him with confused faces

xml.sp: Marluxia Now, if you'll permit me, I've come to ask a favor.
Sora Favor? You have got to be kidding me.

cutscene.desc: Donald & Goofy nod in agreement

xml.sp: Marluxia Please hear what I have to say. I'm sure you've noticed...

cutscene.desc: He muses on this for a moment and Sora raises his eyebrows for him to continue

xml.sp: Marluxia Well, perhaps not. But you should know that maiden with you, Rapunzel, is the very light of this world. I would see you guard her from its dark horrors.
Sora, Donald & Goofy surprised Huh?

cutscene.desc: They take defensive stances

xml.sp: Sora Starting with you, right?
Marluxia All the Organization seeks is balance. You must understand, our ultimate objective is not to clash with the light. We seek to complement it. Use that Keyblade...to keep Rapunzel safe.

cutscene.desc: He vanishes in a corridor of darkness

xml.sp: Sora Rapunzel's light...

cutscene.desc: Goofy scratches his face and Sora looks around

xml.sp: Sora Hey. Where did they go?
Goofy I guess they musta run on ahead.
Sora Then we'd better go find them.

cutscene.desc: They continue through the forest in search of Flynn and Rapunzel

xml.sp: Donald This might be a good spot to find some ingredients.

cutscene.desc: Soon the forest turns into marshland and the fog obscures their view ahead. Still no sign of them, Sora sighs

xml.sp: Sora I wonder where they went.
Goofy Don't worry. They couldn't have gotten too far.

cutscene.desc: A hooded figure quickly hides behind a tree

xml.sp: Donald You just had to stop and talk.

cutscene.desc: Mother Gothel peers at them from beneath her cloak

xml.sp: Sora Hey! Blame the has-been, not me.
Goofy I think you mean Marluxia. I bet that's the name the has-been would prefer.

cutscene.desc: Mother Gothel averts her gaze and begins to leave

xml.sp: Sora calling Hellooo? Rapunzel? Flynn?

cutscene.desc: She stops at Rapunzel's name and turns back, lowering her hood

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Excuse me, good travelers. Do you know Rapunzel?

cutscene.desc: They turn to her as she walks toward them and exchange glances

xml.sp: Sora Uh, yeah... Sort of.
Donald Why?
Mother Gothel My apologies. I'm Rapunzel's mother. The poor child left home without a word, and I've just been worried sick. Please tell me: where is my dear, sweet girl?
Goofy We'd tell ya, but we lost her.
Donald By accident.
Sora We could look together.
Mother Gothel Lost her? (scoffs) You're of no use to me.

cutscene.desc: She waves them off and continues walking

xml.sp: Mother Gothel I'll find her myself.
Donald She ran away from home?
Sora What if Marluxia was onto something back there?
Donald You trust Organization XIII?
Sora What? No! Of course not. But...what if?
Goofy I agree. Why is Rapunzel in danger, and what darkness is after her?
Sora Well, guys, the first step is to find her.

cutscene.desc: They search for Rapunzel and Flynn, eventually exiting the marshland into more bright forest. Soon, they hear a voice

xml.sp: Rapunzel Wh-wh-whoa! Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Easy, boy, easy! Settle down. Whoa, whoa!
Sora That voice!
Goofy It's Rapunzel!

cutscene.desc: Ahead, a terrified Flynn has his back pressed against a rock while Rapunzel attempts to calm down a large white horse. The angry-looking horse peers at the chameleon atop Rapunzel's head. Pascal motions with his three-toed front feet to settle down. The horse, wide-eyed, raises an ear and sets his rump down on the ground with a dispirited whinny

xml.sp: Rapunzel You are such a good boy! Yes you are.

cutscene.desc: She pets the bridge of his nose and his tail starts to wag

xml.sp: Rapunzel Are you all tired from chasing this bad man all over the place?

cutscene.desc: The horse nods sadly

xml.sp: Flynn Excuse me?
Rapunzel Nobody appreciates you, do they?

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel moves closer to give him a hug

xml.sp: Rapunzel Do they?

cutscene.desc: The horse shakes his head

xml.sp: Flynn Oh, come on. He's a bad horse!
Rapunzel Ohhh. He's nothing but a big sweetheart.

cutscene.desc: The horse nuzzles against her

xml.sp: Rapunzel Isn't that right...

cutscene.desc: She scratches under his chin and peers at the name on his collar

xml.sp: Rapunzel Maximus?

cutscene.desc: Maximus stamps his foot and whinnies at the attentive petting as Flynn gripes on the forest floor

xml.sp: Flynn Wha... You've got to be kidding me.

cutscene.desc: Maximus glares at him

xml.sp: Rapunzel Look, today is kind of the biggest day of my life, and the thing is, I need you NOT to get him arrested.

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel helps Flynn up and Maximus narrows his eyes at her

xml.sp: Rapunzel Just for twenty-four hours, and then you can chase each other to your hearts' content. Okay?

cutscene.desc: Flynn begrudgingly offers a hand, but Maximus refuses, looking away

xml.sp: Rapunzel And it's also my birthday. Just so you know.

cutscene.desc: Maximus grumbles softly and offers his hoof. They shake, their scowls unbroken. Rapunzel looks ahead, seeing the trio running toward them

xml.sp: Sora Rapunzel!
Rapunzel You're here. And you're okay!

cutscene.desc: Behind Rapunzel's back, Maximus punches Flynn in the side and smirks

xml.sp: Sora Yeah! You too.
Rapunzel And look! I made a friend.

cutscene.desc: The horse walks over

xml.sp: Rapunzel Meet Maximus. You could say Flynn introduced us. And where one goes, the other follows.

cutscene.desc: Maximus inspects them dubiously

xml.sp: Rapunzel This is Sora, Goofy, and Donald. They've been helping me.

cutscene.desc: He nods. Flynn gets up, clutching his side and pointing onward

xml.sp: Flynn grunting Come on, the Kingdom's not far.

cutscene.desc: They make their way through the wetlands and rocky cliffs where they find a clearing with an odd looking tower on wheels. A Powerwild Heartless smacks its monkey-butt at them summoning a multitude of Powerwilds. The tower shoots cannonballs at them as they attempt to dispose of the surrounding Heartless. Once the Powerwilds are gone, the tower's three sections topple to the ground and a horse-like Heartless bursts from one of the windows, effectively becoming a carriage

xml.sp: Sora Whoa, what? It transformed!
Flynn What is it with me and horses?

cutscene.desc: They defeat the Chaos Carriage and enter the Wildflower Clearing

xml.sp: Rapunzel Oh, look! I see some birds! This way!

cutscene.desc: She runs up to them, but they flutter away

xml.sp: Rapunzel Wait! Come back! I must have startled them.

cutscene.desc: Sora approaches the birds carefully and guides them to Rapunzel. One of the bluebirds sits on his hand and he shows it to her

xml.sp: Rapunzel I've never seen a bird like you.

cutscene.desc: They gather around Rapunzel and chirp out a song

xml.sp: Rapunzel Listen. They're singing for us!

cutscene.desc: She smiles and they watch the birds fly off. After sliding down a giant hill of flowers, they reach the edge of the Kingdom in full view of the castle

xml.sp: Rapunzel I just knew the outside world would be full of amazing things!

cutscene.desc: Sora walks over

xml.sp: Rapunzel And you...you helped me find them. Thank you.

cutscene.desc: They cross the bridge and enter the castle town, Rapunzel giggling to herself all the way

xml.sp: Sora Rapunzel sure looks happy.
Donald She does.
Goofy Well, her dream's gonna come true. They're sendin' the lanterns up after dark.
Sora Cool! We don't wanna miss that!

cutscene.desc: They enter the Thoroughfare, where Rapunzel has her hair braided and adorned with wildflowers. She spots a large tiled mural of the king and queen holding their baby daughter. She peers down where a girl is placing a flower at its base

xml.sp: Girl It's for the lost princess.

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel looks up at the baby on the mural, who has green eyes and flowing blonde hair just like her. Music starts suddenly, distracting her, and she gleefully begins dancing in the street. A crowd of people gather around and join in and Flynn stands watching her

xml.sp: Rapunzel C'mon, everyone! Come dance with us!

cutscene.desc: Sora joins in dancing with the townsfolk

xml.sp: Rapunzel This is so fun!

cutscene.desc: They dance around the sun-shaped circle of stones on the ground. Maximus notices Flynn leaning against him and knocks him forward into the crowd

xml.sp: Flynn Hey!

cutscene.desc: Flynn scowls at Maximus as Sora grabs his hand, the horse laughing. Everyone joins in the sunwheel dance and Sora gives Rapunzel a high-five. Flynn and Rapunzel spin into each other's arms as the music stops. They pause for a moment looking into the other's eyes

xml.sp: Citizen To the boats!

cutscene.desc: They break apart at the distraction with soft surprise. The sun sets and the trio watch from one of the docks, Maximus from another, as Rapunzel and Flynn take a boat to the middle of the lake. They gaze up at the castle against the darkly lit sky

xml.sp: Rapunzel I've been looking out a window for eighteen years, dreaming about what it might feel like when those lights rise in the sky. What if it's not everything I dreamed it would be?
Flynn calmly It will be.
Rapunzel And what if it is? What do I do then?
Flynn Well, that's the good part, I guess. You get to go find a new dream.

cutscene.desc: They look up as a solitary lantern peeks out from behind the castle, floating slowly up into the sky. Rapunzel hastily stands up, rocking the boat and grasping at the stern, as multitudes of floating lanterns pool out of the castle gates. Soon the entire kingdom is enveloped in a flock of lights floating softly into the air. Rapunzel leans her head on the wood as she gazes longingly at the magical sight. She turns back to Flynn holding two of his own in his hands. She happily sits back down

xml.sp: Rapunzel I have something for you, too.

cutscene.desc: She pulls out his satchel and he stares at it

xml.sp: Rapunzel I should have given it to you before, but I was just scared. And the thing is, I'm not scared anymore. You know what I mean?

cutscene.desc: He places a hand on the satchel and moves for her to put it down

xml.sp: Flynn I'm starting to.

cutscene.desc: They set free their lanterns and they join the swirling bunch in the sky. Flynn gazes at Rapunzel, seeing the happiness on her face, then looks toward the satchel, thinking to himself. When the festival dies down, they dock the boat on the edge of the lake and Flynn gets out

xml.sp: Flynn I'm sorry. Everything is fine. There's...just something I have to take care of.

cutscene.desc: He grabs the satchel and she looks back and forth between it and him

xml.sp: Rapunzel Okay.

cutscene.desc: Backing away slowly

xml.sp: Flynn I'll be right back.

cutscene.desc: He turns to leave and Pascal climbs onto her shoulder

xml.sp: Rapunzel It's all right, Pascal.

cutscene.desc: They both sadly watch him go. From Sora's place at the dock, they watch the lights in the sky

xml.sp: Sora gasping Wow!

cutscene.desc: They sense a disturbance from behind as Reaper Nobodies appear on the wharf. They get up and turn around, irked

xml.sp: Sora Could you guys have possibly picked a worse time?
Goofy I don't think they appreciate the moment, Sora.
Donald Not one bit!
Sora It's time for these wet blankets to go!

cutscene.desc: They summon their weapons

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Yeah!

cutscene.desc: They take care of the Nobodies plaguing the wharf as Rapunzel waits by the shore with Pascal. Out of the fog over the water emerges a small sailboat

xml.sp: Rapunzel Eugene?

cutscene.desc: From shore, she sees what looks like Flynn steering the sailboat with the stolen tiara in his hand

xml.sp: Rapunzel Eugene!

cutscene.desc: Unknown to Rapunzel, he is out cold and tied to the mast and helm

xml.sp: Marluxia Oh dear... He's run off with the crown and forgotten you.

cutscene.desc: Marluxia appears behind her

xml.sp: Rapunzel No. He wouldn't. Who are you?

cutscene.desc: He doesn't answer and she looks back at the boat, still drifting away

xml.sp: Marluxia Forget Flynn Rider. You know where you belong, and it's not with him. Now...

cutscene.desc: He motions with his hand and two Reaper Nobodies appear in front of Rapunzel. She runs away in fear and Marluxia smiles. She runs toward an opening between two large rocks, trying not to stumble when her braided hair catches on a fallen log. She pulls on it, trying to free it from the branch, when she hears a voice

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Rapunzel!
Rapunzel Mother?

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel walks back to the shoreline, where the Nobodies have dis- integrated and Mother Gothel stands with a tree branch in her arms, out of breath. She perks up at the sight of Rapunzel

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Oh, my precious girl!
Rapunzel Mother...

cutscene.desc: She runs into Mother Gothel's arms

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Are you all right? Are you hurt?

cutscene.desc: She touches Rapunzel's face

xml.sp: Rapunzel M-Mother, how did you--
Mother Gothel I was so worried about you, dear. So I followed you. And I saw them attack you, and--

cutscene.desc: She hugs her tightly

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Oh my. Let's go. Let's go, before they come to.

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel stops and looks back at the boat on the lake. She slowly turns back to Mother Gothel, holding a green lantern in her hand. Rapunzel pauses as Mother Gothel sets the lantern down and opens her arms, beckoning her. Rapunzel's lip quivers and she starts to cry, running into her mother's embrace. Mother Gothel strokes her hair as she sobs. Sora, Donald and Goofy enter and see the two leaving

xml.sp: Sora Hey, isn't that Rapunzel?

cutscene.desc: He cups his hands to his face

xml.sp: Sora shouting Wait! Rapunz--

cutscene.desc: Marluxia appears in front of them

xml.sp: Marluxia Show some decorum.
Donald You again!
Sora Marluxia!
Marluxia The girl has found her dear mother. You should let them be.
Sora And why is that?
Marluxia Because Rapunzel is far too important. Atop her tower, she must remain out of sight, and live out her days with Mother Gothel.
Goofy And never see anyone else?
Sora But that's like...locking her in some prison!

Marluxia That is EXACTLY what it's like. Rapunzel's hair holds the powerful magic of healing. And yes, Mother Gothel wants it for herself. As do others. And, if Mother Gothel's actions will protect Rapunzel, preserve her...then she is doing the Organization a favor.
Sora What favor?

Marluxia Let's say she's keeping Rapunzel on the shelf for us. An extra pawn in case you fail to find the remaining guardians of light, and we have occasion to call on other hearts of light instead. A New Seven Hearts to fill out the ranks.
Sora New Seven Hearts?
Marluxia Yes. Seven who inherited the princesses' light after their role was fulfilled.
Sora So, you don't care about her. You guys just want Rapunzel for your own purposes! Well, you're done here!

cutscene.desc: He summons his Keyblade

xml.sp: Marluxia Hmph. I just knew you would go and make a scene. Very well, then it's lights out for you.

cutscene.desc: Marluxia extends a hand, blowing a pink wind toward Sora. He drops the Keyblade, his eyes drooping

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Sora!

cutscene.desc: They run towards him as his vision gets hazy, his ears muffled

xml.sp: Marluxia You always were such a sound sleeper.

cutscene.desc: Sora falls to the ground. Meanwhile, Rapunzel lay in bed, her hair flowing throughout the floor. She clutches a purple cloth while Pascal looks on. She stares up at her ceiling where many of her paintings are. Her eyes grow wider and she holds up the cloth where a golden sun is stitched into the fabric. Rapunzel looks back and forth from the cloth to the ceiling. She sits up to get a closer look, her eyes widening, and she gasps as she sees the exact same symbol etched into the paintings on the wall. Over and over and over again. They shine down at her, now impossible to miss. She sees it in her eye, the symbol of the royal family. Her mind flies to the mural in the city plaza with the baby with the golden hair. She imagines placing the tiara on her head, her crown as the lost princess of Corona. This realization hits her like a cannonball and she falls into the vanity in her room, knocking over the stool. The loud thud alerts Mother Gothel, who begins ascending the stairs. Rapunzel tries to catch her breath as Mother Gothel approaches her room. Rapunzel pulls apart the curtains to the stairway

xml.sp: Rapunzel softly I am the lost princess.
Mother Gothel scoffing Please speak up, Rapunzel. You know how I hate the mumbling.
Rapunzel louder I am the lost princess. Aren't I?

cutscene.desc: She glares at Mother Gothel, whose eyes grow wide

xml.sp: Rapunzel Did I mumble, Mother? Or should I even call you that?
Mother Gothel dismissively Oh, Rapunzel. Do you even hear yourself?

cutscene.desc: She walks closer

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Why would you ask such a ridiculous question?

cutscene.desc: She smiles, chuckling it off. She opens her arms only for Rapunzel to push her away

xml.sp: Rapunzel It was you! It was ALL you!

cutscene.desc: Mother Gothel's eyes narrow

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Everything I did was to protect YOU.

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel pushes past her and rushes down the stairs

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Rapunzel...

cutscene.desc: She goes after Rapunzel

xml.sp: Rapunzel I've spent my entire life hiding from people who would use me for my power...
Mother Gothel Rapunzel!
Rapunzel When I should have been hiding from you!
Mother Gothel Where will you go? He won't be there for you.
Rapunzel What did you do to him?

cutscene.desc: Mother Gothel smirks evilly

xml.sp: Mother Gothel That criminal's to be hanged for his crimes.
Rapunzel worried No...

cutscene.desc: Mother Gothel slithers around Rapunzel

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Now, now, it's all right. Listen to me. All of this is as it should be.

cutscene.desc: She goes to pat Rapunzel on the head, but Rapunzel grabs her hand

xml.sp: Rapunzel No! You were wrong about the world. And you were wrong about me.

cutscene.desc: Mother Gothel struggles in Rapunzel's grip

xml.sp: Rapunzel And I will NEVER let you use my hair again!

cutscene.desc: Mother Gothel tugs against Rapunzel, the effort causing her to step back into the full-length mirror behind her, shattering it into pieces on the rug. Her breath comes quick and she looks back at Rapunzel, who walks away from her. Mother Gothel seeths with a dark aura

xml.sp: Mother Gothel You want me to be the bad guy? Fine. Now I'm the bad guy.

cutscene.desc: Meanwhile, a recently escaped Flynn dashes on Maximus over the bridge away from the city. The morning sun brightens the sky as he rides toward the forest, encountering Donald and Goofy hovering over a still-sleeping Sora

xml.sp: Flynn Whoa, Max! Whoa, boy.

cutscene.desc: They slide just short of them

xml.sp: Goofy Flynn!
Flynn Is Sora okay?
Donald We don't know.
Goofy We keep callin' his name and shakin' him, but he won't open his eyes.
Donald Sora!
Goofy Wake up!
Flynn Hmm... Unresponsive sidekick... Wait a minute. I know how to fix this! Max, give him a wash!

cutscene.desc: Maximus licks Sora's face with his long tongue, rousing him from his sleep. Sora opens his eyes seeing Flynn and Maximus looking down at him. Donald and Goofy peek into view

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Sora!

cutscene.desc: Sora sits up

xml.sp: Flynn Well, that did the trick. Nice work, Max!

cutscene.desc: Maximus smiles haughtily. Sora stands and holds his head

xml.sp: Sora Huh? How did I end up...

cutscene.desc: The events come back to him

xml.sp: Sora Oh no! Flynn, Rapunzel's being held prisoner!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Flynn That's right. In her mother's tower.

cutscene.desc: They trot forward

xml.sp: Flynn This calls for a rescue.

cutscene.desc: He smiles down at Sora and extends a hand

xml.sp: Flynn Are you with me?

cutscene.desc: Sora gives a small laugh

xml.sp: Sora Yeah.

cutscene.desc: Flynn pulls Sora up onto the horse with a proud cackle. Donald jumps up onto Sora's shoulders and Goofy tags along on Maximus. Suddenly, they lose height

xml.sp: Goofy Uh-oh!

cutscene.desc: Maximus's legs buckle, struggling to hold them up, but his face changes to one of determination. He lets out a whinny and stands straight up

xml.sp: Flynn Let's go, Max.

cutscene.desc: Maximus rears back and charges forward. They race through the forest in the direction of the tower, when they are intercepted by a group of Nobodies

xml.sp: Flynn Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, Max!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy nod to each other and jump off Maximus, summoning their weapons

xml.sp: Sora We'll take it from here, Flynn. Go help Rapunzel.
Flynn Thanks!

cutscene.desc: He takes off with Maximus, leaving the Nobodies to them. As they follow along through the forest, their path is filled with Heartless. They defeat each wave in turn. By the time they arrive, Flynn has climbed up and entered the tower

xml.sp: Flynn Rapunzel! I thought I'd never see you again.

cutscene.desc: He looks up, seeing Rapunzel chained and gagged. Her eyes widen as Mother Gothel sneaks behind him, striking a hidden dagger into his side. Rapunzel struggles to get free, crying out as Flynn falls over onto the floor. Mother Gothel looks down at him, squirming in pain on the stone floor. She tugs on Rapunzel's chains trying to lead her deeper into the tower, the girl desperate to get free

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Rapunzel, really! Enough already! Stop fighting me!

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel, pulling back, loses her balance and falls over, the gag slipping from her mouth

xml.sp: Rapunzel No! I won't stop! For every minute of the rest of my life, I will fight! I will never stop trying to get away from you! But...if you let me save him, I will go with you.

cutscene.desc: Mother Gothel raises an eyebrow

xml.sp: Flynn grunting No! No, Rapunzel...

cutscene.desc: Flynn attempts to crawl on the floor but the pain is too great. Pascal looks on helplessly

xml.sp: Rapunzel I'll never run... I'll never try to escape. Just let me heal him...and you and I will be together--forever, just like you want. Every- thing will be the way it was. I promise. Just like you want. Just...let me heal him.

cutscene.desc: Mother Gothel releases Rapunzel and shackles Flynn

xml.sp: Mother Gothel to Flynn In case you get any ideas about following us.

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel rushes to Flynn's side

xml.sp: Rapunzel Eu...Eugene!

cutscene.desc: She brushes the hair out of his eyes and he clutches his side, struggling to sit up against the wall. She checks at his wound, obviously bleeding

xml.sp: Rapunzel Oh, I'm so sorry. Everything is gonna be okay, though.

cutscene.desc: She gathers her hair into her arms

xml.sp: Flynn No...Rapunzel...
Rapunzel I promise. You have to trust me.

cutscene.desc: She places the hair over his wound

xml.sp: Flynn No! I can't let you do this.

cutscene.desc: They stare into each other's eyes

xml.sp: Rapunzel And I can't let you die.
Flynn But if you do this...

cutscene.desc: She touches his face

xml.sp: Flynn ...but if you do this, then you will die.
Rapunzel whispering Hey. It's gonna be all right.

cutscene.desc: He gives the very smallest of smiles

xml.sp: Flynn Rapunzel... Wait.

cutscene.desc: He begins to stroke her hair, his face moving closer to hers, and with a swift motion cuts off her hair with a shard of the broken mirror. His hand falls to the floor, dropping the glass, as her hair turns brown, its healing ability lost. She looks down at him in shock

xml.sp: Rapunzel Eugene, what--

cutscene.desc: Absolute terror erupts from Mother Gothel's face

xml.sp: Mother Gothel screaming No!

cutscene.desc: From the strand in Rapunzel's hands, the once golden locks of hair turn a deep brown. Mother Gothel tries to gather them up in her arms before the magic is lost

xml.sp: Mother Gothel Oh no. No...

cutscene.desc: Unable to stop the transformation, she grabs her hand, watching it become wrinkled and withered

xml.sp: Mother Gothel What have you done? What have you DONE?!

cutscene.desc: The aging spreads across her body like a weed, her skin turning pale and her hair a pallid gray. She screams out in sudden shrieks, her body moving feebly, as she covers her decrepit face with her hood. She writhes about the room, crossing closer to the window, where Pascal pulls on the long bunch of hair, causing her to spill out of the tower. She screams as she falls, aging out of existence, the shroud flying downward through the air as Sora, Donald and Goofy reach the base of the tower. Marluxia watches from the hill

xml.sp: Marluxia Fallen to darkness... We can't allow her near our pure light now. Her presence would only cast a pall over it.

cutscene.desc: He motions with his arm, suspending the cloak in midair surrounded by petals of pink. An orb of darkness bursts forth and branch-like limbs erupt from within, followed by a tail. Another set of limbs, and the creature crashes to the ground, the darkness pulling back, revealing a large tree-like Heartless, the Grim Guardianess. It growls down at Sora, Donald and Goofy, who summon their weapons

xml.sp: Sora What happened up there?
Donald I don't know, but we have to stop that Heartless.

cutscene.desc: The Grim Guardianess flies toward them, its tail moving like a serpent, as its large mane of leaves crashes to the ground, sending pollen everywhere. Donald and Goofy are sent into a sneezing fit as thorns surround Sora. He struggles to get free of the thorns' grip before the Heartless slithers around the tower, spiraling to the top. Sora breaks free from the thorny tether as cherries fall from the sky. Sora, Donald and Goofy race across the hill avoiding the cages of vines that block their way, as the cherry bombs explode on impact with the ground. Dodging the torrent of bombs, Sora reaches the tower and runs up its stone exterior. The Heartless is soon no match for Sora and his Keyblade and is knocked from the tower. Inside, Rapunzel clutches Flynn

xml.sp: Rapunzel Don't go. Stay with me, Eugene.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy ascend the tower, seeing Rapunzel over Flynn's body. She grabs his arm and places it against her hair

xml.sp: Rapunzel singing through tears Flower, gleam and glow. Let your power shine. Make the clock reverse.
Flynn Rapunzel.

cutscene.desc: Flynn opens his eyes

xml.sp: Rapunzel singing Bring back what once was mine.

cutscene.desc: He touches her face

xml.sp: Flynn Hey. Rapunzel.

cutscene.desc: She holds his hand

xml.sp: Rapunzel What?
Flynn Rapunzel... You were my new dream.

cutscene.desc: The tears well up in her eyes

xml.sp: Rapunzel And you were mine.

cutscene.desc: Flynn blinks once more and his eyes close, his body falling limp. The trio look on sadly as she moves her hand toward his face

xml.sp: Rapunzel singing Heal what has been hurt. Change the Fates' design. Save what has been lost. Bring back what once was mine.

cutscene.desc: She moves her hand over his heart and leans in closer, her face nearly touching his, her song nearly a whisper

xml.sp: Rapunzel What once was mine.

cutscene.desc: She sobs, a tear falling onto the rogue's skin. It settles there, glowing into the shape of a flower. A light bursts forth from Flynn's wound, wresting Rapunzel from her sorrow. Sora, Donald and Goofy stare open-mouthed at this sight. The healing magic swirls into the air like strands of hair, wisping around Rapunzel, her eyes wide. A six-pointed flower magically blooms from the wound, before the light disappears inside of him. She moves closer to his face, brushing the hair out of her eyes as Flynn slowly takes a breath and opens his eyes

xml.sp: Flynn Rapunzel...

cutscene.desc: She gasps

xml.sp: Rapunzel Eugene.
Flynn Did I ever tell you...I've got a thing for brunettes?

cutscene.desc: He smiles and Rapunzel is overcome by joy

xml.sp: Rapunzel Eugene!

cutscene.desc: She throws her arms around him and he leans on his side to embrace her. Sora, Donald and Goofy smile with glee and Sora throws his arms around the other two, grinning from ear to ear and Flynn tightens his hold on Rapunzel. Later, they all stand at the base of the tower, the warm sunlight bathing over them

xml.sp: Sora Wow, Rapunzel! You're finally gonna get to see your real home.
Rapunzel I know! I mean...I can't believe it. I can finally be with my real family! I couldn't have done it without your help.
Donald You're welcome.

cutscene.desc: She giggles

xml.sp: Flynn Well, from where I'm standing, the Kingdom couldn't ask for a better princess. And I couldn't have asked for better sidekicks!

cutscene.desc: Sora brushes a knuckle across his nose

xml.sp: Flynn Thanks.
Rapunzel Yes, thank you so much.
Donald Happily ever after.

cutscene.desc: Sora crosses his arms

xml.sp: Sora Mm-hmm.
Goofy Now, Flynn, you and Maximus play nice.

cutscene.desc: Maximus and Flynn exchange glances

xml.sp: Flynn Huh?

cutscene.desc: Maximus whinnies with laughter

xml.sp: Flynn smiling Fine.

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel takes Flynn's hand and they stare into each other's eyes

xml.sp: Sora You're gonna be great.
Rapunzel & Flynn Huh?
Sora We haven't seen the guy controlling the monsters in a while, so that's one less worry.
Goofy But there's still a chance that he might be around here somewhere.
Sora Well, if he comes back and tries to bother Rapunzel again, then Flynn will keep her safe. And we three wont be far behind.
Donald Come on. Rapunzel's the tough one, if you ask me.
Flynn True. But nevertheless, I won't let her out of my sight.
Rapunzel smiling Oh... Eugene.
Sora Eugene?
Flynn chuckling Oh! That's my real name. Eugene Fitzherbert. That's right. I never told you guys.
Donald That's different.
Goofy I think it's a great name!
Sora Me too. Nice to re-meet you, Eugene.
Rapunzel to Eugene Hey! I thought I was the only one you were going to tell.
Eugene to Rapunzel Don't worry. I've saved plenty of Fitzherbert-y secrets just for you.
Rapunzel to Eugene Really?
Sora pointing Hey! What are you two lovebirds talking about?
Eugene Nothing!

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel giggles

xml.sp: Rapunzel Nothing.
Donald Hey, you can tell us!
Goofy Yeah, it's not nice to keep secrets.
Eugene This one is none of your business.

cutscene.desc: Sora chuckles

xml.sp: Sora Maximus, get him!
Eugene Huh?

cutscene.desc: Maximus glares at Eugene, an inch from his face, and Eugene stops, unsure of what to anticipate. Pascal crawls onto Rapunzel's shoulder with a determined look and jumps over to Eugene's, sending his long sticky tongue into his ear. Eugene reels back and clutches his ear, Pascal jumping off with a squeal of glee

xml.sp: Eugene You have got to be kidding me!

cutscene.desc: Rapunzel and the rest burst out laughing. Maximus smiles at Eugene, waggling his eyebrows as Pascal chills on Eugene's head. Soon after, the trio leaves the Kingdom of Corona. Meanwhile, Maleficent and Pete look over the sun-lit valley

xml.sp: Pete ANOTHER world where we got doodly-squat.
Maleficent Hmph.
Pete You sure this box thingy's even real?
Maleficent Yes.
Pete Yeah, and just how do you know that?
Maleficent It is etched.

cutscene.desc: She turns away from him

xml.sp: Pete It's what?

cutscene.desc: She opens a corridor of darkness before her

xml.sp: Maleficent Come with me.
Pete Where to? Those bozos ain't gonna help us. Sora's sure not lookin' for the box.
Maleficent Who said anything about following them?

cutscene.desc: She enters the portal and Pete gives a muffled whimper before following her. Meanwhile inside the castle at Radiant Garden, Riku and King Mickey meet with Ienzo and Aeleus

xml.sp: Mickey What? We're too late?

Ienzo Yes. Even would know about the replicas from his time as Vexen in the Organization. He was recompleted like the rest of us, but he didn't regain consciousness. After Lea left, he must have woken and taken his leave. Aeleus here and Dilan went out and turned the whole town upside down to try and find him. But no Even.

cutscene.desc: Aeleus says nothing, simply shaking his head

xml.sp: Mickey That's not good.
Riku What about his research?
Ienzo Unfortunately, his work on the replicas was incomplete. There may still be documents around, but all of them from well before he made any significant progress.

cutscene.desc: He motions to the computer beside him

xml.sp: Mickey Do you have any idea where he might go?
Ienzo There's no place that he could go now that he's human. He has no means of leaving this world.
Mickey The dark corridors--
Ienzo Are beyond his faculties and mine now.

cutscene.desc: Riku realizes something

xml.sp: Riku But not everyone's. What if Even was taken?
Mickey Of course! The Organization could also use the replicas!
Riku To fill out their ranks.

cutscene.desc: Ienzo and Aeleus exchange glances

xml.sp: Mickey We'd better go tell Master Yen Sid. And Sora, and the others, too!

cutscene.desc: Riku nods. In the Badlands on the outskirts of the Keyblade Graveyard, two figures stand atop thirteen pillars of earth. Both in black cloaks, the man with blue hair speaks first

xml.sp: Sax Humanity is a precious gift. And yet you desire to return to the Organization?
????? Oh, yes...of course. One eradication at Axel's hands was enough to learn where NOT to place my trust.
Sax He gave you a second lease on life.
????? He ripped me away from the one thing I care about. I don't require humanity. Give me my research. I must see it to fruition, no matter the cost.
Sax The replicas.

cutscene.desc: The hooded man laughs

xml.sp: ????? Soon they will replace, not just replicate. Given a heart, they can become just as real as any human.
Sax What excellent tidings. I would hate to think we invited you back into our ranks only for you to fail to deliver our final vessel...

cutscene.desc: The man takes off his hood, revealing the yellow eyes and ashy blond hair of...

xml.sp: Sax Vexen.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy return to Le Grand Bistrot in Twilight Town to bring ingredients they've found to Little Chef. Scrooge walks into the kitchen where Little Chef is perched on Sora's head

xml.sp: Scrooge Ha! My bistro's future is lookin' bright. The new recipes are a smash! Those ingredients of yours must really have got Little Chef's gears a-turnin'.

cutscene.desc: He takes out a present

xml.sp: Scrooge Soon, we'll be chasing customers away. Keep up the good work!

cutscene.desc: He offers the present to Sora, who takes it and laughs

xml.sp: Sora We try! Right, Little Chef?

cutscene.desc: He lifts a finger to the rat, who high-fives it confidently. Later, Sora, Donald and Goofy sail the Gummi Ship to a world of doors and monsters. The stars twinkle in the night sky as they walk towards a large factory building taking in the sights. Sora stops, turning around... There's something different about them. As the three finally get a glimpse of one another, they jump back in fright, summoning their weapons. Sora holds his Keyblade tightly, facing the other two. He takes a moment to distinguish the features of the other two

xml.sp: Sora Wha...? D-Donald... Goofy... Why do you guys look like monsters?
Donald You do too!
Goofy Well, ya both scared me.

cutscene.desc: Sora now sports gray striped fur all over his body, a brand new tail, claws and spiky ears. Donald walks forward, lowering his wand. His feathers are now blue skin, his webbed feet now three-toed claws. His beak shows two fang-like protrusions as his tail ends in a spike, and two small purple wings stick out from his back. He peers at Goofy from his single large eye. Goofy, on the other hand, now has two different sized and colored eyes, teal spotted skin and huge claws. Sora looks down at himself

xml.sp: Sora Seriously? Is THIS how we blend in here?
Donald That's right. It's about time you caught on.

cutscene.desc: They walk closer to Sora, who scratches his face

xml.sp: Sora Could you guys take a few steps back? You're givin' me the heebie- jeebies.
Donald yelling YOU take a step back!

cutscene.desc: Sora cowers, sparking a chuckle from Goofy

xml.sp: Goofy Come on, I think our new look could turn out to be lots of fun!

cutscene.desc: Sora shrugs and looks back up at the building. A large symbol of an M with an eye inside is stamped on the outside of the factory

xml.sp: Sora Wonder what kind of weirdos live here...

cutscene.desc: Goofy crouches next to Donald to whisper in his ear

xml.sp: Goofy to Donald Who'da thunk he'd get so creeped out?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy giggle as Sora reads the words above the entranceway. There's scaffolding set up over the left side of the message

xml.sp: Sora It says, We Scare Because We Care?
Donald That's odd.
Goofy Doesn't sound very caring.
Sora If they look like us, then they could be trouble. I think we'd better investigate.

cutscene.desc: They enter the factory doors and in the large lobby, they see two strange creatures. One very large and fuzzy and the other small and green. The larger one is holding a young toddler, causing the trio alarm

xml.sp: Goofy Oh no!
?????? Weeee!

cutscene.desc: The girl pokes out from over the monsters arms. She's wearing an oversized pink shirt and tiny pigtails

xml.sp: ??? Boo!

cutscene.desc: The big monster turns around and sees Sora and company, the little girl squirming in his fluffy claws

xml.sp: ?????? Hmm? I wonder who those guys are.

cutscene.desc: The little green monster looks up at the big one through his single giant eyeball

xml.sp: ???? What?! Careful, Sulley. If they see the K-I-D...
Sulley It's fine. We got nothing to hide.
???? But you're the CEO! You set the example.

cutscene.desc: Sulley caves and sets the girl on the floor as the green thing runs over to the trio, waving his little arms

xml.sp: ???? Guys! Guys, it's not what it looks like. Okay, listen. That kid over there just popped out of nowhere!

cutscene.desc: He slams his fist into his hand and the trio give him disapproving looks

xml.sp: ???? We gotta call the CDA. Uh... It's a...uh... Oh yeah, a Code 835!

cutscene.desc: Sora points his Keyblade at him causing him to clam up

xml.sp: Sora Are you trying to scare that little girl?

cutscene.desc: Sulley raises an eyebrow

xml.sp: ???? Yes! I mean, no no no!

cutscene.desc: He waves his arms frantically

xml.sp: ???? We're done with scare power. Nobody's gettin' scared.
Sulley Mike, take it easy.
Goofy You should too, Sora. Ya see? She's happy!

cutscene.desc: The girl bounces in front of Sulley, who pets her on the head, making her giggle

xml.sp: Sora Oh.

cutscene.desc: Sora chuckles sheepishly as he and Donald put away their weapons. He walks up to the girl and crouches down

xml.sp: Sora Hello. My name is Sora.
??? Boo.

cutscene.desc: She trots over to him

xml.sp: Sora Oh, is that your name? Nice to meet you, Boo.

cutscene.desc: She screams excitedly

xml.sp: Mike Hold on! You guys really aren't afraid of humans?
Boo Mike Wazowski.

cutscene.desc: Boo points at Donald, who jumps in surprise, staring at her with his cyclops eye

xml.sp: Mike Come on, Boo! I'M Mike Wazowski.
Boo Mike Wazowski.

cutscene.desc: She continues pointing at Donald, waving her arm up and down. Sulley laughs

xml.sp: Sulley Well, you can see the resemblance. That googly bear eye.
Donald What's going on? I'm Donald Duck!
Boo Mike Wasowski!

cutscene.desc: Sora smiles as she starts chasing Donald around the room

xml.sp: Goofy A-hyuck! I'm Goofy.
Sulley Well, my name's Sulley. And this is--
Sora Oh, we know. Mike Wazowski, right?

cutscene.desc: Boo jumps out from behind Sora as they laugh, but soon hides behind Sulley nervously

xml.sp: Sulley What's the matter, Boo?

cutscene.desc: Behind Donald, a group of blue pointy creatures with red eyes appear. They rush to the danger, summoning their weapons

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Heartless!

cutscene.desc: Several more appear, bringing with them a giant crab-like creature as well, bearing an unfamiliar symbol which catches Sora's attention

xml.sp: Sora No... That's not the Heartless's emblem!
Donald Then, what?
Goofy And how come I feel like I mighta seen 'em before?
Sora Well, they aren't friendly.

cutscene.desc: Sulley and Mike hide Boo behind the lobby desk

xml.sp: Sulley Stay here. Kitty will be back.

cutscene.desc: She nods and hides

xml.sp: Mike Those guys are right, Sulley. This has got bad news written all over it.
Sulley Yeah, we gotta keep Boo safe.
Mike I'm on it.

cutscene.desc: They run to join the trio in the fray, quickly disposing of the troublesome creatures. Sulley gives Mike a high-five

xml.sp: Sulley All right!
Mike Nice, Sulley. Even with those extra pounds you put on.
Sulley smiling Heh, still runnin' circles around you, butterball.

cutscene.desc: Boo peeks out from her hiding place

xml.sp: Boo Kitty!

cutscene.desc: Sulley shuffles over to Boo as Sora and company keep vigilant

xml.sp: Mike So, any idea who those guys were?
Sora Well...they couldn't have been Heartless...
Goofy Hmm... It's on the tip of my tongue. I remember the King told us somethin' about...nega-tive emotions.
Donald Unversed?
Goofy Oh yeah! Them!
Sora Unversed...?

cutscene.desc: Sulley returns, holding Boo

xml.sp: Goofy Uh-huh. A while back, the King fought a whole bunch of battles against 'em with the three missing Keyblade wielders.

cutscene.desc: Sulley and Mike exchange glances and Mike shrugs

xml.sp: Sora The same three that we're looking for? Aqua, Terra, and Ventus?
Donald Uh-huh. We need more dependable help than YOU!
Sora Hey!
Goofy Still, how come the Unversed are showin' up now?
Donald Is it because they use scream power?

cutscene.desc: He looks over at Mike and Sulley and stamps his foot

xml.sp: Mike Hey, I told you we're through using that!

cutscene.desc: Sulley nods

xml.sp: Mike Besides, we have no idea who or what you're talking about.

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald nod to each other

xml.sp: Sora Oh, you'd really like the King--
Goofy Uh-oh!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy jump at Sora, covering his mouth

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Order!

cutscene.desc: They let go of Sora, who tries to rectify the suddenly awkward situation

xml.sp: Sora Ummm...basically...we've come from far away to get rid of those creatures causing trouble. We're like...exterminators?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod in agreement

xml.sp: Mike Just HOW far away?
Goofy As far as you can imagine.

cutscene.desc: Mike scratches his bald green head

xml.sp: Mike Hmm... Okay, okay, let's just say we buy all that. Are those creeps dangerous?
Donald Extremely!
Sulley They sure gave Boo a scare.

cutscene.desc: Boo rubs Sulley's fur and nods. Mike turns to face Sulley

xml.sp: Mike Sulley, I know you've missed her, but it's time to postpone our playdate.
Sulley You're right, Mikey. Let's get our girl home.

cutscene.desc: Mike nods

xml.sp: Sora What are you planning to do?
Mike It's kind of a long story...but Boo's from another world...and we gotta send her back there...to keep her safe.
Sora Okay, then. We're gonna help you.
Mike What?!

cutscene.desc: Boo reaches for the floor and Sulley lets her down

xml.sp: Sora Well, the Unversed might try to cause more trouble, so, we wanna come along.

cutscene.desc: Sora extends a hand

xml.sp: Mike Great!

cutscene.desc: Mike shakes his hand

xml.sp: Mike We could use a couple of exterminators around here!
Sulley Yeah, thanks.

cutscene.desc: Boo starts running past the lobby and Sulley and Mike join her, playfully roaring. Donald crosses his arms

xml.sp: Donald You've always gotta help.
Sora Hey, they need us. Besides, we need to figure out how all those Unversed got here.

cutscene.desc: The two monsters catch Boo and Sulley bounces her in the air. The companion enter the headquarters of Monsters, Inc. and head to the Laugh Floor

xml.sp: Mike singing Gotta send her home right now, or so help me... So help me! So help me!
Sulley So, Monsters, Incorporated used to rely on scream power from human kids for energy, but now we collect their laughter instead. It turns out laughter's ten times more powerful.

cutscene.desc: They stop as Boo points ahead

xml.sp: Boo Kitty!
Sulley And we'd never have figured it out without Boo.
Sora Cool.
Goofy Our ship's powered by laughter, too! Guess we've got that in common.
Donald Sora's a laughter machine!

cutscene.desc: Sora laughs bashfully

xml.sp: Sora Come on, I am not.

cutscene.desc: They hear commotion inside the Laugh Floor as Unversed appear inside, causing havoc with the door system. Several doors open and the Unversed enter, causing screams from the unaware inhabitants

xml.sp: Sora Unversed are back!

cutscene.desc: They summon their weapons as Mike and Sulley stand agape at the sight on the Laugh Floor

xml.sp: Sulley This is terrible!

cutscene.desc: Mike points at a white door with pink trim adorned with purple flowers making its way out of the room on the mechanical system

xml.sp: Mike Look! There's Boo's door!

cutscene.desc: Sulley runs into the room and Mike notices Boo's wandered off

xml.sp: Mike Go get Boo!

cutscene.desc: He points to their left and Sulley snatches up the girl, hiding her underneath a workstation

xml.sp: Sulley We'll have to play another time, Boo. You stay here.

cutscene.desc: Sulley joins the others as an Unversed appears nearby. Boo cowers under the desk

xml.sp: Sora Ready to clean house?

cutscene.desc: Sulley and Mike ready their battle stances and help Sora defeat the Unversed. After the battle, Mike rushes over to three of the empty door stations, swiping a card at each terminal. He smiles as three doors come sliding into the room on the rail system. They stop above each station where mechanical arms extended from the floor, grabbing the doors and pulling them from the rail. They contract back into the floor and the machines lock the doors in place

xml.sp: Mike Ride's here!
Sulley Nice.
Mike Grab on to the door when you're ready.
Sora Got it.

cutscene.desc: Sora jumps onto the station with the green door

xml.sp: Sora Ready!

cutscene.desc: Mike presses a button on the terminal and the door lifts back up into the air. At first nervous, Sora laughs at the ride up as Donald and Goofy jump onto the red door station. Sulley, holding Boo, takes hold of the yellow door, Mike grabbing Sulley's tail just as the door lifts off the ground. Boo chuckles once the doors latch onto the rail system

xml.sp: Sulley Boo? Hold on. Don't want you to get hurt.

cutscene.desc: Boo reaches toward the floor as Mike climbs up Sulley's back. An invisible figure skulks around the Laugh Floor as the doors begin sliding towards the Door Vault

xml.sp: Mike Boo's door, here we come!
??????? Oh, I just got a great idea.

cutscene.desc: The unseen figure sheds his invisible skin, revealing a long, thin monster, covered in purple scales. He watches as the doors leave the room. The rail systems takes the group through a long tunnel into a gigantic vault where thousands of doors hang on rails. Sora, Donald and Goofy gasp in awe of the enormous sight. Sora perks up at the appearance of...

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy Heartless!

cutscene.desc: Sulley bares his fangs

xml.sp: Mike Not here too?!
Sora Keep Boo out of harm's way. We'll handle the bad guys!

cutscene.desc: Sora leaps atop the sliding door and readies his Keyblade, sending bolts of energy as they speed by the Heartless. Two Gold Beat Heartless appear, spinning their electric chains and striking the railway. Bolts of lightning pulse on the rail, forcing Sora to duck for cover behind the wooden door. Once the coast is clear, he returns to the rail and finishes off the rest of the Heartless that appear before they reach the upper levels of the Door Vault. Sora leaps off the rail and the others leave the door behind. Mike runs excitedly toward a beige door, Sora trailing behind, and opens it, finding only the wall behind it

xml.sp: Mike It's offline!

cutscene.desc: He slams it shut as numerous Heartless appear behind them

xml.sp: Mike We have to power it up!

cutscene.desc: Sora summons his Keyblade again

xml.sp: Sora More bad guys!
Sulley Don't worry. I'll watch Boo.
Sora 'Kay!
Mike Yeah!

cutscene.desc: Mike directs his huge eye towards Sora and they run in the direction of the Heartless

xml.sp: Mike Sora, we gotta make Boo laugh to open the door! Hurry! Help me take out these goons.

cutscene.desc: The group battles the Heartless that appear as Sulley shields Boo from them

xml.sp: Sulley More of 'em?

cutscene.desc: Soldier Heartless surround Sulley, cornering them near a pile of doors. Sora plows through them as the others defeat the Vermilion Sambas that also appear. The companions group together, each letting out a goofy shriek to make Boo laugh, when Sora gets an idea. He grabs onto the sufficiently round Mike Wazowski

xml.sp: Mike Hey, what are we doing?!

cutscene.desc: Sora spins around, sending Mike tumbling toward the Heartless like a bowling ball. The Heartless disappear as he comes to a rolling stop, clutching his head as his eye wobbles in its socket

xml.sp: Mike Whoa, am I dizzy!

cutscene.desc: Boo claps, giggling joyfully. The red light above the door lights up and Sulley opens it, revealing the pathway inside

xml.sp: Sulley The door's open!

cutscene.desc: Sulley enters, followed by Boo and the others. Sora closes it behind him and they exit through a green door on the other side of the upper levels. Sora closes it after they enter and the group looks up at the multitude of sliding doors on the rail system

xml.sp: Sulley Boo's door!
Mike Ready? It's time to hitch another ride.
Sora Cool.

cutscene.desc: They ride the rails once again, defeating the impeding Heartless

xml.sp: Mike There's Boo's door!

cutscene.desc: Sora leaps off the railway attempting to grab on but misses the door at the last second

xml.sp: Sora Whoa!

cutscene.desc: He lands on another rail, eventually sliding down to the lower levels of the vault, where more Heartless are waiting for them. They take them out and enter a yellow door, coming out onto the other side of a large wall of doors inside the factory

xml.sp: Mike Boo's door should be right around here somewhere.
Donald Everybody look!

cutscene.desc: The continue through the Factory and Sulley gasps

xml.sp: Sulley There it is!

cutscene.desc: He runs ahead with Boo in his arms and opens the door, quickly heading inside. Goofy closes it behind them and the slithering figure of the purple monster appears on the outside of the door, dropping his camouflage. He lifts his head, checking that the coast is clear, and silently follows them into the now solid white door. The group bursts out the other end only to find themselves still in the Factory

xml.sp: Mike Wait! How'd we take a wrong turn?

cutscene.desc: They turn back to the door, where two eyes and a mouth appear

xml.sp: ??????? Who cares? All that matters...

cutscene.desc: The color-changing monster reveals himself

xml.sp: ??????? ...is that it's the last turn that you losers are ever gonna take.
Sulley Randall?!

cutscene.desc: Mike and Sulley glare at him

xml.sp: Sora Who's he?
Sulley A creep we banished for trying to collect screams by force. He used to be Boo's scarer.Boo also glares at Randall, trying out her own roar
Mike How did you even get back here? The door we sent you through is sawdust!

cutscene.desc: Randall waves him off

xml.sp: Randall Yeah, and I almost got turned into somebody's wallet. Lucky more me, a real nice guy came along and fixed the door. So here I am.

cutscene.desc: Mike clenches his teeth, growling

xml.sp: Randall And starting today, I'm numero uno! Top of the leaderboard, baby.

cutscene.desc: Randall gets in Mike's face, flashing his wide smug grin

xml.sp: Mike Ha! You, a top laugh collector?

cutscene.desc: Mike laughs in his face, punching him lightly in the side, causing Randall to drop the grin

xml.sp: Mike In your dreams, Randall. My laugh totals are off the charts.
Randall Who said anything about collecting laughs? I'm after negative emotions.

cutscene.desc: He touches his chin with a sticky toe

xml.sp: Randall And my new factory friends have kindly invaded the factory to get 'em for me.
Sora Negative emotions?
Donald to Goofy He's gotta know.
Goofy to Donald Yeah, Organization XIII must be helpin' him.

Randall Laughter's just not sustainable. Once junior chorts his last chortle, you've gotta start over. But negative energy? Especially sadness? Give 'em something that really breaks their little hearts, and they'll stay sad forever. We'll never have to worry about energy again.

cutscene.desc: He walks around spouting off and they eye him suspiciously

xml.sp: Sora We're not gonna let you hurt anyone like that!

cutscene.desc: Randall whirls around

xml.sp: Sora Not you OR your little Unversed helpers!

cutscene.desc: Sora summons his Keyblade and Randall crosses his second pair of forelegs

xml.sp: Randall Just try and stop me. You'll see soon enough. I am gonna be a legend around this place.

cutscene.desc: He smiles through narrow eyes

xml.sp: Randall Now, consider YOUR careers officially over.
Mike What?!
Randall And that goes for the rest of you, too.

cutscene.desc: He turns around, waving them away, and turns invisible once again

xml.sp: Sora Hey!

cutscene.desc: They look around, but he's disappeared

xml.sp: Sora Where'd he go?

cutscene.desc: They hear Randall's voice over the factory intercom

xml.sp: Randall We're in control of this factory now. And I suggested a few improvements--some real doozies I just know you're gonna love. In fact, you're not getting out of here alive.
Mike That weasel means business! He'll never quit.
Sulley We have got to get Boo to safety first. Then, we can take care of Randall. Time to find a way out!

cutscene.desc: They agree and enter the Factory Basement

xml.sp: Randall Enjoy what's left of your miserable lives.

cutscene.desc: They defeat the obstructing Heartless through the factory

xml.sp: Randall Why won't you just fail already?!

cutscene.desc: The party ascends a long set of stairs into another room with mechanical claws and a large conveyor belt. As Sora and company approach, one of the mechanical arms blasts them with a laser, but they dodge just in time. The laser blast creates a sizzling hole in the floor

xml.sp: Mike Hey! What's with the machines? They've gone totally bonkers!

cutscene.desc: The mechanical arm twists and turns erratically

xml.sp: Mike There's no way we can take Boo through here safely.

cutscene.desc: Boo runs to Sulley's leg with a whimper and the big blue kitty picks her up

xml.sp: Sulley This must be what Randall meant by improvements.

cutscene.desc: Donald stamps his foot

xml.sp: Donald Bad ones!
Sora Nothin' we can't handle!
Mike Yep.
Goofy Sulley, maybe you and Mike should take Boo someplace that's safe.
Sulley Right.
Mike If you find the contraption controlling those things and smash it, that should do the trick.
Goofy Maybe we can use the parts here to avoid the lasers.

cutscene.desc: As Mike and Sulley safely hide with Boo, Sora, Donald and Goofy traverse the conveyor belt, ducking under the machine parts for cover as the mechanical arms pace over the belt with steady laser beams, sending a piercing ringing into their ears

xml.sp: Goofy I see a machine up there in the cage past the stairs.
Donald Yeah! Let's smash it!

cutscene.desc: They safely get to the stairs and reach the machine. Sora strikes it with the Keyblade, sending sparks flying from the various panels, and the mechanical arms power down. Sulley and Mike peek out from their hiding spot

xml.sp: Sulley Coast is clear. Go!

cutscene.desc: They run across the conveyor belt, a smile of success on Mike's face, and catch up to Sora and the others. Sulley puts Boo down as the shutter to the Ground Floor slides open

xml.sp: Randall Yeah, well, that was just a warm-up. The real fun's just starting!

cutscene.desc: In the next room, Unversed appear in droves

xml.sp: Randall Surprise, losers!

cutscene.desc: They take out several of the Turtletoads

xml.sp: Randall Look who's starting to sweat.

cutscene.desc: The defeat the remaining Flowersnakes and continue through the Factory, finding a yellow elevator at the end of the hall

xml.sp: Sora Great. The power's out again.
Mike Okay! We know what to do.

cutscene.desc: He looks around, his great iris bouncing around his face in all directions

xml.sp: Mike Gotta find...

cutscene.desc: He sees a nearby room labeled 'Painting Booth' and smiles

xml.sp: Mike Bingo!
Sora Huh?
Sulley Uh, Mike? How's that supposed to help?

cutscene.desc: Mike runs toward the door and chuckles, waving Sulley towards him with a sly look. Sulley approaches and bends down at Mike's command. Mike whispers his plan into Sulley's ear, and Sulley nods with artful approval

xml.sp: Sulley Heh, that's GOOD!
Mike Yep, take it away!
Sulley Nice try, Mikey. I'm not doin' this alone!

cutscene.desc: He grabs Mike by the top of his head and walks to the booth

xml.sp: Mike Hey! You, not me. C'mon... Sulley!

cutscene.desc: Mike struggles to get away as the doors open

xml.sp: Mike No. Stop! Sul-ley! Not what I had in miiind!

cutscene.desc: The doors close on him and the lights turn on in the booth. Sora and the others wait outside with Boo while the machine buzzes and whirrs. Soon a bell chimes and the doors open again. Out strides a miffed Mike covered in blue and pink paint followed by a similarly-painted Sulley. Sulley smirks, nudging Mike. Boo points at them and laughs along with the trio and the lights to the elevator flicker on

xml.sp: Sora It's on! Nice work, guys!

cutscene.desc: They enter the elevator and Sora presses the button on the panel. The doors close and they ride it up to the Second Floor

xml.sp: Randall It's only a matter of time...

cutscene.desc: When the doors open on the next floor, Boo runs out ahead

xml.sp: Sulley Boo!
Mike Come back! You can't run off, kid!

cutscene.desc: The two run after her into a blue room with yellow water pipes. She peeks out from behind one and giggles

xml.sp: Boo Kitty!
Sulley Oh, there you are.

cutscene.desc: They walk towards her when a pipe above them bursts, showering them with water and washing the paint off their bodies

xml.sp: Sulley That paint was kinda growin' on me!
Mike smiling Woo! This is way better.

cutscene.desc: Sulley wiggles his body to dry off, splashing Mike with water

xml.sp: Mike Agh! Hey, no. Would ya cut that out?

cutscene.desc: Sulley chuckles and Boo runs over

xml.sp: Boo Kitty!

cutscene.desc: Behind her a group of Water Cores appear and Mike gives out a shriek

xml.sp: Sulley Boo, c'mere.

cutscene.desc: She runs to him and he picks her up

xml.sp: Mike Sulley, let's get her outta here.

cutscene.desc: Sulley nods and they fall back behind Sora, Donald and Goofy

xml.sp: Sora The Heartless are here too?
Randall Face it, you're doomed!

cutscene.desc: They take out the Heartless and continue through the hallways, finding a large yellow room. The shutter closes behind them and they are trapped with a horde of Unversed and electric-type Heartless, who send bolts of lightning through the metal grid surrounding the room

xml.sp: Sora Now it's electric fences?
Randall Start sizzling, boys! This one's got some spark!

cutscene.desc: They destroy the Heartless and take down the electric grid, opening the door to the next area. They find another conveyor belt with more laser- powered mechanical arms. Sora jumps back to dodge one of the laser beams and Mike lets off a sigh

xml.sp: Mike Not THIS again?!
Sora We'll take care of it.

cutscene.desc: Sora smiles back at them

xml.sp: Mike Pretty sure the control panel for this place is upstairs.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy follow the conveyor belt doing their best not to get singed

xml.sp: Randall You chumps ever wonder what microwaved popcorn feels like?

cutscene.desc: As the conveyor continues into the next room, they jump off the side, following the arrow on the wall to another belt that leads in their direction

xml.sp: Randall Guess what, losers? I decided to ramp things up a little. This next one's a real whopper.

cutscene.desc: As they ascend the belt they struggle against the speed of its descent, forcing them to hide underneath various machine parts and destroy any obstructions with projectiles. After successfully making their way upstairs, Sora destroys the control panel in the next room, disabling the laser beams. With the room now clear, Sulley and Mike run to catch up with them as the shutter opens to the next area

xml.sp: Randall All right, I'll give you that one. But no more freebies.

cutscene.desc: They enter the control room and Sulley runs to a large shutter that is closed

xml.sp: Sulley Once we get through here, we're clear.

cutscene.desc: Mike rushes over to a giant control panel

xml.sp: Mike Yup! This is the central control unit for the whole factory! Now whaddaya say we get outta here?

cutscene.desc: Sora runs over to the control panel, Donald following behind

xml.sp: Sora Let me.

cutscene.desc: Mike throws his hands up with anxiety

xml.sp: Donald I'll do it!
Mike Hey, hey! Show a little finesse!

cutscene.desc: Mike runs over and Sora & Donald get out of his way. He presses a few buttons and then slams his fist on the control board

xml.sp: Mike Rats! Randall must have messed this up. Nothin' works!

cutscene.desc: More buttons, but the result is the same

xml.sp: Donald We can't get out?
Goofy Maybe it would be faster to just break it.
Sora That's brilliant!

cutscene.desc: He summons his Keyblade to a shocked Mike, raising it over his head

xml.sp: Sulley Hang on!

cutscene.desc: He runs over holding Boo

xml.sp: Sulley Think I've got a better idea. If we can just short it out, the lock will disengage. And, lucky for us, Boo is a walking energy generator.

cutscene.desc: Mike ponders

xml.sp: Mike That might work!
Sora You're our MVP, Boo.

cutscene.desc: Boo giggles and Sulley places her atop his head. He starts to laugh, playfully running around the room, and she screams excitedly. Mike and Sora run after them, but soon take a spill. Sora knocks Mike into the air with the Keyblade, but loses his grip and falls over. Mike lands upright on his knees with a triumphant Yeehaw before the Keyblade falls on top of him, causing him to see stars. He holds his head while everyone laughs, causing the control panel to whirr to life. Boo whimpers as multiple Unversed appear in the room

xml.sp: Mike Hide her!
Sulley I'm on it.

cutscene.desc: Mike readies his fighting stance as the other three summon their weapons once again. They defeat the ones that appeared, but more surround Sulley as he guards Boo from her hiding spot. The group performs a scream strike on the creatures before Sora uses Mike as a bowling ball again. Soon, the battle is over and the control panel is surging with energy, but the doors still aren't open

xml.sp: Mike It's no use. We need a bigger burst of laughter.
Sulley Would you care to do the honors?

cutscene.desc: Mike aims his fingerguns at Boo

xml.sp: Mike I'd love to.

cutscene.desc: He waves his hands, getting ready, then smacks himself in the face, sending his eyeball in various directions with each smack, mimicking a bouncing ball. It bounces faster and faster until he gives a final Tada!

xml.sp: Mike 40 - 0. Game and set!

cutscene.desc: Sulley looks down at Boo, but she makes no reaction. Mike sighs

xml.sp: Mike I'm not cut out for this racket.

cutscene.desc: Still no reaction. He clears his throat

xml.sp: Mike Come on. It's a tennis joke.

cutscene.desc: Sora looks at Goofy

xml.sp: Mike Should I've gone with ping-pong?
Sora to Goofy Nothin' could've saved THAT one.
Mike screaming Wait! Nobody move!

cutscene.desc: The trio react in alarm and Mike falls on all fours

xml.sp: Mike I dropped my contact!

cutscene.desc: He searches the floor while Sulley scratches his face

xml.sp: Sulley I don't think Boo's gonna get it, Mike.

cutscene.desc: Mike crosses his arms a Sora walks over to Sulley

xml.sp: Sora to Sulley Do YOU get it?
Sulley to Sora Yeah, it's 'cause his eye's so big. The joke is you can't lose a contact the size of a dinner plate.

cutscene.desc: Boo mimics Mike's arm crossing

xml.sp: Mike whirling around Oh, fine!

cutscene.desc: Boo roars

xml.sp: Donald Aren't you supposed to be good at this?
Mike I AM once I'm warmed up.
Goofy Sora, do the Funny Face Special.
Sora Huh? Whaaat?

cutscene.desc: He scratches his head

xml.sp: Sora Ugh, if you insist.

cutscene.desc: He crouches to Boo's level and drops his head. After a moment of anticipation, he perks up his head with the goofiest smile, causing Boo to laugh

xml.sp: Sora Everybody join in!

cutscene.desc: Sora repeats it and everyone makes a different silly face for Boo. The control panel goes wild and the shutter unlocks. Sulley chuckles

xml.sp: Sulley Sora's aimin' for your job.

cutscene.desc: Mike crosses his arms in a huff. They start to walk toward the door when Randall slithers up behind them

xml.sp: Randall You boys aren't gonna leave without saying good-bye?
Mike Give it a rest, Randall. You're not gonna get away with this.
Sulley We'll stop anything you throw at us.
Sora Yeah!

cutscene.desc: Sora summons his Keyblade

xml.sp: Randall Maybe you will. Or then again, maybe you won't. I have still got an ace up my sleeve.

cutscene.desc: Mike scowls as they stand ready for a fight

xml.sp: Randall Now...I command you to destroy them!

cutscene.desc: He snaps his finger, but nothing happens. He shifts his eyes and looks around

xml.sp: Randall Eh?

cutscene.desc: He turns away from them and snaps twice again, but again gets no response

xml.sp: Randall Hey. Come on!

cutscene.desc: He scuffles along the floor to a piece of machinery in the corner

xml.sp: Randall Move... Move, you stupid--

cutscene.desc: He tries to pull on one of the metal spikes of the machine, but it doesn't budge

xml.sp: Mike Looks like your ace is a joker.

cutscene.desc: Randall groans

xml.sp: Randall What a pile of junk!

cutscene.desc: He kicks the machine and slithers away, seething

xml.sp: Sora Wha-- Hey!

cutscene.desc: Sora moves to follow him, but Sulley pulls him back

xml.sp: Sulley Just leave him. Don't think he can cause us any more trouble.

cutscene.desc: He moves an arm to look down at Boo

xml.sp: Boo Kitty!
Sulley Besides, we gotta focus on getting Boo home.

cutscene.desc: He pets her and she giggles

xml.sp: Sora You're right.

cutscene.desc: He dispels his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sulley Boo's door has to be somewhere in the vault. If we head outside and go through the power station, we can get to the door vault that way.

cutscene.desc: They walk to the shutter and it opens

xml.sp: Sulley Follow me!

cutscene.desc: As they enter the hallway, the door closes and a figure in a black hood enters through a corridor of darkness. The figure holds out a hand to the machine and oil pools out of it. Randall peeks out from around the corner as the oil builds on the edges of the machine, climbing up the sides and into every crevice. An Unversed symbol appears on its metal hood. The figure directs the wave of oil and machine in front of him and a large mouth bursts from the Unversed, causing Randall to grin. Upon reaching the Power Plant, they see that it has been set ablaze by Unversed

xml.sp: Mike Oh no...

cutscene.desc: A helicopter flies overhead and they hear a voice over the radio

xml.sp: CDA Agent Disregard Code 835. 72-16 in progress. We have visual on the unidentified life-forms. Suspected cause of the conflagration. Code 72-16, over.
Sulley We gotta get to Boo's door.
Sora Yeah.
Mike The whole factory--it's a total mess!
Sulley I know, Mikey. But right now, we just have to keep moving.

cutscene.desc: They make their way through the Power Plant and see the Unversed wreaking havoc as the helicopter flies in from above, lowering a rope

xml.sp: CDA Agent Ready to descend.

cutscene.desc: A four-armed monster in a bright yellow suit containing a large tank drops to the ground, followed by other CDA Agents with varying appendages. He approaches Sora and company

xml.sp: CDA Agent Stand aside. We'll get this fire put out, pronto.

cutscene.desc: One of the agents behind him points to his left, giving a direction to the other, who is knocked off his feet by an explosion. A Spiked Turtletoad marches through from its direction, causing the agents to back away. The first agent takes out his radio

xml.sp: CDA Agent Code 72-16. Unidentified life-form sighted.

cutscene.desc: Sora runs ahead of him and summons his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora These guys are OUR specialty!

cutscene.desc: The agent moves to the side as the group begins battling the Unversed. After taking out the vicious Spiked Turtletoad, several Flame Core Heartless appear

xml.sp: CDA Agent We have spotted additional unidentified life-forms.

cutscene.desc: They continue defeating Heartless and Unversed while also using Water spells on the surrounding fire. Once the enemies are taken out, the group helps fight the fires with the giant water hoses brought by the CDA. Soon, the threat is neutralized

xml.sp: Sulley Thank you! You did great.

cutscene.desc: The agent salutes him

xml.sp: CDA Agent Yes, sir. We'll be on our way.
Sora Time to go.
Mike Yeah.

cutscene.desc: The group follow the hallways through the Power Plant, reaching another outside area where the helicopter flies past them

xml.sp: CDA Agent Requesting backup. We need help containing the fire!

cutscene.desc: More of the plant is on fire. Heartless appear to block their way to the Tank Yard, where the agents are fighting the fire. The helicopter flies over the Tank Yard, shining down its searchlight

xml.sp: CDA Agent Deal with those life-forms!

cutscene.desc: They fight the Heartless and extinguish the fires

xml.sp: Mike This way.

cutscene.desc: A boom catches their attention as a large blue tank starts crackling with electricity. Sulley grabs Boo and the group runs as quick as they can away from the tank. It explodes, knocking them all off their feet. Mike's breaths come fast and quick as the pipes above burst into flames and explode likewise. Another blow to their right causes another explosion, dislodging a gigantic pipe above them from its rivets. They run as it starts to fall to the ground, sending up a cloud of dust. The passageway they were about to use is now filled with broken piping

xml.sp: Mike Oh, great. This time we're really stuck.

cutscene.desc: Goofy whimpers

xml.sp: Sora Sulley, have you got any ideas?

cutscene.desc: Boo hops down from his hand

xml.sp: Sulley Just gimme a second.

cutscene.desc: Boo runs toward something as Sulley thinks. The other watch her as she returns

xml.sp: Boo Kitty!

cutscene.desc: At their confusion, she points ahead at the fallen pipe and giggles

xml.sp: Sulley If I'm right about that pipe...

cutscene.desc: He makes a fist

xml.sp: Sulley Yep, it's perfect. Boo, thank you!

cutscene.desc: He pats her on the head and she giggles again

xml.sp: Sulley We gotta follow that pipe.

cutscene.desc: He starts walking

xml.sp: Mike What?! Wait a sec. I thought we were going straight to the door vault. The only place that pipe leads is to the cooling tank!

cutscene.desc: Mike, walking beside him, blocks his way

xml.sp: Mike You sure you don't have a better idea?

cutscene.desc: Sulley picks him up by the head with one hand and sets him down to his left

xml.sp: Sulley Don't worry, Mike. Just trust me.

cutscene.desc: They climb up the busted pipe and into the cooling tank, defeating the Unversed that appear inside it. Sulley rushes to a set of doors
