xml.sp: Boo Kitty!

cutscene.desc: Boo follows behind

xml.sp: Sulley I'm pretty sure Maintenance hasn't finished patching it up.

cutscene.desc: He releases the door from its hinges and sets it aside, pointing

xml.sp: Sulley This way.

cutscene.desc: Boo giggles and they run inside. Mike looks at his surroundings

xml.sp: Mike Wait a second... It's the door vault!
Sulley smiling Yep. What'd I tell ya?

cutscene.desc: Mike puts his hands on his hips

xml.sp: Mike Sure, nice job, Sull. Seriously, if I didn't know any better...I'd say you actually ran the place.

cutscene.desc: He gives his friend a sly smile

xml.sp: Sulley Thanks, Mikey. All right, it's not much farther.

cutscene.desc: They traverse the Vault Passage and enter another hallway. The floor is covered in a black substance

xml.sp: Donald Hey! What's this black goop?
Goofy Gawrsh, it looks like some kinda trail.

cutscene.desc: They follow the trail of sludge into the Door Vault

xml.sp: Sulley Everybody look for Boo's door.

cutscene.desc: They hear a snicker as a certain purple fiend slithers in

xml.sp: Sulley Randall...
Mike Didn't you learn your lesson with that pile-of-junk fiasco?

cutscene.desc: Randall scoffs

xml.sp: Randall Oh, I learned a lot.

cutscene.desc: He walks aside, pointing out the very same pile of junk behind him. Its existence there startles them, but Mike quickly waves it off and moves closer. The Unversed symbol appears on its hood, which scares Boo, who hides behind Sulley

xml.sp: Sulley Wait, Mike. Something's different!

cutscene.desc: Sulley picks up Boo and leads her to safety as Sora, Donald and Goofy run up to Mike

xml.sp: Mike Oh, please. It's just more junk.

cutscene.desc: Randall cackles from a high ledge, distracting Mike from the ooze seeping out behind his back. He turns around to see an enormous Lump of Horror rising up from the machine. Mike shivers and backs away, Sora and company running to his rescue

xml.sp: Sora An Unversed!

cutscene.desc: Mike lands on his butt as the blobby creature opens its mouth wide, scream containers bursting from the goo. Sulley grabs Mike by the head and lifts him up

xml.sp: Sulley Mike, time to reach down and let the scary out.

cutscene.desc: Mike smiles, then smacks his own face, Sulley letting him down to the floor

xml.sp: Mike Oh, I'm ready, Sulley. I'm ready!
Randall Finally... This is exactly what I need to take over the company. But first, I am getting rid of YOU.

cutscene.desc: He looks down at Mike and Sulley

xml.sp: Randall Attack!

cutscene.desc: The Lump of Horror plants itself into the floor, spreading itself across swipes of ooze where Tar Hands burst from the ground, tossing fireballs at the party. They take out the Tar Hands and dodge out of the way as the great lump barrels towards them. It sinks into the floor for a moment before exploding in a swell of oil, sending it all across the floor and up the walls. The main body of the Unversed raises itself up in the center of the room, sprouting wings on its jack-o-lantern face, as a hundred Tar Hands emerge from the walls and floor. The hands attempt to claw at them but are quickly subdued. As Sora approaches the Lump of Horror, it strikes with a gust of wind from its great wings, sending him back into the Tar Hands clutches. As the group destroy the hands, the Unversed absorbs the oil back into its body and emits steam from the canisters of scream stuck inside it, also sending a cluster of fireballs in their direction. Knocking the fireballs back at it causes the Lump of Horror to lose control of its form, dripping oil everywhere. It falls to the floor in a silent puddle, leaving a pile of machinery and scream canisters, which Randall scuttles over to, whimpering

xml.sp: Randall screaming Whyyy?!

cutscene.desc: Randall begins kicking the debris as Mike looks over to a door which was previously restored from wood chips. He waves for Sulley's attention and quickly does a series of charades to get his point across without speaking. Door. Randall. Pointing. Strangle? Obviously, Sulley doesn't understand. Mike grunts in frustration, then makes a quiet roar

xml.sp: Sulley Ah!

cutscene.desc: He gives Mike a double thumbs-up and Mike rolls his eyes in relief, as Sulley runs forward

xml.sp: Donald Where are you going--

cutscene.desc: Goofy grabs Donald to silence him as Randall turns toward Sulley in surprise. Sulley bellows loudly in Randall's face. Not long after, they show Randall the door. Mike turns the knob and opens it

xml.sp: Mike All right, and in ya go.

cutscene.desc: Randall grits his teeth and Boo roars at him from Sulley's arms

xml.sp: Sulley There's no place for you here anymore, Randall. Now we're in the business of making children laugh.

cutscene.desc: He looks down at Boo, smiling, and she giggles. Randall scowls back at them

xml.sp: Randall yelling You think it's funny?

cutscene.desc: He points with two of his arms and Mike puts a hand on his shoulder

xml.sp: Mike Hilarious! The more that you whine, the funnier it gets.

cutscene.desc: Mike smiles haughtily and Randall growls in anger, before accepting defeat. He pushes Mike away and walks toward the door

xml.sp: Sulley Enjoy your extended vacation.

cutscene.desc: Randall seethes

xml.sp: Randall You clowns are gonna be sorry when I find my way back and I finally take over this place!

cutscene.desc: Mike follows him to the door and Randall steps inside. Mike overhears

xml.sp: Trailer Son Mama, that gator's in the house again!
Trailer Mom Are you kidding?! Oh, this time, he's in for it. C'mere!

cutscene.desc: Mike grins widely as they start beating up Randall from beyond the door

xml.sp: Randall Ugh! Oof! Ahhh!

cutscene.desc: Mike recoils with a grimace

xml.sp: Trailer Mom Get back here!

cutscene.desc: Randall screams and Mike chuckles

xml.sp: Mike So long! Smell ya later.

cutscene.desc: He closes the door with a smile and Sulley walks up to the door

xml.sp: Sulley And now we just need to do one last thing.

cutscene.desc: He reaches an arm back to smash the door

xml.sp: Sora Hang on! I have a way to lock him out.

cutscene.desc: Sora walks forward and summons the Keyblade, aiming it at the door. A Keyhole appears on the door and the Keyblade glows, sending a beam toward the Keyhole. A bright light shines and they hear a clicking sound as the Keyhole disappears. A warm glow envelops the locked door and it rises into the air, vanishing

xml.sp: Donald And that takes care of that.
Goofy Uh-huh.

cutscene.desc: Sora gives a sheepish chuckle. Later, they finally find Boo's door and jump up to it, Mike and Sulley hanging from the rails

xml.sp: Sulley Okay, Boo. Time to go home. You must be tuckered out, but we'll play together real soon.

cutscene.desc: The rail buckles and begins to slide the door along, with Sora, Donald and Goofy following on their own red door. They each give their own excited shouts

xml.sp: Mike What NOW?!

cutscene.desc: The doors arrive at the Laugh Floor, and the group jump off as they lock in their terminals. A hooded figure steps toward them, sending Sora on the defensive

xml.sp: Sora Who are YOU?
??????? Gotta say, that strange facade had me fooled at first, brother.

cutscene.desc: The figure takes off his hood, revealing a dark reflective helmet

xml.sp: Sora Wait a sec...

cutscene.desc: He gasps

xml.sp: Sora Oh yeah! You were at the cathedral! And hey! Who are YOU to call anyone strange?
Goofy Say, do we know this guy?
Donald Uhhh...
??????? We haven't ever met in the flesh. I am Vanitas.

cutscene.desc: Goofy and Donald act in surprise

xml.sp: Sora This is the part where you spout some mumbo jumbo and disappear, right?

cutscene.desc: Vanitas walks through one of the workstations

xml.sp: Vanitas This whole world...was powered by scream. They converted the screams of human children into energy.

cutscene.desc: He picks up one of the scream canisters

xml.sp: Vanitas And this very company was what made it all happen. It's as rich a source of negative emotion as we'll ever find.
Mike angrily For the last time, we already stopped doing that!
Vanitas Did you? Then how do you explain all these canisters of surplus scream?

cutscene.desc: He holds the canister up

xml.sp: Vanitas This facility was everything I could hope for. And I was lucky enough to find a pawn whose heart was darkened by thoughts of revenge.

cutscene.desc: He juggles the canister in the air

xml.sp: Mike You mean Randall.
Sulley All Randall ever cared about was winning. And this guy took advantage of that weakness.
Vanitas My heart is made of just one thing. And the Unversed collected enough screams and sadness from those children to reconstruct it.
Mike Yeah, and the whole time they were trashing our company in the process!

cutscene.desc: Sulley holds Mike back from rushing at Vanitas, but Mike struggles against the grip on his head

xml.sp: Vanitas But, even with all this negative emotion, my heart is still incomplete. I need something else.

cutscene.desc: He drops the canister. It clangs to the ground before screaming off into the air

xml.sp: Sora Whoa!

cutscene.desc: Sulley dodges away, taking Mike and Boo with him. They watch as the canister flies around the expansive room, bouncing off the walls until it runs out of scream and crashes to the floor. Mike and Sulley scowl as it rolls to Sora's feet

xml.sp: Vanitas The half of me that sleeps on...inside of your heart.

cutscene.desc: Sora turns around and gasps as Vanitas holds his Keyblade just inches from him. A voice bursts from Sora's chest

xml.sp: Sora/Ven Vanitas!

cutscene.desc: Sora is taken aback at his own outburst

xml.sp: Vanitas Ventus... What a strange place to slither off to...

cutscene.desc: He creeps closer to Sora, holding out his hand

xml.sp: Vanitas ...you insignificant speck.

cutscene.desc: Sora knocks his hand away

xml.sp: Sora What are you talking about?

cutscene.desc: Mike, Sulley and Boo sneak carefully through the workstations out of sight of Vanitas

xml.sp: Vanitas Oh, you wouldn't remember. When you were little...you formed a special bond, with a boy named Ventus who joined with your heart.
Donald Ven!
Goofy Is he sayin' that one of the missing Keyblade wielders is inside Sora's heart?
Sora How is that possible?

cutscene.desc: A dark mist swirls around them

xml.sp: Vanitas Now, you will return Ventus to me.

cutscene.desc: Vanitas swings his Keyblade, releasing a dark wind and Sora feels a tug on his heart. He catches himself upon falling to the floor as Donald and Goofy shield him from the front

xml.sp: Sora Donald...Goofy...

cutscene.desc: Goofy struggles, holding back the dark wind with his shield

xml.sp: Goofy The King told us about this. Ventus wasn't able to defeat Vanitas. They struck each other down, and then the King said that Ventus's heart never returned to him!
Donald You're not gonna do that to Sora! No way!

cutscene.desc: The wind is blasted away

xml.sp: Vanitas Stay out of this.

cutscene.desc: With a wave of his arm, he swipes Donald and Goofy away in a streak of darkness. With Sora left defenseless, they gasp

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Sora!

cutscene.desc: Vanitas walks closer as Sora stands and summons his Keyblade. Vanitas knocks it away in seconds with his own and aims it at Sora's chest. The image of Ventus is superimposed over Sora

xml.sp: Vanitas Join your heart...with mine!

cutscene.desc: Vanitas releases another dark wind just as Sulley appears behind him

xml.sp: Sulley Made you look!

cutscene.desc: He roars ferociously and Boo covers her eyes, while Mike covers her ears. Vanitas drops his Keyblade as Sulley grabs and lifts him up. He struggles against Sulley's firm grip

xml.sp: Vanitas Let me go!

cutscene.desc: Another set of doors slide into the room, brought by Mike

xml.sp: Mike Over here, Sulley!

cutscene.desc: Sulley runs over, tossing Vanitas inside the door

xml.sp: Sulley Close it! Quick!

cutscene.desc: Mike slams the door and Sulley grabs it as Mike runs to the next terminal and opens a second door. Sulley tosses the door inside the second door, and the process repeats with a third, and then a fourth door. Finally, the fourth door is shredded into sawdust with glee. Sulley and Mike high-five and Boo dances

xml.sp: Sulley Boo!
Mike Hey!

cutscene.desc: The two then high-five Boo

xml.sp: Sora That was awesome!
Donald Thank you!
Goofy We owe ya.
Sulley No, WE should be thanking YOU. We never woulda managed to get Boo this far if you hadn't come along to help.
Mike And finally, we found her door.

cutscene.desc: Boo giggles and Sora walks over to her

xml.sp: Sora Boo, I know how excited you were to come play with Mike and Sulley. Sorry we dragged you into this.
Donald Watch it! You're gonna scare her with that face!
Sora Hey, you are WAY scarier.
Goofy Gawrsh, I think you're both scary.

cutscene.desc: The group laughs at Sora and Donald's expense

xml.sp: Sulley Okay, Boo. Time to go.
Boo Kitty...
Mike We'll catch up soon, kid.
Boo Mike Wazowski!

cutscene.desc: Mike turns, seeing Donald behind him

xml.sp: Mike No, that's Donald, Boo.
Boo Mike Wazowski.

cutscene.desc: She runs up to Mike and hugs him. Surprised, he smiles and pets her on the head

xml.sp: Mike Better. I'll see ya, kid.

cutscene.desc: He waves as Sulley leads her to her flowery door

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy Boo!

cutscene.desc: They reveal a trio of silly faces from under their hands

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy So looong!

cutscene.desc: Boo laughs and waves goodbye. Later, the trio returns to the lobby with Mike and Sulley

xml.sp: Sora Sorry for all the headaches we caused.
Sulley Don't mention it. And actually, it was kinda nice havin' a little adventure for old times' sake.

cutscene.desc: Mike nods

xml.sp: Mike Yeah, the flying and the falling--and hey, let's not do that paint thing again--but nothin' like running for our lives to get the heart pumping!

cutscene.desc: Sora chuckles

xml.sp: Donald I had a great time.
Sora Donald! All you did was complain!
Donald I did not.
Goofy Any chance that we can drop by again?
Mike The door's always open.
Sulley And maybe Boo can join us!

cutscene.desc: He extends a hand and Sora takes it

xml.sp: Sora Yeah.

cutscene.desc: Donald shakes Mike's hand while Sulley and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Sora Bye!

cutscene.desc: They back off to the entrance, waving

xml.sp: Donald Good-byeee!
Mike For the record, I still get the most laughs!
Sulley Happy exterminating!

cutscene.desc: Sora chuckles and shrugs at Donald and Goofy

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy Thank you!

cutscene.desc: The group returns to the gummi ship. Sora taps his foot and a finger impatiently to the concern of Donald and Goofy. Sora stands up on his chair, turning back to them

xml.sp: Sora We should go to the realm of darkness!
Donald No way!
Goofy You can't go there until you get the power of waking!
Sora But come on, we have to do something! If we don't act, the Organization's gonna win!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy exchange worried expressions and Jiminy jumps onto Sora's shoulder

xml.sp: Jiminy Sora, do you even know how to get to the realm of darkness?

cutscene.desc: Sora's realization garners a sigh and he takes out his gummiphone

xml.sp: Sora Well, Riku and the King do.
Donald They won't tell you.
Goofy Nope, not until you complete your own mission.

cutscene.desc: He looks back at them sadly, and slumps, defeated, back into his chair, letting out an angsty shout and staring at the ceiling. Suddenly, his gummiphone begins to ring

xml.sp: Sora Huh?
Donald & Goofy excited The King?
Sora excited Riku?

cutscene.desc: He answers the phone and neither Riku nor the King appear

xml.sp: Ienzo Is this a bad time?

cutscene.desc: They sigh

xml.sp: Sora Ienzo.

cutscene.desc: Ienzo pauses at this unorthodox response

xml.sp: Ienzo So, I have some news about Ansem's Code and the replica we need for Roxas's heart.

cutscene.desc: Jiminy hops up again to see the screen

xml.sp: Jiminy Oh!
Sora And...?
Ienzo First, the replica. Even is still missing, but we found some of his research. I'll see what I can learn from it.
Jiminy bowing You've got our thanks.

Ienzo As for Ansem the Wise's data, we've discovered a very interesting passage. I'll read you exactly what he wrote. I have discovered three unique hearts inside of Sora's. One is Roxas. The second has been with Sora for nearly as long. And a third has resided in Sora's heart for even longer--most of his life, in fact. This is a truly astonishing discovery. While these hearts have now melded with Sora--grown silent and indistinct-- Sora retains the memories of all three. The memories have been compartment- alized--each placed in its own 'box,' so to speak. I surmise the hearts can be awoken, provided that each of them is returned to the box that contains the correct memories. Unite the heart with its memories, and provide it a suitable body within which it may flourish, and I believe any or all three of these people can be made real again.
Sora Roxas and TWO MORE?
Jiminy Who else?

cutscene.desc: Sora thinks and Jiminy hops down

xml.sp: Sora Oh. Thanks, Ienzo.
Ienzo Certainly. Take care.

cutscene.desc: The call ends

xml.sp: Donald Three different hearts...

cutscene.desc: Sora puts the phone away

xml.sp: Goofy One of them's Roxas. The other one must be Ventus.
Donald You're gonna believe what Vanitas said?
Goofy Well, uh...it's kinda all we got to go on.

cutscene.desc: They think for a second

xml.sp: Goofy Sora, do you know who the third one might be?
Sora shaking his head Uh-uh.
Donald teasing 'Cause Sora can't count.
Sora Hey! That's not related.

cutscene.desc: They begin to laugh

xml.sp: Sora Donald...

cutscene.desc: The gummi ship sails on. Meanwhile, on the edge of a dark beach, a young woman in blue sits with a cloaked man, his blonde beard just visible beneath his hood

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise Tell me, will you stay here?
Aqua I can't shake the feeling that these waters touch another shore I've visited.
Ansem the Wise The Destiny Islands.
Aqua surprised You've heard of them?
Ansem the Wise Yes. They are quite lovely--a far cry from this wasteland.

cutscene.desc: She crosses her arms over her legs, staring out at the light far over the water

xml.sp: Aqua I'm staying. Someone will come for me.
Ansem the Wise These waters are the in-between of dark and light, its shores the margins of day and night. They brought you and I together, so why not also you and another?

cutscene.desc: She nods

xml.sp: Aqua Yes.

cutscene.desc: Some time later, Aqua senses an approaching presence

xml.sp: Aqua turning back Who's there?

cutscene.desc: Ansem the Wise follows suit, seeing the arrival of his usurper, Ansem, Seeker of Darkness

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise angrily You...

cutscene.desc: They stand to face him, ready for conflict

xml.sp: Ansem Master...I must have a word with you.

cutscene.desc: Ansem the Wise doffs his hood, glaring at him through orange eyes

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise Master? So now you mock me.

cutscene.desc: Ansem walks nearer to them

xml.sp: Ansem Do you recall those experiments of the heart you bade me cease? Among the test subjects was a girl. She had lost her memory, just as I had. But...you can reconstruct memories. You did with Sora. I believe you have seen the girl's memories.
Ansem the Wise What is your question?
Ansem Where did you put the girl?
Ansem the Wise What girl?
Ansem Very well. If you won't tell me here...

cutscene.desc: He reaches for Ansem the Wise, but Aqua knocks his hand away, standing between the two of them

xml.sp: Aqua I think you should go.

cutscene.desc: Ansem looks Aqua over and raises his eyebrow

xml.sp: Ansem A lost guardian of light?

cutscene.desc: He scoffs

xml.sp: Ansem You wait here...for the King and his fool.

cutscene.desc: Ansem crosses his arms with a smile, and the earth shakes as a black creature with glowing yellow eyes emerges from the ground behind him. The Dark Figure reaches back with its muscular arms and punches Aqua away. She lands on her feet on the sand

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise Where's your Keyblade?
Aqua Don't need it!

cutscene.desc: She runs forward with a leaping kick to the Dark Figure's bandaged face. She jumps off its arm, but it grabs her by the leg before she can get away. It lifts her up to look her in the eyes as she struggles. Ansem the Wise runs up, waving his arms

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise No more! I'll go.

cutscene.desc: Ansem chuckles evilly

xml.sp: Ansem You are wise.

cutscene.desc: Aqua breaks free, spinning downward to land a kick on Ansem, but he blocks with his arm. She leaps off the arm and lands back near the water

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise Poor thing. I mustn't leave you with nothing.

cutscene.desc: Energy begins to swirl between the Dark Figure's hands as a massive orb of darkness emerges. At the apex, the orb bursts from the Figure's chest, striking Aqua at high speed, sending her screaming into the murky waters. Ansem the Wise rushes to the water and falls to his knees helplessly. Aqua sinks deep into the water, darkness spreading over her heart

xml.sp: Aqua What...is this feeling?

cutscene.desc: The darkness envelops her body as she drifts deeper into the abyss. Meanwhile on the Gummi Ship, Sora's phone rings. Sora answers it, seeing Dale on the screen

xml.sp: Dale Hiya, Sora.
Sora Hey, Dale. What's up?
Dale Chip just got a message from Merlin.

cutscene.desc: He yells off-screen

xml.sp: Dale Chip! I got him!

cutscene.desc: No response

xml.sp: Dale waving Hey, Chipper!

cutscene.desc: Chip hops onto the screen

xml.sp: Chip Hi, Sora!
Sora Hi, Chip. Does Merlin need us for something?
Chip Yep, I think it's got something to do with some kind of book. He said he'll have a cup of tea while he waits for ya.
Dale A cup of tea where?
Chip Oh no! He said tea, but he didn't say where.
Dale Do you mean he left before you could find out?
Chip He's a tough wizard to pin down.

cutscene.desc: Chip crosses his arms while Dale sighs

xml.sp: Chip Anyway, message delivered. Bye!

cutscene.desc: Dale waves and the call ends

xml.sp: Sora Where could he be having tea?
Donald I don't know.

cutscene.desc: They pause for a moment to think

xml.sp: Goofy Say, if you were gonna have a cup of tea, wouldn't you wanna have it at the best restaurant you could find?
Sora Ohh... Of course!
Donald Little Chef's bistro.
Goofy Yeah! Let's go drop by Twilight Town, and we can see if Merlin's there.

cutscene.desc: The Gummi Ship takes off toward Twilight Town. They enter the Tram Common, where Merlin is sipping tea at Le Grand Bistrot, his large carpet bag at his feet

xml.sp: Merlin Ah, greetings, gentlemen. What brings you all the way out here? Besides the finest tea this side of Big Ben, of course.

cutscene.desc: He chuckles

xml.sp: Sora Huh? But...Merlin, I thought that you asked us to stop by.
Merlin Gracious, did I?
Sora nodding Mm-hmm.
Goofy Didn't ya leave a message for us with Chip and Dale?
Donald About a book?

cutscene.desc: The wizard raises a finger

xml.sp: Merlin Ah! Yes, the book. That's right.

cutscene.desc: He taps his wand against the carpet bag and it opens. Out floats a familiar children's book labeled Winnie the Pooh

xml.sp: Merlin Behold.

cutscene.desc: Sora grabs onto the book

xml.sp: Sora Hey, this is...

cutscene.desc: They inspect the cover. The titular bear sitting alone on a log beneath the stars

xml.sp: Donald Sora's not on it.
Goofy Did somethin' happen?
Merlin Well, that's what you need to find out, lad.

cutscene.desc: Sora contemplates before handing Donald the book

xml.sp: Sora Okay, I'll see you in a bit.

cutscene.desc: Sora aims his Keyblade at the book

xml.sp: Goofy Take care.
Merlin Yes, and good luck.

cutscene.desc: The blade glows and with a flash, Sora becomes particles of light that fly into the storybook. In the familiar landscape of Rabbit's Howse, Winnie the Pooh sits near the front door with his best friend Piglet, a paw to his temple

xml.sp: Pooh Oh, bother. Think, think, think... Think, think, think...
Sora Pooh Bear!

cutscene.desc: Piglet looks over as Sora enters

xml.sp: Sora You okay?
Pooh Oh! Hello there, Sora.

cutscene.desc: Pooh giggles and stands up

xml.sp: Pooh You're home.
Sora Uh...huh? Good to see you, Pooh. And you, too, Piglet.
Piglet cheerfully Hello.
Sora You're not in trouble? But I thought something odd must be going on.
Pooh Hmm, let me see... I don't remember anything oddish, but perhaps I've forgotten. Think, think, think...
Rabbit Oh, we've got trouble all right!
Pooh Think, think, think... Oh, bother.

cutscene.desc: Rabbit walks up

xml.sp: Piglet Would that be the Rabbit sort of trouble?

cutscene.desc: Rabbit crosses his arms and glares at Piglet

xml.sp: Piglet shaking S-s-s-sorry, please continue.

cutscene.desc: Sora chuckles

xml.sp: Roo Sora!

cutscene.desc: Sora looks over and sees a large lavender elephant walking towards them, with Roo aboard its back

xml.sp: Sora Wow! Who's this?

cutscene.desc: Roo leaps over his head and slides down his trunk

xml.sp: Roo It's okay. He's my friend.

cutscene.desc: Sora approaches and leans down

xml.sp: Sora Hi, I'm Sora.
Lumpy And I'm Lumpy! It's nice to meet you!

cutscene.desc: The Heffalump stomps the ground happily and Gopher bursts from the soil

xml.sp: Gopher Sufferin' sassafras! Stomp around a little louder, why don't ya?
Lumpy Oh! Gopher, I'm sorry.
Piglet I kind of like it when the ground gets bouncy.

cutscene.desc: Gopher turns toward Piglet

xml.sp: Gopher Well, I suppose if something has to bounce...

cutscene.desc: He turns to look behind Sora

xml.sp: Gopher Speaking of...

cutscene.desc: A bounce. Then another bounce. Then another, and another, until...

xml.sp: Sora Hmm?

cutscene.desc: Sora turns around and gets tackled by the one and only Tigger

xml.sp: Tigger Back for some more bouncin', Sora?

cutscene.desc: Sora smiles wide

xml.sp: Sora Tigger!
Tigger C'mon, let's go! You too, Roo!

cutscene.desc: He bounces on his striped tail and Roo follows

xml.sp: Roo Yippee!

cutscene.desc: Roo starts laughing

xml.sp: Lumpy Me too! Me too! I wanna bounce!

cutscene.desc: Lumpy and Roo bounce around in circles as Piglet and Gopher feel the effects on the ground

xml.sp: Pooh Think, think, think...
Tigger Oh yes, it is time for bouncin'! Say no more! All would-be bouncers are welcome.
Pooh Oh, I remember now. Rabbit's trouble is harvest related.
Rabbit Well, thank YOU for remembering my plight, Pooh. Better late than never.

cutscene.desc: He addresses the bouncing buddies

xml.sp: Rabbit EXCUSE ME!

cutscene.desc: They ignore Rabbit and keep bouncing

xml.sp: Rabbit Would anyone else care to remember why we're here?

cutscene.desc: Rabbit walks toward them and they stop to think

xml.sp: Pooh As I recall, we came to help you with your garden, Rabbit. After which, perhaps, you'll invite us in for a smackeral or two of honey?
Rabbit Correct.

cutscene.desc: He shakes his head, whirling around

xml.sp: Rabbit No. No! I mean, we'll see about that, Pooh. Now, the garden, if you please?

cutscene.desc: Sora walks over

xml.sp: Rabbit You can help, too, Sora.
Sora What? Me too?

cutscene.desc: Together, they help Rabbit pick vegetables. A delighted Rabbit holds a bounty of bright orange carrots in his arms

xml.sp: Rabbit What a harvest!
Piglet Thanks to Sora's help.

cutscene.desc: Rabbit puts down the carrots

xml.sp: Rabbit Yes, quite right. Thank you, Sora!

cutscene.desc: Tigger's back at it

xml.sp: Tigger Well, how's about a little more bouncin'?
Rabbit Oh no, no no no! There's no bouncing in farmwork!
Roo Aww, no bouncin' at all?
Tigger Huh?
Lumpy I want to bounce.
Gopher holding his head Whippersnappers and their bouncing...

cutscene.desc: Piglet giggles

xml.sp: Pooh Excuse me, Rabbit. The carrots are very nice, but might you have some honey to go with them?
Rabbit Now's not the time, Pooh. If I give you any honey here, I'll just end up with a bear stuck in my front door, AGAIN.
Sora looking around Well, looks like your problem's solved. Guess I'll be on my way.

cutscene.desc: He starts to leave

xml.sp: Rabbit Solved? Oh, it's far from solved. We still need to harvest the fruit!

cutscene.desc: Sora sighs softly

xml.sp: Pooh Won't you stay, Sora, for the sake of honey?
Sora Uh...okay!

cutscene.desc: Sora helps the group pick fruit in the orchard. Rabbit surveys the giant pile of colorful fruit

xml.sp: Rabbit Yes! Yes! Look at all this marvelous fruit!
Lumpy Oh, it's lovely.
Roo Lumpy loves, loves, LOVES fruit.

cutscene.desc: Roo giggles

xml.sp: Pooh You know, Rabbit, I find that fruit always tastes better with a little honey.
Piglet You're right, Pooh. It certainly does.
Tigger bouncing Hoo-hoo! Then, I'll keep lookin' for fruit up at bouncin' height!
Gopher And I'll search closer to the soil.

cutscene.desc: Gopher descends into his hole

xml.sp: Rabbit Sora...

cutscene.desc: Sora bends down and Rabbit whispers in his ear

xml.sp: Rabbit ...could you help me with my flower patch? I've got a surprise for Pooh.
Sora quietly A surprise, for Pooh Bear?
Pooh Yes, Sora?
Sora Ohh. It's nothing, Pooh.

cutscene.desc: Sora helps Rabbit pick flowers, unearthing the stash of honey he keeps there. Afterward, Rabbit presents Pooh with a hunny pot

xml.sp: Rabbit Here, Pooh. A pot full of honey. It's your reward for being such a big help. Eat all you want.
Pooh Oh, thank you. Rabbit!

cutscene.desc: Pooh sits right then and there for a snack

xml.sp: Piglet You planted all these flowers just for Pooh?
Roo Really? Why?
Gopher It's simple, sonny. Flowers mean nectar. Nectar means honeybees. And honeybees...mean honey.
Lumpy Oh, and the flowers are so lovely. I like the pretty colors.

cutscene.desc: They look over just as a breeze wafts along, sending various flower petals into the air. Tigger bounces up to touch them

xml.sp: Tigger Look at 'em all. They're bouncin' even higher than me!

cutscene.desc: They marvel at the sight

xml.sp: Pooh Sora, I believe the one I should thank for all that yummy, delicious honey is you.

cutscene.desc: Sora squats to Pooh's level

xml.sp: Sora Don't mention it, Pooh. Besides, we all helped.
Pooh Um, Sora?
Sora Hm?

cutscene.desc: Pooh points to his chest

xml.sp: Pooh You used to be right here. Why is it that you went away?
Sora Away? Oh, THAT's what you meant by you're home.
Pooh Yes. You see, when I get a rumbly in my tumbly, it's very hard to think of anything but honey. So I was worried that I might have forgotten you away.
Sora Silly bear, I'd never.
Pooh Oh, good, because I want us to be together forever.
Sora Pooh. We are together. There isn't a second that we're not. (thinking to himself) Except I can feel it. Our connection's weaker... Why is that?
Pooh What's wrong, Sora?

cutscene.desc: Sora snaps out of his daze

xml.sp: Sora Oh, it's nothing. What matters is I'll be here from now on.

cutscene.desc: He points to Pooh's heart and the bear smiles happily

xml.sp: Sora No going away.
Pooh Thank you, Sora.

cutscene.desc: They laugh cheerfully, watching the petals dance through the air. The storybook closes and Sora has joined Winnie the Pooh on the log, now under a bright blue sky. Sora appears back in Twilight Town

xml.sp: Merlin Splendid. All is as it should be.
Goofy But how come Sora's picture disappeared in the first place?

cutscene.desc: Sora peers downward sadly

xml.sp: Donald Sora?
Sora Something's happened to me that made me vanish from Pooh's heart.

cutscene.desc: He turns to the wizard

xml.sp: Sora Merlin, I don't ever want to lose my friends.
Merlin Well, now.
Sora Huh?
Merlin There's no need to fret, lad. Whatever's lost can be found again. There are always new paths between hearts for us to discover and traverse. But you already know that.

cutscene.desc: He shows Sora the changed book cover, bringing a smile to his face

xml.sp: Sora Yeah!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy leave Twilight Town and sail the Gummi Ship to a kingdom covered in snow and ice. Upon their arrival, they are attacked by a group of Soldier Heartless. Goofy knocks one back with his shield and Donald sends out a Fire spell, destroying two of them. Sora takes out the remaining one with his Keyblade. He feels the wind blow through his hooded shirt, garnering a shiver

xml.sp: Sora It's cold! Donald, gimme a coat!

cutscene.desc: He tucks his arms in, freezing and Donald gives him a stern look

xml.sp: Donald The magic doesn't work that way.
Goofy Guess he's too used to the beach!
Sora Hey, islander, what can I say?

cutscene.desc: He rubs his shoulders and looks over to his right at the fjord...

xml.sp: Sora pointing Look! Even the sea's turning to...ice...

cutscene.desc: ...which is slowly freezing over

xml.sp: Sora Donald, this isn't YOUR magic, is it?
Donald shaking his head Uh-uh.
Goofy Do ya think it's the Heartless?
Sora Might be. Let's go.

cutscene.desc: They run forward to the edge of the fjord, watching the ice creep over the rippling water

xml.sp: Sora Wow!

cutscene.desc: Something catches his attention. A young woman with a blue dress and purple cape runs along the top of the water, freezing the surface in her wake. The expression on her face is one of desperation. They react with a start once the ice reaches the shore

xml.sp: Sora That girl... She looked so sad. I wonder what happened. Maybe the Heartless? We should talk to her.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod and they run toward the base of the North Mountain. They near a cliffside and see snow fall from it, soon followed by a horde of reindeer-like Winterhorn Heartless. They take out the Heartless and continue up the mountain. They reach the end of the Treescape with a sheer cliff

xml.sp: Donald Oh... A dead end.
Goofy Naw, Sora can run up this.
Sora Yeah, no problem.

cutscene.desc: They continue climbing the mountain, reaching an open spot in the Gorge where you can see over the kingdom

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, look how high up we are!
Donald Do I have to? What if we fall?

cutscene.desc: They finally catch up to the young woman, who walks slowly across the snow

xml.sp: Sora Hey, hold up!

cutscene.desc: She gasps, turning around quickly, fear emblazoned on her face

xml.sp: ???? Why are you here? Where did you come from?
Sora Hi. I'm Sora, and I--

cutscene.desc: He looks over at Donald, who gives him a forbidding look

xml.sp: Sora Uh...I'm from...let's just say someplace...a little warmer.

cutscene.desc: Donald approves of this response

xml.sp: Donald I'm Donald.
Goofy And I'm Goofy.
???? Are you visiting Arendelle? For the coronation?
Sora Huh? Um... uh...

cutscene.desc: He looks to Donald and Goofy for an answer. They both nod

xml.sp: Sora You got us!

cutscene.desc: Sora laughs nervously and Goofy waves

xml.sp: Sora So, what's your name?
???? Elsa... Queen Elsa of Arendelle.

cutscene.desc: They appear surprised

xml.sp: Sora What? The queen?!

cutscene.desc: They stand at attention

xml.sp: Elsa You shouldn't be out here. Please go back to the village.

cutscene.desc: She turns away from them and begins walking

xml.sp: Sora Why? Your Majesty, you look like you could use a friend. Don't you want to talk?

cutscene.desc: She grapples with the anguish on her face

xml.sp: Elsa respectfully Please leave. I need to be alone. I don't want to hurt anyone.

cutscene.desc: At a certain distance, she stops

xml.sp: Sora Oh... Is it that bad? You must've been through a lot.
Donald We know what that's like, don't we?
Goofy Sure, adventuring's fun, but it definitely has its ups and downs. When the going gets tough, us friends have to stick together!
Sora Exactly! Although, Donald, you DO lose your temper a lot, so...I can relate to wanting some alone time.
Donald What? I don't do that!
Elsa Enough!

cutscene.desc: Frustrated, Elsa whirls around, her hand glowing as a multitude of spikes emerge from the ground between them. Terror returns to her face at this outburst, her second of this unfortunate night

xml.sp: Sora Elsa... Did you...

cutscene.desc: Heartless appear behind her and she gasps

xml.sp: Goofy The Heartless!

cutscene.desc: She backs away from them as Sora rushes forward with his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora Don't worry. We got 'em. Take cover!

cutscene.desc: She runs safely back as they take on the horde of snow-faring Heartless. As Sora deals the final blow to the Rock Troll, Elsa approaches them

xml.sp: Sora Elsa, are you okay?
Elsa I...I'm sorry I was so upset. Thank you for your help.

cutscene.desc: A Winterhorn Heartless drops down from above and leaps at the group

xml.sp: Elsa Look out!

cutscene.desc: Elsa holds up her hands, shooting a beam of ice at the Heartless, taking it out

xml.sp: Sora That's amazing. You can control ice.

cutscene.desc: She holds her one bare hand with her blue-gloved hand

xml.sp: Elsa Control it? No, all I ever do...is hurt people.
Goofy It's okay. Those were just the Heartless.
Elsa You said that word before. What are they?
Sora Monsters that are after people's hearts. Wherever they go, there's trouble.
Elsa They're after people's hearts?
Sora Yes, they're dangerous! You should head home before it gets any worse.
Elsa This is my home now. I can't go back.

cutscene.desc: She looks down at her hand

xml.sp: Elsa I don't want to hurt anyone.
Sora What?
Elsa Arendelle is safer with me staying up here.

cutscene.desc: She walks away from them

xml.sp: Sora Not safer for you!

cutscene.desc: He tries to follow her but a large ice wall appears to block him. Elsa looks back at the wall and then breaks into a run

xml.sp: Elsa Please, go away!

cutscene.desc: Sora places his hands against the wall of ice

xml.sp: Sora Elsa...
Goofy Aw, don't worry, she'll be okay. Seems like she's pretty strong.
Donald You gotta let her go. She wants to be alone.
Sora Yeah, I hear you...but I just wanted to know why she was so sad.
??????? And how is it any of your business? Read the room, kiddo.

cutscene.desc: They turn around to see a woman in a black coat with blonde hair and yellow eyes

xml.sp: Sora Who are you? That's...the Organization coat. You new?

cutscene.desc: She raises an eyebrow in annoyance

xml.sp: ??????? Excuse me? Oh yeah, you forgot. The name's Larxene. This time, remember. And we'll take care of Elsa, so don't you worry.

cutscene.desc: He looks her over and turns to Donald

xml.sp: Sora Do you--
Donald Nope.
Goofy Well, she seems to think she knows us, so maybe we should play along.
Sora Not unless her name's Terra.
Larxene Excuse me! I'm right here?

cutscene.desc: They turn their attention back to Larxene

xml.sp: Sora Why are you after Elsa?
Larxene No one's gonna hurt her? But we're not about to put up with YOUR meddling. Stay here and behave yourselves.

cutscene.desc: She holds out her hand, electricity crackling as a set of ice crystals float around her fingers. She sends out a bolt of lightning at the ice wall, which shatters. She raises her arm. The remnants of the ice wall, glowing blue from the lightning coursing through it, start to rise into the air, spinning into a vortex of frozen electricity. The whirlwind stops, and boulders of ice shoot into the ground around the trio

xml.sp: Sora Wait. The ice!
Goofy It's going to wall us in!
Larxene Ice is so not my style.
Sora Larxene!

cutscene.desc: He runs towards her, but is stopped by a final boulder on the pile of frozen blocks. Inside, they inspect their surroundings

xml.sp: Goofy Anybody see a way out?
Donald No, not me.
Sora Well, we can't stay in here.
Goofy Elsa's in REAL trouble now.
Sora Yeah. Larxene promised not to hurt her, but I trust those guys as far as I can throw 'em.
Donald nodding They've gotta be up to no good!
Sora Clearly!

cutscene.desc: They begin to explore the Labyrinth of Ice

xml.sp: Donald Start looking.
Goofy Yeah, we'll freeze if we don't find a way out.

cutscene.desc: They traverse the unsettling landscape, fighting both Heartless and Nobodies alike, discovering a room with a peculiar pillar

xml.sp: Donald There's something funny about that pillar.

cutscene.desc: Sora spins around the pillar and the room starts to shift

xml.sp: Donald It's moving!

cutscene.desc: The room spins, opening a passageway

xml.sp: Goofy Hey, look! We can get through now!

cutscene.desc: They reach the Lower Tier of the labyrinth and find another room with pillars

xml.sp: Donald More pillars!
Goofy That spin trick you did should work again.

cutscene.desc: Sora rotates the pillars, causing the shelf above to slide over, revealing a new passageway leading to a vertical shaft

xml.sp: Donald Sora, you can climb this!
Goofy There might be something up there.

cutscene.desc: Sora ascends the shaft and reaches the other side of the Middle Tier. They continue through the Labyrinth of Ice eliminating Heartless and Nobodies and rotating pillars to unbar the way. The final pillar unlocks an elevator that takes them to the Upper Tier, revealing the shape of the maze to be a snowflake

xml.sp: Sora Well, that seemed to lock everything into place.
Donald That better be the end of it.

cutscene.desc: They reach the center of the maze, where a portal sits in waiting

xml.sp: Goofy This must be the exit.
Donald About time.

cutscene.desc: They rush through the portal back out to the Gorge and look around for Elsa

xml.sp: Sora See her?
Goofy I think she mighta gone up in that direction.

cutscene.desc: He points further up the mountain

xml.sp: Donald Yep.
Sora Okay, c'mon!

cutscene.desc: They reach another cliffside

xml.sp: Donald More CLIMBING?
Goofy Yep. And tough climbing, too.
Sora We can do it. C'mon!

cutscene.desc: They ascend to the Mountain Ridge, where a strong icy wind pelts them with snow

xml.sp: Elsa singing The snow glows white on the mountain tonight, not a footprint to be seen. A kingdom of isolation, and it looks like I'm the queen. The wind is howling like this swirling storm inside. Couldn't keep it in, heaven knows I've tried.

cutscene.desc: They stop, hearing a voice

xml.sp: Sora What?
Elsa singing Don't let them in. Don't let them see.
Sora That's Elsa's voice!

cutscene.desc: They start running up the mountain

xml.sp: Elsa singing Be the good girl you always have to be. Conceal, don't feel. Don't let them know. Well, now they know.

cutscene.desc: Atop the mountain, Elsa releases her glove

xml.sp: Elsa singing Let it go! Let it go!

cutscene.desc: She conjures snowflakes from her fingers

xml.sp: Elsa singing Can't hold it back anymore.

cutscene.desc: With a spiral of wind, she creates a snowman

xml.sp: Elsa singing Let it go! Let it go! Turn away and slam the door.

cutscene.desc: She sends up sparks of magical ice that fall down like rain at her command

xml.sp: Elsa singing I don't care what they're going to say. Let the storm rage on.

cutscene.desc: She grabs the clasp on her cape...

xml.sp: Elsa singing The cold never bothered me anyway.

cutscene.desc: ...and lets it fly. It passes over the three of them

xml.sp: Sora This way!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs ahead, and they follow

xml.sp: Elsa singing It's funny how some distance makes everything seem small.

cutscene.desc: She looks out over the mountain

xml.sp: Elsa singing And the fears that once controlled me can't get to me at all.

cutscene.desc: She started running up the mountain, elated

xml.sp: Elsa singing It's time to see what I can do, to test the limits and break through.

cutscene.desc: She pushes her hands forward, creating a jagged set of stairs

xml.sp: Elsa singing No right, no wrong, no rules for me. I'm free!

cutscene.desc: She takes one step on the stairs, turning the jagged ice crystals into a surface smooth as glass

xml.sp: Elsa singing Let it go! Let it go!

cutscene.desc: She runs up the staircase, extending it as she goes, just as Sora and company catch up

xml.sp: Elsa singing I am one with the wind and sky.
Sora Look at that!
Elsa singing Let it go! Let it go!

cutscene.desc: She reaches the top with a flurry of magic

xml.sp: Elsa singing You'll never see me cry.

cutscene.desc: She rushes forward and slams her shoe into the ground, creating a large snowflake-shaped platform

xml.sp: Elsa singing Here I stand and here I'll stay.

cutscene.desc: The dendrites grow freely, creating a continuously intricate snowflake

xml.sp: Elsa singing Let the storm rage on.

cutscene.desc: She bites her lip, raising her arms, lifting the platform with pillars of ice, creating large towers against the mountainside. Sora, Donald and Goofy stare in amazement

xml.sp: Elsa singing My power flurries through the air into the ground.

cutscene.desc: She adds decoration to the walls and floor

xml.sp: Elsa singing My soul is spiraling in frozen fractals all around.

cutscene.desc: The magic traces up the walls, adding detail to the archways, reaching up to form a ceiling

xml.sp: Elsa singing And one thought crystallizes like an icy blast.

cutscene.desc: A chandelier bursts from the ceiling, growing down like a multi-pointed stalactite

xml.sp: Elsa singing I'm never going back. The past is in the past.

cutscene.desc: She removes her crown and tosses it away

xml.sp: Elsa singing Let it go! Let it go!

cutscene.desc: She unties her hair, letting her long braid trail down over her shoulder

xml.sp: Elsa singing And I'll rise like the break of dawn.

cutscene.desc: Magic trails along her dress

xml.sp: Elsa singing Let it go! Let it go!

cutscene.desc: Her dress changes to a sparkling gown of light blue with a long train

xml.sp: Elsa singing That perfect girl is gone.

cutscene.desc: Her reflection shining on the smooth floor, she walks forward confidently

xml.sp: Elsa singing Here I stand in the light of day.

cutscene.desc: She walks out onto the balcony as the sun rises into a pink sky, glittering every tiny facet of her gown

xml.sp: Elsa singing Let the storm rage on!

cutscene.desc: She raises her arms, finally free

xml.sp: Elsa singing The cold never bothered me anyway.

cutscene.desc: She spins around, whipping the train in front of her as the doors slam behind. Sora, Donald and Goofy stand at the base of her Ice Palace

xml.sp: Sora Wow. I don't know what we just saw but...wow. That...was Elsa?
Donald She looked different.
Goofy And a lot happier, too.
Sora Let's say hi.

cutscene.desc: They walk closer and a corridor of darkness appears, revealing Larxene's smirking face

xml.sp: Larxene PLEASE don't tell me that you're spying on her now.
Sora Larxene!

cutscene.desc: The react defensively, but quickly Sora relaxes

xml.sp: Sora Don't turn this around on us. YOU'RE following her.

Larxene Ooh. Look at YOU get all sassy. Okay, I'll admit Elsa is a person of interest to us. Maybe she's one of the seven pure lights we need--the New Seven Hearts. Gotta make sure though. Fortunately, we're in the best position to tell. Can't pick out that special glimmer...unless you're standing in the shadows.

cutscene.desc: She looks up at the palace

xml.sp: Larxene And maybe...Elsa DOESN'T have it. I mean, just look how icy her palace is--made of magic she forced herself to keep hidden until now. What if it's dark magic?
Sora Elsa would never rely on the darkness!

Larxene Actually, it's still too early to call. Depends on how SHE sees it. If she believes her magic is darkness, that's what it will become. Accepting her power, whatever it is, is the only way she can set her heart free. So what will Elsa accept? Light or darkness? I know I wanna know!

cutscene.desc: She smiles snidely

xml.sp: Sora Well, good for you, but guess what? I won't let her fall to darkness!
Larxene It's her choice to make, not yours. You know, I'm starting to understand why she gave you the cold shoulder.

cutscene.desc: She combines ice and lightning again to create a blasting wind. Electricity crackles along the ground as they struggle against it

xml.sp: Sora Larxene!
Larxene You wanna help her? Then stop trying to be her hero! Let her figure things out her own way!

cutscene.desc: Bolts of lightning burst from her fingertips, forcing the three of them to lose their grip on the snow and fly off down the mountain. Recovering from the fall, Sora gets to his knees seeing Donald and Goofy buried in the snow

xml.sp: Sora Donald! Goofy! Are you okay?

cutscene.desc: Donald stands on his feet, pulling against the heavy pile of snow covering his head. He breaks out of the snow, bouncing back from an overabundance of force, a light dusting of snow on his hat and bill. He shakes himself off, his eyes wobbling from dizziness

xml.sp: Donald Phew. I'm okay...

cutscene.desc: Goofy signals with his arms from beneath the snow

xml.sp: Goofy All good!

cutscene.desc: They fish Goofy out of the ground

xml.sp: Sora I think we should probably go check on Elsa.
Goofy And make sure Larxene was wrong about her magic.
Sora Yeah.
Donald But don't you tell her what Larxene said.

cutscene.desc: He wags a finger at Sora

xml.sp: Sora Huh? Why not?
Goofy Well, to keep the order.
Donald Yeah. Order.
Sora Oh... Okay.

cutscene.desc: They start to walk, when Goofy's ear perks up

xml.sp: Goofy Wait, fellas. Do ya hear that?

cutscene.desc: They stop and listen

xml.sp: Donald Look!

cutscene.desc: An enormous avalanche tumbles down the mountain toward them, encasing tree and rock alike

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy Avalaaaaaanche!

cutscene.desc: Goofy summons his shield

xml.sp: Goofy Quick, climb aboard!
Sora Right!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Sora jump aboard the shield and Goofy gets it going, just as the snow reaches them

xml.sp: Goofy Here we go!

cutscene.desc: Goofy jumps on and they start careening down the mountain. From within the avalanche, three Frost Serpent Heartless appear. Their wings spin effortlessly through the snow as they leer their prey with glowing yellow eyes

xml.sp: Goofy It's closin' in!
Sora I got this!

cutscene.desc: One of the Frost Serpents swims through the snow after them as another takes off into the air

xml.sp: Goofy Incoming! Watch out!

cutscene.desc: The flying Heartless aims an ice beam at them, but they jump to dodge the attack

xml.sp: Donald Dodge it!

cutscene.desc: Soon all three Frost Serpents fly in the air, shooting identical beams

xml.sp: Donald It's right behind us!

cutscene.desc: The blasting wind brings a chill over Sora as they eventually careen over the mountain edge, spilling from the shield. Further down, the shield lands on the snow and they lose their pursuers. Donald and Goofy land back on the shield, sledding down the mountain as Sora flips over in the air and joins them. Reaching the Snowfield, the three Frost Serpents burst from the ground as the shield comes to a stop

xml.sp: Sora Look who's back!

cutscene.desc: After a tricky battle against air and ice, Sora, Donald and Goofy emerge victorious

xml.sp: Donald Phew...

cutscene.desc: A shadow passes over them, catching their attention. They look skyward, seeing more Frost Serpents fly into the snow of the mountain, causing a second avalanche. The trio attempts to escape, but the snow overtakes them too quickly spilling them over the edge. Later, they hear a voice in their unconscious stupor

xml.sp: ???? Wow! Look at all the pretty colors. There's blue, and green--ooh, I love green! And look, black.

cutscene.desc: Sora feels a tug

xml.sp: ???? Just like my buttons. Hmm?

cutscene.desc: Sora wakes up with a snowball stuck in his spiky hair. In his woozy state, he thinks he sees a talking, walking snowman. Well, less walking, more hopping. The snowman hops over to Sora, just inches from his face

xml.sp: ???? Silly spiky grass. Give me back my foot.

cutscene.desc: He pulls the snowball from Sora's hair and reattaches it to his body with his twig-like arms. He waddles off between the trees

xml.sp: Sora Was that...a snowman?

cutscene.desc: Sora stands up slowly, the snow falling from his jacket. He looks ahead, but sees no one

xml.sp: Sora Huh? Uh...did you see that snowman?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy recover from the endeavor

xml.sp: Goofy Snowman?
Sora Yeah. And here's the funny thing: he was walking and talking.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy exchange glances

xml.sp: Donald Everybody knows snowmen can't walk. You must've imagined it.
Sora Huh... I thought he was real.
Goofy Well, maybe we'll see him again. But if we don't get goin', we'll never reach Elsa's palace.
Sora Oh, right! I almost forgot! C'mon!

cutscene.desc: They enter the Valley of Ice, surrounded by trees with large frozen droplets lining their branches. Soon, they see two people walking with a reindeer and a...

xml.sp: ???? giggling I can't wait to meet Elsa. I bet she's the nicest, warmest, best person ever.

cutscene.desc: ...snowman!

xml.sp: Donald Wow!
Sora See? I told you! A walking, talking snowman.

cutscene.desc: Sora laughs

xml.sp: Goofy Well, whaddaya know? You were right!
Sora I wanna look!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs up to the snowman

xml.sp: Sora Wow! You really ARE alive! What's making you walk?

cutscene.desc: He reaches out to touch the snowman, but he inches backwards. The commotion causes the other three strangers to turn around

xml.sp: ???? Um, well, I guess...my feet.

cutscene.desc: The three walk over to them and the girl speaks up

xml.sp: ???? Hello. Olaf, are these your friends?
Olaf Nope! Never met 'em. Don't know anyone blue, green, or who's oddly spiky.
Sora Spiky? My hair?

cutscene.desc: Olaf giggles

xml.sp: Sora Wait, why don't I get a color too? My name is Sora.
Donald And I'm Donald Duck!
Olaf Oh.
Goofy And I'd be Goofy the Green!
???? I'm Anna.

cutscene.desc: She addresses the man as he gives her a skeptical look

xml.sp: Anna And I know they're strangers, but...they seem pretty nice to me.

cutscene.desc: The man sighs

xml.sp: ???????? I'm Kristoff, and this is Sven.

cutscene.desc: He motions toward the reindeer who nods

xml.sp: Goofy Nice to meet ya.
Sora So, where are you guys all headed?
Kristoff We're going to try and put an end to this crazy winter.
Anna And to do that, we need to find my sister, Elsa.
Sora Elsa's...your sister?
Goofy What a coincidence. We're going to see her too.

cutscene.desc: She gasps

xml.sp: Anna You know Elsa?
Sora Yeah, we ran into her up the mountain. Um... Do you mind telling us what's going on around here? We're worried. We think your sister might be in some trouble.
Anna Trouble? Are you sure?

cutscene.desc: She looks into his eyes

xml.sp: Anna All right. I know we just met, but...Sora, was it? I get the feeling that you're someone to trust.
Kristoff I'm right there with ya.
Anna I just hope you like long stories.
Sora Sure.
Kristoff Ya know, I should go find some moss for Sven. He's looking a little hungry. C'mon, Sven.

cutscene.desc: Kristoff and Sven start to leave

xml.sp: Olaf Hey, w-w-w-wait, what's going on? Tell me. Is something happening?

cutscene.desc: Kristoff bends down to pick up the snowman

xml.sp: Kristoff C'mon, Olaf. You're with me.
Olaf Sure, Sven. Reindeer Sven too?
Kristoff The reindeer IS Sven.
Olaf Oh, how fun!

cutscene.desc: Olaf giggles as they leave. Anna and Sora sit on a nearby rock

xml.sp: Anna When we were little, my sister and I used to be really close.

cutscene.desc: Over a decade ago in Arendelle, Anna skips through the halls of the palace as Elsa enters her bedroom door. Anna tries to get to her but Elsa closes the door

xml.sp: Anna But then, one day, for some reason, Elsa just shut me out.

cutscene.desc: Later that same year, Anna notices the snow falling outside the window and rushes to Elsa's closed door, knocking

xml.sp: Young Anna singing Do you wanna build a snowman? Come on, let's go and play. I never see you anymore. Come out the door. It's like you've gone away.
Anna Years passed and we barely ever saw each other. Then, finally, it was time for her coronation.
Young Anna singing We used to be best buddies and now we're not. I wish you would tell me why.
Anna Let's just say I was more than a little excited. I thought we'd finally have a chance to talk.

cutscene.desc: Young Anna peers through the keyhole of Elsa's door, then sings into it

xml.sp: Young Anna singing Do you wanna build a snowman? It doesn't have to be a snowman.
Anna But at the party, I did something that made her mad. We got into an argument, and I lost my temper.
Young Elsa Go away, Anna.
Anna I was just so frustrated!
Young Anna singing Okay, bye...

cutscene.desc: Young Anna sadly leaves

xml.sp: Anna And then, well...that's when she used her magic to push me away. It was all my fault.

cutscene.desc: The flashback ends

xml.sp: Anna singing Please, I know you're in there. People are asking where you've been. They say, have courage and I'm trying to. I'm right out here for you. Just let me in. We only have each other. It's just you and me. What are we gonna do? Do you wanna build a snowman?

cutscene.desc: She stops, sadly

xml.sp: Anna I shouldn't have upset her the way I did. Elsa ran away because she was frightened. I have to bring her home.
Sora I'm sure she knows how much you love her.

cutscene.desc: He remembers the look on Elsa's face when she was fleeing across the fjord

xml.sp: Sora thinking And I think...maybe that's why she looked so sad.

cutscene.desc: He remembers Riku's sacrifice at the door to darkness and his journey after Sora woke from his year-long sleep

xml.sp: Sora thinking It's just like when Riku disappeared. He thought he had to push me away, to protect me. Maybe Elsa's the same. (to Anna) If anyone can help her, it's you.
Anna Huh?

cutscene.desc: He smiles at her

xml.sp: Anna Thanks.
Kristoff Hey, guys! I need some help!

cutscene.desc: Kristoff runs toward them

xml.sp: Sora What's the problem?
Kristoff This.

cutscene.desc: He holds up a stick

xml.sp: Donald A stick problem?
Kristoff It's not a stick. Well, it IS a stick, but it--

cutscene.desc: He bends it and it straightens back up

xml.sp: Kristoff It's Olaf's arm. (sigh) He's fallen apart again.
Sora, Donald & Goofy Fallen apart?!
Donald Uh, how come you're not upset?
Anna Oh, it's no big deal. He's a snowman. We'll just...put him back together.
Sora Really?!
Donald You can do that?
Goofy I gotta see this! A-hyuck!
Kristoff The pieces can't be too far from here. Could you guys help us look for 'em?
Sora 'Course!

cutscene.desc: They start to search for Olaf

xml.sp: Goofy It is kinda hard to spot him in all this snow.
Donald Everything looks like Olaf.
Goofy He can't have gone TOO far.
Olaf Heeey! I'm over this way!
Sora Huh?
Donald I heard it too.
Goofy Yep, that's Olaf's voice.
Olaf Would I call this cozy or snug? Mmm, I'm gonna go with snug.

cutscene.desc: Sora finds an oversized snowball

xml.sp: Olaf I can hear you! You're getting closer!
Donald His voice is getting louder.

cutscene.desc: Sora jumps aboard the snowball, riding along until it crashes into a rock and bursts open, revealing Olaf's head

xml.sp: Olaf Hi, Sora!
Sora Hey, Olaf. There you are!
Olaf I was starting to think nobody'd ever come along and find me.

cutscene.desc: Sora picks up Olaf's head

xml.sp: Sora Well, I'm glad we did.

cutscene.desc: They continue searching for the rest of Olaf

xml.sp: Sora Are these trees made of ice?
Goofy Maybe. Look at the little snow-blossoms growing on 'em.

cutscene.desc: They find a frozen waterfall

xml.sp: Goofy Why don't we look up above the waterfall?

cutscene.desc: They climb the water fall and find an oddly-shaped snowball with a black rock in it

xml.sp: Sora This...MIGHT be Olaf?
Donald Might be...
Goofy There's only one way to find out.

cutscene.desc: They keep looking

xml.sp: Goofy I think I mighta seen Olaf's legs leggin' it.
Donald Where did he go?

cutscene.desc: They return to the frozen pond in the center of the valley

xml.sp: Donald Look! Legs!

cutscene.desc: The small set of Olaf's legs turn tail and run away on the ice. Sora dashes forward and grabs them, its feet wiggling in the air

xml.sp: Sora I caught them!
Donald Yay!
Goofy Great job, Sora!
Sora Think that's all of him?
Donald Yup!
Goofy Anna'll know what to do next.

cutscene.desc: They put Olaf together, but something is wrong

xml.sp: Olaf Wait, why does everybody look all wobbly?
Anna It's not us, Olaf. You're about to tip over!
Olaf Huh? Wha-- Oh no.

cutscene.desc: Olaf's head falls off the oddly-shaped snowball

xml.sp: Donald Aww...
Sora Yeah, I kinda figured that was wrong.

cutscene.desc: Just past the waterfall, they find a hugely-oversized snowball with a large black rock embedded in it

xml.sp: Sora Is THIS him?
Goofy Well, it's the right shape...
Donald But it's huge.

cutscene.desc: They put Olaf together a second time, but something is definitely wrong

xml.sp: Olaf Anna, question... When did you get so small and tiny?
Anna Um, actually, Olaf, it's more that you're really big now.
Olaf You're right! What a great view!
Goofy Hmm... I think we did it wrong.
Olaf Aw, but I like being tall.
Sora Keep looking...

cutscene.desc: On the other side of the waterfall, they slide down the slippery hill and find a small nook, where they find a tiny snowball with a single button of coal

xml.sp: Sora Hey, this is Olaf's body.
Donald It is!
Goofy Button and all!

cutscene.desc: They return to the group and Anna puts Olaf back together

xml.sp: Anna And that should...do it.

cutscene.desc: Olaf's body is correct, but strangely less colorful

xml.sp: Goofy You sure something's not missin'?
Kristoff Nah. Looks right.
Olaf Wow, I feel so much better.

cutscene.desc: He touches his face

xml.sp: Olaf Wait! Where's my cute new nose! The one Anna gave me!
Anna Uh, Sora... Do YOU have his nose?
Sora I don't think so.
Donald Nope, didn't see it.

cutscene.desc: Olaf gasps sadly and Kristoff eyes Sven, sighing. He leans down to him sternly

xml.sp: Kristoff Sven...

cutscene.desc: The reindeer smiles coyly and Kristoff opens his mouth, commanding. Sven obliges, revealing the carrot on his tongue. Kristoff grabs the carrot, pursing his lips, and shrugs at a disapproving Anna

sp.speaker: Kristoff as Sven
sp.q: Someone had to pick it up!

cutscene.desc: Sven smirks

xml.sp: Kristoff You're right, buddy. Thanks for finding it...and not actually eating it. (as Sven) Aw, you're welcome.

cutscene.desc: They return Olaf's nose

xml.sp: Olaf My nose, it's back! Oh, I love having a nose!
Sora Hey, Kristoff, how'd all this happen, anyway?
Kristoff You know, I'm not sure. These weird animals--well, they were more like monsters--they just crashed into Olaf.
Goofy I knew it.
Donald The Heartless again!
Sora Yeah.
Kristoff The Heart-less? Hmm... And I thought the wolves around here were bad.
Anna Kristoff, look!

cutscene.desc: A group of Heartless appear over the pond

xml.sp: Kristoff They're back!

cutscene.desc: Olaf waves his arms frantically

xml.sp: Olaf No... I've already fallen apart today.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy summon their weapons

xml.sp: Sora We know how to handle them! Anna, Kristoff, keep going!
Kristoff Okay!
Anna Wait? What?

cutscene.desc: Kristoff leads her away from the battle. The three adventurers defeat the horde of Winterhorns, Flutterings, and Satyrs

xml.sp: Sora We better catch up!
Donald & Goofy Yeah!

cutscene.desc: They travel out of the Valley of Ice to the Frozen Wall, where an icy wind starts to pick up

xml.sp: Donald shivering I'm getting cold.
Sora Just keep moving. You'll warm up!
Goofy Gee, nothin' ever gets you down, huh, Sora?

cutscene.desc: Sora rides on a snowball and takes out a few Heartless

xml.sp: Sora All right! I love snow!
Donald So much for islander Sora.

cutscene.desc: They continue up the mountain reaching the Mountain Ridge from the other side, where snowdrifts containing horizontal icicles stick out dangerously in their path

xml.sp: Sora We're back! Finally.
Donald That palace is incredible!
Goofy Yeah. I wonder if Anna and the others made it there yet.

cutscene.desc: At Elsa's Ice Palace, Anna speaks to her sister, pleading for her to return to Arendelle

xml.sp: Anna You kind of set off an eternal winter...everywhere.
Elsa concerned Everywhere?
Anna Well, it's okay. You can just unfreeze it.
Elsa No, I can't. I don't know how.
Anna Sure you can. I know you can.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy approach the base of the staircase leading to the palace, where Sven has stuck his tongue to the banister. The reindeer attempts to pull it away with not much luck

xml.sp: Sora Anna and the others must've gone inside.

cutscene.desc: Inside the palace, a great wind swirls as Elsa's conflicting emotions get the better of her. Anna shields her eyes at the stinging snow, but stands unrelenting to help her sister

xml.sp: Elsa screaming I CAN'T!

cutscene.desc: A giant burst of power erupts from the queen, striking Anna in the heart, causing her to lose her balance. Elsa whirls around, terrified at the sight of what she had just done. Outside, Sora feels a pain in his heart and winces, catching the attention of Donald and Goofy

xml.sp: Donald Sora?
Goofy Are ya hurt?
Sora No, I'm fine. But...I think something terrible must have happened.

cutscene.desc: He looks back up to the palace, and the others follow his gaze

xml.sp: Sora I hope our friends are okay.

cutscene.desc: The doors slam open and a giant snow monster appears in the doorway

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy What?

cutscene.desc: The monster walks out with Olaf, Anna, Kristoff in his clutches

xml.sp: Anna Stop! Put us down!

cutscene.desc: Anna beats against the monster's icy fingers

xml.sp: Marshmallow Go away!

cutscene.desc: The monster tosses Anna and Kristoff, who take a bumpy slide down the stairs, past the trio

xml.sp: Olaf Heads up!

cutscene.desc: Olaf's head flies into the snow-covered rock behind Anna and Kristoff

xml.sp: Olaf Watch out for my butt!

cutscene.desc: Anna and Kristoff duck as Olaf's middle and legs fly in as well

xml.sp: Anna yelling Hey! It is not nice to throw people!

cutscene.desc: She gathers a snowball in an attempt to toss it at Marshmallow, but Kristoff stops her

xml.sp: Kristoff Whoa-whoa-whoa, feisty-pants.

cutscene.desc: He grabs her

xml.sp: Anna Let me go!
Kristoff Okay, relax. Just calm down. Calm down.
Anna Okay! All right! I'm okay.
Kristoff Just let the snowman be.

cutscene.desc: He lets go of her

xml.sp: Anna I'm calm.
Kristoff Great.

cutscene.desc: She tosses the snowball less than calmly

xml.sp: Kristoff Huh? Oh, come on!

cutscene.desc: It hits Marshmallow in the shoulder (barely a scratch and he roars at them, his eyes glowing and spikes protruding from his legs and arms)

xml.sp: Kristoff Aw, see? Now you made him mad.
Olaf I'll distract him. You guys go!

cutscene.desc: He waves them off and they run, while Olaf's torso and legs do the same

xml.sp: Olaf No, no. Not you guys!

cutscene.desc: His face falls off the rock and into the snow

xml.sp: Olaf muffled This just got a whole lot harder.

cutscene.desc: Sora jumps in front

xml.sp: Sora We can buy you some time!

cutscene.desc: Marshmallow stomps over to them and roars in their faces, spraying icy breath, causing the three to run away. Olaf's body comes out from hiding and rejoins with his head

xml.sp: Olaf Wait for me!

cutscene.desc: Marshmallow pursues Donald and Sora, who looks around

xml.sp: Sora Huh? Where's Goofy?

cutscene.desc: He spots him at a tree that's bent over from the heavy snow

xml.sp: Goofy calling Hey, Sora! I got an idea!
Donald Goofy, what are you doing?
Sora Oh! That's perfect!

cutscene.desc: Sora leads Marshmallow in the direction of the tree

xml.sp: Donald Huh? Hey!

cutscene.desc: Goofy rubs his hands together and grabs onto the tree, lifting it up just as Sora latches onto him. They pull back the snow-laden tree as Marshmallow approaches

xml.sp: Sora Get ready... Okay, now!

cutscene.desc: They release the tree and it snaps back into Marshmallow's face, knocking him over. Sora and Goofy get up and high-five

xml.sp: Sora Oh, yeah!

cutscene.desc: Donald reaches them and summons his wand

xml.sp: Donald He's not done...

cutscene.desc: Marshmallow gets up and Sora and Goofy join Donald

xml.sp: Sora Bring it, snowball!

cutscene.desc: They take on the snow monster at the end of the ridge. He roars, hundreds of spikes emerging across his body, and tries to claw at the three of them. He corners them at the edge of the mountain and slams his fist into the ground

xml.sp: Sora Wh...what?

cutscene.desc: The outcropping shatters and they tumble down the cliff once again. At the bottom, they rest before getting back up again

xml.sp: Sora Good thing snow's so soft. We could do this a HUNDRED times.

cutscene.desc: Donald stands up

xml.sp: Donald No! Let's not.
Goofy A-hyuck! Ya sure you don't wanna go again?
Sora Nooo thank youuu!

cutscene.desc: Sora stands

xml.sp: Sora Do you think everybody else made it?
Goofy I don't think the snow monster got 'em.
Donald They probably went back to the palace.
Sora Makes sense. For us, too. We still need to talk to Elsa.
Goofy Second time's the charm!
Sora Yeah, back to the ice palace.

cutscene.desc: As they return to the Snowfield once again, they see an auburn-haired man carrying Elsa over his shoulder. He is tall and well dressed, a sword attached to his hip

xml.sp: Sora Hey...that's Elsa. But who's that guy?
Goofy It could be somebody from Arendelle who came up here to help her.

cutscene.desc: Sora looks closer

xml.sp: Sora Don't think so. That doesn't look like help to me.

cutscene.desc: Donald takes a careful look

xml.sp: Donald Oh no!

cutscene.desc: A dark aura eminates from the man's body

xml.sp: Goofy Darkness?
Sora Let's move!

cutscene.desc: They lose sight of the man and find a pile of fallen down trees. Suddenly, the snow monster bursts from behind the trees and stomps out, growling and struggling to walk on his leg

xml.sp: Sora Him again?!

cutscene.desc: They run over and summon their weapons, preparing for a rematch

xml.sp: Sora Hey! You'd better not have hurt our friends!

cutscene.desc: The monster walks past them with barely a glance

xml.sp: Sora Huh?
Marshmallow Elsaaa!

cutscene.desc: They put their weapons away and run after him

xml.sp: Sora Hey, wait up! Are you...looking for Elsa, too?

cutscene.desc: They run alongside his giant strides, but he stops and glares at them

xml.sp: Sora Whoa! Eeeasy! Do you wanna save her from the bad guy? We're on the same side.

cutscene.desc: The monster settles down

xml.sp: Marshmallow Elsa...
Goofy I guess all he ever wanted to do was keep Elsa safe.
Sora Hey. We should team up, big guy.
Donald Team up?!
Sora C'mon. We wanna help her, too. Why not?

cutscene.desc: Marshmallow watches them talk

xml.sp: Sora So, whaddaya say?

cutscene.desc: Marshmallow nods and Sora walks closer

xml.sp: Donald Sora!
Goofy to Donald One great thing about Sora--he can always make friends with anybody.

cutscene.desc: Donald crosses his arms

xml.sp: Donald Yippee...
Sora Donald! Goofy! C'mon.
Donald & Goofy Wait for us!

cutscene.desc: They catch up and continue through the Snowfield. As they get nearer to Arendelle, they hear a voice up ahead

xml.sp: Kristoff Stop it. Put me down!
Sora That's Kristoff.

cutscene.desc: He turns to Marshmallow

xml.sp: Sora Do me a favor and wait here. If you come alone, Kristoff might freak out.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy run ahead, where Sven tosses Kristoff to the ground

xml.sp: Kristoff standing up No, Sven! We're not going back. She's with her true love.
Sora Kristoff!

cutscene.desc: He sees them run in

xml.sp: Kristoff Sora.
Sora You all right?
Kristoff Yeah, I'm fine. I'm glad you guys are safe.

cutscene.desc: Donald sees they're alone

xml.sp: Donald Hey!
Sora Where'd Anna go?

cutscene.desc: Kristoff sighs

xml.sp: Kristoff She's back at home.
Sora Something happen?

cutscene.desc: Sven gives a sad whine

xml.sp: Kristoff Anna was struck in the heart by Elsa's ice magic. If the ice isn't removed, she'll freeze forever. Only an act of true love can thaw a frozen heart. So I took her back to Arendelle and her true love, Hans.
Sora But...what about you?
Kristoff What ABOUT me?
Sora awkwardly Uh, I sorta assumed you guys were...
Kristoff Nooo! I just keep her from getting lost.
Sora Really? Oh, but you seem so...
Goofy Perfect together!
Donald Yeah, like me and Daisy!

cutscene.desc: Kristoff shrugs, his shoulders slumped, and the wind picks up

xml.sp: Kristoff What?

cutscene.desc: They look down to the castle town, where a swirl of storm clouds have gathered

xml.sp: Kristoff Anna.

cutscene.desc: He runs off toward town with Sven in tow. The ground shakes and Marshmallow catches up to the three of them. He points toward the town

xml.sp: Marshmallow Elsa...
Sora Is that where Elsa is?

cutscene.desc: Marshmallow lets out a cascading roar

xml.sp: Sora Elsa and Anna might both need our help. Let's go!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod to each other and follow Sora into a run. They travel through the Foothills as the wind bares down upon them

xml.sp: Sora Storm's getting worse.
Donald I'm freezing...
Goofy Yeah, and the wind's just makin' it colder!
Donald We got to get out of this storm!
Goofy There must be some place we can use as shelter.

cutscene.desc: Walking through the Foothills, they take cover behind rocks between the massive gusts of icy wind as Marshmallow braves the storm ahead of them. They catch up and stay behind the huge snow monster

xml.sp: Goofy Look! He's protectin' us from the storm!
Donald We can make it!

cutscene.desc: As they near town, the wind calms slightly

xml.sp: Sora Okay, guys. The storm's died down.

cutscene.desc: The swirling clouds pelt Arendelle with snow

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, I hope Anna and Elsa are okay.
Sora Hurry!

cutscene.desc: They run on ahead, where, like the fjord, the storm has frozen solid. Snow particles dangle in place in the still air. Anna walks along the ice, her hair now completely turned white. She is alone, shivering from head to toe. She sees Kristoff in the distance

xml.sp: Anna Kristoff?

cutscene.desc: He sees her

xml.sp: Kristoff Anna!

cutscene.desc: He runs her way as she hobbles in his direction. Anna hears the sound of a sword unsheathing and turns to see Hans with his weapon out stepping slowly toward the back of Elsa, who is on her knees

xml.sp: Anna Elsa?

cutscene.desc: She sees Kristoff running towards her...and makes her decision. She turns away from Kristoff, who stops, just as Sora, Donald and Goofy arrive

xml.sp: Sora Elsa, Anna...

cutscene.desc: Hans brings the sword up over his head to begin the swing as Elsa sobs, oblivious with grief. He brings the sword down, just as Anna rushes in to stop him...

xml.sp: Anna Nooo!

cutscene.desc: ...and she freezes solid. The sword makes contact and shatters, a pulse of magic knocks Hans off his feet as a final breath exhales from Anna

xml.sp: Sora Anna...

cutscene.desc: The unconscious body of Hans erupts with darkness, enveloping Sora, Donald and Goofy

xml.sp: Sora What?!

cutscene.desc: They struggle to move as they are dragged down into the pool of darkness. Sora opens his eyes and they find themselves in a wide landscape with a giant glowing orb of darkness in the center. Particles dance around it and it changes form, growing long tail. Claws surface, stomping the ground, and two glowing red eyes appear as a giant wolf's head emerges bearing the symbol of the Heartless. The Skll howls, leaping into the air and hovering

xml.sp: Goofy Do ya really think this will help Anna?
Sora I don't know...but we'd better try something!

cutscene.desc: Marshmallow catches up to them

xml.sp: Donald Let's get it.

cutscene.desc: The Skll begins by tackling them head on and running around the field. Sora strikes, but it knocks him back with a giant claw. With a wailing howl, it sails high into the clouds spinning itself into a giant ball of darkness. It grows larger and larger, getting spherical, undulating within the clouds. Darkness rains from the black sun as several wolf heads stream downwards toward the party. Casting back the shadows, the dark orb slowly encroaches on the ground, threatening to crash into the earth. Marshmallow rushes forward and grabs the orb, holding it away from the ground

xml.sp: Sora Together!

cutscene.desc: Sora leaps up to the dark sun, spinning his Keyblade on its surface in an attempt to dispell the darkness

xml.sp: Sora Come on!

cutscene.desc: He spins his Keyblade faster, struggling against the weight of the orb that's only purpose is to crush them. Suddenly, the dark breaks beneath his fingers, giving way to light as cracks form on the orb's surface. The orange tendrils snake their way through the giant dark sphere, light shining outward from every crevice. The orb shatters into ice and the Skll falls to the ground. After a few more minutes of fighting, the Skll leaps into the air for a second chance, creating another black sun, however this last-ditch effort cannot sustain the fusion and it explodes brightly, expelling its energy in a giant blast. Marshmallow steps in front of Sora, Donald and Goofy, shielding them as the blast hits. He roars, struggling against the mighty wind, until his knees buckle and he's swept over them. He cries out, unable to catch anything to grab, as the wind sweeps the trio off their feet behind him. Feeling a cold surface against his chin, Sora awakes back on the frozen fjord. He along with Donald and Goofy get to their feet, seeing the sight before them. Sora starts to run, but something stops him. Elsa is weeping, her arms draped around the frozen form of Anna as Olaf, Kristoff and Sven look on. The sorrow in the air is palpable. Suddenly, the area around Anna's heart begins to steam and then melt, the magic making its way across her shoulders and down her arms and the cape billowing around her. Olaf gasps and Sven nudges Kristoff, who was looking away. Kristoff's eyes widen and Sora, Donald and Goofy wait with bated breath. The melting spreads through Anna's toes and fingertips and she finally takes a breath, her braid falling over her shoulder. The trio rush forward excitedly, but are surrounded by a whirlwind of darkness

xml.sp: Sora What?

cutscene.desc: The whirlwind encases them in a dome and a flash spreads out from it, casting the world out of time. Sora peers through the dark wind, where Arendelle outside has stopped moving. Larxene appears before them

xml.sp: Larxene So, love has filled BOTH their hearts with light.

cutscene.desc: They take a defensive stance

xml.sp: Sora Larxene!
Larxene Two in one world... Definitely didn't see THAT coming.
Sora angrily First Marluxia, now you. What is this all about?!

Larxene Oh, I see, so you bumped into Marluxia. (annoyed) Then why am I explaining this again? I told you before: The New Seven Hearts. If you mess up and don't find your seven guardians of light, we're gonna need another group to fall back on.
Sora Leave innocent people out of it!
Larxene Ohh, look at this tough guy. Such a big boy now. Well, maybe you should do your job, and find the other guardians of light.
Sora Please, like you've found your thirteen. The King said you're one seeker of darkness short.
Larxene Oh no, we're set.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy jump

xml.sp: Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: Larxene giggles through a wide grin and vanishes along with the dark dome

xml.sp: Sora thinking They have all thirteen? Then if we don't find our seven, they'll go after Elsa and Anna.

cutscene.desc: Elsa looks up, noticing her sister is alive. She smiles, giving her a big hug. Sora frowns, despite the happy reunion

xml.sp: Goofy It'll be okay. They're strong.
Donald And now, it's our turn!

cutscene.desc: He looks back at them

xml.sp: Sora You're right. They have each other.
Elsa Anna...
Anna Oh, Elsa.
Elsa You sacrificed yourself for me?
Anna I love you.

cutscene.desc: Olaf gasps, lifting his head off his body

sp.speaker: Olaf
sp.q: An act of true love will thaw a frozen heart.
