cutscene.desc: Elsa and Anna hold hands

xml.sp: Elsa Love...will thaw. (to Anna) Love...
Anna Elsa?

cutscene.desc: Elsa looks down at her hands

xml.sp: Elsa Of course. Love!

cutscene.desc: She spreads her arms downward and the ice from the fjord spreads out in a snowflake shape, magically taking off into the air. Kristoff marvels at this sight as Sven tries to catch a floating snowflake on his tongue. The magic spreads beneath Sora, Donald and Goofy who jump for joy

xml.sp: Sora Yes!

cutscene.desc: As the lake thaws, a ship beneath the ice rises to the surface under their feet. The frozen magic flies throughout the down, breaking through the snow on the rooftops and the water in the fountains. As Elsa raises her arms, the floating ice coalesces into a giant snowflake in the air, and she blasts it apart with a wave. Everyone is overjoyed to see the sun, and Anna places her hand on Elsa's shoulder. Sora and company leave Arendelle and travel to Yen Sid's tower, where the sorcerer has also summoned King Mickey and Riku. They turn as the door opens

xml.sp: Sora Sorry we're late.
Mickey It's okay. You got here as fast as you could.

cutscene.desc: They fill everyone in on what they've learned so far

xml.sp: Sora The Organization claims to HAVE their thirteen darknesses.
Mickey Do we believe it's true?
Sora Umm...I don't know, but there's something else they keep mentioning. They're after a New Seven Hearts, which seems to be code for let's go bother more princesses.

Yen Sid Well, as the original princesses of hearts' time for protecting the pure light has ended, they have passed the light to others. Our enemy must certainly be cognizant of this. If the New Seven Hearts is what they wish to call them, so be it.
Sora But Kairi hasn't passed on her power. Is she one of the new seven?
Mickey She must be. But still, she chose to wield a Keyblade and fight with us as one of the guardians of light.
Sora Yeah...
Donald We haven't found Terra yet.
Goofy Hey, at least we've tracked down Ventus. Vanitas told us that he's inside Sora's heart.
Jiminy And so did Ansem the Wise in his data, so it almost certainly must be true.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Mickey That's great! Now we can rescue Ven.
Riku Maybe, except Aqua's the only one who knows where he's hidden. We still have to find her first.

cutscene.desc: Sora feels a tugging in his chest

xml.sp: Sora I'll go.
Donald & Goofy What?!
Mickey Is that wise?
Yen Sid You need the power of waking, Sora. Do you have it?
Sora Uh...no? Probably not.
Yen Sid sternly Without that power, you are not ready to face the realm of darkness.
Sora C'mon...

cutscene.desc: Riku laughs

xml.sp: Sora What's so funny?
Riku Sorry. Master Yen Sid knows you a little too well. He said you'd try to stage a half-baked rescue.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy start to laugh, followed by the King

xml.sp: Sora Yeah! Laugh it up!
Riku Sora, I know you're volunterring because you're worried--about me and Mickey.
Sora Yeah...

cutscene.desc: Riku places a hand on his shoulder

xml.sp: Riku Well, thanks. But, the power of waking's important. You can come to the rescue once you've got that. Sound fair?
Sora Yeah. All right. But be safe. No reckless stunts.
Riku nodding Yes, sir.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy move aside and Jiminy Cricket jumps down onto the duck's hat to whisper softly to each other

xml.sp: Donald Sora's the reckless one.
Jiminy No, not exactly. He just doesn't think.
Goofy If only he listened to Master Yen Sid the way he listens to Riku. That would be a good start.
Sora miffed I'm listening now.

cutscene.desc: Everyone but Sora chuckles

xml.sp: Yen Sid Very good. Sora will continue his journey to build his powers, while Mickey and Riku will focus on the search for Aqua.

cutscene.desc: They stand at attention

xml.sp: Sora, Donald, Goofy, Riku & Mickey Yes, sir!

cutscene.desc: In the Badlands on the outskirts of the Keyblade Graveyard, Marluxia and Larxene stand atop thirteen pillars of earth

xml.sp: Marluxia So, why are you back?
Larxene Nice way to greet your old partner in crime.

cutscene.desc: Marluxia gives a small laugh at the title

xml.sp: Larxene So, why do you think the old geezer took us back? He must know we backstabbed the Organization when Xemnas was running it.
Marluxia Xehanort doesn't care about you or me. To him, we're nothing but empty husks. The old Organization was the same. Xehanort needs thirteen vessels to hold his essence.
Larxene Husks? Not me. You up for another coup?

cutscene.desc: She gives him a coy smile

xml.sp: ????? Oh, please. You couldn't do it last time. You gotta play it smart, like me.

cutscene.desc: They look over to another pillar, where a man with blond hair is holding a large sitar

xml.sp: Larxene What?! You're not smart!
Demyx Well, you heard what Marly said. I don't have to be smart.

cutscene.desc: He smirks

xml.sp: Larxene Or capable, or likeable, or attractive. A cereal bowl would make a better vessel.

cutscene.desc: Demyx tunes his strings

xml.sp: Demyx Whoa now, you are WAY out of line. I am extremely imposing...when I want to be. Which is, admittedly, almost never.
Larxene Why haven't you gone to any worlds? Are you slacking?
Demyx 'Course not. I got benched.
Larxene Huh?
Marluxia Sax brought Vexen on board. They must be planning to use replicas.
Larxene Those windup toys?
Demyx Oh, no. The replicas are way more real than you remember. I mean, one stole my spot!

cutscene.desc: Larxene bursts into laughter

xml.sp: Larxene OF COURSE it stole your spot. You're dumb as a brick.
Demyx Har-dee-har.

Marluxia Vexen's latest replicas are no mere puppets. The Riku replica we used in Castle Oblivion was just a prototype. The next replica, the one crafted from Sora's memories, was real enough to join our ranks. And Vexen claims the new ones will be human in every way. If he ever finishes them.
Larxene Oh... The thing is...I kinda told Sora and his nitwits that we're ready. My bad.
?????? Let them believe as much.

cutscene.desc: Xemnas appears on another pillar

xml.sp: Larxene Ugh. Xemnas.
Xemnas If they think that we have all thirteen darknesses, then they will panic. And panic leads to a lack of preparation.
Demyx Yeah, totally.

cutscene.desc: Larxene points towards Demyx

xml.sp: Larxene Why is this thing a member again?
Demyx Hey now! Pointing is rude.

Xemnas The first six members of the original Organization were all apprentices to Ansem the Wise, and the seventh and eighth members joined thereafter. The thirteenth member was Roxas, a Keyblade wielder. So. What about you? How do you suppose I chose numbers nine through twelve?
Larxene Because our hearts are ber powerful.
Xemnas Wrong. You have been brought together for another purpose.
?????? What? So that we can rot away on the bottom rung?

cutscene.desc: A man with short blond hair and multiple earrings appears on the pillar adjacent to Demyx

xml.sp: Larxene sighing You're in too? What is this, Organization Rehash?
Luxord I happen to play an important role. No one benched me.
Demyx You were listening? So not cool.
Luxord One must hold one's cards as long as necessary.
Larxene What important role? That stupid box that Xigbar claims is real, but won't tell us a thing about?
Luxord You'll just have to ask Xigbar that.

cutscene.desc: He plays with his cards in his hand

xml.sp: Luxord Now then, Xemnas, what is this purpose? You didn't invite us back for old times' sake.
Xemnas You four are going to reveal your greatest secret: the ancient Keyblade legacy that slumbers within you.

cutscene.desc: They each react with surprise and skepticism as Xemnas gives a breathy laugh. Meanwhile, Sora, Donald and Goofy return to Le Grand Bistrot in Twilight Town to give Little Chef more ingredients from their travels. Scrooge walks into the kitchen where Little Chef is perched on Sora's head

xml.sp: Scrooge ecstatic Me business is boomin! Splendid! Just splendid! You two have outdone yourselves. The critics are going cuckoo and the register, ka-ching. I canna wait to see what it is you cook up next.

cutscene.desc: He takes out a present

xml.sp: Scrooge Nor can the customers.

cutscene.desc: He offers the present and Sora takes it, laughing

xml.sp: Sora We try! Right, Little Chef?

cutscene.desc:
He lifts a finger to the rat, who high-fives it confidently. Later, Sora sets sail for a world of ships and sea-faring pirates. A sea shanty plays to open our tale:
Yo ho, yo ho, a pirates life for me The Kraken leapt from the ocean brine Look out, me hearties yo ho And to the Locker the sparrow confined Look out, me hearties yo ho Yo ho, yo ho, a pirates life for me A goddess thought she'd a sparrow save Look out, me hearties yo ho And brought a blackguard back from the grave Look out, me hearties yo ho Yo ho, yo ho, a pirates life for me The Flying Dutchman is on the hunt Look out, me hearties yo ho To punish a sparrow for his affront Look out, me hearties yo ho Yo ho, yo ho, a pirates life for me Within the chest his secret sleeps Look out, me hearties yo ho The heart of Davy Jones still beats Look out, me hearties yo ho Yo ho, yo ho, a pirates life for me
Sora, Donald and Goofy arrive in the night under a cloudless sky

xml.sp: Sora singing Yo ho, yo ho, a pirates life for me

cutscene.desc: Sora hums to the song as Donald and Goofy row, each dressed in pirate garb

xml.sp: Donald Why are you so happy?
Sora 'Cause we get to be pirates again!
Goofy Yep, you always did like this world.
Sora How could anyone not? Still...it's a real shame we don't have a bigger ship.

cutscene.desc: They sail upon a fairly small raft lit by a single lantern. The fog looms around them

xml.sp: Donald Got any idea where we're going?
Sora Where else? The edge of the world!

cutscene.desc: He points ahead confidently

xml.sp: Goofy saluting Captain Sora!

cutscene.desc: Sora puts on his best pirate voice

xml.sp: Sora What ails ya, Mister Goofy?
Goofy The edge of the world!

cutscene.desc: He points forward

xml.sp: Sora Aye!
Goofy We're runnin' outta sea, sir!
Sora Aye! We're runnin' outta sea.

cutscene.desc: He chuckles, then glancing at Donald, realizes what Goofy said

xml.sp: Sora & Donald Running OUT?!

cutscene.desc: Up ahead, the ocean water rushes forward and down into an abyss, dragging the raft with the current. The raft rocks, knocking Goofy over while Sora clutches the mast

xml.sp: Sora Hard to starboard!

cutscene.desc: Goofy and Donald try rowing with reckless abandon as the edge grows nearer

xml.sp: Goofy But there's no time, Captain!

cutscene.desc: The raft reaches the edge and careens over the waterfall, sending Sora, Donald and Goofy screaming over the world's end. In the midst of Davy Jones' Locker, the trio awake and sit up, surrounded on all sides by endless dry sand. The three sigh together

xml.sp: Sora Where'd we end up THIS TIME?

cutscene.desc: Eventually, they get up and walk across the empty dunes, only finding more sand ahead of them, no matter how long they trudge

xml.sp: Goofy We've been walkin' forever.
Donald I'm exhausted...
Sora Some pirates. We won't get anywhere without a ship.

cutscene.desc: He looks up through the heat in the air, making out an image of a pirate ship sailing over the desert

xml.sp: Sora A ship...

cutscene.desc: He stops, causing Goofy, and then Donald, to crash into him

xml.sp: Donald Sora... This is dry land.

cutscene.desc: The duck shrieks as he also sees the ship

xml.sp: Goofy Oh boy!

cutscene.desc: Strangely enough, the ship comes clearer into view, drifting through the sand as if by magic

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy It IS a ship!

cutscene.desc: They run to catch up to the forward vessel, being pulled by an incalculable amount of odd white crabs. From behind, a familiar man gains on them and then passes by, raising an arm in greeting

xml.sp: ???? Hail, Sora!
Sora Huh? (excited) Jack Sparrow!

cutscene.desc: Jack stops momentarily to face them

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow CAPTAIN Jack Sparrow.
Goofy Sure is!

cutscene.desc: Donald giggles

xml.sp: Sora Hey, Jack. Where are we?

cutscene.desc: He looks back at Jack, who's already begun running again

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Belay that. Ship absconding!
Sora Huh?
Jack Sparrow Help me catch the Pearl before she gets away!
Sora saluting Aye, aye, Captain!

cutscene.desc: They race to catch up with the Black Pearl, but are delayed by attacking Heartless

xml.sp: Donald Heartless?
Goofy We better get rid of 'em quick.

cutscene.desc: The Pearl turns, sending cannonfire in their direction

xml.sp: Sora Who's shooting at us?
Jack Sparrow Cease fire! Cease fire!

cutscene.desc: They avoid the cannonballs and take out the Earth Core Heartless, using the slowed momentum of the Pearl to their advantage. Reaching the still moving ship, a group of Anchor Raider Heartless appear, swinging the anchors at the end of their right hands like propellers

xml.sp: Sora That's who's doing this.
Jack Sparrow No one said you could use my ship!

cutscene.desc: Together with Captain Jack, they take out the Anchor Raiders and take back the Pearl. Jack Sparrow watches from atop the mast as the ship crests the final sand dune and reaches the sea's edge of Davy Jones' Locker. Sora, Donald and Goofy stand at the bow, as more familiar faces stand aghast at the sight from the beach. Elizabeth Swann and her betrothed Will Turner are joined by the previously deceased Hector Barbossa and others in their crew. A mysterious woman with dreadlocks named Tia Dalma pets the crab in her hand, chuckling to herself. Will watches in amazement as the Black Pearl settles into the water with a loud splash. As Jack and the trio disembark from the Pearl as it reaches the sea, a smiles comes to the faces of both Elizabeth and Joshamee Gibbs, Jack's first mate

xml.sp: Gibbs Jack!
Jack Sparrow commandingly Mister Gibbs.
Gibbs Aye, Cap'n.
Jack Sparrow I thought so. I expect you're able to account for your actions, then.
Gibbs confused Sir?
Jack Sparrow There's been a perpetual and virulent lack of discipline upon my vessel--why?
Gibbs Sir, you're... You're in Davy Jones' Locker, Cap'n.

cutscene.desc: Jack's face twitches

xml.sp: Sora Davy Jones' Locker?
Jack Sparrow I know that. I know where I am. And don't think I don't.

cutscene.desc: He turns to Sora

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow I'm in Davy Jones' Locker. Assuredly.
Barbossa Jack Sparrow.

cutscene.desc: Sora gasps

xml.sp: Sora Barbossa!

cutscene.desc: Barbossa smiles at them cheekily as the wind blows through the feather in his wide-brimmed hat. Jack saunters forward towards him

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Ah, Hector! It's been too long. Hasn't it?
Barbossa Aye, Isla de Muerta, remember? You shot me.
Jack Sparrow No, I didn't.

cutscene.desc: Will and Elizabeth walk up to Sora and friends

xml.sp: Will Sora. We meet again.
Elizabeth It's lovely to see you all.
Sora Oh! Will. Elizabeth. Is...something about you different?

cutscene.desc: They notice her more pirate-y clothing

xml.sp: Goofy Yeah, you look all swashbuckly.
Elizabeth Well, I've seen some adventures. But I never thought I'd find YOU here.
Sora Speaking of... Where exactly IS here? What's all this about a locker?
Will Davy Jones' Locker. Jack neglected to repay a certain debt to Jones. So Jones sent the Kracken to devour Jack, and that's how he ended up here.
Sora Then...Davy Jones' Locker... (frightened) You're saying that we've gone beyond...
Goofy sadly Beyond the grave?

cutscene.desc: Donald whimpers

xml.sp: Elizabeth And we're here to wrest Jack from his fate.

cutscene.desc: Jack notices the mysterious woman with them

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Tia Dalma, out and about, eh?

cutscene.desc: She smiles at him

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow You add an agreeable sense of the macabre to any delirium.

cutscene.desc: She chuckles softly

xml.sp: Will He thinks we're a hallucination.
Jack Sparrow Heh... Complete with these three masqueraders.

cutscene.desc: He motions toward Sora, Donald and Goofy

xml.sp: Elizabeth Jack, this is real. We're here. We've come to rescue you!

cutscene.desc: He looks at her, cycling through his emotions

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Have you, now? That's very kind of you. But it would seem that as I possess a ship and you don't, you're the ones in need of rescuing. And I'm not sure as I'm in the mood.

cutscene.desc: He walks up to Elizabeth, narrowing his eyes, and Will moves forward

xml.sp: Will Jack, Cutler Beckett has the heart of Davy Jones. He controls the Flying Dutchman.
Elizabeth He's taking over the seas.
Tia Dalma And him must be stopped. The Brethren Court is called.

cutscene.desc: Jack turns to her

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Leave you people alone for just a minute and look what happens. Everything's gone to pot!

cutscene.desc: He throws his hands up in the air. Sora turns to Donald and Goofy, crossing his arms

xml.sp: Sora I'm lost. What's going on?
Goofy Well, umm...sounds to me like this Beckett fella they mentioned is tryin' to conquer the ocean.
Sora Oh.
Donald scowling The sea belongs to everyone!
Sora Yeah! No conquerers.
Donald Yeah!

cutscene.desc: They nod

xml.sp: Gibbs Listen, Jack. The world needs you back somethin' fierce.
Will And you need a crew.
Jack Sparrow Why should I sail with any of you? Four of you have tried to annihilate me.
Sora waving Jack, WE'RE on your side.
Jack Sparrow Aye, so you are, mates. I never could have caught the Pearl without you. Sora, Donald, Goofy, you're hired.
Sora Yes!
Jack Sparrow Now, as for the rest of you...

cutscene.desc: He walks up to Tia Dalma and copies her infectious smile

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Tia Dalma, you're in. Gibbs, you can come.

cutscene.desc: Gibbs gives a satisfied chortle

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Weigh anchor, all hands! Prepare to make sail!

cutscene.desc: The crew starts toward the Pearl as Jack takes out his compass, the needle spinning continuously. Unsatisfied, he closes it. A captain without a heading

xml.sp: Barbossa Jack...

cutscene.desc: He looks over, seeing a grinning Barbossa holding up the ancient charts

xml.sp: Barbossa Which way you goin', Jack?

cutscene.desc: Hector taps on the maps with his long fingers forcing Jack to hold back a sneer. Later, once everyone is aboard, Jack lets Sora try his hand at the wheel

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Right then, Mister Sora. The helm is yours, provided...you pass muster.

cutscene.desc: He places a hand on Sora's shoulder

xml.sp: Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: Jack leans in closer, pointing ahead

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow See that island there with the two peaks? Prove you can reach that, and the open sea is yours.
Sora Oh!

cutscene.desc: He gives an excited laugh

xml.sp: Sora Aye, aye!

cutscene.desc: Later, after sailing for a while, the ship has nearly come to a stop. Sora, Donald and Goofy sit on deck at the base of the mast

xml.sp: Sora So, we DO have a destination, right?
Goofy I can't tell anymore.
Donald Jack is just making it up.

cutscene.desc: Jack stands at a pair of barrels, idly playing with the rings of the map charts. Tia Dalma walks up to them and smiles

xml.sp: Tia Dalma Cast your fate with Jack Sparrow, and you soon be sharing in the wrath of Davy Jones.
Sora The guy Will mentioned? Who does he think he is, anyway? And what did Jack ever do to him?
Tia Dalma coyly suspicious Truly? You don't know who Davy Jones be? And you say you be men of the sea?

cutscene.desc: The three tense up and Sora tries to cover

xml.sp: Sora Let's put it this way--we're from ANOTHER sea.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod in agreement

xml.sp: Tia Dalma Are you now? Jack and Davy Jones' fate be intertwined. Jones, him raised Jack's precious Pearl from the depths and make Jack captain for thirteen years. In exchange, Jack promise to give Jones him soul as payment. But thirteen years pass, and Jack fail to return.

cutscene.desc: Will concerningly looks toward Elizabeth, who herself is frowning, her back turned to him

xml.sp: Tia Dalma So Jones, him send the Kraken to devour Jack, taking him and the Pearl back to the depths. But... if Jones learn that Witty Jack cheat that fate, him wanna punish Jack even worse. And Jack's friends, too.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy whimper

xml.sp: Donald Are you, um, talking about us?
Goofy Ya mean that the Kraken's gonna eat us?
Sora Aw, let the Kraken have a crack. I ain't scared!

cutscene.desc: She leans over him

xml.sp: Tia Dalma Hmm... Not scared at all? That be rare. Most men, them run for land at the mention of the Kraken. Not you.

cutscene.desc: She stands, turning in Jack's direction

xml.sp: Tia Dalma But Jack be scared. He want to be free of his debt to Davy Jones. That's why him need the box.
Sora, Donald and Goofy Box?!

cutscene.desc: Sora glances at Donald in mutual understanding

xml.sp: Tia Dalma It be a chest...where Davy Jones lock away the part of him that hurt. The pain it cause him was too much to live with...but not enough to cause him to die.
Sora And...what part of him is that?

cutscene.desc: She chuckles, placing a hand over her chest

xml.sp: Tia Dalma Him heart.

cutscene.desc: Meanwhile on the deck of a separate vessel, Vexen stands with Luxord

xml.sp: Vexen Oh, how does he do it? A creature absent a heart and yet somehow able to keep existing... Not even my finest replica can claim that achievement. The secret must be in that box. I have to know what mysteries it contains.
Luxord I believe our orders were to find the box and seize it. No more. Put a leash on that runaway curiosity.

Vexen Always so shortsighted. Why would the Organization seek me out just as soon as I was recompleted--if not to affirm my intellectual prowess and invest in my research? Every stride I make is a stride for all of us.
Luxord Oh really? And what exactly are we striding towards?

cutscene.desc: Vexen narrows an eye

xml.sp: Vexen Luxord, do I detect...a hint of treachery in your words?
Luxord What? Don't be absurd. But to be clear, I serve the Organization. I don't share your need to please Xemnas. He's good at wrapping you around his little finger--always has been.
Vexen All I desire is the freedom to continue my research. Ansem the Wise refused to nurture my talents. So I cast my lot with Xemnas--with Xehanort, rather. Simple as that.
Luxord I see. And you don't care how he uses your research?
Vexen Not in the slightest. All that concerns me is that I complete the perfect human vessel.
Luxord That's all well and good. But I know this world better than you. Kindly stay out of the way.
Vexen Oh, of course. Considering those pests have shown up, I'd hardly get anything done.
Luxord I already know what to do with the pests. Then you can resume your stuffy studies.
Vexen Ah, that's my boy. I'll be watching from the shadows, then.

cutscene.desc: He disappears in a corridor of darkness. Back aboard the Black Pearl, Sora along with the ship and the crew have been entirely submerged in the water. They hold their breath as the sun sets with a flash of green. Suddenly, the water surges downward and the Black Pearl emerges from the sea, the briny water splashing off its sails. The crew inhales the sea air and regains their bearings. Sora stands, waving water off his wet clothes

xml.sp: Sora Thanks, Jack. You could've warned us.
Goofy Yeah, everything went topsy-turvy and upsy-downsy!
Sora Well, at least we're back in the land of the living.
Donald Thank goodness!

cutscene.desc: Jack stands up and adjusts his hat

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Never fear. All according to plan.
Barbossa But that be no reason to rest easy.

cutscene.desc: He looks out to sea, Will following his lead

xml.sp: Will A ship!

cutscene.desc: They gaze at another pirate ship sailing in their direction

xml.sp: Elizabeth I've never seen one like that.

cutscene.desc: A horde of Vaporflies sails out ahead of it

xml.sp: Sora Heartless!

cutscene.desc: Tia Dalma smirks at his understanding of the situation as a Raging Vulture Heartless soars above the ship. It roars, sending a cascade of energy from its two cannon wings

xml.sp: Gibbs Look out!

cutscene.desc: The first strike hits the water, causing a giant splash and rocking the Black Pearl, knocking the crew off balance and spraying them with mist

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Barbossa, have you allied with those fiends again?
Barbossa Don't impugn me honor. Why would I conspire with them?
Jack Sparrow But you DID conspire with them.
Elizabeth Could you discuss it later?

cutscene.desc: Tia Dalma whispers something in Sora's ear

xml.sp: Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: She laughs softly, smiling as he looks back at her before walking away

xml.sp: Will Get ready!

cutscene.desc: The Raging Vulture flies overhead

xml.sp: Goofy Hmm... I sure do wish we could get a little closer.
Donald What? Walk on air? We can't do that!

cutscene.desc: Vaporfly Heartless zoom above them, leaving trails of colored smoke in their wake

xml.sp: Sora We can!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs forward before they can stop him

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Sora!

cutscene.desc: He jumps off the ship's deck and onto a blue smoke trail, riding it up into the sky

xml.sp: Sora yelling back Donald and Goofy, protect the ship! I'll handle the Heartless.

cutscene.desc: He reaches the Vaporfly and jumps aboard. Utilizing the Vaporfly's torpedoes and flight, Sora weakens the Raging Vulture before leaping aboard the Heartless itself. As he grabs hold of one of the Vulture's back spikes, the Heartless flaps its wings, flying higher into the sky. Once it settles down, Sora leaps across its back from spike to spike. The bird's long neck turns to face him as he reaches its head and screams in his face, almost knocking him off

xml.sp: Sora Taaake...THIS!

cutscene.desc: Sora leaps at the face of the Vulture, serving up a killing blow. A cracking sound reverberates and the Heartless starts to glow, a giant Heart rising out of its body as its form dissipates

xml.sp: Sora All right!

cutscene.desc: As the Vaporflies vanish in succession, Sora is stranded in the air

xml.sp: Sora Wha-- Wait! Oh noooooo!

cutscene.desc: He falls, landing straight down into the water. Not too long after...

xml.sp: Donald Sora?
Goofy Sora?

cutscene.desc: He opens his eyes, seeing the faces of Donald and Goofy staring down at him

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Sora!

cutscene.desc: He lies on a sandy beach with the sound of the waves in his ears

xml.sp: Sora weakly Donald? Goofy?

cutscene.desc: They nod and he slowly sits up

xml.sp: Sora Where are the others?
Goofy After you fell, we came looking for ya. I guess they musta kept goin'.
Donald sternly That's desertion.
Sora Oh... And I was so happy that we got to see them again.
Jack That eager to sail under Captain Jack Sparrow?

cutscene.desc: They turn to see Jack approach from behind

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy Jack!

cutscene.desc: A white crab falls out from behind his leg and scuttles away. Meanwhile, aboard another ship, the Endeavour, the real Jack Sparrow has been pulled aboard and into the Captain's Cabin, where he finds Lord Cutler Beckett

xml.sp: Beckett Perhaps you'll consider an arrangement. One which requires nothing from you but information.

cutscene.desc: He holds out a small glass of sherry, which Jack takes

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Regarding the Brethren Court, no doubt.

cutscene.desc: Beckett raises his own glass up to drink, which Jack takes also

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow In exchange for fair compensation...

cutscene.desc: Jack drinks the first glass

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Square my debt with Jones...

cutscene.desc: and the second

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Guarantee my freedom...

cutscene.desc: Beckett pops the cork on the bottle of sherry and pours another drink

xml.sp: Beckett Of course. It's just good business.

cutscene.desc: Jack picks up a small human statue

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Were I in a divulgatory mood, what then might I divulge?
Beckett Everything. Where are they meeting? What are their plans?

cutscene.desc: Back on the Huddled Isles, Sora, Donald and Goofy are with Jack

xml.sp: Jack Shall we?

cutscene.desc: He turns away, leading them further into the island

xml.sp: Sora Shall we what?
Jack Some pirate! Won't get anywhere without a ship.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy exchange puzzled looks

xml.sp: Jack So, let's go get one.

cutscene.desc: Sora can barely contain his excitement

xml.sp: Sora Yes!

cutscene.desc: Sora chuckles happily and starts to follow Jack, Donald and Goofy after him

xml.sp: Goofy Sora and Jack sure are cut from the same cloth.
Donald They even talk alike!

cutscene.desc: Sora stops, reflecting on what Tia Dalma has whispered to him earlier

xml.sp: Tia Dalma Use that key to free me, Sora, and you have my most certain promise--all the power on the sea you ever wish for be yours.
Sora Free her how?
Donald Sora?
Goofy What's wrong?
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: He turns around

xml.sp: Sora Oh, nothing, really. I'm good.

cutscene.desc: They explore the island, swimming into one of the many underwater caverns

xml.sp: Goofy Look! Something's glowin'.

cutscene.desc: They see two strange glowing rods emerging from the seabed

xml.sp: Donald And there's a chest!

cutscene.desc: A chest is nestled directly between the rods

xml.sp: Goofy That seems suspiciously convenient.
Sora I'll check it out.

cutscene.desc: He swims closer

xml.sp: Donald Sora, this could be dangerous.

cutscene.desc: Sora smirks

xml.sp: Sora But Donald! No pirate worth his salt ignores treasure.

cutscene.desc: Sora swims to the sea floor and taps on the treasure chest. Suddenly the ground beneath him quakes, sending up dirt in the water and clouding his vision, as two gigantic blue jaws clamp over him and the chest. Breaking out of the ground, the Lightning Angler ejects Sora from his mouth and attacks them. After a strike with electricity from the Heartless's many glowing spikes, the trio manage to dislodge the treasure chest from within its throat. Its eye scans its surroundings, trying to make a break for it, but crashes into the cave wall. The Heart floats out of its body as the rocky wall opens into a further cave containing jellyfish. Exploring the inner cave, they reach a tunnel that becomes shallow until they wade into a huge open-air cavern. Inside, they find an abandoned pirate ship with orange sails

xml.sp: Sora Oh, cool.

cutscene.desc: They run forward, Sora leaping into the air

xml.sp: Sora Woo-hoo! It's our very own ship!

cutscene.desc: He laughs

xml.sp: Jack Are you certain about that?

cutscene.desc: Jack appears from up on deck

xml.sp: Sora Jack?
Jack Finder's keepers.
Goofy How'd he get here so fast?
Jack Mine. Savvy?

cutscene.desc: Donald stamps his foot

xml.sp: Donald No savvy!
Sora Jack, you already have the Black Pearl.
Jack Aye, to which this ship holds no candle. But, take what you can, mate.

cutscene.desc: He walks forward, but stops

xml.sp: Jack Now then, my ship has a captain, but it does appear I'm in need of a crew.

cutscene.desc: He turns around in their direction

xml.sp: Jack Suppose you'll have to do. Don't dawdle. Climb aboard!

cutscene.desc: He waves them on

xml.sp: Sora Ummm...

cutscene.desc: They enter the Leviathan and Sora takes the helm

xml.sp: Jack Ready now, helmsman?
Sora Ready enough, Cap'n, but...aren't we kinda...trapped?
Jack Now, Sora, I know you've made passage through straits far more dire than this. Just follow your heart's command.

cutscene.desc: He nods, grabbing the help with both hands and taking a deep breath. Ahead, the cave wall collapses into open air, the bright sun shining through and allowing the seawater to unmoor the ship from the sandbar

xml.sp: Sora Make way!

cutscene.desc: The ship sails out of the cave, free to sail the Caribbean ocean. Once they find their bearings, they sail into a fog, where a giant ship silently sails near them. Its sails are emblazoned with the Nobody insignia

xml.sp: Sora That ship...

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy summon their weapons

xml.sp: Donald It's the Heartless.

cutscene.desc: Goofy sees a hooded figure on its deck

xml.sp: Goofy But look. This time there's somebody aboard.
Sora Isn't that...
Jack Not the merry company I'd hoped for.

cutscene.desc: The hooded figure removes his hood to reveal...

xml.sp: Luxord Parley!
Sora A black coat.
Jack Of course...

cutscene.desc: Luxord boards the Leviathan

xml.sp: Sora You back in the Organization?
Luxord Yes. Surprising, isn't it, that they'd do me the honor? Never count your cards until they've all been dealt.
Sora Jack, don't you give this creep the time of day.
Donald Yeah!
Luxord Come now, are you really so unsophisticated that you'd decline a gentlemanly conversation?
Sora What'd you say?!
Jack Sora. Stand down. It's the Code. Mustn't strike a pirate aboard ship... when said pirate offers to confabulate.
Luxord Ah yes. And how could I love games and contests without honoring the rules? Because only by winning fairly does victory have any savor at all.
Jack But...of course the Code is actually more guidelines than rules. Speak your piece.
Luxord I am looking...for a box. A chest, perhaps.

cutscene.desc: Jack's face twitches

xml.sp: Luxord You know the one?
Jack Yes. M-maybe. No! I know of A box. But said box is not a box you want to trifle with, mate. Trust me.
Luxord Really? A wager, then.
Jack And of what nature would this wager be?
Luxord What say we have a little race to that charming port town which you hold so dear?
Jack Port Royal?
Luxord Yes. Whoever reaches it first is the victor. And the stakes: you tell me all about that chest.
Jack Against what?
Luxord I will get you whatever it is you want.

cutscene.desc: Jack mulls over this

xml.sp: Jack Done!
Sora Jack!
Luxord Then we have an accord.

cutscene.desc: Luxord teleports from the Leviathan back to his own ship

xml.sp: Luxord Now, let us begin!
Jack All hands! Prepare to make sail!

cutscene.desc: Jack starts walking toward the stairs

xml.sp: Sora But Jack!
Jack Drop canvas!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs after him

xml.sp: Sora Hey... Jack!

cutscene.desc: Jack rushes up the stairs

xml.sp: Jack With a will, lads!
Sora Jack, listen!
Jack whirling around What?!
Sora You can't let him get his hands on that box. Do you really know whatever it is that he's looking for?
Jack Let's just say...there's a potential possibility he wants the chest containing Davy Jones' heart. But I haven't the foggiest notion why he'd covet the blighted thing.
Goofy Is it a BLACK box?
Jack It is more black than blue... So, yes!
Sora to Donald and Goofy Hmm... Do you think it's the one?
Donald Could be.
Goofy And winnin' the race would keep it out of Organization XIII's hands.
Sora Hey... You're right!
Jack What are you three muttering on about?
Sora Basically, we need to win this race.
Jack Precisely. No purchase, no pay. You might have the makings of a pirate after all.
Sora Yeah!

cutscene.desc: Sora rushes to the helm and the race begins

xml.sp: Goofy First one to Port Royal wins!
Jack And I say we make it interesting. Let's try out those cannons.

cutscene.desc: They sail east, weaving between small islands, and fighting off Heartless ships until they have Port Royal in their sights

xml.sp: Jack That's it. Don't let up now!
Goofy Go, go go!

cutscene.desc: They near the waters of the port

xml.sp: Donald Getting close!
Jack Lookouts, report!
Goofy Starboard side, all clear!
Donald Port, too!
Sora We got this one in the bag.

cutscene.desc: From behind the fog looms heavy and other ships appear around Luxord's vessel, gaining on them

xml.sp: Luxord The game isn't over until it's over.

cutscene.desc: Luxord raises an arm

xml.sp: Luxord Fire!

cutscene.desc: From both sides, the ships aim their cannons at the Leviathan, rocking the boat

xml.sp: Jack They're closing in! Come about! Make ready to return fire!

cutscene.desc: Sora nods

xml.sp: Sora Aye, aye!

cutscene.desc: Sora spins the wheel with a large thrust and the ship begins to turn as a multitude of cannonballs splash in the water around them, near misses. It's a full-on naval battle as they take down the sister ships in Luxord's fleet. Soon they focus their efforts on taking down Luxord's ship. When the mast topples over, the battle is nearly won

xml.sp: Jack Prepare to board!

cutscene.desc: They launch their arrow-shaped anchor into the ship and use the chain to board

xml.sp: Luxord Another game it is, then.

cutscene.desc: Luxord snaps his fingers summoning a group of Heartless and Nobodies, and retreats into the ship. Once the battle is over, Luxord reappears, clapping

xml.sp: Luxord Magnificent! I salute you all, gentlemen.
Sora scowling You're up to something.
Donald Admit it!
Luxord Perish the thought. I know when I've been outdone.
Jack You were outdone before you even started, mate. But I admire your conciliatory way of conceding defeat.

cutscene.desc: Luxord quickly brushes away the polite insult

xml.sp: Luxord Yes... Now, I believe I owe you your prize. But I neglected to ask what it is that you want. Perhaps...you'll enlighten me?
Jack Aye, that's easy. I want the chest that's aboard the Dutchman.
Goofy No, Jack, don't tell him!

cutscene.desc: There is an awkward pause

xml.sp: Luxord Really?

cutscene.desc: Jack has half-way realized his mistake

xml.sp: Jack Not good?

cutscene.desc: Sora realizes

xml.sp: Sora Oh, Jaaack...

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy summon their weapons

xml.sp: Jack Well...I didn't tell him WHICH Dutchman.

cutscene.desc: Jack draws his sword and Donald glares at Luxord

xml.sp: Donald You tricked him!
Luxord Actually, I outwitted him.
Sora You knew he'd tell you where it was!
Luxord chuckling I've always been far more interested in the long game. Now, let's see where it takes us. That is, if you stay apace.

cutscene.desc: Luxord disappears into a corridor of darkness. Sora hears a buzzing off to his right

xml.sp: Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: A group of Vaporfly Heartless swoop in and knock the party back onto the Leviathan. Sora gets up, rushing to the edge of the deck, and sees that Luxord's ship has vanished

xml.sp: Sora After him!

cutscene.desc: He starts to run for the helm

xml.sp: Jack Nay. There's no point.
Sora stopping Why not?
Jack The ship's listing near to scuppers from that cannon fire. She'll be needing repairs. Best make berth at Port Royal.
Sora Whaaat?

cutscene.desc: They dock at Port Royal and walk up the marina

xml.sp: Jack Look for crabs. They'll set her right.
Sora Crabs? Why crabs?
Jack Never mind the particulars, mate. The white crabs. Savvy?
Sora Aye, aye.

cutscene.desc: They search Port Royal from top to bottom for the elusive white crabs. After gathering a sufficient amount, they return to the Leviathan

xml.sp: Jack Aye, that's all of 'em. Now, to my final task. Be back in a trice.

cutscene.desc: Jack leaves momentarily and brings the ship back to shipshape

xml.sp: Jack There, mates. Fit to sail any sea. Now, Sora, one final inquiry: is there any particular reason you wanted this ship?

cutscene.desc: Sora's eyes widen at the question and he thinks on it

xml.sp: Sora Yeah, to explore the seas, free as the wind.
Jack Good answer. You ARE a pirate... Captain Sora.

cutscene.desc: Sora smiles for a moment

xml.sp: Sora But, Jack...why do you keep saying final, like you're leaving?
Jack Ah... It's because THIS me has run his course, mate.

cutscene.desc: Three white crabs fall from his body and one scuttles away, catching Donald's attention

xml.sp: Sora This you?

Jack Aye, the surrogate me that the goddess of the sea sent here to help you lot. Of course, any me is still me. I may be duplicatable, but I'm always incomparable. The sea, she smiles upon us, Sora--and let's leave it at that, shall we? For now, the REAL me has a crucial engagement...at Shipwreck Cove, where the Pirate Brethren will meet Beckett and his lot in battle to win back our freedom.
Sora Then let us help.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Jack No, it's for pirates to resolve. But not you, Sora.

cutscene.desc: Jack begins to glow

xml.sp: Jack You're as free as the winds now, and far you'll go.

cutscene.desc: Jack explodes into a burst of light, leaving behind a pile of white crabs. They settle on the dock and splash down into the water. The trio watch them go

xml.sp: Goofy So, Jack was showin' us the way.
Donald Even if he did get tricked.
Sora Jack... He said it was the pirates' battle to fight.

cutscene.desc: He smiles brightly

xml.sp: Sora But a fight for pirates...

cutscene.desc: He gets Donald and Goofy to join him

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy ...is a fight for us!

cutscene.desc: The three of them punch the sky

xml.sp: Sora C'mon! Let's find the real Jack!

cutscene.desc: Before meeting in battle, on a sparkling white strip of sand, Captain Jack Sparrow, Elizabeth, and Barbossa walk away from a longboat beached on one side, toward a second longboat on the other side. The threesome draw near to the three others who have docked: Cutler Beckett, Davy Jones and Will Turner. Jonas, as per his curse by the goddess Calypso, stands in a bucket of water. They regard each other in silence; this is an attempt at parley

xml.sp: Beckett You made a deal with me, Jack, to deliver the pirates. And here they are. Don't be bashful. Step up. Claim your reward.

cutscene.desc: Elizabeth and Barbossa look to their left at Jack, who looks to his left, too. He makes no effort to corroborate Beckett's words

xml.sp: Davy Jones Sparrow. Your debt to me is still to be satisfied. One hundred years in servitude aboard the Dutchman. As a start.
Jack Sparrow That debt was paid, mate.
Davy Jones You escaped.
Elizabeth I propose an exchange.

cutscene.desc: Jack turns to Elizabeth and Beckett perks up

xml.sp: Elizabeth Will leaves with us...and you can take Jack.

cutscene.desc: Barbossa and Sparrow are taken aback by this offer

xml.sp: Will Done.
Jack Sparrow Undone.
Beckett Done.
Barbossa to Elizabeth Jack's one of the nine Pirate Lords. You have no right.
Elizabeth dismissively King.

cutscene.desc: Elizabeth turns away from him to Jack, the reason for her being declared Pirate King of the Brethren Court. He smirks and doffs his hat

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow As you command, your nibs.
Barbossa Scurvy blackguard!

cutscene.desc: Barbossa draws his sword and slices at Jack, just missing him and tearing off the circlet coin that hung from his hair. It falls to the sand and the two men regard each other

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Easy there, mate. You wouldn't want to damage the leverage, now would you?

cutscene.desc: Jack moves to cross and Barbossa picks up the coin with a smirk

xml.sp: Beckett Now...

cutscene.desc: Will and Jack complete the cross, keeping eyes on each other. Reaching Beckett, the lord motions Jack to stand beside Jones. He does so nervously, donning his hat, and Jones breathes menacingly in his face. Beckett steps forward and Jack saunters to the side making space between him and Jones

xml.sp: Beckett Advise your Brethren. You can fight, and all of you will die. Or you can not fight, in which case only most of you will die.

cutscene.desc: Elizabeth moves closer

xml.sp: Elizabeth We will fight. And YOU will die.

cutscene.desc: Elizabeth walks away, followed by Will and Barbossa. Meanwhile, Sora, Donald and Goofy return to the High Seas and look off to the north, where large clouds have begun to gather

xml.sp: Donald Look at those clouds!
Goofy That must be Shipwreck Cove, the place that Jack told us about.

cutscene.desc: They sail into the Northern Waters, the wind blowing through Sora's pirate garb

xml.sp: Donald The water looks turbulent in that direction.

cutscene.desc: Nearly to their destination, the fog looms heavy and out sails Luxord's ship

xml.sp: Sora Luxord!
Luxord Ahh, you do know how to make good time. Yes, one must simply marvel at your celerity. But, such compulsive behavior is eventually going to bring you nothing but sorrow.

cutscene.desc: He snaps his fingers and more ships appear around him as his disappears

xml.sp: Sora Lost him again.

cutscene.desc: Goofy blocks the sun with his hand, seeing the fleet of ships before them

xml.sp: Goofy How are we gonna go after him?
Donald First, get those Heartless!
Sora Right!

cutscene.desc: Sora steers the ship to the right, aiming the starboard cannons in the fleet's direction. Keeping the wind in their sails, they target the Heartless ships, managing to sink several of them. Once out of range, Sora turns again, but the maneuver slows their speed such that they take on some cannonfire, sending splinters of wood into the air. Getting the boat back on track, they are surrounded, with ships on either side planning to cut them off or ram into them. They ready both the port and starboard cannons as the wind direction changes, speeding them along. Seeing their chance to neutralize the threat if they can pass through to Shipwreck Cove faster than the fleet can catch them, they open fire on the enemy, sending bursts of wood and sail crashing to the depths of the sea. The fog lightens once safety is assured

xml.sp: Sora He's plotting to swipe the chest in the heat of battle.
Goofy To Shipwreck Cove!
Donald Fast!

cutscene.desc: Sora nods. Sailing into Shipwreck Cove, amongst the incredible amount of pirate ships Sora spots the Black Pearl as a torrent of crabs flow over the sides into the water. Calypso has been freed. Will looks up as the Leviathan pulls alongside

xml.sp: Sora Guys! Are you okay?
Will Sora... You're a welcome sight!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy board the Pearl

xml.sp: Elizabeth We've all been quite worried about you.

cutscene.desc: The sight of a few straggling crabs on the deck catches Sora's eye

xml.sp: Sora Isn't that...?
Elizabeth Sora?
Sora Where's Jack? And Tia Dalma?
Elizabeth I'm afraid you've missed a few things while you've been gone.
Will Jack... He's...he's been taken by Cutler Beckett.
Elizabeth Yes, and Beckett commands Davy Jones and the Flying Dutchman.
Will Barbossa thought we could defeat them if we released Calypso, the goddess of the sea, who was really Tia Dalma, bound in human form.

cutscene.desc: A crab scuttles up to Will's shoe, but quickly turns away from the obstruction

xml.sp: Will But it didn't work.
Barbossa Aye, a fickle goddess Calypso be.
Goofy So what now?
Barbossa Nothin'. Our final hope has failed us.

cutscene.desc: Sora remembers Tia Dalma's words once again

xml.sp: Tia Dalma Use that key to free me, Sora, and you have my most certain promise--all the power on the sea you ever wish for be yours.
Sora thinking So...Tia Dalma was Calypso. She's the one who was helping us.

cutscene.desc: He looks down at the crabs

xml.sp: Sora thinking And you know what? I think...that she might just be able to help us again.

cutscene.desc: He turns to Will and Elizabeth

xml.sp: Sora You can't give up now. We can all fight, together.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Sora The sea belongs to everyone!

cutscene.desc: The hopeful determination coming from Sora is infectious, even catching Barbossa's interest

xml.sp: Donald I said that. Don't copy my expressions!
Sora Huh? You did?

cutscene.desc: Donald nods vehemently

xml.sp: Goofy Sometimes it just goes in one ear and right out the other.
Sora Wait... Really?
Donald Yes!

cutscene.desc: Elizabeth looks toward the sky, where the wind has picked up. Mr. Gibbs follows her gaze, as does Barbossa

xml.sp: Elizabeth It's not over. There's still hope for us.

cutscene.desc: She turns, walking across the deck past the crew

xml.sp: Elizabeth You will listen to me. (shouting) Listen!

cutscene.desc: She ascends to the edge of the deck, grabbing hold of the rigging

xml.sp: Elizabeth The Brethren will still be looking here to us, to the Black Pearl, to lead. And they will see free men and freedom! Our enemy will see the flash of our cannons and hear the ring of our swords, and they will see the courage of our hearts as we succeed and they fail. Gentlemen... Hoist the colours!
Will Hoist the colours!
Sora Hoise the colours!

cutscene.desc: The rest of the crew release shouts of tenacity

xml.sp: Goofy Hooray!
Donald Oh boy!

cutscene.desc: The clouds above begin to rotate and sheets of rain begin to fall. Lightning strikes down at the sea as a giant whirpool begins to turn slowly. The two formations converge, the Black Pearl outpacing the pirate fleet and the Flying Dutchman outpacing the Armada. Between them the sea continues to swirl. The two warring ships sail into the maelstrom and ready their cannons, the Leviathan following the Pearl. Cannonfire thunders as the two ships battle across the abyss. In awe of this spectacle, Sora steers the Leviathan as the rain pelts down on him. Luxord appears on the quarterdeck and Sora whirls around

xml.sp: Sora I knew it was you!

cutscene.desc: Luxord walks to the edge of the ship, looking down at Jones's vessel

xml.sp: Luxord So that's the Flying Dutchman.
Sora The chest Jack told you about has the heart of Davy Jones in it. There's no way it's the chest that you're looking for!

cutscene.desc: Luxord gives a haughty chuckle

xml.sp: Luxord No one knows what's in the chest we're looking for. If it's a black box, then we are to collect it, simple as that.
Sora You don't know what's in it? Then why do you need it? How will you know you've found it?
Luxord Got me. Regrettably, the higher-ups haven't deigned to tell us. But they did say the box contains hope.
Sora Huh?
Luxord That's all you'll get from me.

cutscene.desc: He looks over at the Black Pearl, still firing on the Dutchman

xml.sp: Luxord Hmm, it's far to chaotic to find the box like this. Perhaps I'll remove that ship from the picture.

cutscene.desc: He snaps his fingers and the boat lurches upward as thick, slithering tentacles rise out of the water surrounding the Black Pearl. The crew dives out of the way as they crash down onto the deck. Barbossa holds tight to the helm as the ship is lifted high into the air by the Kraken. Sora's eyes grow wide

xml.sp: Luxord Now, this should afford me time to look.

cutscene.desc: Luxord vanishes in a corridor of darkness

xml.sp: Sora THEY'RE looking for hope?
Donald Hey!
Goofy Will and the others need us!
Sora Yeah, I know!

cutscene.desc: Sora maneuvers the Leviathan alongside the Kraken in an attempt to free the Black Pearl from its clutches. The Flying Dutchman uses this opportunity to fire on the Leviathan, expecting the Pearl to be crushed by the sea monster. Meanwhile, Jack has secretly escaped the brig on the Flying Dutchman and gotten his hands on the chest. He stops as Luxord appears before him

xml.sp: Luxord So, you got what you want. Perhaps you're the better player among us. However, I must demand you give THAT to me.
Jack Sparrow Pardon? You must be mistaken, mate. I'll not be giving you anything.
Luxord Then I invoke the right of parle--

cutscene.desc: Jack walks right up to him, wagging a finger in his face

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Uhp, no! No parley.

cutscene.desc: He presses further, causing Luxord to step back

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Look around. We're a little busy.

cutscene.desc: He nearly pins Luxord to the overboard railing and holds up the chest

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow And besides, I've already got all that I want, mate.

cutscene.desc: He breathes directly in Luxord's face. The stench is unbearable and causes Luxord to fall from the ship into the water. Jack cups a hand to his mouth and breathes again, slightly coughing himself

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Yup. Still works.

cutscene.desc: He walks further down the deck and comes face to face with--Davy Jones. Jack reels back in surprise

xml.sp: Davy Jones Jack Sparrow... Are you lost? Prisoners don't belong on deck. Your station is in the brig!

cutscene.desc: Jones swings his arm, or tentacle rather, and Jack starts to run as Sora, Donald and Goofy have come aboard the Dutchman

xml.sp: Sora We're here!

cutscene.desc: They jump down to the deck between Jack and Davy Jones, and summon their weapons. Jack turns to see them and laughs, unsheathing his sword

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Tables have turned, mate.

cutscene.desc: Lightning flashes

xml.sp: Davy Jones Hardly. Just a few more maggots to join my crew!

cutscene.desc: They attack the captain of the Dutchman getting in a few successful hits before the cursed pirate sinks into his ship

xml.sp: Davy Jones Over here!

cutscene.desc: He reemerges from the crow's nest above, cackling, as the tentacles of the Kraken rise up around the ship, swiping at Sora and the others. One tentacle spirals around Donald and squeezes him

xml.sp: Davy Jones Hahah! Fish food!

cutscene.desc: Sora rushes up the stairs and strikes down the squirming appendage, releasing Donald from its grasp. Davy Jones returns to the deck as the Kraken retreats, but is knocked back by Jack Sparrow

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Care to surrender?

cutscene.desc: Davy Jones growls at him, rushing forward with his sword. Jack jumps back, knocking away Jones's blows, until the swords cross at a standstill

xml.sp: Davy Jones The chest. Hand it over!
Sora Jack!

cutscene.desc: Sora tries rushing at them

xml.sp: Davy Jones Stay out of this, boy!

cutscene.desc: A tentacle crashes down to the deck in front of Sora, stopping him in his tracks, and a second one emerges from behind, trapping the three inside. The two ships are drawn closer in an ever-tightening circle as Jack and Davy Jones spar. The fight takes them to the yard atop the mainsail where they exchange sword blows. The giant masts of the two ships tilt toward each other before slamming together. Jack loses his balance and the chest falls, just as Will swings to the deck from the Black Pearl. He bends and picks up the chest, running across the deck as a tentacle emerges from the floor. It slithers beside him and knocks him over, spilling the chest from his hands to the rain-soaked floor. Davy Jones jumps down to the deck, walking towards the chest, when Jack drops drown in front of him. They strike each other with their swords and Jack moves so the ship's capstan is between them. Jack and Jones try to fake the other out in which direction to go around the capstan before Jones realizes the game's folly. Jones walks THROUGH the capstan, alarming Jack. He leaps from the capstan slashing at Jack, who knocks the sword down, before swinging back at Jones with his own. In a quick movement, Jones grabs Jack's sword with the large claw that is his left hand. Jack tries to push back, but Davy Jones cleaves his sword in two and punches Jack hard in the face with the same claw. Jack lands hard on the deck as Elizabeth swings in between Jones and the chest

xml.sp: Davy Jones Harridan! You'll see no mercy from me.
Elizabeth That's why I brought this!

cutscene.desc: She draws her sword as Will awakens. He looks over, seeing Elizabeth knocked away against the stairs, dropping her sword. As Jones moves in for the kill, he is run through with a sword by Will

xml.sp: Jones Missed. Did you forget? I am a heartless wretch!

cutscene.desc: Jones looks back at him before swinging around and kicking him in the face with his peg leg. Elizabeth brushes her wet hair out of her eyes as Will squirms on the deck of the Dutchman, weaponless. His eyes shift toward Elizabeth. Davy Jones looks from Will to Elizabeth

xml.sp: Davy Jones Ah. Love. A dreadful bond. And yet, so easily severed.

cutscene.desc: Jones lurches across the deck toward Will

xml.sp: Sora That's not true!

cutscene.desc: Jones looks over to see Sora, Donald and Goofy

xml.sp: Sora I may still have a lot to learn about love, but I know what it means to share my heart with others. And it will take more than you to break a bond like that.

cutscene.desc: Sora's words taste bitter in Jones's mouth

xml.sp: Davy Jones What does a whelp like you know about the heart?

cutscene.desc: Jack arrives

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow The whelp has seen far more of the world than you know.
Davy Jones Ha! What of it?

cutscene.desc: Jones raises his sword to Will's neck

xml.sp: Davy Jones Tell me, William Turner do you fear death?
Jack Sparrow Do you?

cutscene.desc: Jones turns, seeing Jack with the chest open, his broken sword aimed at Jones's still-beating heart. Above, Vexen watches the scene unfold

xml.sp: Vexen How disappointing. So this is all they meant when they said heart. We've been chasing the wrong box this whole time.

cutscene.desc: He angrily whisks away

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Heady tonic, holding life and death in the palm of one's hand.
Davy Jones You're a cruel man, Jack Sparrow.
Jack Sparrow Cruel is a matter of perspective.
Davy Jones Is it?

cutscene.desc: Without hesitation, Jones stabs Will Turner and cackles. Sora screams, leaping at him along with Donald and Goofy as Jack looks at Will, mortally wounded. Sora punches Jones in the face as Elizabeth races toward Will

xml.sp: Elizabeth Will? Will? Look at me. Look at me!

cutscene.desc: Jones knocks Donald and Goofy off of him before grabbing at Sora and doing the same

xml.sp: Davy Jones You will not forestall my judgment!

cutscene.desc: As he moves to strike Sora, he feels a sudden shooting pain and cries out in anguish. He blinks, looking back toward Will. Jones's heart has been stabbed. By Jack's shortened sword. And Will's hand is on the sword hilt. Davy Jones stumbles back, his mortality returning, and he falls over the rail, plummeting down into the sea, at one with Calypso at last. Barbossa is at the wheel of the Pearl

xml.sp: Barbossa She's taking us down! Make quick, or it's the Locker for us all!

cutscene.desc: The ships spin. The point of no return. On the Dutchman, Elizabeth weeps over Will's body

xml.sp: Sora Jack, can't we save him?
Jack Sparrow Part of the ship, part of the crew. The Dutchman must have a captain.

cutscene.desc: Jack grabs Elizabeth, pulling her away from Will

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Elizabeth, say good-bye.
Elizabeth No! I won't leave you!

cutscene.desc: She struggles briefly, but the grief is overwhelming. They escape to the Black Pearl once the ship wrenches free from the Dutchman and Will and the ship vanish into the whirlpool. The maelstrom ends as they regroup with the crew aboard the Pearl

xml.sp: Gibbs Thank goodness, Jack. The armada's still out there. The Endeavour's coming up hard to starboard. And I think it's time we embrace that oldest and noblest of pirate traditions.

cutscene.desc: His hands mimic the act of running away

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Never actually been one for tradition.

cutscene.desc: Mr. Gibbs and Elizabeth watch as Jack moves toward the wheel

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow In we go!

cutscene.desc: On the Endeavour, Beckett sees the Black Pearl, sails luffing, helpless. Below him on the gun deck, the cannon ports open and the cannons emerge

xml.sp: Beckett It's nothing personal, Jack. It's just good business.

cutscene.desc: The armada reforms behind him and Beckett sails in for the kill. Suddenly, the Flying Dutchman breaks the water's surface, up from the depths, sailing alongside the Black Pearl. A clean slate gray, no longer encrusted. On the deck, William Turner puts his hands on the helm, a dark, avenging anger in his eyes, now in control of the Flying Dutchman

xml.sp: Will Ready on the guns.

cutscene.desc: Elizabeth smiles

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Full canvas!
Barbossa Aye! Full canvas!

cutscene.desc: Will turns the wheel of the Dutchman as Barbossa does the same with the Pearl. On the Endeavour, Beckett's smile fades as the Dutchman and the Pearl split, sailing to either side of the Endeavour, trapping it between

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Fire!
Gibbs Fiiire!
Will Fire!
Barbossa Fiiiiiire!
Elizabeth Fire aaall!

cutscene.desc: The Dutchman and the Black Pearl open fire and we see the full fury of these two ships for the first time. Cannons blast and blast and blast, the crew on the Endeavour screaming in the furious broadside. Beckett stares in disbelief as his ship is blown to pieces

xml.sp: Beckett It's just...good business.

cutscene.desc: A mast falls and the deck gives way, the Endeavour sinking into the Caribbean. On the Black Pearl, the crew cheers. Donald and Goofy share a fist bump

xml.sp: Donald We did it!

cutscene.desc: Sora looks back at Elizabeth, who is staring out at the Dutchman

xml.sp: Gibbs The Flying Dutchman must have a captain. Just wed, and now she and Cap'n Turner must live in different worlds.

cutscene.desc: Will's gaze is drawn back to Elizabeth

xml.sp: Gibbs One day ashore, ten years at sea. It's a steep price.
Sora Will...

cutscene.desc: Gibbs walks up to Elizabeth

xml.sp: Gibbs Your chariot awaits, Your Highness.

cutscene.desc: She smiles, walking over to the crew gathered on deck. Barbossa addresses her

xml.sp: Barbossa Mrs. Turner.

cutscene.desc: She walks up to Sora, Donald and Goofy

xml.sp: Donald Elizabeth...
Goofy Take care.

cutscene.desc: She walks up to Jack Sparrow

xml.sp: Elizabeth Jack...

cutscene.desc: She smiles

xml.sp: Elizabeth Thank you.

cutscene.desc: She leaves

xml.sp: Sora One day isn't enough time.
Jack Sparrow There's always enough time for hearts to say what's true. Sora, you know better than anyone. It only takes a moment to connect with your mates... With your hearties.
Sora There's always enough time. And I'm going to find them.

cutscene.desc: Behind them, the Leviathan's magic wears off and it bursts into thousands of white crabs that sink into the ocean. Meanwhile, Axel sits alone in the Secret Forest in his usual black coat

xml.sp: Kairi Hey, Axel!

cutscene.desc: He turns to see Kairi in her new outfit

xml.sp: Axel Hey. Liking the look.

cutscene.desc: She giggles, showing it off

xml.sp: Axel Cut your hair, too.
Kairi Mm-hmm. So, you gonna try yours on?
Axel Uhh...I dunno. Maybe later.
Kairi But you always wear the same thing.
Axel If it ain't broke, don't fix it. This is how you pick me out of a crowd. I make myself easy to remember.
Kairi How thoughtful.
Axel Nah, not really...

cutscene.desc: He scratches his head and she giggles, sitting down next to him

xml.sp: Kairi Our training's almost finished.
Axel Yeah...
Kairi Somewhere inside me is Namin. If we can free Roxas, we can free her too.
Axel I guess so.

Kairi Namin was made when Sora freed me from his heart. So, now that she's a part of me again, I figured all was right. But she can't look at this forest, feel the wind on her face, none of it. And if she could, it would be different for her. Her time was short, but she lived it, and that makes it hers. What right did I have to take those feelings and experiences back? They don't belong to me. Nothing's as it should be. Not for her OR Roxas.

cutscene.desc: Axel takes in her words, agreeing

xml.sp: Axel I know.

cutscene.desc: He pauses

xml.sp: Axel Way back when I was a kid, I met this other weird kid. Somehow we became fast friends. Never saw him again--nearly forgot about him, too. Then, I met Roxas. Couldn't believe it. The two of 'em were identical. Oh, I didn't tell Roxas. Didn't want HIM to go vanishing on me, too.

cutscene.desc: He leans back on his hands

xml.sp: Axel The kid's name was Ventus. He's one of the lost Keyblade wielders we're looking for. Think he's still got ME memorized?
Kairi Oh yeah. Very memorized.

cutscene.desc: She points to her head and he laughs softly

xml.sp: Axel Now that we're going back, I'm worried about everything.
Kairi Well, you don't have to worry alone anymore, Axel.

cutscene.desc: He smiles at her. In the Dark World, Mickey and Riku are fighting the Demon Tower once again with their repaired Keyblades. The tower strikes at Riku twice, but he dodges before it slams into the ground, forcing him to jump away. The Shadows scramble across the sand as Riku catches his breath. From behind him, the energy rebuilds

xml.sp: Mickey Riku, look!

cutscene.desc: The Demon Tower wriggles in the air, bending over and twisting into Riku, knocking the Keyblade from his arms. It dissipates when it hits the sand

xml.sp: Mickey gasping Riku!

cutscene.desc: The swarm of Heartless knocks Mickey off his feet and he also drops his Keyblade, consumed by the swarm. Riku lifts himself up

xml.sp: Riku Mickey!

cutscene.desc: In the Woods of Twilight Town, just outside the Old Mansion, a corridor of darkness appears and Ansem, Seeker of Darkness strolls out of it, followed by Ansem the Wise. From behind a tree, Hayner, Pence and Olette watch

xml.sp: Pence more excited than impatient It's about time!

cutscene.desc: Hayner covers Pence's mouth

xml.sp: Hayner Heeey, shut it! C'mon.

cutscene.desc: He moves ahead as the two skulk behind him. As both Ansems walk into the courtyard, the trio peek out from behind the gate. Ansem the Wise stops just before the entrance door, forcing Ansem to turn around

xml.sp: Ansem What now?

cutscene.desc: Ansem the Wise looks up to the curtained window

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise Please. I have created enough victims.
Ansem Yes, you have. All the children sacrificed in the name of your research... So make things right.
Ansem the Wise I told you I did not take her. Her disappearance was why I put a stop to the research.

Ansem And that makes you honorable? You used Roxas and Namin and threw them away. I doubt there's a merciful bone in your body. You took the girl, and hid her. Now, show me the data you are hiding here.
Ansem the Wise Roxas and Namin... If there is any reason that I still draw breath, it is to atone for what I did to them.

cutscene.desc: Olette and Pence gasp

xml.sp: Pence He said Roxas.
Hayner Yeah.
Olette That man needs us.
Hayner Right.
Pence Yeah.
Ansem the Wise If you do find the girl, what is it that you expect will happen?
Ansem The child's memory holds a mystery to unravel--one concerning the battle we seek between light and darkness. You know something and that... is why you stopped the experiments.
Ansem the Wise You are completely deluded, Xehanort.
Ansem We shall soon see.

cutscene.desc: He grabs Ansem the Wise's shoulder and pushes him toward the door before Pence pops in

xml.sp: Pence Yoo-hoo!

cutscene.desc: Ansem stops

xml.sp: Pence 'Scuse meee!

cutscene.desc: Ansem whirls around at this interruption

xml.sp: Ansem Who are you?
Pence Oh, well, I'm looking for a friend who used to live here.

cutscene.desc: His distraction enables Olette to run inside the courtyard

xml.sp: Ansem No one lives here. Begone.
Pence stalling But sir...

cutscene.desc: He starts to approach them

xml.sp: Ansem No, no, no! Not one more step. Get out!

cutscene.desc: As he walks toward Pence, Olette rushes and grabs Ansem the Wise

xml.sp: Olette whispering This way!

cutscene.desc: Ansem spins around, seeing Ansem the Wise escaping as Hayner runs in, attempting to jump kick him from behind

xml.sp: Hayner Hey, loser!

cutscene.desc: The Dark Figure emerges from behind Ansem and catches Hayner in its grip

xml.sp: Hayner ...or not!
Pence Hayner!

cutscene.desc: The Dark Figure tosses Hayner at the brick wall of the courtyard but a strange white blob curls around him and cushions the blow. He bounces to the ground safely. More white blobs fly through the air from behind corners, like wispy trails. They surround Ansem and the Dark Figure, revealing themselves as Dusk Nobodies

xml.sp: Pence The squiggly things?

cutscene.desc: It uncurls from Hayner as he sits up in disbelief

xml.sp: Hayner They...protected me.

cutscene.desc: Pence grabs Hayner's arm

xml.sp: Pence Hayner! Get a move on!
Hayner Oh... Okay.

cutscene.desc: Pence helps Hayner up and the two run back to the Woods. Ansem focuses his attention on the Dusks

xml.sp: Ansem I serve the Organization. This is treason.

cutscene.desc: He sneers

xml.sp: Ansem I see what is happening. Have it your way then.

cutscene.desc: Olette and Ansem the Wise escape to the Underground and Hayner and Pence catch up

xml.sp: Olette Are you guys okay?

cutscene.desc: They catch their breath

xml.sp: Hayner Yeah, I think.
Pence Nobody knows the twists and turns of Twilight Town better than us.
Ansem the Wise You are Roxas's friends.
Hayner That's right. So you know him, too?
Ansem the Wise Oh yes. Quite well.
Pence Pay dirt. Guess it was worth staking out the old mansion after all, because this guy here is what I call a lead.

cutscene.desc: He reaches into his pocket and takes out the photo of them together with Roxas

xml.sp: Olette That's the only proof we have that Roxas was our friend.
Hayner Tell us about him. We wanna know him better.
????? My dear master. You are safe.

cutscene.desc: A cloaked man enters behind them

xml.sp: Hayner Who's there?

cutscene.desc: They whirl around, seeing the scientist with blond hair

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise Even, is that you? So...those Nobodies were your doing.

cutscene.desc: The wispy blobs float in behind Vexen and become Dusks again. Their appearance unsettles the trio. However, Vexen bows his head

xml.sp: Vexen I have been waiting for this. Gave up a normal life in order to plant myself in the Organization. And when I heard Xehanort had gone looking for you, I realized it was my chance to find you as well. For you see, I, too, wish to atone.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy leave the Caribbean and travel to a world of science and skyscrapers

xml.sp: Sora Oh, wow!

cutscene.desc: He laughs, amazed by the bright orange suspension bridge he arrives on

xml.sp: Sora Cool!
Donald C'mon, let's go!
Sora Aww, but I wanna take a look at the big city!
Goofy Yeah, it does seem pretty exciting.

cutscene.desc: He can hardly tear his eyes away from the skyline

xml.sp: Sora I feel so metropolitan! Uh, cosmopolitan?
Donald Not-apolitan!

cutscene.desc: Goofy giggles

xml.sp: Sora Ooh!

cutscene.desc: Sora takes out his Gummiphone

xml.sp: Donald Now what?
Sora I gotta tell Riku what a blast this place is.

cutscene.desc: He fiddles with the phone to Donald's annoyance

xml.sp: Goofy But we just got here. We haven't even done anything yet.
Donald Blast? I'll show you a blast!

cutscene.desc: An explosion rocks the bridge and they look down the road to see a cloud of smoke and a group of purple flying creatures

xml.sp: Goofy The Heartless!

cutscene.desc: They summon their weapons

xml.sp: Sora C'mon!

cutscene.desc: The rush forward just as a figure in a yellow suit flies over them. They turn back to see them slide against the pavement, a set of discs falling off their suit

xml.sp: ???? Go Go! You okay?

cutscene.desc: The trio look up to see something large and red flying in over them

xml.sp: Sora What in...

cutscene.desc: It lands with its rocket boots pointed toward the ground as the smaller purple-suited passenger jumps off its back, rushing to the yellow figure

xml.sp: ???? Go Go.

cutscene.desc: The boy looks over the fallen girl, then up to the robot in the red suit

xml.sp: ???? Baymax!

cutscene.desc: The robot scans the girl

xml.sp: Baymax Go Go's suit has shielded her from a major injury, but the blow she sustained to her head has caused a mild concussion. We should take caution and not move her until we can fully stabilize her head.
???? Got it.
Sora Oh, cool! That's a robot!

cutscene.desc: The trio runs up to them. Baymax and the boy turn around and the robot holds up a welcoming hand

xml.sp: Baymax Hello. I am Baymax, your personal healthcare companion.

cutscene.desc: Sora reacts in amazement

xml.sp: Sora Wow, cool! This rules!
Goofy Uh, Sora. Remember our other problem?
Donald The Heartless.
Sora Whoops! Oh yeah!
???? Hey! Who are you?
Sora Oh. (turning) I'm Sora.
Donald Donald.
Goofy And I'm Goofy.

cutscene.desc: Goofy waves and the boy smiles, running up to them

xml.sp: ???? Name's Hiro. You...mind helping us fight those things? Our team's called Big Hero 6.

cutscene.desc: Sora smiles

xml.sp: Sora Sure!

cutscene.desc: The group run across the Golden Gate Bridge

xml.sp: Hiro Let's go, Baymax!

cutscene.desc: Baymax shoots forward with his rocket boots, his wings engaged. The group tussles with the Heartless in the light of the setting sun. Traffic has stopped on the bridge due to the commotion as Pole Cannon Heartless appear, scattered between the cars. Sora slides to avoid their rocket fire and hides behind a red car

xml.sp: Goofy Sora! Go from car to car!
Donald Look above you!

cutscene.desc: Sora slides between cars, sniping the Pole Cannons. A great stomping quakes through the bridge as a giant Metal Troll Heartless makes its way toward them, knocking away cars in its path

xml.sp: Donald Look!

cutscene.desc: A yellow car becomes a missile swung by the Metal Troll's mighty axe, flying right at Sora and Donald. Donald screams and the two run as it crashes to the road, throwing up sparks against the pavement. The troll stomps closer, knocking the car away again

xml.sp: Sora It tried to crush us!

cutscene.desc: It hones in on Sora, roaring at him

xml.sp: Baymax You may reduce the risk of injury, by seeking cover.

cutscene.desc:
Together, they defeat the Metal Troll and regroup in Hiro's Garage. The Sokyo News releases an article about the attack that Hiro pulls up on his computer:
MYSTERIOUS MONSTERS ATTACK!
Crisis struck San Fransokyo today when a horde of unidentified creatures attacked the populace without warning. Local superteam Big Hero 6 was nearly deep-sixed when they came to the rescue, raising questions about just how prepared they are to protect the city. Will another group of crimefighters rise up in our hour of need? Or is there no force capable of containing this new threat? In the opinion of this humble reporter, the city's days are numbered, so grab your wallets, keys, kids, and pets, and get your kiesters to the airport before it's too late.

xml.sp: Go Go Not cool.
Honey Lemon People like spectacle, not truth.
Wasabi Yeah, who needs quality reporting when you can just make stuff up?

cutscene.desc: Hiro closes the article

xml.sp: Fred I don't get it. I mean, didn't they see how awesome we were?! Sure, those things landed a couple of good hits, but we had chem-balls, and laser hands, and fire-breathing!
Honey Lemon Well, it really didn't matter. They beat us.
Go Go Where'd they come from?
Wasabi Well... Why don't we ask the guys...who actually stopped 'em?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy chuckle

xml.sp: Honey Lemon Hiro, you never introduced us.
Hiro Oh, right.

cutscene.desc: He stands up from his chair

xml.sp: Hiro Well, uh, this is...the gang!

cutscene.desc: Outside of the red flying suit, Baymax resembles a rotund and squishy marshmallow. Hiro motions to the girl in the yellow suit with purple streaks in her hair

xml.sp: Hiro That's Go Go.

cutscene.desc: She regards them coolly. Hiro points to a tall guy with dreadlocks in a green suit

xml.sp: Hiro He's Wasabi.
Wasabi How ya doin'?
Hiro And that's Honey Lemon.

cutscene.desc: He looks up to a tall girl with long hair in a hot pink suit. Draped around her shoulder is an orange purse

xml.sp: Honey Lemon Hello there.

cutscene.desc: A three-eyed monster with an angry expression walks up to Sora

xml.sp: Sora Wha--?!
Fred I'm Fred. Don't be alarmed.

cutscene.desc: He jumps back and pulls down the hood of the costume, revealing a boy wearing a beanie

xml.sp: Fred This is not my real body.
Sora Good. For a second, I thought this was the monster w--

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy rush to cover Sora's mouth. He shuts up and Hiro turns to his gang

xml.sp: Hiro Those three are Sora, Donald, and Goofy, the, uh...

cutscene.desc: Sora looks on Hiro's computer, seeing a poster of Big Hero 6

xml.sp: Sora Keyblade Hero 3!

cutscene.desc: They strike a pose and a light shines behind them. The group doesn't react outwardly

xml.sp: Baymax I am detecting minute contractions in your faces and shoulders, perhaps due to the garage's brisk temperature.

cutscene.desc: He raises a finger

xml.sp: Baymax To remedy that, I will give each of you a hug and warm you with my internal heat source.

cutscene.desc: Baymax glows orange

xml.sp: Donald Hey, why did you say THAT?!
Goofy Sora, you know Donald and I don't have Keyblades.
Sora So? Are we heroes, or aren't we?
Donald Not here, we're not.
Go Go The monsters. Tell us how you managed to take them down.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods

xml.sp: Sora They're called the Heartless, and they're drawn to the darkness inside people's hearts.
Fred Ooh, now we're talking! Light versus darkness. Classic conflict!
Wasabi Would you calm down, Fred? This is serious.
Honey Lemon Very serious. We don't have any way to fight them.
Go Go Wait. So we're just gonna give up?
Baymax With our current skillset, my analysis places our chances at 0.0000--
Hiro Yup, we get it, Baymax.

cutscene.desc: They give a collective sigh

xml.sp: Sora Hey, don't sweat it. The three of us will go take care of the Heartless for you. Right, Donald, Goofy?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod. Hiro watches as they start to leave

xml.sp: Hiro Wait. We're going too.
Donald It's okay. We've got it.

cutscene.desc: Hiro shakes his head

xml.sp: Hiro We have to help. My brother would have.

cutscene.desc: He smiles and his friends agree, followed by Sora

xml.sp: Wasabi Great, buuut...don't we need a plan?
Fred We train up! When heroes are brought low, they get new powers.

cutscene.desc: He flips his hood back on and strikes a Wushu salute

xml.sp: Fred It's shugyo time!
Go Go Did you read that in Geek's Quarterly?
Hiro Fred's actually not wrong. I may have an idea.

cutscene.desc: Hiro hands Sora a futuristic-looking headset called an AR device

xml.sp: Sora AR device?
Hiro Yeah. Cool, huh? It creates a CG overlay that augments your vision. While you wear it, this device sees everything you do and logs it.
Sora Uh, huh...
Hiro You put it on your face.

cutscene.desc: Sora puts on the headset and Hiro steps aside to reveal a Shadow Heartless

xml.sp: Sora freaking out Heartless! Donald!! Goofy!!!

cutscene.desc: He summons his Keyblade

xml.sp: Donald Are you okay?
Goofy There's no Heartless here.
Sora Huh? But...uh...

cutscene.desc: Hiro steps back in

xml.sp: Hiro Whoa! Chill. Sora. Just take the AR device off.

cutscene.desc: Sora switches it off. Then back on again. Off. On

xml.sp: Sora Wow, I have no idea how you're doing it, but this is cool!
Hiro Thanks. But so far the map data only covers San Fransokyo. I need to expand it.
Fred impatiently Now can we shugyo?
Wasabi Not yet, Fred. He's still learning.
Honey Lemon Sora, all you need to do is run through some courses that Hiro scripted. Like a minigame.
Go Go We'll put a tracer on your movements so we can--

cutscene.desc: Fred starts jumping around, chanting

xml.sp: Fred Shugyo, shugyo, shugyo!
Go Go sighing So we can shugyo.
Goofy I guess shugyo's like training. That's a good idea. We could prob'ly use the practice.
Donald Speak for yourself.

cutscene.desc: Baymax lifts a finger

xml.sp: Baymax I can shugyo by installing new combat data.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy scratch their heads

xml.sp: Sora Huh?
Hiro Hey. Let's just try it out.

cutscene.desc: They head to the city. Sora rides on Baymax as he flies past a fish-shaped windsock overlooking the city, a trail of smoke spewing behind him. A high- pitched squeal and they shoot forward with his rocket boots, curving through the skyscrapers. Sora releases shouts of fear and delight as the red robot turns a quick right, then a left into the North District railroad tunnel. Flying back upward, then ducking beneath the red lanterns hanging from a giant archway, they pass an oversized statue of a sushi-cook which waves its mechanical arms. They meet up with Fred, Wasabi, Go Go, and Honey Lemon on the roof of a building. Baymax lands in a superhero pose, dropping off Sora, then taking off back into the sky. Sora hears Hiro's voice through his headset

xml.sp: Hiro Okay, guys. Go through the rings and head for the goal.

cutscene.desc: A tunnel of colored rings appear in Sora's vision through the AR device

xml.sp: Sora & Company Okay!
Hiro I'll be here to help you out remotely.
