cutscene.desc: Fred, Wasabi, Go Go, and Honey Lemon jump from the roof following their own path of virtual rings. Baymax flies overhead

xml.sp: Hiro Start with the rings right in front of you. Head toward the indicator on your AR device. Try and stay on course. If you start to veer off, you'll know. I put up a virtual boundary.

cutscene.desc: Sora rushes ahead collecting the colored rings on the building in front of him before dropping to the street below. He hops aboard a railing as Go Go rolls by him on her wheeled boots

xml.sp: Go Go Ya gotta keep up, Sora!

cutscene.desc: More rings appear along the path as Go Go splits off to the right

xml.sp: Hiro Jump side to side and go through the rings. You got this!

cutscene.desc: Sora jumps from rail to rail, making his way to a building with a high- powered fan. He shoots into the air collecting a string of rings as Fred jumps in the air beside him, Wasabi clutching the suit's tail

xml.sp: Fred This is awesome!

cutscene.desc: Wasabi's whimpering in fear implies that it isn't awesome for everybody

xml.sp: Wasabi Come on... Can't we do this on the ground?

cutscene.desc: Fred cackles and Sora lands on a gigantic red ball with the face of a Daruma. His balance starts to shift as the ball rolls forward off the building

xml.sp: Sora Whoa!

cutscene.desc: It lands on the road beneath and Sora begins rolling along down the street

xml.sp: Hiro Okay, I didn't program this. But, you can handle it. Just improvise.

cutscene.desc: Sora collects rings with the ball and hops off at the base of a skyscraper

xml.sp: Hiro Climb up the side of that building. And watch out for enemy fire.

cutscene.desc: As Sora runs up the skyscraper, Honey Lemon creates colorful platforms by tossing chem-balls from her purse to ascend beside him

xml.sp: Honey Lemon Don't you just LOVE chemistry?

cutscene.desc: Sora reaches the roof of the skyscraper where the rings extend out from the building

xml.sp: Hiro Sora, time to fly. Go full superhero!

cutscene.desc: Sora airsteps off the building, flying through the rings to the windsocks hanging in the air as Baymax flies ahead. Sora catches up to Baymax

xml.sp: Baymax You are near the goal.

cutscene.desc: Proceeding further, Sora reaches for a virtual star high above a building and Baymax catches him on the way down. Later, Sora runs down the street as Go Go races alongside him. He summons his Keyblade and airsteps to a post ahead, surprising her. He jumps from the post to a building and begins running up the side, magical blue dust eminating from him. She stops, watching him run

xml.sp: Go Go Interesting. Gravity--not binding.

cutscene.desc: A virtual Tireblade Heartless in flight mode swoops down at Sora and his AR Device locks onto it. Jumping ahead, he drives the Keyblade through it, releasing the heart from within. More appear as he reaches the top of the building, where Wasabi is. Sora changes the form of his Keyblade into Double Arrowguns and shoots down the Heartless with ethereal arrows

xml.sp: Wasabi Hey, wait. My laser hands...

cutscene.desc: He looks down at his energy-covered gauntlets

xml.sp: Wasabi ...can be projectiles!

cutscene.desc: Honey Lemon hides near a group of virtual Pole Cannon Heartless, thinking up a strategy to defeat them, while Sora reaches the edge of the building and changes his Keyblade to the Magic Launcher, striking the enemies with a charged cannon

xml.sp: Honey Lemon Ooh! Change the weapon, change the attack.

cutscene.desc: Sora runs ahead into a group of Tireblade Heartless. He jumps to the right ascending the building as the Heartless engage their flight mode and follow him. Sora aims his Keyblade and releases a Blizzara spell, shattering the Tireblades, as Fred watches from below

xml.sp: Fred Whoa. A freeze attack!

cutscene.desc: He looks down at his claws

xml.sp: Fred Fire...and ice. Diametrically opposed...or SO WE THOUGHT!

cutscene.desc: He takes off excitedly and Sora hops down

xml.sp: Hiro Thanks, Sora. That should be enough data. And I think you sparked some new ideas.
Go Go Yeah! Hiro, I think there's a way to--

cutscene.desc: They all start talking at once in Sora's ear. He winces at first, but smiles

xml.sp: Fred Hey, are you listening?

cutscene.desc: Back in Hiro's Garage, Hiro is enthusiastically typing at his computer, creating updates for his pals' gear. Goofy and Honey Lemon create new elemental combinations for her chem-balls. Wasabi praises Hiro on his new gauntlets and Donald imagines having one of his own. Fred gives Hiro difficult specifications for his suit, but Sora comes up with an easier solution. The data from Sora is updated for Baymax to use and Hiro ejects the data chip from the drive. He walks up to Baymax and presses the port on the robot's chest. It opens, displaying Baymax's chip slots. Hiro inserts the updated battle chip into Baymax and the port closes

xml.sp: Hiro That...should do it.

cutscene.desc: The video on Hiro's computer suddenly broadcasts a news update

xml.sp: Action 7 News We interrupt your scheduled program to deliver this breaking news. Moments ago, the city's South District was attacked by numerous unidentified creatures.

cutscene.desc: They rush to the screen, seeing Heartless marching through the city

xml.sp: Action 7 News Witnesses describe losing sight of victims during the mayhem. Many also said they saw strange, floating heart symbols in the vicinity of the missing victims. City police are urging citizens to stay at home. For those just joining us, only minutes ago the South District was attacked by--

cutscene.desc: Hiro closes the broadcast and turns to Sora, who nods

xml.sp: Sora & Hiro Go time.

cutscene.desc: The rest of the group agree. They make it to the South District, where people are fleeing the chaos. Sora turns down an alley, finding a large group of various Heartless as Baymax catches up

xml.sp: Donald Heartless!
Hiro Sora, above you!

cutscene.desc: Sora looks up and his AR Device searches for a target. A large shape is moving on the roof of a building

xml.sp: Hiro I'm picking up some kind of threat.
Sora Okay, I'll check it out.
Hiro Run up the buildings if you have to. Watch out for those enemies on the building.

cutscene.desc: They fight the Heartless from the ground to the roof, where they're surrounded by Mechanitaur Heartless. They take the group out and Sora dispels his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora Piece of cake.
Hiro Wait, Sora! Something big's coming your way.

cutscene.desc: There is a large crash in the middle of the city as a titanic Catastro- chorus Heartless stomps through. It eyes a green car on the road and chases after it, terrorizing the driver. It jumps onto an overpass, sending citizens screaming for their lives. Baymax flies over carrying Sora, Donald and Goofy as the giant dinosaur-like Heartless bellows loudly. They spot it from above

xml.sp: Sora Gotcha! I'll take care of it.

cutscene.desc: Baymax's rocket boots engage and he swoops down with a superhero landing, knocking Donald off and Goofy off-balance. Sora jumps down from Baymax's back as the Catastrochorus stomps toward them. Sora summons the Keyblade as it gives off another roar

xml.sp: Hiro That thing's massive! Stop it, or it's gonna wreck the city!

cutscene.desc: The dangerous dino sends huge fireballs from the volcano on its back as it stops across the pavement. Sora gets in a few good hits before it leaps to the top of a skyscraper, its roar sending shockwaves around the city

xml.sp: Hiro The target's moved up onto one of the buildings. You gotta go after it. I marked the target so you don't lose track of it.

cutscene.desc: They take care of the smaller Heartless that pop up to bar their way to the building. After ascending to the roof, the dino tail has formed into a small cloud with eyes, sending bolts of lightning to strike at them. Sora evades the lightning and pummels the Catastrochorus until it falls. Sora returns to ground level, scanning for more threats as Go Go is being chased by a small group of Heartless

xml.sp: Go Go Just try and catch me.

cutscene.desc: She speeds ahead, charging her magnetic disks from the friction against the ground. She leaps into the air as she reaches a building, engaging the electromagnetic suspension to defy gravity. Spinning around, she stops midair on a high story window, facing the ground below and the Heartless persuing her. Smirking, she tosses a disk, which slices through the Heartless near the ground before flying back to her arm, and drops back down off the building. A few blocks down, Wasabi stands on a rooftop shooting his plasma lasers at a group of flying Tireblades. They dodge most of his attacks, starting to wear him out, but Honey Lemon runs in from behind

xml.sp: Honey Lemon excitedly I've got an idea!

cutscene.desc: She tosses a purple chem-ball at the Heartless which bursts into a purple cloud of smoke

xml.sp: Wasabi Hey!

cutscene.desc: She starts typing in a new combination into her purse

xml.sp: Wasabi I can't aim if I can't see!

cutscene.desc: Out from her purse comes a red chem-ball and she smiles, tossing it into the cloud. It turns into a solid block of purple hexagons, trapping the Heartless inside, and falls to the ground

xml.sp: Honey Lemon Better?
Wasabi Much better.

cutscene.desc: She smiles at him and he aims his gauntlets to the ground, destroying the block with the Heartless inside. As it bursts into a puff of smoke, Fred leaps through into another group of Heartless

xml.sp: Fred Freeze!

cutscene.desc: Fred blows a torrent of icy wind from the mouth of his monster suit, freezing the Heartless in place. Then, switching to fire, becomes a human flamethrower, unfreezing them

xml.sp: Fred Whuh? Oh, I get it...

cutscene.desc: He jumps into the air, now spewing out fire and ice together, eliminating the Heartless flying above him

xml.sp: Fred It's a combo move!

cutscene.desc: Up in the sky, Baymax flies in, engaging the rocket boosters on his armored fist. It shoots away from him and flies through the Heartless fighting Sora, Donald and Goofy. One Tireblad avoids the attack and flies in front of Sora, who grits his teeth and takes it down in one strike. The fist returns to Baymax's arm and he lands near them

xml.sp: Sora Nice, Baymax!

cutscene.desc: Baymax raises a fist

xml.sp: Sora What?
Baymax Now, we fist bump.
Sora Fist bump?
Baymax To display excitement. Hiro taught it to me.
Sora So, like...this?

cutscene.desc: Sora taps his fist against Baymax's, while Donald does the same with Goofy's

xml.sp: Baymax Bah-la-la-la-la-la-la.

cutscene.desc: Baymax flutters his fingers upward in the air

xml.sp: Sora Bah-la-la-la-la-la-la?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy do the same with confused looks. Suddenly, a Metal Troll drops from the building behind them. The three summons their weapons

xml.sp: Goofy Get ready!

cutscene.desc: They rush forward

xml.sp: Sora Another one?!
Honey Lemon We're here!

cutscene.desc: They turn to see Hiro, Fred, Wasabi, and Honey Lemon ready to fight

xml.sp: Wasabi Ugh! Can't we pick on one our own size?

cutscene.desc: Go Go rolls in

xml.sp: Go Go It looks the right size to me.
Fred Watch me scorch 'em with my freeze-nado! The only tornado made of ice AND fire.
Donald You took on the wrong court magician.
Goofy And the wrong captain of the guard.
Sora Prepare to face Keyblade Hero 3!
Donald Oh, come on...
Hiro And the crime fighting team of Big Hero 6! Together, we're unstoppable.
Everyone Yeah!

cutscene.desc: They run forward and clash with the Metal Troll. Later, the group relaxes atop the Golden Gate Bridge, treating themselves to chocolate ice cream bars. Fred jumps around Donald, excited

xml.sp: Fred Was that awesome...or was that TOTALLY AWESOME?! Haha! Jumping!
Donald Yeah, I was pretty good.
Honey Lemon Your magic is amazing. Do you think I could study it sometime?
Donald Why not?
Goofy You just made Donald's day.

cutscene.desc: Honey Lemon giggles. They sit and watch the sunset

xml.sp: Hiro My brother wanted to help people. Now, we try to do the same.
Sora Your brother?
Hiro looking down Yeah, Tadashi. There was a fire, and now he's gone.

cutscene.desc: Go Go shares Hiro's grief

xml.sp: Hiro But he always wanted to make a difference. He cared about people. That's why he worked so hard to create Baymax.
Sora I'm sorry.

cutscene.desc: Hiro and Sora take bites of their ice cream

xml.sp: Hiro He's still here. In Baymax. In all of us.
Sora Tadashi--he lives on in your hearts.
Hiro Yeah. Right. He will always be a part of us in some way.

cutscene.desc: Sora leans back

xml.sp: Sora And when you're not strong enough, he'll make up the difference.

cutscene.desc: Morning bells ring and Sora becomes Roxas as Hayner, Pence and Olette eat sea-salt ice cream beside him, if only for a moment

xml.sp: Hiro Sora. You okay?
Sora Yeah. Fine.

cutscene.desc: Hiro takes another bite as Sora looks down at his hand, coming to his senses, and places it over his heart

xml.sp: Sora I'm with you.

cutscene.desc: Later at night, the friends walk through the city together. Fred stretches after a long day while Hiro and Sora chat. They hear an odd sound woosh behind them and whirl around

xml.sp: Sora What?!
Goofy What's that?

cutscene.desc: They see a jellyfish-shaped cluster of blocks floating through the air

xml.sp: Go Go Great, they're back.
Wasabi Oh, we got this.
Honey Lemon Time for a lesson.

cutscene.desc: Fred closes his hood and jumps ahead

xml.sp: Fred Cheee-aaarge!

cutscene.desc: Fred, Wasabi, Honey Lemon and Go Go charge ahead after the strange entity. Hiro engages his headset and analyzes the threat

xml.sp: Hiro Wait! Uh, guys! That one's not like the others!

cutscene.desc: They fail to hear him

xml.sp: Hiro It can't be. Microbots?
Sora Microbots? You know what they are?
Goofy Well, they're different from Heartless.
Donald Uh-huh.
Hiro Microbots are designed to do whatever you think via a neural transmitter...that communicates what you're...

cutscene.desc: He trails off upon seeing their ever-more confused faces

xml.sp: Hiro They're kind of a mini-bot I invented. Some bad stuff happened and I thought that meant they were totally gone. But those enemies are way too similar. Which means someone's controlling them. The question is who.

cutscene.desc: He gasps

xml.sp: Hiro Could it be?

cutscene.desc: He puts on a determined face

xml.sp: Hiro I'm gonna go back to the garage and look into it some more. You mind going after 'em?
Sora Sure!
Donald You bet!
Goofy Of course!
Sora We need you on the sciency stuff.

cutscene.desc: Sora puts on his visor and Hiro smiles

xml.sp: Hiro Baymax... Stick with 'em.
Baymax All right, Hiro.

cutscene.desc: The trio start walking in the direction of the block monster

xml.sp: Baymax Sora, Donald, Goofy, I will be your personal healthcare companion.

cutscene.desc: Sora smiles

xml.sp: Sora Thanks, Baymax. We're in good hands. C'mon, let's move!

cutscene.desc: They search the city for the enemy while Hiro races home

xml.sp: Hiro Sora, I just marked the target's position. Look for the indicator.

cutscene.desc: Sora leads them to the North District. The blocks fly behind them, causing Baymax to turn around

xml.sp: Baymax Target acquired.

cutscene.desc: He points upward and the strange entity floats above a building, wiggling its blocky appendages

xml.sp: Hiro They're not microbots... Be careful!

cutscene.desc: The body folds its arms into a heart shape. It floats down at them, partially glowing red, and shoots red blocks in their direction. They evade the attacks, but are unable to make headway against its shifting form

xml.sp: Sora It's no fair! Why can't we hurt it?
Donald Magic is no good.
Goofy What do we do?

cutscene.desc: It spirals aside and changes direction, flying elsewhere in the city, faster than they can run after it

xml.sp: Sora This is weird.
Hiro Sora, you guys all right?
Sora Oh... Yeah, but the target escaped. Have you got any leads?
Hiro Tons. Somewhere inside that thing, there is a core. It's what powers the whole cluster. The core is the only way to hurt it.

cutscene.desc: Sora sees the analysis readout in his headset

xml.sp: Wasabi Now he tells us.

cutscene.desc: Wasabi lets out a scream

xml.sp: Hiro Wasabi! What happened?
Wasabi Let's just say it's a handful.
Hiro Team, check in.
Honey Lemon So far, so good.
Go Go Guys, I'm really tired of just dodging this thing.
Fred Freddit getting frustrated!
Hiro Guys, I'm on my way.

cutscene.desc: Honey Lemon shoots a chem-ball, creating a pink blobby platform against the side of a building as the cubes persue her. It attacks, and she jumps to another platform

xml.sp: Honey Lemon No, Hiro!

cutscene.desc: She continues running as the shifting bots attempt to strike Fred, but he counters by freezing its appendages

xml.sp: Fred Hiro, you analyze the Darkubes.
Wasabi Wait, did you just say Darkubes?
Fred Yeah. They're dark, they're cubes. I call 'em like I see 'em. Every bad baddie needs a cool name.

cutscene.desc: The blocky arms begin to free themselves

xml.sp: Go Go Yeah, that's not cool.

cutscene.desc: Honey Lemon pops out a yellow chem-ball from her purse as the Darkubes slam into the building opposite her

xml.sp: Honey Lemon We'll gather as much data from the Darkubes as we can.

cutscene.desc: She tosses the yellow chem-ball against the pink platform she stands on and it bursts into a blue cloud of smoke, just in time for the Darkubes to strike. Wasabi shoots his plasma lasers at the Darkubes long arms, bursting loose blocks from the main body. The arms swipe at him, but he dodges

xml.sp: Wasabi Hiro, figure out a way for us to beat this thing!

cutscene.desc: He looks up and jumps just in time to dodge another strike. Go Go blades down the city, jumping over the railway as the Darkubes fly after her

xml.sp: Hiro But guys, I can't leave you out there all alone.
Go Go Hiro. We are a team. And teams delegate. We need you at the garage. We trust you, so you trust us.

cutscene.desc: He nods

xml.sp: Hiro Fine. I'll look for a way that we can expose the Darkubes' core. Just keep that data coming.
Everyone Copy.
Sora Hiro, what should WE do?

cutscene.desc: Hiro busily types away at his computer

xml.sp: Hiro You protect the others.

cutscene.desc: A map appears on the screen with the locations of the four heroes

xml.sp: Hiro I'll mark their position for you on your AR display.
Sora, Donald & Goofy We got it!

cutscene.desc: They summon their weapons

xml.sp: Sora Time to go, Baymax!
Baymax All right.

cutscene.desc: They start racing through the city to the nearest hero

xml.sp: Hiro Sora, the Darkubes are gonna be tricky to bust open. You'll have to assess everyone's situation and--
Sora Improvise! I know.
Hiro Cool. Good luck!

cutscene.desc: In the Central District they reach Honey Lemon's indicator, but don't see her

xml.sp: Sora Honey Lemon!
Honey Lemon Hey, Sora? I think I'm stuck. See if you can find the residue from my chem-balls. If you hit it with fire or electricity, it might trigger a chain reaction!

cutscene.desc: The Darkubes holding Honey Lemon are gathered in the center, with each arm held down by different colored blobs. Sora strikes an orange one with a Fira spell and the Darkubes' arm falls off. He repeats this with different spells on each blob until the arms pulse with an orange glow along its arms and Honey Lemon busts free

xml.sp: Honey Lemon Gracias, Sora! Next time I won't go so easy on them.

cutscene.desc: She hops away

xml.sp: Hiro Honey Lemon! I'm glad you're safe.

cutscene.desc: They approach Wasabi's indicator at the top of a blue-ringed skyscraper where he finds a large orb of Darkubes

xml.sp: Sora Wasabi! Can you hear me?
Wasabi Sora! Am I glad to see you! I am not a big fan of heights. Hey, you think it dragged me up here 'cause it's scared of being attacked from above? See if you can get the drop on it.

cutscene.desc: Sora leaps over a high-powered fan, which sends him soaring over the Darkubes. On his descent, he readies his Keyblade with a laugh, slamming it into the Darkubes. An orange pulse radiates through the blocks until Wasabi busts out, landing on the rooftop

xml.sp: Wasabi Finally! Thanks for the save, Sora. I'll see if anyone else needs help.

cutscene.desc: He jumps to the edge of the building and, swallowing his fear, leaps off

xml.sp: Hiro Wasabi, good to see you're all right.

cutscene.desc: Sora descends the building, seeing a large rolling ball made of Darkubes which matches Go Go's indicator

xml.sp: Sora Go Go! Are you in there?
Go Go Sora! I don't know how to stop this thing. I tried slowing it down with my discs.
Goofy You see anything big you can smash against it?
Donald Hey... What about that big red thing from the shugyo?

cutscene.desc: They pass the giant red ball from earlier and Sora leaps aboard

xml.sp: Go Go Sora! C'mon, hurry!

cutscene.desc: Sora rides the ball through the North District to cut off the rolling Darkube in its path. He crashes it directly into the Darkubes, which crackle with electricity, before falling to pieces. Go Go bursts out and lands on the pavement

xml.sp: Go Go Thanks. I owe ya.

cutscene.desc: She rolls away as Sora continues his search

xml.sp: Hiro Doesn't look like you're hurt, Go Go.

cutscene.desc: They reach Fred's indicator, where he is trapped in a bunch of Darkubes suspended between four light posts

xml.sp: Sora Fred! You okay?
Fred I'm getting pulled in too many directions! Do you think you can free my arms and legs? Gotta find a weak point and loosen the Darkubes' grip!

cutscene.desc: Spinning horizontally on each light pole, the Darkubes' arms fall away and the central mass starts to give

xml.sp: Fred Yeah!

cutscene.desc: The blocks explode in all directions as Fred leaps out of it

xml.sp: Fred Super juuump!

cutscene.desc: He lands, making sure his hood stays on

xml.sp: Fred Pure appreciation, my man.

cutscene.desc: He turns

xml.sp: Fred My citizens! They need me!

cutscene.desc: He hops away

xml.sp: Hiro Glad you're okay, Fred. Listen, Sora! The Darkubes have converged on a single location.

cutscene.desc: The Darkubes gather on the top of the tallest building in San Fransokyo

xml.sp: Hiro Whatever's happening can't be good. I'm almost done pinpointing the core. If you need me to help--
Sora Nah, it's okay, Hiro. We're on it.
Hiro Thanks.
Donald Get a move on!

cutscene.desc: The Darkubes resemble fireflies as they float in the air of the South District as Sora and company reach the top of the skyscraper. They amass into the largest orb of blocks so far, its outer layer rippling as they arrive

xml.sp: Go Go Okay, there's a lot of them.
Goofy What do ya suppose they'll do?
Wasabi I don't think we wanna find out.

cutscene.desc: Fred hops closer

xml.sp: Fred I say we destroy this thing!
Donald Yeah!
Honey Lemon But without a strategy, we'd just be wasting our strength.
Sora If we knew where to strike...
Hiro Sora! I got it! I'm sending you an AR software update. It'll show you where the core is--the Darkubes' weak point. I'm coming to help.

cutscene.desc: The AR display glitches like an old videotape

xml.sp: Sora Huh? That's weird. Is it busted?

cutscene.desc: He attempts to press the button on his headset, but it has no effect. Looking ahead, he sees a cloaked figure walking in his direction

xml.sp: Sora Hiro, who's that on the display?
Goofy That's not the display. He's really here.
Sora Huh?
Go Go The black coat... He's back?
???? Are you done messing around?
Sora What? Wait, that voice...
Wasabi Hold on. You...know this guy?
Fred And now...enter the supervillain.
Honey Lemon He definitely has the vibe.

cutscene.desc: The figure removes his hood, revealing shoulder-length silver hair just like...

xml.sp: Riku Funny.

cutscene.desc: Sora dispels his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora Riku... But...

cutscene.desc: Riku conjures a red object from thin air

xml.sp: Riku As if this stupid experiment wasn't already a hassle.
Hiro Huh? Where'd he get that?
Sora Hiro, do you recognize it?
Hiro Yeah...

cutscene.desc: Riku holds it up, peering at it with his yellow eyes

xml.sp: Riku Not quite ready.
Hiro That's the first chip I made for Baymax. It's full of combat programs.

cutscene.desc: The chip has a skull and crossbones drawn on it. Big Hero 6 reacts with shock and disbelief

xml.sp: Sora Programs?
Hiro Yeah, they tell Baymax how to react.
Goofy Does that mean...it's like his heart?
Donald Kind of...

cutscene.desc: Riku faces the Darkubes

xml.sp: Riku More then!

cutscene.desc: He tosses the chip into the nest of Darkubes before vanishing in a corridor of darkness

xml.sp: Sora Riku!

cutscene.desc: The Darkubes assume a heart shape and begin to spin uncontrollably, glowing a bright greenish-blue. Its arms lash out, knocking Go Go, Wasabi, Honey Lemon and Fred off the building

xml.sp: Sora Oh no!
Hiro Sora, I'm on my way. I'll look after my team. You guys fight the Darkubes! Remember to use the AR device to target the core!
Sora I got it!

cutscene.desc: The Darkubes aim and shoot a spurt of blocks in their direction, but they dodge the attack. Assuming a heart shape once again, the core is exposed as a small single block with glowing yellow eyes. However, the core is too high for Sora to reach. Without warning the Darkubes glow red and slam into the ground, swiping away at the group before reassembling in the air as a giant fist. Sora dodges away as it narrowly misses a deadly punch from the blocky foe. Forming a heart shape again, Sora takes the initiative

xml.sp: Sora Baymax! Full thrust!

cutscene.desc: Sora rides on Baymax's back

xml.sp: Sora Go, Baymax!
Baymax Full speed!

cutscene.desc: Baymax engages his rocket boots and flies through the center of the Darkubes. Sora and Baymax strike at the central core repeatedly until the outer blocks fall still, disappearing until only the central core is left. It falls to the ground and Sora releases a final strike, freeing the heart inside from the Heartless. The red chip clatters to the floor

xml.sp: Hiro Baymax...

cutscene.desc: Hiro runs over and kneels to pick up the chip

xml.sp: Riku Oh, this isn't for you.

cutscene.desc: Riku snatches it up first

xml.sp: Riku At least not until we're done.

cutscene.desc: Hiro attempts to get it back, but Riku jumps to the top of a device on the roof

xml.sp: Sora Riku... Is it you? Why do you look like that?
Riku Looks are deceiving, but the heart? You know that it's me.
Sora I know Riku wouldn't do this. Not without a good reason.
Riku A reason? When did that ever matter? We've been trying to one-up each other since we were kids.
Sora What...?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy rush in front of Sora

xml.sp: Donald Don't listen to him, Sora!
Goofy The coat means he's with Organization XIII! And THAT means he's not really Riku.
Dark Riku Smarter than you look.
Goofy We defeated Ansem and Xehanort--every last one of 'em. But still they all came back anyway, right? So, maybe this Riku came back too, from the time when Ansem possessed him.
Donald Yeah, from the past!
Sora What? How?
Dark Riku Unlike a certain wizard you know, I had to play by the rules to travel through time. Which meant leaving my body behind.

cutscene.desc: Sora remembers Young Xehanort's explanation of time travel

xml.sp: Sora I know about this...

cutscene.desc: He looks up at Riku

xml.sp: Sora But...YOU HAVE a body.

cutscene.desc: Riku smirks

xml.sp: Dark Riku Xehanort's heart left his body in order to voyage back through time. He needed to tell his younger self of the great plans he had in store. There in the past, his heart stayed, and waited out the years until you and I came along. Xehanort's heart possessed me and became Ansem, the first adversary you faced. The rest of him, the piece he left behind, took the name Xemnas and created the first Organization. It was all a part of a larger plan to bring Xehanort into contact with the right hearts--enough of them to form the real Organization XIII. They could come from anywhere, any WHEN...just as long as he had the right vessels at hand to place their hearts in.
Sora Vessels?
Donald & Goofy Replicas!
Dark Riku That's right. The Replica Program was a success. We are as real as people.

cutscene.desc: Sora dispels his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora Then pack up and leave! What are you still doing here?
Dark Riku To see if we can recreate a heart from data.
Sora What?
Dark Riku chuckling darkly Sorry, did we steal your idea? That walking balloon over there has a heart.

cutscene.desc: He looks at the chip in his hand

xml.sp: Dark Riku At least that's the nonsense I'm supposed to believe.
Sora There are hearts all around us. You only have to see them for them to become real.
Hiro Where'd you get that? That's my chip. I made it.
Dark Riku Oh, well, I'm sorry about that. But I promise I'll put it right back where I found it.
Hiro What do you mean?

cutscene.desc: Riku turns away from them

xml.sp: Dark Riku I think I'll be getting back to work now.
Sora No!
Hiro Wait!

cutscene.desc: Riku vanishes

xml.sp: Hiro We gotta stop him. Guys--

cutscene.desc: Hiro looks back to his friends, who are worn out from tonight's events

xml.sp: Baymax You are all suffering from acute exhaustion. I recommend rest.
Hiro Yeah, you're right. Let's regroup.

cutscene.desc: They return to Hiro's Garage

xml.sp: Fred C'mon, guys. What's with all the long faces?

cutscene.desc: Fred jumps to the center of the room

xml.sp: Fred Did you forget that we WON?!
Go Go Fred. Not now.

cutscene.desc: He agrees and stops

xml.sp: Hiro His name is Riku? And you know him?
Sora Yeah... Well, I know A him.
Donald That one is a fake!
Goofy The fake one's with Organization XIII, our arch-nemenies.
Wasabi Okay, but how'd he get Hiro's chip?
Honey Lemon And what did he mean about an experiment?
Go Go And what do they want?

Sora He said they're trying to recreate a heart from data, but I don't know what they REALLY want. None of us do. These guys, they show up--and instead of fighting fair and square, they go for the heart and say things to try and get under your skin. They're cowards. And now, they're doing it to you, too. It's our fault.

cutscene.desc: The trio look down

xml.sp: Hiro No. This could be good. That chip might finally be able to give me some answers.
Sora You said that you made it, right?
Hiro Yeah. This Baymax--he's actually the second model. Uh, no offense.
Baymax I am a robot. I cannot be offended.

cutscene.desc: Hiro smiles

xml.sp: Hiro It's a long story. But the first Baymax and the chip I made...vanished into another dimension along with the microbots. The chip's back... So the first Baymax might be back too.
Honey Lemon Hiro...

cutscene.desc: There is silence for a moment

xml.sp: Baymax Those who suffer a loss require support from friends and loved ones.

cutscene.desc: He motions toward the others in the room and there is a big crash that shakes the entire building

xml.sp: Fred What was that?
Wasabi I don't know.

cutscene.desc: Hiro rushes to his computer and pulls up a breaking news broadcast reading Mysterious Monsters Renew Attacks. Giant flying creature terrorizing San Fransokyo. Police to impose curfew. The screen shows a visual of the Darkubes

xml.sp: Sora Guys, c'mon!
Hiro Team, let's go!

cutscene.desc: Meanwhile, Maleficent and Pete walk along the overpass of the quiet city. Dark Riku enters behind them, causing them to turn around

xml.sp: Dark Riku Why are you snooping around?
Maleficent That would be none of your concern.
Dark Riku Overstep, and darkness will consume you again.
Maleficent What an interesting thing to say. I shall do anything I please. As should you.
Dark Riku Oh, I intend to.

cutscene.desc: He leaves them

xml.sp: Pete Who's he? Friend of yours?
Maleficent Yes. Though I could not tell you from when.

cutscene.desc: Later after sunrise, the gang finds the Darkubes above a tall building

xml.sp: Go Go Hope it's learned some new tricks.
Wasabi Yeah, now it's gotta face ALL of us.

cutscene.desc: Baymax lands on the roof

xml.sp: Honey Lemon That's right.
Fred Freddie want to destroy!
Baymax Our probability of success is--
Hiro You don't have to crunch the numbers, Baymax.

cutscene.desc: Hiro walks forward

xml.sp: Hiro It's not the sum of our parts. It's the sum of our hearts.
Sora Yeah.

cutscene.desc: Riku smiles

xml.sp: Dark Riku Which adds up to what?

cutscene.desc: They look up to the flying wind sock, where Riku is perched, staring down at them

xml.sp: Dark Riku Show me.

cutscene.desc: He leaps down off the wind sock, summoning the Soul Eater, using it to slice through the Darkubes core. He lands on the ground, dispelling his weapon as the Darkubes disintegrate. He stands, a piercing grin on his face, and holds up the chip, which brims with darkness

xml.sp: Dark Riku Almost there.
Sora What?!

cutscene.desc: Riku kicks a few of the blocks, which move slightly, glowing a faint red

xml.sp: Dark Riku This pile of junk collected the data we needed... The terror of being attacked without warning... The despair of having no place to run... The longing for vengeance...
Sora A heart's more than that!
Wasabi It's working together.
Donald & Goofy Smiling at something funny.
Hiro Trusting friends.
Sora In every heart, there's hope.
Big Hero 6 Yeah!
Dark Riku You're right.
Sora Huh...?
Dark Riku That's why I made sure our creation fought YOU. Now the data contains a complete heart.
Sora A heart made from conflict? That can't be real.
Dark Riku interrupting What was it you said? I only have to see it for it to become real? So, let's see it.

cutscene.desc: Riku turns toward the Darkubes and raises his arm. A dark portal appears in the sky and the Darkubes begin to float, being pulled as if by magnets into the portal, some glowing red, and others, green

xml.sp: Dark Riku First, we need a vessel.

cutscene.desc: Once the Darkubes have all been gathered into the portal, they return out in a single round mass, all glowing red with lightning bolts dancing around its outside. It descends slowly, pulsating

xml.sp: Go Go What's going on?
Honey Lemon Another Darkube form?
Fred Doesn't look as bad as the last one.

cutscene.desc: He chuckles nervously

xml.sp: Goofy It could be a trick.
Wasabi Usually is.
Donald We can stop it!

cutscene.desc: The Darkubes begin to recede and a white arm emerges from the mass of blocks, surprising Hiro. Sora summons his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora Yeah.
Hiro Wait! That's...Baymax.
Sora What?!

cutscene.desc: Sora looks from Hiro to the Darkubes

xml.sp: Sora No way.

cutscene.desc: They slowly recede from Baymax's body, but unlike his usual red armor, he is clad in a deep purple suit with spiked pauldrons. His right arm is covered in miniature Darkubes shaped in an oversized fist. He lands in front of Riku. Big Hero 6 exchange looks of concern

xml.sp: Hiro Baymax...
Dark Riku Don't bother. This puppet has lost his heart. He won't wake up.
Hiro He's not a puppet! Baymax, he's like my family. Please! Give me back my friend.

cutscene.desc: Riku laughs darkly

xml.sp: Dark Riku Yes... I did promise I'd put this back where I found it.

cutscene.desc: He lifts up the red chip and Dark Baymax's port opens as Riku inserts the chip. The port closes and Dark Baymax's eyes glow red

xml.sp: Dark Riku But there's one piece missing. Sora, you're the one who's going to complete this heart.
Sora Yeah, right.
Dark Riku You can't have a heart without sadness...without loss. You see, you're going to destroy Hiro's friend right in front of him.

cutscene.desc: Riku disappears in a corridor of darkness

xml.sp: Sora Wait!

cutscene.desc: Dark Baymax engages his wings and takes off into the sky. They realize that he's heading for Hiro

xml.sp: Everyone Hiro!
Baymax Oh no.

cutscene.desc: Go Go, Wasabi, Honey Lemon, and Fred try to intervene but Dark Baymax swipes them away. Sora, Donald and Goofy hold Dark Baymax back from Hiro, when Baymax 2.0 punches him away. Dark Baymax sails through the air and over the edge of the building. The others run back to Hiro

xml.sp: Go Go, Wasabi, Honey Lemon & Fred Hiro...

cutscene.desc: Dark Baymax rises back to the roof, his Darkube arm becoming more of a claw. Donald and Goofy run forward

xml.sp: Sora Hiro, tell us. What should we do?

cutscene.desc: Hiro clenches his fist

xml.sp: Hiro Baymax means everything to me. But that chip isn't who he is.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy hold Dark Baymax back

xml.sp: Hiro I already made this mistake once before. Tadashi wouldn't want there to be a Baymax that hurts people. Sora, he has to be stopped.
Sora Okay. Help Go Go and the others. You can leave this guy to us.
Hiro Thank you.

cutscene.desc: Sora smiles before rushing forward just as Dark Baymax knocks Donald and Goofy away. He flies back up into the air

xml.sp: Sora Oh no!
Hiro Sora, take Baymax!
Sora Okay! Baymax!
Baymax I am ready, Sora.

cutscene.desc: Baymax readies his wings and flies to Sora, extending his arm. Sora grabs it and leaps on Baymax's back. They ascend into the skies of San Fransokyo, following Dark Baymax. They fly through the city streets as Dark Baymax shoots Darkubes back at them. Sora shoots magic bolts at Dark Baymax as Baymax 2.0 punches the Darkubes back at him. They sail through each District, over and under the railways in an effort to catch up with the dark robot. Dark Baymax pulses with purple energy as they corner him in the South District

xml.sp: Sora What?

cutscene.desc: A surge flows through Dark Baymax and the red behind his eyes flash, Darkubes sparkling in the air around him. He strikes aggressively with his large claw and Baymax and Sora dodge backwards. Dark Baymax extends his wings and raises his arm, summoning a torrent of dark rain upwards that falls back down, cascading in Sora's direction. With a quick boost from Baymax's rocket boots, they aerial dodge as it narrowly misses them

xml.sp: Sora We'll stop him together!
Baymax Understood.

cutscene.desc: Baymax 2.0 flies at the Dark Baymax, performing an uppercut and interrupting his summoning of Darkubes. Immediately, Sora continues his barrage of magical bolts as Baymax pummels Dark Baymax

xml.sp: Baymax Knife Hand. Roundhouse. Hammer Fist.

cutscene.desc: Sora leaps off of Baymax from above his dark doppelgnger and as Baymax persues Dark Baymax from behind, Sora drops in above him, knocking him away. Baymax swoops by and Sora grabs his extended hand, leaping onto his back again and dispelling his Keyblade. Baymax jolts, being pulled backwards as Dark Baymax grabs onto his rocket boots and swings Baymax and Sora toward the ground. Baymax regains his orientation and clutches Dark Baymax's own rocket boots, pulling him down. Sora screams as their descent results in a tussle through the air. Dark Baymax's large claw grasps Baymax's arm, but Baymax knocks it away and engages the rocket in his fist, punching Dark Baymax away from him. As Baymax reaches the ground, he slows his descent with his rocket boots as Dark Baymax crashes to the earth. Baymax 2.0 turns back as his fist returns to his suit. Sora leaps off Baymax and rushes to the dark robot, which sparks as electricity courses around the broken armor. Donald and Goofy arrive with the others

xml.sp: Sora Guys... Hiro...

cutscene.desc: They rush past him and Hiro stops at the sight of the fallen Baymax

xml.sp: Wasabi So...did we stop him?
Hiro Safety mode kicks in if he's put under too much stress, so he's probably just in stasis.

cutscene.desc: He kneels down by his friend

xml.sp: Hiro We'll have to destroy the chip if we want to be certain.
Honey Lemon But...are you sure?
Fred Yeah, dude...you don't need to go THAT FAR.
Go Go Maybe we can find another way.

cutscene.desc: Hiro shakes his head and taps open the port on Dark Baymax's chest. He removes the red chip

xml.sp: Hiro It's the right thing to do.

cutscene.desc: The Darkubes fly into the air in spirals as Baymax's armor starts to glow a bright red. The cubes blink away, leaving behind the white pillowy form of Baymax. Hiro places a hand on his friend

xml.sp: Hiro Tadashi would've done the same thing.
Sora But Hiro...isn't that Baymax's heart?

cutscene.desc: Hiro places a hand over his own heart

xml.sp: Hiro It's okay. Baymax is HERE.

cutscene.desc: He opens his palm, looking down at the red chip

xml.sp: Hiro I...should be the one.

cutscene.desc: Hiro destroys the chip. Later, they gather in Hiro's Garage

xml.sp: Hiro Ow?

cutscene.desc: Eyes open

xml.sp: Baymax Hello, I am Baymax, your personal healthcare companion.

cutscene.desc: They rejoice as Baymax is restored and Hiro rushes to hug him

xml.sp: Fred Two Baymaxes!

cutscene.desc: Baymax 2.0 hugs Hiro as well as Goofy and Donald laugh, everyone chattering excitedly

xml.sp: Sora This is great, Hiro!
Hiro Yeah, thanks.
Sora So, uh, do you think I could take one of them with me?
Hiro Uh, that's a no.
Sora What? Come on.
Hiro No. Who's gonna repair him?
Sora One. Just one of them!

cutscene.desc: Hiro sighs

xml.sp: Sora C'mon. Pleeease?
Hiro He's MY personal healthcare companion?

cutscene.desc: After unsuccessfully convincing Hiro, the three pals leave their new friends in the big city of San Fransokyo. They return to Le Grand Bistrot in Twilight Town. After giving Little Chef more ingredients, they walk out of the restaurant with Scrooge

xml.sp: Sora Hey, Little Chef, your bistro turned out to be a big hit!

cutscene.desc: The rat smiles and nods from atop Sora's head

xml.sp: Goofy Yeah, everybody in the whole town loves it.
Donald Good idea, Uncle Scrooge.
Scrooge Aye, naturally! But to be perfectly honest, I'm actually a wee bit surprised myself.

cutscene.desc: He scratches his temple

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, Uncle Scrooge, I thought you had this all planned out in advance.

cutscene.desc: Sora turns to face Scrooge

xml.sp: Sora Wait, didn't you?

Scrooge Oh, I had the business side of it planned down to the finest detail--the open air theatre, the flyers, the promo data--the whole kit and caboodle. But that wasn't enough. It was Little Chef's commitment to his craft--his desire to put smiles on everyone's faces--that made the bistro a success. A heart that cares that much is like a giant magnet that grabs ya and pulls ya right in.
Goofy That must be why we like hangin' around Sora. Don'tcha think so, Donald?
Donald Yeah!
Scrooge Aye, and perhaps why Little Chef took such a shinin' to you in the first place.

cutscene.desc: Sora's eyes move upward to Little Chef's direction. He moves his arm and the rat runs down to his hand, facing Sora. Sora chuckles and high-fives Little Chef with his finger

xml.sp: Scrooge Folks are hungry for connection, so you lads keep 'em well fed.
Sora Sure thing! Right, Little Chef?

cutscene.desc: Little Chef nods confidently, winking. Later, they return to their Gummi Ship. Sora's Gummiphone starts to ring and Jiminy leaps into his shoulder as he pulls it out

xml.sp: Jiminy Sora, somebody's callin' us on the Gummiphone.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy walk to Sora's chair and Sora answers the call. Dale appears on the screen way too close to the camera

xml.sp: Dale We got baaad news.
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: Chip yanks Dale away from the camera

xml.sp: Chip We totally lost contact with the King and Riku! They're all on their own in the realm of darkness!
Sora, Donald, Goofy & Jiminy Whaaat?!
Sora See? I knew I shoulda gone!
Donald Chip, how do we get to 'em?
Sora NOW we can ask?
Goofy It's not like we can use that big old door anymore. It's completely gone.
Sora Yeah, we closed it after beating Ansem.
Jiminy And we certainly can't ask the King or Riku.
Sora 'Cause you wouldn't LET me ask.

cutscene.desc: Dale pushes Chip out of the way

xml.sp: Dale Only King Mickey can open a door to the realm of darkness.
Sora, Donald & Goofy Huh?

cutscene.desc: Chip pushes Dale away and Jiminy hops down

xml.sp: Chip It's because he has a special Keyblade of darkness. He figured out how to make it open the way.
Sora sighing Oh...
Goofy Gawrsh, what'll we do then?

cutscene.desc: Donald groans

xml.sp: Sora May my heart be our guiding key. It'll show us the way.

cutscene.desc: Sora stands and summons the Keyblade, aiming it ahead of him. The tip glows and a portal opens outside the ship

xml.sp: Jiminy, Donald & Goofy A gate!

cutscene.desc: Sora puts away the Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora But where does it lead?
Donald It doesn't matter! Go!
Goofy Hurry, Sora!
Sora Okay.

cutscene.desc: Sora sits at the controls and pilots the ship through the wormhole, the portal closing behind them with a ripple. The bright warm sun shines down on the sandy beaches of the Destiny Islands. Sora, Donald and Goofy walk along the seashore

xml.sp: Sora Why do you think that gate took us here?

cutscene.desc: Walking further down the beach, Sora comes upon a Keyblade in the sand, the teeth of the blade forming the shape of an 'E'. Sora kneels down and picks it up

xml.sp: Sora A Keyblade?
Donald It looks so old.

cutscene.desc: He holds it in both hands, looking it over

xml.sp: Sora How did it end up here?
Goofy Hmm, maybe it's another guiding key.
Sora Sure, but to guide us where?

cutscene.desc: He aims it forward and a beam erupts from the blade, striking a corner of the beach where a tree meets a rockface. The area glows, revealing a door. They rush over to it

xml.sp: Goofy A door!
Donald Let's go.

cutscene.desc: Sora closes his eyes, steeling himself

xml.sp: Sora Not you guys.
Donald & Goofy Huh?

cutscene.desc: Sora takes a few steps forward

xml.sp: Sora The realm of darkness--it isn't safe for you.
Donald Forget it. I'm going.
Goofy Yeah. You can't make a whole pint without us.

Sora Come on, guys, think about it. Even the King and Riku struggled in the realm of darkness. Someone needs to stay out here, just in case. If something happens to the rest of us, you two need to carry on.
Donald sadly Sora... (angrily) Stop it!
Goofy We understand, but we don't want you goin' someplace dangerous on your own.
Sora Thanks, guys. But I'll be fine. I'll make sure Riku and the King are safe. Trust me.

cutscene.desc: He smiles and Donald and Goofy exchange concerned looks. They nod softly to each other

xml.sp: Donald You promise to be good?
Goofy And come home nice and safe?
Sora Right.

cutscene.desc: Sora turns around and enters the Secret Place. In the Dark World...

xml.sp: Mickey Riku, look!

cutscene.desc: The Demon Tower wriggles in the air, bending over and twisting into Riku, knocking the Keyblade from his arms. It dissipates when it hits the sand

xml.sp: Mickey gasping Riku!

cutscene.desc: The swarm of Heartless knocks Mickey off his feet and he also drops his Keyblade, consumed by the swarm. Riku lifts himself up

xml.sp: Riku Mickey!

cutscene.desc: The Demon Tower coalesces under swirling winds into an orb of darkness before Riku's very eyes. Purple fragments gather within the orb, pushing out of it. The bubble bursts and a dark figure leaps out landing on the gray sand. King Mickey watches from his prison in the orb as the dark figure walks toward his Keyblade, picking it up

xml.sp: ???? This Keyblade...

cutscene.desc: Mickey gasps at the familiar voice

xml.sp: Mickey Is it her?

cutscene.desc: The darkness peels away at the woman, revealing blue hair

xml.sp: ???? Mickey...

cutscene.desc: She turns, revealing her yellow eyes

xml.sp: Anti-Aqua You're too late.
Riku Aqua?
Mickey What happened?
Anti-Aqua You abandoned me, that's what. Left me in this shadow prison for more than a decade, knowing what it would do to me...
Mickey I'm sorry. It's all my fault.

cutscene.desc: She turns and walks to the shoreline

xml.sp: Anti-Aqua I reached this shore after endless wandering. Waited forever for help to arrive. But no one ever came.

cutscene.desc: She walks over the water

xml.sp: Anti-Aqua I lost my Keyblade. Had no means of fighting my way back through the Heartless. You should have known I was stranded. Do you have any idea how lonely it is here?

cutscene.desc: These words speak to Riku

xml.sp: Anti-Aqua How frightening it is to have no one?

cutscene.desc: Riku clenches his fist in the sand

xml.sp: Anti-Aqua All that's left in my heart is misery and despair...and now, you can share it!

cutscene.desc: Riku walks toward her

xml.sp: Riku There's no need. Got my own.

cutscene.desc: In Riku's heart, a version of Riku from the past wearing the dark clothes of his possessed self walks to his side, the Riku Replica. In his hand he holds a special Keyblade, the Way to the Dawn. He looks over at Riku and smirks, before vanishing into particles of light. Riku clenches his fist again and summons his Keyblade, walking over the water after Aqua. The orb holding Mickey floats over the water between them, becoming a swirling mass of Shadow Heartless once more. He strikes at the swirling mass, sending Shadows flying left and right. The Demon Tower takes on a purple aura and splashes downward, the Heartless's eyes glowing red, as Anti-Aqua appears, raising the Keyblade in her hands

xml.sp: Anti-Aqua Enough!

cutscene.desc: She summons large icy spikes, sending them careening toward Riku, before releasing the Demon Tower once again. Riku lands back on the water, breathing heavily

xml.sp: Riku Sora...

cutscene.desc: A light shines from above and a door appears, the same door from the Destiny Islands. Sora soars in, landing with a splash on the water

xml.sp: Sora smiling I made it!

cutscene.desc: Riku smiles back at Sora and dispels his Keyblade as the Demon Tower swirls in front of them. Both Sora and Riku hold their arms out together, eminating a brilliant white light. Above, two colorful Keyblades, Nightmare's End and Mirage Split join together to form a giant two-handled blade. Sora and Riku lift their arms, raising the powerful Keyblade, which glows with a warm light. They throw their arms forward and the light washes over the Demon Tower, dispersing the Shadows inside. They release Mickey from their hold, sending him falling to the beach with a shout. Riku rushes over to him and Anti-Aqua races after him. She raises the Keyblade as Riku summons his just in time. The blades clash, sending up a gigantic splash. As the misting water falls away, Sora is holding back Aqua's Keyblade from Riku, sparks flying from the blades' contact. Riku stands with his mouth agape. Anti-Aqua leaps backward. Sora looks back at Riku, giving him a reassuring smile, which Riku returns

xml.sp: Riku How, Sora?

cutscene.desc: Sora dispels his Keyblade and summons the one he found on the island

xml.sp: Sora I...had a little help. Watch over the King. I've got this.
Riku Okay.

cutscene.desc: Riku rushes back to Mickey as Sora dispels the Master's Defender in favor of his own Keyblade to face down Anti-Aqua. She teleports over the water, sending a strike of dark energy in his direction. She spirals on the water, summoning a dark Blizzard spell. Two identical clones appear wielding the same spell, closing in on Sora. They release shards of ice that whiz by Sora's head, just missing him, before encircling him in a glowing snowflake. He narrowly dodges, but is struck by an icicle. He runs forward, but Anti- Aqua teleports three times in succession, causing him to miss with each strike. For a moment, he sees no one on the water, waiting with bated breath, but then he turns his head. She walks slowly away from him

xml.sp: Anti-Aqua Shouldn't have abandoned me...

cutscene.desc: Sora's eyes lock onto her and he leaps into the air. Suddenly, she cartwheels to the side and strikes again. Sora catches himself, but at his chance to strike, she vanishes again. She reappears with multiple illusory copies of herself

xml.sp: Anti-Aqua I've wandered the shadows endlessly...
Anti-Aqua You don't know what true loneliness is...
Anti-Aqua I've waited for so long...
Anti-Aqua Now you can share in the terror I've felt!

cutscene.desc: Sora sends multiple projectile attacks until they hit their mark, exposing the true Anti-Aqua as the doppelgngers disappear. As Anti-Aqua reels back from the onslaught, Sora goes in for the final blow. She takes a few steps back, holding her head as darkness pools at her feet. With labored breaths, she stumbles backwards, releasing her hold on the Star Cluster Keyblade. It glows and disappears away from her. As she falls backwards if in slow- motion, the darkness she harbors chips away. Aqua lands in the pool of darkness and sinks into the water. Above, a light shines through the blue abyss. She opens her equally blue eyes

xml.sp: Aqua So...this is the end.

cutscene.desc: She closes her eyes, assuming for the final time

xml.sp: Sora Aqua!

cutscene.desc: At the voice, she opens them again seeing a boy holding out his hand, reaching for her. She met this boy once. What was his name?

xml.sp: Aqua Sora...

cutscene.desc: She extends her hand and they touch, a brilliant light erupting from it. Warm like the sun. She opens her eyes. The sky is blue and the waves are calm and the sand is soft. In the haze of the light from the Destiny Islands, Aqua sees Ventus and Terra

xml.sp: Ventus Aqua!
Terra Aqua!

cutscene.desc: Her surprise turns to comfort

xml.sp: Aqua Ven... Terra...

cutscene.desc: The haze starts to clear and the images of Ven and Terra become that of Sora and Riku

xml.sp: Sora Aqua!
Riku Aqua!
Aqua It's you...
Mickey Thank goodness. You're awake!

cutscene.desc: She turns to see him

xml.sp: Aqua Mickey...

cutscene.desc: She looks around at the environment, still sitting on the sand

xml.sp: Aqua Are these...the Destiny Islands?
Mickey That's right.
Aqua When did they fall to darkness?

cutscene.desc: Riku shakes his head with a smile

xml.sp: Riku You're in the realm of light.

cutscene.desc: The revelation strikes a chord, the emotion welling up inside her, the weight of the loneliness and despair that she had been holding onto for years suddenly exits her body in the form of tears. Seeing this, Sora extends a warm hand

xml.sp: Sora You're home.

cutscene.desc: His smile is infectious

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy You're home!

cutscene.desc: Donald rushes forward to hug her, along with Mickey. Goofy joins in

xml.sp: Mickey Welcome home.

cutscene.desc: Sora grabs hold of Goofy and they all release a relieving laughter. Riku puts a hand on Sora's shoulder

xml.sp: Sora We did it!

cutscene.desc: Meanwhile in Radiant Garden, Vexen speaks with Demyx

xml.sp: Demyx WHAAA--?!

cutscene.desc: Vexen clamps a hand over Demyx's open mouth

xml.sp: Vexen hissing Quiet, you dunce!

cutscene.desc: He looks around warily and Demyx releases his hand

xml.sp: Demyx But, dude, why would you pick me?
Vexen I cannot let the chosen catch wind of this, understand?
Demyx Oh, I see! It's because I got benched!

cutscene.desc: He wags a finger in Vexen's face

xml.sp: Vexen yelling I got benched too!
Demyx Wha--

cutscene.desc: Demyx covers Vexen's mouth this time

xml.sp: Demyx Hey! Quiet!

cutscene.desc: Vexen looks around again and Demyx lets up. Vexen coughs awkwardly, regaining his composure, and sighs, turning away from Demyx

xml.sp: Demyx Okay, man, look. Real talk? Backstabbing those guys would be stupid. If they find out, we are yesterday's toast. I mean, what's in it for me?
Vexen Forgiveness.
Demyx Huh? For what?
Vexen Men like us--in the pursuit of science, we sometimes make terrible mistakes. Lose sight of our mission to help people. But now I can help someone with my research. Now, I can atone.

cutscene.desc: Demyx narrows his eyes

xml.sp: Demyx I'm not a scientist.

cutscene.desc: He turns away, but Vexen rushes after him

xml.sp: Vexen Wait, wait, wait!

cutscene.desc: He grabs him by the shoulder

xml.sp: Demyx C'mon, dude. I'm useless, I'm chicken, we're not friends. I can count the number of times you and I have hung out on one hand--LESS than one hand! I didn't even KNOW you in the old life!
Vexen Fine, FINE! But listen.

cutscene.desc: He waves him closer and whispers in Demyx's ear

xml.sp: Demyx Huh? No way!
Vexen It's true. The whole thing was HIS idea.
Demyx Huh? No stinkin' way.

Vexen He wants to atone too. But, he is one of the chosen, so his hands are tied. Hence my actions on his behalf, hence my need for you to act on MY behalf should all go awry. As you said, we are far from friends. No one would ever suspect you.
Demyx Hmm... So I'm not doing any fighting?
Vexen Correct. And more importantly, no benchwarming.

cutscene.desc: He smiles and does a small leap

xml.sp: Demyx Ha! Yeah baby! Sign me up.

cutscene.desc: He swings around making happy fists in the air as Vexen rolls his eyes

xml.sp: Demyx Yes! Demyx time.

cutscene.desc: Inside the castle, Ienzo stares at the computer screen, which displays an image of Ansem the Wise from a decade ago

xml.sp: Ienzo We've come a long way toward reconstructing Roxas's heart. But a vessel... Without that... Yeah, right. Bodies don't grow on trees, Ienzo. It's the backup plan or nothing now. But...the backup plan isn't a true solution.

cutscene.desc: A corridor of darkness appears behind him

xml.sp: ????? Finally. 'Bout time.

cutscene.desc: Ienzo whirls around, seeing Demyx enter, carrying something wrapped in a white cloak. He chuckles, looking around

xml.sp: Demyx Ooh. Nice place.
Ienzo Demyx? Is that you?!

cutscene.desc: Demyx raises an arm

xml.sp: Demyx Hey, Zexion! Long time!

cutscene.desc: Demyx lays the cloaked bundle on the floor and rotates his shoulder and stretches his neck

xml.sp: Demyx How's humanity treatin' ya? I rejoined the Nobodies, but, like...I just can't shake the feeling I've been sweet-talked, y'know?

cutscene.desc: He walks up to Ienzo

xml.sp: Demyx We have sooo got to have a chat.
Ienzo Whoa, back up. What?
Demyx Oh! Sorry, sorry. I'm gettin' ahead of myself. I'm actually here on a top secret mission. Apparently I'm so off everyone's radar, that I'm just the guy to handle a special delivery.

cutscene.desc: He walks back to the corridor of darkness and places his hands on his hips. He moves aside as if presenting something

xml.sp: Demyx Ta-daaah!

cutscene.desc: Out of the corridor walks Ansem the Wise

xml.sp: Ienzo flummoxed Master Ansem!

cutscene.desc: The portal closes and Ansem the Wise stands with his hands behind his back

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise Ah, well me, little Ienzo.

cutscene.desc: Aeleus and Dilan run into the room, equally shocked, both speechless. Ienzo steps forward, his feelings twisting and turning inside his stomach

xml.sp: Ienzo choking back tears They told me you'd gone mad. That you abandoned us. I was just a boy, but I should have known better. I am truly, deeply sorry.

cutscene.desc: Ansem places his hands on Ienzo's shoulders

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise I think what matters is that you recognize the mistake. Peace, Ienzo.

cutscene.desc: Ienzo looks up at him

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise It was I who was consumed by hatred--who failed you in my obligations as your mentor. Forgive me.

cutscene.desc: Aeleus comforts a remorseful Dilan and Demyx interjects with a nervous laugh

xml.sp: Demyx So, uh...are we cool to get on with things here?

cutscene.desc: He points to the bundle on the floor

xml.sp: Demyx Got ya a present from Vexen. One was all he could manage for the time being, but hey, he figured you guys would know what to do with it.

cutscene.desc: They look down at the replica in the cloak

xml.sp: Ienzo A vessel!

cutscene.desc: Later, Sora, Donald and Goofy accompany Aqua down a foggy road

xml.sp: Goofy You sure about this, Aqua?
Sora If you want, we can take you back to Master Yen Sid's tower to rest with Riku and the King?
Donald Uh-huh.
Aqua Thank you. But...Ven's expecting me. I promised to wake him. Said I'd be right back, but I'm not even close. I'm in for an earful.

cutscene.desc: She smiles to herself and the trio exchange glances as they arrive at Castle Oblivion. Aqua takes a deep breath with her hand over her heart. Donald looks from Aqua to the castle, then back to Aqua. Then the castle. Then Aqua. Then he starts getting impatient, tapping his finger on his arm. Just as he decides he's finished waiting, Goofy clamps him up, muffling his squawking, as Aqua summons the Master's Defender. Donald taps on Goofy's hand to get his attention. They watch as Aqua aims the Keyblade at the castle doors, a Keyhole appearing with a dazzling light. Donald breaks free from Goofy's grip and the three stare in amazement. The wind whips around them and Aqua steels her resolve. She thrusts the Keyblade forward and a beam of light sparks forward into the Keyhole. The trio shield themselves from a burst of wind, while Aqua stares unblinking as the seal on the castle breaks. A projection of her former home rises on the face of the castle and the many towers and floors readjust themselves to match the projection, untwisting and untangling the endless halls, everything clicking into place. The shadowy darkness of the clouds around the castle are pushed back to reveal the brightest blue sky of the world knows as The Land of Departure. They walk forward in awe of their surroundings. Inside the castle, they walk through the entrance hall taking in its splendor. Aqua turns to face them

xml.sp: Aqua Ready?

cutscene.desc: The three of them nod and they walk through the golden halls and ascend the stairs to the Great Hall, where they find Ventus sleeping in the center of three large chairs. Aqua rushes to his side

xml.sp: Aqua Ven.

cutscene.desc: She touches his face and places her head to his

xml.sp: Aqua I'm sorry it took so long.

cutscene.desc: He doesn't stir and she tries to shake him

xml.sp: Aqua Ven, wake up. Open your eyes, please!

cutscene.desc: He still doesn't stir

xml.sp: Aqua Why? Your heart never found its way home?
??????? That was a neat trick.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy turn to see Vanitas walk in

xml.sp: Vanitas No wonder no one could find him.
Sora Vanitas!

cutscene.desc: Aqua rushes forward, glaring

xml.sp: Aqua Why are you here?
Vanitas Oh, I'm sorry to interrupt your touching reunion, but surely you won't begrudge me a moment with my brother?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald and Goofy summon their weapons and rush at him. Vanitas chuckles and vanishes as they reach him. He reappears behind them, but before Sora can react, he disappears again. Aqua searches the room for him, but he reappears on top of Ven's chair

xml.sp: Aqua What?!
Vanitas So Venty-Wenty wants to keep sleeping. What am I ever going to do with you?

cutscene.desc: Aqua summons her Keyblade

xml.sp: Aqua Shut up!

cutscene.desc: She leaps up at him, pulling back the Keyblade for a great swing. She whips it forward but it is met by Vanitas's Keyblade. She pushes against him, but he fights back

xml.sp: Vanitas You better settle down there, Master.

cutscene.desc: She jumps away from him, flipping backwards to land on her feet, as he persues her to the floor

xml.sp: Sora Aqua, I'll handle him!
Aqua No. I'M ending this.
Sora But...you haven't recovered yet.
Aqua Sorry, but you've seen me too weak, too often. Now it's my turn to shine.

cutscene.desc: She created a hexagonal barrier around herself and Vanitas. The trio move backwards as it expands. Sora places a hand while Goofy bangs his fist on the barrier

xml.sp: Sora, Donald & Goofy Aqua!

cutscene.desc: Vanitas readies to fight. Demonstrating years of honing her craft, Aqua fights circles around Vanitas. All of the darkness he can muster fails to snuff out her light. In midair, she swings her Keyblade forward knocking him away, both fighters falling to the floor. Vanitas turns his head toward Ventus and cackles. He brings his Keyblade back behind his head, igniting the teeth of the blade and sending a meteor straight toward Ventus, creating a deep crack in the magical barrier. Sensing his plan, Aqua leaps to guard the weak point just as Vanitas sends a second meteor to finish the job. Aqua slams to the ground, her Keyblade vanishing, as Vanitas releases a dark laugh. Sora watches, helpless, as Vanitas walks over to Aqua and raises his blade

xml.sp: Sora Aqua!

cutscene.desc: Sora feels a sudden tug in his chest. Above the stained glass in Sora's heart, Ventus floats, his eyes closed in sleep

xml.sp: Ventus I...have to wake up...
Sora Yes. Tell me what to do.
Ventus The power of waking...
Sora I can't. I still don't have it yet.
Ventus You never lost it... It sleeps...until someone needs it... Call to it...
Sora I am calling...with all my heart.

cutscene.desc: The stained glass platform shines with a light and Sora appears. He lifts his Keyblade and the tip glows. A Keyhole appears on the floor in front of him and light ripples through the stained glass. Sora rises off the platform and the Keyhole shines brilliantly. Soon, thousands of white birds take off from the Keyhole, the light growing along the glass, revealing Ventus's platform. Sora aims his Keyblade, shooting a beam of light at Ventus's heart

xml.sp: Ventus Thank you for always keeping me safe, Sora...

cutscene.desc: Ventus's eyes begin to open as Sora watches Ven's heart ascend, finally released. The light shining from Ven's body catches Vanitas's attention as Ventus smashes through the barrier

xml.sp: Ventus Aqua!

cutscene.desc: He strikes Vanitas's blade, clenching his teeth, and the clash between light and darkness spills over, shattering the barrier. It settles around them in magical shards and Sora, Donald and Goofy rush forward. Vanitas bites his tongue and leaps over them silently

xml.sp: Vanitas Three guardians is more than I care to face. But now that my brother is awake...I'm just certain that he'll come to visit.

cutscene.desc: He disappears in a corridor of darkness and the group dispels their weapons. Ven helps Aqua stand

xml.sp: Sora Aqua, are you all right?
Aqua Yes. I'm fine, Sora.

cutscene.desc: Ventus pauses momentarily, noting the similarity between Sora and Vanitas

xml.sp: Ventus Huh?! You're...Sora?
Sora Yup. Hey, Ventus.

cutscene.desc: He extends a hand

xml.sp: Ventus I get it. You were my second chance.
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: Ventus smiles, shaking the thought away, and takes Sora's hand

xml.sp: Ventus Call me Ven.

cutscene.desc: Aqua touches his head

xml.sp: Aqua Good morning, Ven.
Ventus Good morning, Aqua.

cutscene.desc: Later, the seven guardians of light, along with Donald and Goofy meet in Yen Sid's study

xml.sp: Yen Sid At last, we are all assembled. First Sora, Riku, Donald, Goofy, Mickey, I cannot thank you enough for what you have done. And you, Aqua and Ventus: we are fortunate to have you back.
Aqua Thanks. I only wish we could have returned to help sooner. We're grateful to all of you for rescuing us.
Ventus Thank you.
Mickey I feel bad for letting you guys down. We tried, but we still haven't found Terra.
Aqua Don't. He studied with Master Eraqus, just like us. He's our responsibility.

cutscene.desc: She looks to Ventus, who nods

xml.sp: Riku Mickey told me that you saved me in the realm of darkness. I should have gone to help you right away. But I was too inexperienced. I'm sorry. I know that I let you down.
Aqua No, just the opposite.
Goofy Did ya know Riku's a true Keyblade Master now?
Aqua That's wonderful.
Donald The King, too.
Aqua Good for you!

cutscene.desc: Mickey blushes

xml.sp: Donald But Sora needs work.
Sora Yeah, rub it in...

cutscene.desc: They all laugh

xml.sp: Aqua I'm happy to see that you haven't changed one bit.
Sora Huh?
Aqua Sora, you probably don't remember...
Sora Umm... Uhhhhhh...

cutscene.desc: He gives her a sheepish smile

xml.sp: Aqua It's okay.

cutscene.desc: Axel clears his throat

xml.sp: Yen Sid Ah yes. Let us not forget our new Keyblade wielders. Lea, Kairi, you have made tremendous strides.
Axel Hey there. And that's future Keyblade Master--
Aqua Kairi?

cutscene.desc: Interrupting Axel, Aqua walks up to Kairi, bending closer to see her necklace

xml.sp: Aqua Incredible! It IS you.
Mickey You know her?
Aqua When you and I first met in Radiant Garden, the Unversed tried to attack a little girl. Do you remember?
Mickey Oh, gosh! That little girl was Kairi?

cutscene.desc: Kairi is speechless

xml.sp: Aqua I guess it must've worked--the spell that I cast on you.
Kairi I'm sorry. Those days are hazy for me. But it sounds like I'd have been in trouble without you. So, thank you.

cutscene.desc: She bows

xml.sp: Aqua Please. You were really, very little. Anyone would forget, hazy memory or not.

cutscene.desc: Axel clears his throat again, more forcefully this time

xml.sp: Axel This is all very touching, guys, but where do I fit in? Ven looks just like Roxas--or is it Roxas looks just like Ven?

cutscene.desc: Ven smiles and Axel notices

xml.sp: Axel And now I have to explain all of that to him--which is in itself a crazy long story--and, apparently everybody already knows everyone, and this is an insane amount to get memorized!
Ventus Sorry, Lea.

cutscene.desc: Axel gasps, pointing to his temple

xml.sp: Axel You remember me?
Ventus Yeah, 'course! We're friends. I can't believe you became a Keyblade wielder just like me.
Axel Yeah.
Sora Axel, you know Ven?
Ventus Axel? Who's Axel?
Axel See, see, SEE? Major brain-ache.

cutscene.desc: Jiminy emerges from Sora's hood and hops onto his head, surprising Axel

xml.sp: Axel NOW who?

Jiminy Not to worry, folks. To help us out, I've given each of you a Gummiphone. They've got summaries of everything that's happened so far. That way, you can read up, if you'd like. And if anyone has any questions, we can call each other.
Donald That's our Jiminy.
Goofy He's always prepared.
Jiminy proudly Mm-hmm.
Mickey Welp, we've got our seven guardians.
Sora Yeah. But...I do wish that Roxas, and Namin, and Terra could be here with us too.
Riku Since when do you mope, Sora? Come on. Terra's gotta be with the Organization. Which means we'll have a chance to save him.
Aqua Leave it to Ven and I. We'll bring him home.
Ventus Yeah, I made Terra a promise. I said I'd be there for him when he needs me.
Axel And I'll figure Roxas out. Don't know how, but...I'll get him back.
Kairi Namin is right here, safe with me.

cutscene.desc: She places a hand over her heart

xml.sp: Kairi I know that we'll find a way to help her. Trust me--I'm not giving up.
Mickey Kairi's right. We're all in this together, Sora.
Goofy And Donald and I are no Keyblade wielders, but we'll always be right there to help keep ya steady. We've got your back, not just now, but always.

cutscene.desc: Donald taps Sora's leg

xml.sp: Donald Three half-pints make a whole!
Sora That again?

cutscene.desc: They laugh

xml.sp: Yen Sid It is a shame that all of our friends could not be here. But our seven guardians of light have united. Perhaps you might say that we have nine guardians, with Donald and Goofy. Given time, I know the others will soon stand with us.
Sora Yeah.
Yen Sid Today, you recuperate. On the morrow, you journey to the fated place.
Mickey Right!
Everyone Yeah!

cutscene.desc: Later, Aqua and Ven walk down the steps of Yen Sid's tower, looking up at the life-sized painting of stars in the sky

xml.sp: Ventus The stars here are so beautiful. I noticed it when we arrived.
Aqua Yes.
Ventus We've gone without this for so long.
Aqua I know.

cutscene.desc: Ven sits on the steps

xml.sp: Ventus I remember dreaming a lot. Of you and Terra. Of Sora and his friends too, I think. And there were some more people I didn't recognize. Oh, and I saw these weird animal creatures! It's like...I've been part of some big adventure.
Aqua I've been places, too. But pretty soon...things'll be back to normal.

cutscene.desc: Ventus takes out his Wayfinder, holding it up to the stars

xml.sp: Ventus Let's share stories when Terra's back.

cutscene.desc: Aqua takes her Wayfinder out, holding it the same way

xml.sp: Aqua Yeah.

cutscene.desc: Meanwhile in Twilight Town, Maleficent walks through the Tram Common. She looks over as Pete walks toward her

xml.sp: Pete I've had it with this stupid treasure hunt. Every box we've found has been nothin' but a bust.
Maleficent I agree. Our search ends today.
Pete What-a-huh-now?!
Maleficent You cannot find the unfindable. The box does not exist.
Pete I KNEW they was takin' us for a ride.

cutscene.desc: She taps her staff against the ground

xml.sp: Maleficent Silence, imbecile. I mean the box does not exist NOW.
Pete Is that some kinda riddle? Just where we s'posed to be lookin'?
Maleficent Light and darkness are fated to clash. A Keyblade War is upon us. We need only wait for that destined moment. No matter the victors, the box will be revealed.
Pete That's it?! But when's MY big moment?
Maleficent You will have it soon enough. Once I possess the box, our real work can begin.

cutscene.desc: She enters a corridor of darkness and Pete, groaning, follows her in. Elsewhere in Twilight Town, Axel sits atop the clock tower with three bars of sea-salt ice cream. He bites into one with a sad look on his face

xml.sp: Axel Well, Roxas... I shoulda been there for you by now, but here we are.
???? Shouldn't you say good-bye to your REAL home?

cutscene.desc: He looks up, stunned, as Sax enters from around the corner

xml.sp: Axel Why...

cutscene.desc: He sits next to Axel on the ledge

xml.sp: Sax I'm not here to fight. Relax.

cutscene.desc: Sax takes one of the ice cream bars

xml.sp: Axel Hey!
Sax You can't eat all this. Why did you buy three of them? One for Roxas...

cutscene.desc: Axel looks at them

xml.sp: Sax ...and two for good luck?
Axel grumpy I dunno. Because I felt like it, okay? Why are you here?

cutscene.desc: Sax begins to eat his ice cream

xml.sp: Sax Got it memorized? Back when we were still friends, we used to sneak into the castle.
Axel Yeah...
Sax And we made a friend there, a girl. We apprenticed to Ansem the Wise to rescue her.
Axel Yeah, and we failed. One day she was just gone!
Sax You gave up.

cutscene.desc: These words sting Axel

xml.sp: Axel I did not give up. One day we're apprentices, the next Ansem the Wise has up and vanished, the day after we're Nobodies, day after that we're doing icky jobs for Xemnas. I couldn't keep up with you.
Sax Following Xehanort's Nobody was the only way to discover what happened to her. She was his lab rat.
Axel So? You found her? I helped you rise up the ranks, so I hope it paid off.
Sax I'm afraid not. Nary a trace. I started to wonder if we'd imagined her. Maybe she never existed. And then, in time, I awakened to a new purpose. I realized I could be stronger.
Axel Well, then, you blew it! Wise up already and just quit.
Sax Face it. Roxas is just like our other friend.

cutscene.desc: Axel's eyes widen

xml.sp: Sax Gone forever. You need to accept that.
Axel You wish. I'm getting her back. All of 'em!

cutscene.desc: He looks at the second ice cream

xml.sp: Axel Especially Roxas! I'm even dragging YOU home.

cutscene.desc: Sax finishes his ice cream

xml.sp: Sax The marks under your eyes. They're gone.
Axel Yeah. Don't need 'em.

cutscene.desc: Sax stands up slowly

xml.sp: Sax Always told you they'd stop you from crying. The upside down tears.
Axel Would you get lost? I'll clobber you tomorrow.

cutscene.desc: Sax smirks

xml.sp: Sax I expect no less.

cutscene.desc: He disappears in a corridor of darkness and Axel's face softens in the light of the eternal sunset. On the Destiny Islands, Riku sits on the beach, staring out at the setting sun

xml.sp: ???? How long have you known that I was with you?

cutscene.desc: Riku looks over at the voice, his initial surprise turning to warm comfort

xml.sp: Riku You DID save me.

cutscene.desc: Next to him on the beach is the Riku Replica

xml.sp: Riku I think you came along for a reason.

Riku Replica I didn't make much of myself as a replica. I was a failure, and after you and Sora moved on, my body fell to ruin and the darkness took my broken mind. I was all ready to give up and let it happen, and then you showed up.

cutscene.desc: Riku gives a small laugh

xml.sp: Riku You took that as a sign?

cutscene.desc: The Replica smiles

xml.sp: Riku Replica Maybe. I'd rather face my end with you than in darkness.
Riku That's...what you want?
Riku Replica Yeah. But I'm not done yet. Got one last thing to see through.
Riku Take the time you need.

cutscene.desc: Sora and Kairi sit on the small island next to the Seashore, watching Riku

xml.sp: Sora Hey, why's Riku all alone?
Kairi He said he needed time to himself. Let's let him be.

cutscene.desc: Sora hears a rustling and Kairi hands him a star-shaped fruit

xml.sp: Kairi Here.
Sora surprised Huh?

cutscene.desc: He looks down at the paopu fruit and up to Kairi's smiling face

xml.sp: Kairi Tomorrow's fight will be our toughest yet. I want to be a part of your life no matter what. That's all.

cutscene.desc: He takes the fruit from her

xml.sp: Sora Kairi, I'll keep you safe.

cutscene.desc: Kairi shakes her head

xml.sp: Kairi Let ME keep YOU safe.

cutscene.desc: What once was just a symbol drawn on a cave wall has now become real. They stare into each other's eyes in the glow of the setting sun. The next day, they arrive in the dusty deserted Badlands

xml.sp: Mickey It's time. The Keyblade Graveyard is up ahead.

cutscene.desc: Aqua, Ven, Donald and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Sora Someone's coming.

cutscene.desc: Up ahead, through the hazy air, Master Xehanort walks toward them, a dark glint in his eye. He bares his teeth

xml.sp: Master Xehanort Legend has it that darkness once covered the world. We know so little about the Keyblade War--only that it was just the beginning. If ruin brings about creation, what, then, would another Keyblade War bring? When the darkness falls, will we be found worthy of the precious light the legend speaks of?

cutscene.desc: Ansem, Seeker of Darkness appears to his right

xml.sp: Ansem Or will all of creation be instead returned to the shadows? Today, we will recreate the legend and see.

cutscene.desc: Xemnas appears to Xehanort's left

xml.sp: Xemnas But first... Your light shines far too brightly. It must be extinguished in order for the truth to be seen.

cutscene.desc: Vanitas and Young Xehanort appear in front of them

xml.sp: Vanitas Only when your hopes have been broken by battle upon battle can the key be claimed to Kingdom Hearts.
Young Xehanort And break you is what we shall do. It has been etched.

cutscene.desc: Darkness eminates from the five of them and consumes the landscape. Heartless begin falling from the heavens in massive numbers, joined by Nobodies and the Unversed

xml.sp: Sora Look at how many there are!

cutscene.desc: Donald, Goofy, Kairi and Axel show faces of concern and Mickey summons his Keyblade

xml.sp: Mickey Okay, gang. Get ready!

cutscene.desc: Everyone summons their weapons and dives into the fray until the battle- field is cleared of the numerous enemies and Sora, Donald and Goofy stand alone

xml.sp: Goofy Everybody else has gone on ahead.
Donald We gotta move!

cutscene.desc: They walk through a long crevice, catching up to the others at the edge of a wide, barren field

xml.sp: Mickey Is everybody okay?

cutscene.desc: Axel gives a thumbs-up

xml.sp: Sora C'mon, let's go.

cutscene.desc: Aqua and Ven nod before something up ahead catches Ven's attention. As the haze clears, Ven sees...

xml.sp: Ventus Terra!

cutscene.desc: Ventus runs toward him

xml.sp: Aqua Ven!

cutscene.desc: Ven grabs Terra's wrist

xml.sp: Ventus joyfully Terra! We found you!

cutscene.desc: Aqua catches up and looks into Terra's eyes

xml.sp: Aqua Terra, please say you're in there.

cutscene.desc: Terra's eyes move only slightly and Aqua pulls Ven away from him as the others catch up

xml.sp: Ventus What gives, Aqua?
Aqua I know that you're not him.

cutscene.desc: Ven eyes grow wide

xml.sp: Aqua Now, let our friend go!
